address.streetAddress: Av República do Líbano, 256 Shopping RioMar Recife

title: Very good
author: Marta P
reviewBody: The sweets are great, as are the prices, which are not high, and the service. I recommend the cup cakes, they are delicious.

title: Delicious
author: MelBr75
reviewBody: Madero has a very nice and beautiful environment. Service is very standard in several franchises. The burger never disappoints. At home, we are super bacon fans!

title: Italian and elegant food
author: mariafernandabg
reviewBody: Pleasant, sophisticated and elegant atmosphere. During the week, they work with an executive menu, with cover (a basket of homemade rolls, made in the restaurant, with butter), salad and main course. I ordered a saffron risotto with filet baits, very tasty. Waiters sometimes seem a little lost when the restaurant fills up, but in general the service is good. It has wifi, but no parking - depending on the time, it is difficult to find a place on the street.

title: Good
author: Berê R
reviewBody: Galeteria, several options of salad and pasta, besides the chicken. For me, all coffee shops are the same ...

title: Good cost-benefit
author: marciotino
reviewBody: The recently renovated environment has made the restaurant more comfortable and beautiful. But it continues with an open environment like most restaurants in Goiânia. I think that the open environment exposes the client to the risks of the street and on hot days, there is no air conditioning to cool off. During our dinner we were approached at the table by street vendors selling pirated CDs (unpleasant). We ordered fillet skewers that accompany vinaigrette, farofa and cassava, it was very tasty, the meat was tender and tasty. It is well served. The price is good. But, the service is reasonable, we lack proactivity and deal with the customer.

address.streetAddress: Avenida T-13, 178 - quadra S-19, lote 11 Setor Bela Vista

title: Great service
author: Juliano V
reviewBody: After a run and playing with the kids at Tia Nair Park, I stopped at Alphamall's Subway. Very good service. In addition, the sandwich is also made differently. It even seems to have more flavor compared to other restaurants. Congratulations to all for the customer service and care.

title: Excellent!
author: Tata F
reviewBody: I have been attending for over a year and the quality is always great. Yakisoba delicious and very well served (if your appetite is not great, eat two). The commercial is also neat. I love the salad dressing!

title: Best and fairest in Porto Alegre
author: guipiccinini
reviewBody: Best steakhouse in Porto Alegre. Ceaseless rotation. And the icing on the cake is the potato salad. Do not accept cards.

title: Very good
author: 517andr_s
reviewBody: Great place to order the specialty and shrimp !! Very cold draft beer and a little salty price .... it's worth it !!!!!!

title: Good
author: DanielA5876
reviewBody: Nice atmosphere, beer and very tasty homemade draft beer. Portions well served and tasty. The only thing that left something to be desired was the attendance of the waiter, which was reported when the account was closed.

title: Pleasant surprise
author: Nico003
reviewBody: We were looking for a restaurant in the western region of SP when we came across this restaurant, with a beautiful fountain at the entrance and a very large and landscaped space. The service is a bit clumsy but attentive and the food is very tasty.

title: PERFECT!
author: Annielly D
reviewBody: The restaurant is excellent in terms of service, food (hmmm), location and climate. For a couple, the atmosphere of the restaurant with music is perfect, and even better, the night with a view of the beachfront in the middle. PERFECT! It's worth visiting!

address.streetAddress: Av. Eng. Roberto Freire, 2396 Ponta Negra

title: Different
author: ismael85
reviewBody: It is a different snack that is worth tasting because the bread is very different from xis and bauru .. What I ate I thought was very good .. the atmosphere is nice too

title: Cute but ordinary
author: viniciusffm10
reviewBody: The house is beautiful, delicious drinks, but the positive experience comes up against the rude, disqualified and time-consuming service. The house looks like a mess. A friend booked 12 seats to celebrate the birthday, and when they got there, they only got 6 seats. The guests were cramped and uncomfortable. We asked for extra tables, as was agreed, and it took us 40 min to be served. Always giving an answer "we don't have more" "we can't get other tables, because other customers may arrive" "the house can't get ugly". Drinks are served very quickly, the food is a regret. 35 minutes for a coxinha and 1h20min for a sandwich. The house was not even full, I believe it is unprepared for the kitchen. I don't think about it and I won't be back.

title: Unbelievable
author: jezusgoncalves
reviewBody: Amazing! The food was incredible! At the entrance there was this toasted rennet cheese with the reduction of a regional guarana, to lick your lips! Also a few boats with plantains and a fish. In the main dishes my vegetarian of black rice, pineapples, red onion and tucumã and the other a pirarucu with mashed banana and a tucupi broth, spectacular. In addition to the flavors of the dishes, the super different drinks gave the tone of delight to our evening. This one that is on a wooden mat is a gin and tonic full of new flavors until then. We ate fast, about 20 minutes per dish the service was good and we were satisfied with the portions, nothing to be stuffed, because the food was light and tasty. Thanks Cheff Felipe

title: Tradition and great atmosphere
author: Hotellegal
reviewBody: The kibe's house is certainly one of the best if not the best point in Sobradinho, I frequent the house for a while but lately the attendance has dropped a little. Cold beer and stuffed kibe are the expensive heads of the house, it's worth checking out.

title: GASTRONOMY
author: PAIZAO
reviewBody: A cool place that welcomes you with quality service and attention worthy of 5-star restaurants. There you can meet with family, friends or couple.

title: Traditional Bar
author: robertobA2660TO
reviewBody: Located in São Sebastião square, around the Church of the same name and overlooking the secular Teatro Amazonas (inaugurated 1896), the bar of “Seu” Armando, has a simple, informal atmosphere. The clientele is basically made up of tourists and bohemians. Tuesdays have mpb from 18:00 hrs. On Saturdays, pagoda from 21:00 hrs. Place for cold beer and snacks. Codfish dumpling, shank and the famous fillet sandwich, are the good choices.

title: Bar Nota Nota Mil
author: Adriano M
reviewBody: Night bar, very good structure, cold drink and don't find it expensive, as it is cheaper than in SP, live music, snacks .... Hawaiian type place, very cool

address.streetAddress: Av. Silvio Carlos Viana, 27 Ponta Verde

title: Good, but improving
author: 368luizar
reviewBody: Very good appetizers and drinks. Same day service can be excellent and casual. Salty price, typical of the South Zone. Dirty bathrooms, with and without movement, which is unacceptable. Lack of customer education and house cleaning.

title: Terrible attendance
author: luispedrosaneto
reviewBody: Waiters ignore customers, orders that get lost on the way Between the table and the kitchen, dishes without cutlery, it takes too long. Impressive inability to attend. They must rethink whether they are ready to answer, because the way they work ... I myself will not be back.

address.streetAddress: Rua Capitao Aurelio de Araujo 135 Serraria

title: Traditional Visit
author: Marcelo A
reviewBody: Huge place with good food and cold beer. The service is also good, and on our visit, the dishes arrived very quickly. They always present promotions of dishes, which are well served and worthwhile. It has a space for children to play, but with the exception that the amount of R $ 10.00 is charged ... Not so much for the amount, but it is the type of unnecessary charge ... if the Parents can be more relaxed having children entertained, they will certainly consume more at the tables ...

title: I loved it
author: Amanda P
reviewBody: I really liked this restaurant. It is per kilo, the value is honest. Everything is new. It has several options of meat and salad.

title: Excellent flavor and super healthy!
author: Eduardo G
reviewBody: I love Pinoli, because in addition to offering a unique flavor with an exclusive recipe from the house (with options even for vegans, celiacs and lactose intolerants) the pizzeria is a great choice for those who want to combine good gastronomy with a healthy food option!

title: Almost complete absence of veg options
author: pecegonha
reviewBody: I once considered Morais to be an excellent restaurant. It was a great advantage to be able to eat pizza during lunch hours. However, in recent times, the restaurant has increasingly extinguished the meatless options of its buffet. Even a pasta with broccoli they did "the favor" to put bacon! It really is a complete neglect with the vegetarian public that is becoming more and more present and constantly rising. Lack of complete understanding of the market in which it operates. Let's see now ... who knows, maybe in a while they will offer diversity again. When I find out that I am, I'll be back with pleasure.

title: Delicious pizza!
author: Denise_CGranata
reviewBody: The pizza is wonderful! Sophisticated and pleasant atmosphere! Friendly staff. The price is expensive, but it is worth it for special occasions.

title: Bongiovanni
author: RAM202
reviewBody: Cozy restaurant with excellent service. It has parking and the decor is pleasant, as well as the lighting. The cuisine is very good, but the restaurant has a cover charge, mainly due to the quality of the toast (very hard).

address.streetAddress: Avenida Engenheiro Domingos Ferreira, 2655 Boa Viagem

title: Everything excellent
author: paulapfcurado
reviewBody: The menu and wine list, combined with customer service and the new address at Flamboyant, prove the beautiful management of Piquiras,

title: Excellent
author: Sarah17303374
reviewBody: Excellent service, good location, cozy, tasty food, we made 3 different orders and they were all very good, price was normal, we had lunch to the sound of a beautiful piano.

title: Good food and great service
author: carlos D
reviewBody: There is no live music, but it ends up being positive, because the conversation flows better. Delicious food, good drinks, the best pinã colada in Brasilia, beers of good brands, an atmosphere reminiscent of street bars in Rio de Janeiro. We liked a lot.

address.streetAddress: Av. Alameda Gravatá, S/n Águas Claras

title: Wonderful restaurant, from the ambience to the food!
author: PedroScavuzzi
reviewBody: The restaurant is all perfect from the menu to the place! The Chef is always at the house serving customers and the dishes are perfect! The starters are wonderful, I recommend the carpaccio! I recommend Filet Du President as a main dish or Palde de Cordeito which is also perfect!

address.streetAddress: Rua Desp. Humberto Guimarães, 877 Ponta Verde

title: Wonderful place!!!
author: itstealves
reviewBody: Cozy atmosphere with a very kind and helpful staff. The pizza is very good and with a magical flavor so good kkkk And the brownie, besides being beautiful, is very tasty. They are to be congratulated!!!!

title: Best cost benefit
author: 739pedrol
reviewBody: Salmon with sesame crust in teriyaki sauce and Moroccan tabbouleh. A show! Sensational atmosphere and music in the right tone.

title: Cool place
author: 886karlaf
reviewBody: Cool, beautiful and well-groomed place, another terrible service, a waiter who takes a long time to order, a separate order, I ordered a large fruit salad and the bowl came in half !, it takes to bring, to pay ....

title: Maintains the tradition of excellence
author: Anna Amalia G
reviewBody: Same pattern as the matrix of João Pessoa. Pleasant atmosphere, very spacious, excellent service. Wonderful menu, difficult to choose among so many options of starters, dishes and desserts. Worth it. From 1pm there is already a queue.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Odilon Gomes de Lima 1772 Bairro Cidade Jardim

title: Good Picanha
author: ottouro
reviewBody: A place with complicated parking, however, of a very well made and tasty steak. You choose the piece that the waiter takes to the table and wait. Not being able to wait, I advise you to go elsewhere. I never had any major problems waiting for me to know, so here's the tip. The price is a good size. I always go. Try it.

address.streetAddress: Av. T-2 Setor Bueno E Rua 10 Setor Oeste

title: dinner
author: Marcos Rogério D
reviewBody: Cozy place, but I found it a bit expensive. Very varied menu, for all tastes. I recommend. Very picturesque environment.

title: Very good food and pleasant atmosphere!
author: julio940
reviewBody: It is worth visiting the restaurant ... great options on the menu ... from entrees to desserts. Three people eat an oxtail risotto very well, for example. Located in one of the noble neighborhoods of the capital of Maranhão, it is worth the visit.

title: Delights in the historic center
author: Karen Angélica S
reviewBody: What a nice place! Beautiful and cozy, in the historic center of João Pessoa. Tasty dishes and top ten service! The jabuticaba juice is sensational!

title: Good
author: arquiteta_danibaco
reviewBody: Great location. We sat on the open deck which is beautiful. We ordered the onion portion, which gives about 3 people, delicious. We ordered the dish with 2 meats, one of which was the rib with barbecue and the other was a bit burnt.

address.streetAddress: Av. Deputado Jamel Cecílio Flamboyant Shopping Center

title: Coral Tintas Launch
author: Michele S
reviewBody: Excellent service by the Coco Bambu Porto Alegre team in special thanks: Metrie Thiago, Calebi, Kleber, Luiz thank you for your attention. Marketing Team Coral Milene Dannus

title: Excellent service
author: Sensatao
reviewBody: Seeing on TripAdvisor that the restaurant would be open until 15: 50h on Saturday (despite closing every other day at 14: 30h), we came face to face with the restaurant closed. Still, a waiter came to greet us outside and when I informed him that the TripAdvisor schedule said it would work until later, he promptly called the manager, who invited us in. Lucky us. The atmosphere, although small on the ground floor, is very cozy. There are tables on the second floor, too. Although famous in the city, it refers to a traditional neighborhood restaurant. It has a kilo buffet with spectacular snacks, with many options. It makes you want to try everything. The menu is very varied, with many choices of pasta and sauces, with or without meat. The dishes were very well served, delicious, and the meat at the requested point, very juicy. The courtesy of the staff in the initial service clearly reflects the quality of the product they sell. I tasted like I want more.

title: Best pasta in town
author: robertakunzlerl
reviewBody: Best pasta restaurant in Maceió! My favorite dish is the ricotta rondota with walnuts. The crispy pie is incredible. Good service and fair price.

address.streetAddress: Rua Comerciario Jose Pontes de Magalhaes 271 Jatiúca

title: Eat whatever you want.
author: Carlos Cezar A
reviewBody: Excellent indeed. I've been going there for about 30 years and I've never been disappointed. Everyone I took there always liked it a lot. And it is not limited to meats: there are fish, moquecas, paella, prawns and sushi. The meat is excellent.

title: Unmissable!
author: Karinamd7
reviewBody: Good choice for couples who want to enjoy a dinner with great menu in a first class environment, with fine quality music and an incredible night view over the City of São Paulo !!!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Brigadeiro Luis Antonio, 4700 Jardim Paulista

title: cinematic view with great food
author: ricardovb
reviewBody: Restaurant in a privileged location due to the view of Rio de Janeiro. It is difficult to get there, for tourists it should not be easy, but it is worth the visit. Very good food, good variety of dishes, appreciation of Brazilian food with international touches. Very good wine list with emphasis on the production of the house within the organic concept. The production of own beer is also a highlight. Very good service.

title: Excellent Order!
author: Pedrinho F
reviewBody: Excellent restaurant. Lean but varied menu. Exquisitely prepared dishes. Incredible pizzas.

title: Great pasta
author: Maécio P
reviewBody: A great place to enjoy good pasta. Pleasant environment, with impeccable hygiene. The service captivates those who visit, highly approved

title: friends
author: Pedro S
reviewBody: very good service, our waiter ronaldo and maciel were excellent, as well as delicious food offered us

address.streetAddress: Rua República da Armênia 1154 Água Fria

title: Good snack
author: Andersonribei
reviewBody: Service needs to improve. The snack is still delicious, but some employees do not like it.

title: Quality and fair price
author: duarte_ac-sp
reviewBody: Quality and fair price is what the house offers. Abadejo in several options, in addition to other dishes, which can be served in half portion. leaves nothing to be desired by the brothers of the Grande stream.

itemReviewed.name: O Rei do Abadejo Restaurante Praiano

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr Gentil de Moura, 386 Ipiranga

title: Northern Pizza
author: vald0l
reviewBody: Wow pizza of various flavors from the North, with that exemplary service is typical Nortista, I loved it and I will definitely return, OBs on the day I ordered half dried meat and Peperone, with edges is accompanied with a wine ...

title: Excellent!
author: AlecsandraPM
reviewBody: Beautiful restaurant, impeccable and personalized service. The menu has options for all tastes, from the starter to the dessert is all wonderful. Cozy atmosphere and thought of all the details, it even has an internal elevator for the comfort of customers, it doesn't seem like it is inside a mall, congratulations to Coco Bambu.

title: a place where the tendency is wonderful
author: robertafreitas2006
reviewBody: it has a beautiful view of the beach, a nice climate and a very good food, which is extraordinary

title: Oldest restaurant in town!
author: NIMSI
reviewBody: It is a traditional Bar / Restaurant. There you can try a delicious scalded cuiabano that is only there. It has a wide menu and the food is very good.

address.streetAddress: Praça 8 de Abril - Goiabeiras Bairro Goiabeiras, proximo ao centro da cidade.

title: Simply Sensational
author: Magally M
reviewBody: My husband and I went for a moqueca, we ordered the whiting with small shrimp, the taste was excellent, delicious, and served perfectly 04 people, we didn't know it was so well served ... The menu has excellent options ... Really very good I will come back more often

address.streetAddress: Rua Alcino Pereira Netto, 570 - Jardim Camburi Varzea

title: Wonderful!
author: jadsons680
reviewBody: The best dishes and the best drinks in the city. Very friendly and welcoming service. Very tasty dishes. Chef Aurelien is a delightful, wonderful professional!

address.streetAddress: Rua Eurycles de Mattos 191 Rio Vermelho

title: nice food
author: DurvalRCB
reviewBody: Japanese restaurant with reasonable quality food at a slightly salty price. well located, good service

address.streetAddress: Avenida Professor Carlos Cunha 1000 Lj 144 Jaracaty

title: Good option in Pompeii
author: Daniel L
reviewBody: The bar has a small but good list of craft beers. I who love wheat beer always have great options: Baden Baden, Paulaner, Schneider Weiss and Franziskaner. To eat, as I am a vegetarian, I always bet on the delicious curd cheese and garlic bread skewers. The service is cordial, has sidewalk tables and is open late during the week. Well good!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Professor Alfonso Bovero 1008 Pr Dos Sonhos

title: Very good
author: catiam891
reviewBody: Everything very fresh and tasty, very attentive service. It's worth the wait if you have to queue!

title: Great option
author: Ana S
reviewBody: Great food. Good for celebrations or business meetings. Dishes well served. Varied cuisine, including regional dishes.

title: Good food
author: urbanos
reviewBody: Dona Mariquita is already a classic in the Rio Vermelho neighborhood. Small, cozy and simple restaurant. This is precisely the proposal: simplicity and flavor. Maniçoba, sarapatel, auça rice and moquecas are my favorites. On hot days, it's hot, prefer the air-conditioned environment, although the air conditioning doesn't always do the job. To beat the heat, ask for a caipirinha (with cachaça!). Enjoy your food!

title: Top of Paraiba
author: Dindapimentel
reviewBody: Delicious seafood and fair prices. We ordered a delicious seafood platter (squid lobster sauce, squid prawns ...).

title: Wonderful food
author: jeancarolina
reviewBody: I recommend this restaurant. Menu of quality and excellence in execution. The service is first class.

title: Chocolate Cake!!
author: marueiraperret
reviewBody: We ordered the 3-course menu (starter, main and dessert). I had a very good oxtail risotto (and I don't even like oxtail :) The fish stew is also very tasty and the chocolate cake is a must! I highly recommend the visit, but it fills up early, because it is very small.

title: Great restaurant
author: None
reviewBody: A French speaking maitre D 'who was very professional in our arrivval. Good explanations. From the menu. Great service. Good food. An unforgettable night with our friends celebrating their 33 'weeding birthday. Keep some fo of the Room. the hotel's traditional magnificiant desserts; great decor

title: Excellent lunch and service
author: leticiamarotta
reviewBody: I set up a work meeting and we had lunch later. I loved the place, the atmosphere, the service and the food. Delicious dishes and fair prices! Super recommend!

title: To eat and not goat
author: cfukunari
reviewBody: The best goat I've ever tried. Soft and tasty meat. Generous and equally tasty side dishes. Fast and attentive service.

address.streetAddress: Rua Marquês de Valença, 50 Boa Viagem

title: Excellent
author: Cláudia M
reviewBody: Great food, atmosphere and service. Fair price . Best restaurant we went to in Natal. We repeat 3x in a week. It opens at 6:30 pm for dinner, arrive at that time, otherwise the queue is huge.

title: Nothing more
author: Marcelo_Ducati
reviewBody: Well located, with parking on site, it serves the pasta table and the chicken, which were very good. The other pastas, served on a rotating basis, were not bad, but also nothing very good. They also serve some meats such as maminha and pork ribs. The price is high for the quality of the food. The service is very good, the waiters are attentive and polite.

title: Great gastronomic experience
author: Gretasanches
reviewBody: They offer delicious pastries. I really enjoyed the bruscheta, ca kiwi caipiroska and the juices (lemon with groselia). High points: decoration, price, tranquility, good music, quality of dishes and service Low points: location a little out of hand, but this is very relative. For those who live in mangabeira is close

title: Italian food
author: Pellucio
reviewBody: Nice atmosphere, tasty Italian food, however, the value is not very much taken into account. Worth knowing.

title: Tasty experience
author: gabrielapls
reviewBody: I was at Jamies on a Tuesday night by reservation, which I recommend because even on this day it was full. We ordered a basket of bread and funcky chips, both delicious! As the main course we ordered the most famous of them, linguine with shrimp, I ordered the smaller portion, which comes a little but is enough for those who ate starter. It was tasty but nothing more than expected. The other dish ordered, roasted eggplant was very good. And for dessert, we ordered the brownie, delicious! The service was excellent and the price adequate to what was offered. And the restaurant's atmosphere is very pleasant. Highly recommend the visit!

title: Very tasty
author: Tereza123
reviewBody: Bavarian delicacies and tea is excellent. In my opinion it is better and better served than the German house, although it is more refined. Located right in the commercial center of the city, car access is a little difficult. But it's worth checking out their delicacies, which are wonderful !!! I recommend

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont, s/n Orla de Atalaia

title: Good steakhouse
author: Solange a
reviewBody: Big and nice steakhouse. Great variety of meats and great flavor. Price 56.00 per person. Rotation

address.streetAddress: R. Fernando Luis Henrique dos Santos, 713 Bessa

title: I recommend
author: Pbcmatos
reviewBody: The string bean retaurant is one of the best in the city, with several locations spread across the city. The place has very good food, as well as the service and a very nice decoration.

title: Too expensive and too simple!
author: Gerson C
reviewBody: I asked for a pasta and it came too soft and the meat was too hard. A simple meal at a very high price. Good service.

address.streetAddress: Rua da Paz 237 Esquina com Rua Bahia

title: Good food, bad service
author: marciabedetti
reviewBody: The food is good but the service is very bad. I believe that the public is too big for the amount of waiters, a pity.

address.streetAddress: Rua Bernardo Guimarães, 2267 Entre Av Olegário Maciel e Rua Santa Catarina

title: Better to forget the service
author: danymascolo
reviewBody: Poor service that Saturday night. I thought this steakhouse was of great quality but I regretted having dinner there ..... super-cooked meat (certainly from lunch) the director was very sullen ...... account: R $ 231.00

address.streetAddress: Rua Emilia Marengo 504 Jd. Analia Franco

title: Beautiful view
author: CarlosYohei
reviewBody: On the roof of Shopping Bossa Nova Mall which is attached to Santos Dumond Airport, it offers a good menu, drinks and beverages. Due to its location next to the airport, it provides an excellent way to start a trip and the view from its roof is one of the best in Rio de Janeiro.

address.streetAddress: Av. Alm. Sílvio de Noronha, 365 Rooftop do Hotel Prodigy Santos Dumont

title: It is a big challenge, but needs to improve the wait !!
author: Augusto W
reviewBody: We waited more than 90 minutes and gave up. We are Madero fans, but we need to pass a forecast close to reality. Simply saying that there is no forecast, knowing that it can take hours is even a lack of respect for the customer. That same day there was a large group with 2 babies that was also not attended. Anyway, we gave up on the table but there is no food. We asked for the trip ...

address.streetAddress: Setor Comercial Norte Quadra 6 - Conjunto A Shopping ID

title: Reasonable.
author: 234brunan
reviewBody: Dom Gourmet does not have the best food in the world, but it is a great place to gather many people, as the atmosphere is wide and the location is excellent. The pizza is reasonable, the price is nice. In addition, they have the option of rotating sushi on certain days of the week, so anyone who doesn't like pizza can opt for sushi.

title: Great
author: Amira1987
reviewBody: Great option for an evening and for those who have a taste for a taste! I recommend, we went with a couple of friends and we loved it !!

title: Still just good
author: Fernando B
reviewBody: I ordered a dish from the menu, despite having a buffet at that lunch time, I preferred to order one of the dishes from the menu which was not bad, but did not have enough quantity for the price of the dish, it was very low despite the price of a normal dish. The service was excellent as I have always been served in all these years that I frequent La Mole, more than 40 years.

title: Excellent
author: marcuscaleiras
reviewBody: Good food, excellent service, very pleasant atmosphere, live music, reasonable price, I recommend.

itemReviewed.name: Cachaçaria do Dedé e Empório - Manauara Shopping

title: pleasant night
author: dago48
reviewBody: Well the place suggests meetings and really and very conducive as the name suggests, it has a great atmosphere with a beautiful frequency, there I had a beautiful meeting and soon I will return to Bahia and hope to have an excellent meeting there, RS.

title: Delivery on time, tasty food and quality service.
author: JESSICA P
reviewBody: Great option for those who like Arabian food: kibes, spears, kaftas and more. The price is very affordable and the service is fast and quality. I usually ask for delivery.

title: Very cozy atmosphere and good food
author: EduardoGuimaraesRJ
reviewBody: I have been going to the Preface bookstore for over a decade and have always had great experiences there. The environment has excellent decoration in a very cozy space. The service is great, the foods (sandwiches, quiches, desserts) are very well prepared and different and the drinks offered (craft beers, wonderful cappuccino) are diverse. if you're in Botafogo and want a safe haven for a snack or coffee, go without fear.

title: Very good, but expensive
author: jaque_nascimento
reviewBody: The food is very good, has a lot of variety and several desserts that are a temptation, at the exit there is also a coffee and delicious hot chocolate available, but the price is quite salty.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Ministro Jose Americo de Almeida, 986

title: Just reasonable
author: MSBacha
reviewBody: A correct Italian restaurant, but that's about it. For the prices, one would expect a more differentiated cuisine. Far from being bad, but the cost / benefit is not worth it.

title: Expensive and BAD food!
author: J Netto N
reviewBody: I haven't been to a place to eat so bad in ages! As soon as I arrived I immediately ordered shrimp broths and what came were seasonal broths! They were green !!! I've never seen it in my life, everyone at the table agreed with me, so we returned it. Right after a fish, mercy, what was that, total disappointment, very poorly made and tasteless. As we were in a CAMEROON HOUSE, we had also ordered a portion of garlic / oil shrimp and the shrimp was full of water (as if it had not been thawed properly). We paid the bill, half salted, and left. Summary: Expensive and bad food! I don't intend to go back. Paying dearly but eating well still pays off, but I don't recommend the place.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Engenheiro Abdias de Carvalho 2910 Capim Macio

title: Hot!
author: ALINE M
reviewBody: Very good location, good menu, friendly staff, family atmosphere. It's great to know that there are places like this and Christmas!
userLocation: Natal, Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil

address.streetAddress: Avenida Erivan Franca 108 Prq Cento E Vinte

title: Chefs Club promotion gotcha
author: 906ricardop
reviewBody: The house announces 40% discount for holders of the Chefs Club card. When asking for the price of the rotation, we are informed the value of 69.90. Obviously we thought that the 40% discount would be applied on this amount, however we were surprised by the bill when they claimed that the 40% discount would be related to the value of 99.90 advertised on the menu and that 69.90 would be the value of another promotion . Brazilian thing. We will never go back.

title: Great
author: LaylaBarcelos
reviewBody: Great service. A wide variety at the buffet and at the carvery. The best is the low price with wonderful quality.

address.streetAddress: Av. Roberto Freire, 1070 - Capim Macio Capim Macio

title: Dinner overlooking the local architecture by the owner
author: DarioAllevato
reviewBody: House specializing in pasta in general, of excellent quality. Both the menu and the architecture of the place were developed by the owner, who in addition to being an Italian is a commander! The location is privileged with a view of the sea in the middle of the coastal avenue. Excellent taste and variety. Calm and comfortable environment with fast and efficient service! I recommend the visit that I consider to be a must!

title: Wonderful service
author: monyamota
reviewBody: Genildo's Kiosk is extremely pleasant! is right in front of the sea. The attendants are very attentive, make you feel at ease and always checking that everything is fine. It is well organized and clean. The foods are tasty and cold drinks! It makes you want to stay there all day, just eating snacks, having a cold one and lying on the sun lounger lol. I recommend! Grade 10!

title: Great Pizza but missing draft beer, really?
author: cacoRiodeJaneiro
reviewBody: Despite the failure to serve beer, as the waiter said he was missing, the pizza is good and worth the visit, great ingredients, both salty and sweet, and the starters are worth the try, to minimize the lack of beer, at least less wine list eh honest

address.streetAddress: Rua Saturnino de Brito, 50 Jardim Botânico

title: Excellent!
author: paulacleone
reviewBody: We vacation in JP every year and always go to this restaurant. The cod is divine, fair price, small but pleasant atmosphere! I recommend!

title: Sensational view
author: RS-Paula
reviewBody: I went to Skye a few times, usually to enjoy the view which is very beautiful. My last visit there was for dinner. I ordered a fish (wrapped in a banana leaf) that was + _, it lacked flavor. But what my fiance asked for was wonderful. I pinched the meat our friend ordered and it was delicious. However the price is quite steep.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Brigadeiro Luis Antonio, 4700 Jardim Paulista

title: A Franco-Carioca bistrot
author: suddy2016
reviewBody: What a pleasant surprise it is to discover in our Rio de Janeiro a new space as charming as Le Pulê. And for several reasons: First, the name. He is brilliant and forces everyone to speak French well. Then we have the place: a charm. Finding a bistrot that could be at the Marais in Ipanema is awesome! In addition, it has a decor that resembles a bistrot with the joy of French grannies' tea houses; to complete a carioca bar, open to the green and the sun of Ipanema, with a lively, happy audience. Trendy place that an efficient service can handle. To complete a very good meal with the flagship - the jerk - of the gods. Ah! And honest prices and good choices of wine by the glass and bottle. Why didn't I give it high marks? To encourage them to take action regarding refrigerated air. In our approaching summer in Rio, what currently exists will not do.

title: Cool
author: Patrícia G
reviewBody: The atmosphere is very nice, and the service on the beach too, the waiters are very helpful and the beer always arrives cold. But the food is average, and the price is very expensive for what is served.

address.streetAddress: Rua Desembargador Manoel de Andrade Teixeira 266 Praias do Flamengo

title: Very good!
author: 305anacristinav
reviewBody: I've been to Rocco twice and it hasn't disappointed once. Julieta is incredible, the mixture of guava jam in the sandwich is formidable. It is noteworthy that they serve water from the house, something unusual still in Brazil. It's worth the experience, I'll be back for sure!

title: Pleasant Contemporary Food
author: GapRio
reviewBody: Located in Porto da Barra, near Farol da Barra, this place has a large balcony with a beautiful view over Bahia de Todos os Santos, where you can enjoy the best of contemporary food and watch one of the most beautiful sunsets in Salvador . Very pleasant environment, has an air-conditioned environment, impeccable service and a menu with good options of snacks and dishes. Worth knowing.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Sete de Setembro 3959 Porto De Barra

title: Excellent
author: Anibalbezerra
reviewBody: A delicious Spanish restaurant, in one of the most charming neighborhoods in Salvador, the result could not be different: Uma Maravilha !! Nice atmosphere, nice staff and amazing food !!

title: Note 10
author: ca2muller
reviewBody: Excellent burger at Cidade Jardim. We had the option of chicken and ordered rustic potatoes, like canoe, to accompany. The chopinhos was cold, the service was attentive.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Vice Presidente José Alencar,1350 Empório Jardim II

title: Good restaurant
author: GustavoCastro
reviewBody: Feijão de Corda is a good restaurant in São Luis, with a very good location, good variety of dishes and good service too. I recommend this restaurant.

title: Great restaurant
author: lelo1965
reviewBody: Great restaurant, spectacular location, very good service, very attentive waiters and maitre d ', excellent wine list, simply spectacular seafood.

title: Great option
author: Gianfranco S
reviewBody: The atmosphere is very pleasant. Good service in spite of a mistake that occurred, but these are things that happen. I really liked the taste of the dishes.

title: Best Rib
author: MagdaG506
reviewBody: Excelent reception!! Delicious boneless and breaded ribs !! Too bad it left the menu !! Come back with her !!

address.streetAddress: Av. do Contorno, 6061, Savassi Shopping Pátio Savassi

title: Very good
author: Juniski
reviewBody: An honest and varied self-service including a Japanese wing, many seafood, poultry, meat, risotto and even lobster. Those who like the style will love it.

title: Delicious!
author: Malu Cunha S
reviewBody: This restaurant is one of the best in Natal. Incredible variety of salads, for those on a diet it is perfect. Freshly grilled meat and fish, Camarao dishes every day. It has a very select clientele, because the prices are not cheap, but it is worth every penny, because the food is wonderful and the service is perfect. The only one, however, is part of the parking lot, which is small and it is very difficult to get a place during busy times.
userLocation: Natal, Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil

title: Good crepe, but the place is very noisy
author: julidgm
reviewBody: I've been to this creperie a few times, since before, when it was called la plage and occupied another address in a strong house. He loved the crepe there. It's still good, but I thought you lost a little. The place managed to add more, with a playground for children and a closed lounge with air conditioning for those who want to stay away from the fun. The hall near the playground is extremely crowded, being very noisy on busy days. The service is reasonable and the food is good, but it could go back to being excellent as it once was. There is ample parking at the rear of the house and perhaps the best place to sit is, in fact, in the air-conditioned lounge, otherwise your meal will become unbearable with noise. It is no longer an intimate setting for dating or chatting, but a place geared towards family groups with children. The price has also increased a lot.

title: Great place to visit with the family
author: Seaside794409
reviewBody: I already knew the bamboo coconut in Brasília, but the one in Belo Horizonte surprised me. Spacious location, excellent food, pleasant service. I thank the official Willian for the attention and cordiality.

address.streetAddress: Rua Francisco Deslandes 900 Shopping Anchieta Garden Shopping Anchieta Garden

title: The forró is good but the service. .. !!!
author: Juvenal d
reviewBody: Located in front of the beach, on the beautiful shore of Salvador, it is an option for those who want to enjoy a real forró, that mountain range that is increasingly difficult to find. On Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday nights there are a number of groups playing forró. Usually the first attraction is the best. Now the service leaves something to be desired. I've never seen so much disrespect for the customer. When the house is full, you arrive and enter what would be a waiting list (so far so good, but all the time a group came and talked to a guy there and they went in, skipping the line without any ceremony. And the manager simply told him ignore it when asked. I would have left at that moment but I was accompanied by people who wanted to come in and try the forró. Well, what a regret. They charge for the entrance and another buffet with almost no food and to make things worse it was cold and Half an hour later they emptied everything! A bad joke not to say anything else. A pity because the music is good

title: Best of the world
author: Luiz34
reviewBody: There is no mistake in the end of the afternoon: after the rain D Maria do Carmo installs her tacacá in front of the Colégio Marista da Av. N Sra de Nazaré and the line is formed. Taste the soup sitting in the plastic chairs eating your prawns and jambú leaves with lots of pepper on the stick, as tradition says and then sweat, shake and feel refreshed by the most famous delicacy in Pará!

address.streetAddress: Av. Nazaré, altura do nº 902 Nazaré

title: Nice place, but salty in price !!!
author: tonycavalcanti2014
reviewBody: I had with friends to the place, and we were well attended, but Recife's fame of being a good price is no longer, in 3 appetizers payments R $ 200 approximately, and it really does not justify such a price !!! Restaurant managers should know that keeping the price reasonable not only brings more movement, but also guarantees better profitability !!!! Dilutes the risk and pays less taxes ...

address.streetAddress: Rua Marquês de Valença, 50 Boa Viagem

title: Brewery with many titles
author: Carolyne L
reviewBody: Local with many national and international beer titles. Menu with meals and lunch available during the week. Good location.

title: Wonderful!
author: anikkita
reviewBody: From the entrance, to the beer, which comes straight from the craft brewery next door, to the impeccable pasta. And on top of that it is inside the Eataly, a must for gastronomy lovers!

title: Good food
author: Samira d
reviewBody: This is another excellent quality restaurant in Goiania. I recommend it for those who like high level food !!

address.streetAddress: Av. T-2 Setor Bueno E Rua 10 Setor Oeste

title: Time consuming food with a hair
author: KellyToledoGomes
reviewBody: The park itself is beautiful! Beauty is the most beautiful place in Curitiba, however we had a bad experience in the restaurant where we stayed more than 1 hour waiting for the order because they forgot to send it to the kitchen and when I complained they sent me a plate quickly, but with a hair inside. Anyway I recommend the park but not the DECK

address.streetAddress: Rua Frei Bernardino Tomat, 330 sobre o lago do parque tangua

title: coffee with charm and magnificent view
author: Andreia de Carv... M
reviewBody: located in Pelourinho, almost in front of the hotel convento do carmo, this place becomes a different meeting point with friends. In a colorful house, like all the houses that make up the block, glued together; and, when you reach the bottom of the café, you can see the best view of Salvador Bahia, with a unique and unforgettable view of the sea.

address.streetAddress: Rua do Carmo, 50, Santo Antônio Centro Histórico

title: WORTH IT
author: MariaJoseStarling
reviewBody: This restaurant is worth visiting. Cozy atmosphere, very clean and very tasty food. If it is a little expensive? It is, however, for those who do not attend it routinely, one must go. It is a restaurant, on Rua Curitiba with Gonçalves Dias, well located with valet, balconies overlooking the street. I say expensive, but weighing what you order, it's not so much, depending on the portion and the dishes you order. You can order dishes that will cost, say, R $ 45.00 per person. I forgot to say that he has dishes like Hot Philadelphia that is worth tasting as well as Yakissoba, dishes that we ordered, in addition to others, that we also tried and were in 4 people, which maybe made the bill higher!

title: Delicious dishes!
author: Natalia F
reviewBody: The restaurant has delicious dishes, it only left something to be desired in the last two times, as it had no shrimp or strawberry for dessert.

title: sushi is good, but the service and price are not worth it
author: 381LucasB
reviewBody: the sushi is very good, but it is by far the sushi with the worst reef service. Usually you eat good sushi, but you get stressed out with the poor service.

title: Beautiful and pleasant place
author: Christianebarros
reviewBody: Beautiful and pleasant place. Good service, tasty food. It is not sensational, but it is delicious. As the place is beautiful, it is worth visiting.

title: Beautiful place, salty bill, food without charms
author: jopcd
reviewBody: I went to the Italian to celebrate Father's Day. The restaurant was not full but unfortunately the service left something to be desired. The excess of waiters made one run over the other, forget orders or not take finished dishes. Entries are expensive and unbalanced. We ordered a pan meat that arrived with 4 slices of bread. We had to ask for 3 more portions of bread to be able to eat the starter and those portions took longer to arrive than the meat itself. The main dishes are also not very charming. Nothing spectacular and the price is very high. Lousy wine recommendation. Beautiful place but will not be returning. Extremely disappointed!

title: A bigger highlight as a snack bar than a juice house (little variety of fruits). I expected more.
author: edunakabr
reviewBody: I went with my friend at Skina dos Sucos after reading the reviews on TripAdvisor, however we were disappointed with the little variety of typical / different fruits. Perhaps for some gringo the variety of fruits in this place is "absurdly excellent", but for travelers who know Brazil well, this place left a lot to be desired. In short, I believe that this place should be known more for snacks, than for the variety of juices. I can give you an example of a juice shop located on the bus station in Londrina, which has much more variety of fruits than this place. If you're passing by, and want to have a juice, come. But if you are going to travel here expecting a wide variety of fruits from the region, don't waste your time.

title: GOLDEN PEARLS
author: maria p
reviewBody: excellent food, free range chicken, sun-dried meat with milk sauce, very good sururu broth

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont, 957 - Praia de Atalaia, Aracaju - SE Orla da praia de Atalaia

title: The best Tambaqui
author: B4234CTricardoc
reviewBody: Excellent fish cake as a starter. The best tambaqui without bones, on the grill, from Porto Velho. In small, medium and large sizes. The File of golden on fire is also excellent. Pleasant and spacious environment. It has large tables reserved for families. Parking in the back with side entrance. Restaurant with the same menu as Casa do Tambaqui.

title: Quality music and variety of drinks !!
author: Andreaesilvan
reviewBody: The place is very cozy, varied menu, shows at night with music of various styles and the view of the sunset is perfect !! The only thing they need to improve is the sales of drinks, because I thought it was unnecessary to buy a plug to be able to buy. Direct selling could be done !!

title: An excellent choice
author: Murilo Tadeu L
reviewBody: I didn't have the pleasure of sleeping at the hotel, I just had dinner at the restaurant on Valentine's Day. Dinner was amazing, the menu offered great combinations of starter, dinner and dessert. The ambient sound, pleasant light and the great choice of wine bottle made the dinner unforgettable.

title: This is the famous "3B"!
author: EdsonYK
reviewBody: If you are looking for a basic, good and cheap restaurant ........, here's an option! The rustic atmosphere, without air conditioning, nowadays makes the meal somewhat uncomfortable, but as a compensation, you can enjoy a "homemade" food, served on the wood stove. The dishes are based on Minas Gerais cuisine, without much refinement and by the way, with plenty. The in-house system is self-service, streamlining the process and allowing the customer to repeat the dish they liked best, without being attached to a menu .... I recommend it!

title: Very good!
author: carolchavesmc
reviewBody: Most popular tent on the beaches of Maceió. As it is more popular, it ends up being the one with the highest prices, but nothing that takes away the curiosity to know and / or attend. Ideal to enjoy with friends. Top ambient songs! I recommend it, especially to enjoy the sunset.

address.streetAddress: Av. Silvio Carlos Viana, 27 Ponta Verde

title: Cozy canteen
reviewBody: Very good and homemade meal with a very wide menu with snacks, snacks, juices, dishes and vegetarian options.

title: Bad experience
author: colliercaico
reviewBody: I went with my wife to buy two salads for the trip, initially to our surprise we were charged a service fee, asked about what service the employee could not explain, there was no manager on the spot, pointing out that packaging fees had already been charged. When I got home another unpleasant surprise, the sauce was spilled all over, pointing out that it came into my hand, which confirms that it was the employee who caused the problem. Finally, the Cesar salad was terrible. I don't recommend it and I won't be returning.

title: Always good
author: mauricios880
reviewBody: Excellent food and service, warm atmosphere and cool people. The rice balls with starter relish are a must.

title: Fabulous
author: Edson_Meneghini
reviewBody: One of the best restaurants I found in João Pessoa when it comes to food, the location needs no comment, we had lunch on a Sunday, so JP's high society was in full force, a damned "payment", but it didn't hinder the excellent meal. But in general, prime service, fabulous food, delicious dishes, tasty starters.

address.streetAddress: Av. Cabo Branco, 5160 Frente Ao Mar - Cabo Branco

title: Good dishes!
author: 704wagnerl
reviewBody: All our dishes were made of shrimp, all were good, a very pleasant atmosphere, good service, a very clean bathroom and dishes at a fair price. It's really worth it!

title: Otimooo
author: jo_ocE8784UX
reviewBody: The quality of the pastry is the best in Brazil And a very good service, polite, pleasant and kind people I hope that does not change these qualities

title: Wonderful!
author: 96pamm
reviewBody: Delicious food with typical varieties made in an innovative way. Super interesting menu. Very different drinks made with local products. Very nice restaurant, with competent professionals. It is in front of the theater. Beautiful and old place.

title: Must visit in Maceió
author: marcoslimaoliveira
reviewBody: Good food, fair order and excellent service, from waiter William and all the staff. It is a mandatory restaurant when visiting Maceió.

address.streetAddress: R. Gen. João Saleiro Pitão, 1296 Ponta Verde

title: Excellent crepe
author: RenataPena
reviewBody: Beautiful and cozy environment, has an outdoor area and another heated. It suits couples, families and groups of friends. Usually families with children stay at the end of the restaurant as it has a toy area and so it does not bother couples who are in the central area and in front. We stayed in front and didn't even notice the noise of children playing. We ate a delicious crepe, which is very large and has left us quite satisfied, the average price is R $ 18 to R $ 30.

title: Cozy atmosphere!
author: anapaulascherer
reviewBody: Excellent food, warm atmosphere and good service. On some days, it is good to go on time due to the waiting time.

title: Disappointed
author: arthurizidoro
reviewBody: It takes 1 hour to deliver a dish Bad drinks. Couple at the next table, who were already at the restaurant, received, after complaint, the dish after our order. Group of 5 people arrived after our arrival and received their dishes in 15 minutes. Arrogant and unprepared maître. Microwave defrosted dish. The salvation of the restaurant was the waiter Alexandre: attentive, he apologized countless times for the failure of the Mezzan. The experience was so bad, that Alexandre insisted not to charge the dish with a defrosted aspect (Lula with shrimp, worth 70 reais). Bad experience.

address.streetAddress: Avenida General Edson Ramalho 1131 1º andar do Hotel Manaíra

title: Good service, good food
author: Eduardo B
reviewBody: The service was friendly and helpful. The place is nice and wide, with several tables. Food well prepared within Habib´s standards. Liked it.

title: Impressive!
author: patriciaftimo
reviewBody: I went to this wonderful restaurant for dinner on a Friday. I made the advance reservation When I arrived I was surprised by the size and beauty of the place. And as we enter, we have several surprises. Different environments, sophisticated decor and special service. The restaurant has 3 levels. I stayed on the second level balcony. The night was cold but no problem, it has a heater and blanket to keep warm. During the day it must be very different from the night, as it has a children's section. Well priced wine and very tasty food. Would come back again to try all the dishes.

title: meat spot
author: effernandes
reviewBody: pleasant environment. I tasted the steak tartar and it was great, the problem was my wife's meat, which asked "to the point for good", which came rare, we returned to spend a little more and the meat came back burnt on the outside and still rare in its interior. We did not return again because the wife was very hungry and decided to eat the edges of the meat. really disappointing.

title: Wonderful
author: _dhr88
reviewBody: From zl I believe it is the best temaki and hot roll I have tasted, the waiters are attentive, food came quickly and fresh, the quality is exceptional, temaki very well served and hot rolls divine, very tasty, very well done.

title: “Great option to enjoy the evening with friends
author: YaraNeves
reviewBody: I went to check out Bar do Alemão and I loved it, a good place to go with friends, family and even two, draft beer and German cuisine, very fun, feeling like we're in another country.

address.streetAddress: Rua Doutor Claudino dos Santos 63 Largo da Ordem

title: Super yummy
author: Nino_Melo
reviewBody: Delicious sandwiches, especially the teriyaki chicken. Excellent location, on the main avenue of the neighborhood. The only bad thing, which happens on all subways, is the queues for ordering. Employees need to be faster!

title: Steakhouse without many options
author: Luiz P
reviewBody: Few meat options and limited salad buffet. Still on the buffet there are prawns, but they look unattractive. There are countless better options in Natal.

title: VERY WELL RECOMMENDED
author: CarolMendonca
reviewBody: CARNE DE SOL DE PICUI - and number 2 on the Internet, but we didn't go. It is on Pajucara beach, at the end of it, and half away from the "bombante" part. It is recommended to hide meat from the sun and dessert, tapioca ice cream with spoon and honey.

title: Liked it
author: Eduardo A
reviewBody: Very nice place. Very delicious food. Pizzas of various flavors. I recommend the chicken with catupiry. It was worth the visit.

title: A good option
author: Alexandre H J
reviewBody: We tried this restaurant on a Saturday at 14:00, at this time it is difficult to get a reservation at other restaurants, but in this one the queue was short. We didn't expect much, because the attendant at the door offered a tatami room and we would share it with another family, I was in doubt, but we accepted. In fact, it is very comfortable and there is a small screen that separates the two tables, providing a little privacy. We stayed in room 20 and it costs R $ 17.00 per family, other rooms cost R $ 15.00. The menu is typical Japanese, has tonktsu, sushi, sashimi, etc. We ordered a teishoku, tonkatsu, additional rice, a portion of dumplings and a jar of pineapple juice with mint. Everything was very tasty, even the dumplings. The service was friendly and helpful, there is a bell in the tatami room to call the attendant. In the end we paid R $ 155.00. 2 adults and 1 child aged 11, all left satisfied with the meal. I recommend a visit and choose the tatami room, a fee is paid, but you will have privacy, you can even lie on the mat to rest.

title: Impeccable service
author: Bianca F
reviewBody: As much as the intention is to eat when we go to the restaurant, the taste of food can be in the background depending on the service. At Djapa I was very well attended and guided, I didn't know how it worked and they explained it to me patiently and even made suggestions for dishes. The food is delicious, a sensational variety of sushi. The salmon dumpling and bundle are delicious and very dry, the oyster gratin and crab cone very tasty and in general everything is very fresh. We only realize how it makes a difference to be well cared for when we go to a place where we are treated badly. I prefer to pay a little more and eat well and be treated well as I was in Djapa. It's worth it, a fair price for great service!

title: Excellent food
author: 717let_ciay
reviewBody: It was not the first time I had been to the restaurant, so I decided to take my Italian friend over to meet. The website said it closed at 00:00 so I arrived at 23:20. But when arriving at the place, the reception guy informed us that they could not attend us because he had more than 8 waiting tables in front of us and then there would be no time. We were upset because it was my friend's last night in SP and had spoken very well about this restaurant. We were calling Uber when the manager called us and said he would get us a table and we could wait at the Bar. We were happy with the news, but when we entered there were not more than 8 people in front of us as the host said. But as for the food, everything was perfect! The dough is very well made and the flavor is incomparable!

address.streetAddress: Rua Jeronimo da Veiga, 30 Itaim Bibi

title: Great. Great food
author: dguedes2013
reviewBody: The quality of the food is excellent. The service is very good and the owners are very attentive. The place is small and busy and there are usually queues at the weekend, but the wait is worth it. The food is really good. It is possible to buy to take home. The breads are very good

address.streetAddress: Rua Professor Almerinda Dutra, 65 Rio Vermelho

title: Place to enjoy at night
author: ORLANDO C
reviewBody: Located in the Bermuda Triangle, where several bars are found. Beautiful and well frequented environment. Very good service. The pastries and the hiding places are delicious. Good live music from 10pm. This bar always sells. Get there early.

address.streetAddress: Av Anisio Fernandes Coelho Ljs 8,9,12 E 13

title: Different option in the mall
author: Filipe M
reviewBody: I was at the house with my wife for a Saturday lunch. It was a little later and the service was very attentive. Prices are not low, but there are several interesting options on the menu. The fig bruschetta is excellent! The house salad was very good and the risotto with parmigiana was also good. I would return to try other dishes.

address.streetAddress: Av Olégario Marciel 1600 Segundo andar - Praça dos Restaurantes, loja 030 - DiamondMall

title: Good service and best sushi rotation
author: GuiaLuzivan
reviewBody: Menu with a lot of variety, quality and excellence ... really good ... hummmm❤ So far it was the best carvery I've found here in Salvador ...

address.streetAddress: Av. Centenário, 2992, Lj 142 , 1º Piso Shopping Barra - Barra Gourmet

title: Very good!!!
author: Viviane V
reviewBody: Excellent Peruvian. Good service. Delicious food is excellent value for money. It is very worth knowing. Prime location.

title: Great dishes
author: Gabrielaasbr
reviewBody: The pastas are delicious, the wine list is good. The only drawback, perhaps, is not accepting debit or credit cards.

address.streetAddress: Av. Heitor Beltrão, 126 Tijuca - Rio de Janeiro

title: He gives for gasto.
author: Sivieri
reviewBody: Famous with good menu. Presentable atmosphere and good service. Regional food with a gourmet touch in the dish description. Salty price. I expected more than a winning Travelers' Choice ™ 2013 restaurant. The restaurant's ingredients lacked "spice": fame; creative chef; high price.

address.streetAddress: Rua Libertador, 102 Nossa Sra. das Graças

title: Great!!! very delicious and exceptional service
author: Fabiamo G
reviewBody: Great!!! The variety, quality are unquestionable. Delicious tapas and exceptional service!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Almirante Tamandare Complex Alim. Varandas De Tambau

title: Excellent feijoada on Saturdays !!!
author: Adrianopilot
reviewBody: I recommend the feijoada on Saturdays (around R $ 39.00), a great option for those who live in Vila Mascote. Order a very good Burgman beer made in Sorocaba !!! I also recommend artisanal sausage as a snack.

title: I was surprised
author: 304fernandal
reviewBody: When you enter the restaurant it is already very well received. The food is delicious. Plenty of candy options. The food from Minas Gerais is delicious, it has a lot of flavor. I simply loved.
userLocation: Parelhas, Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil

address.streetAddress: Avenida Campos Sales, 622 Esquina com Rua Mossoró

title: Delicious barbecue
author: Tarsila7
reviewBody: Quality service. Great steakhouse, with very good quality and service. You can't let go. After that beach, dying of hunger is the ideal to try all the delights.

address.streetAddress: R. Fernando Luis Henrique dos Santos, 713 Bessa

title: This is the best cachaçaria
author: Amaury L
reviewBody: Very good service and be sure to tease your appetizers and Amazon beer. Great options and flavors.

itemReviewed.name: Cachaçaria do Dedé e Empório - Manauara Shopping

title: Excellent codfish cake! Take care of how many draft beers you take to avoid surprises!
author: fabianneverlindo
reviewBody: Jobi is a very nice bar. The cuisine is very good. The prices are not inviting, but the standard is a thousand. The codfish cake is wonderful!
userLocation: Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil

title: Good option in the Center
author: Anelise N
reviewBody: Good quality food, excellent service, very clean and well maintained environment. Unfortunately, you have little choice of drinks.

title: Already was better
author: Sayumi M
reviewBody: I went to Jamie's Italian 3 times, both times were good. The last time I found the food bland, the dough was very dry, I tried the potato with garlic and salt, which had no garlic in it. Anyway, I think the crisis got there too, they are saving on ingredients.

title: Tasty food with a view!
author: marcondes
reviewBody: Good execution of the dishes but the food arrived a little cold on the table, but it did not compromise the final result. Reservation recommended on weekends. Attentive waiters.

title: Bad experience
author: Jair S
reviewBody: We ordered food for 4, it came for a maximum of 3 ... The tambaqui was really tasty, but on the menu it said it accompanied rice with jambu, farofa, campaign sauce and sautéed potatoes. The sauté potato was not served even after we announced that it had not come twice. At the end, the waitress took us to the manager or owner (I don't know for sure) and he said that he could only cash 1 real of the potato, on a plate that charges 129 reais, because the potato would be decorative (on the menu it said that it accompanied the food) . With this treatment I do not return to the place and I do not recommend it to anyone

title: One of the best of sampa !!!
author: Diego D
reviewBody: Restaurant with one of the best rodizios served in sao paulo! Fresh fish and good variety of dishes, in addition to serving fresh oysters and crab cakes ... In addition to a differentiated service, with dedicated attention from all the waiters in the house ... For me it is an example of a restaurant in the city !!!

title: Spacious
author: Sugaeli
reviewBody: Even though it is a restaurant chain, which should have the highest product quality in all stores, this is not the case with this chain. And that was evident in this branch. Salad buffet, w / regular presentation. The quiches were cold (in other units, they get hot), The fried cauliflower was also cold. I had the feeling, that it was all yesterday, that they decided to serve today. I will not be returning to this unit.

title: Good
author: MarinaBotelho
reviewBody: The pizzeria lounge is spacious, with a covered kids space, the restaurant also has parking. The menu is quite varied but I found the prices a bit salty. Everything is very well served. I asked for a steak that they said served 3 people but would serve 4 without a doubt. The waiters are polite. Would go back other times.

address.streetAddress: Rua Coronel José Benjamin, 824 Padre Eustáquio

title: Hot Coffee
author: Pedro P
reviewBody: Great options to start the day with a nice meal, thank you for the good service and dedication to "me" customers ^^

address.streetAddress: 303 Norte Al 10 SN Lt 17 Plano Diretor Norte

title: Very good food
author: LarissaFGJ
reviewBody: The restaurant has a good location, is beautiful, the service is good, the food is varied, well seasoned and very well served.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Praia de Ponta Negra 8952 Ponta Negra

title: Good range
author: Mauricio_viagem
reviewBody: Restaurant specializing in pies with a good variety of flavors. The quiche we ordered was perfect. Regarding meat pie with beer, I expected more. The pie is very stuffed, but the meat is very processed and a little too heavy. Prices are fair (R $ 70 to 100 a large pie for approximately 6 people).

title: Great restaurant
author: PrislaAguiar
reviewBody: With a view of the sea, it leaves us very comfortable, making the place well discovered. Very tasty food, but with a little high price. It is worth knowing, but if you are going to order starters, main course and some drinks, prepare your pocket. LOL

title: Very good
author: anabqf
reviewBody: Restaurant with a family atmosphere, varied menu options, very tasty dishes, friendly and helpful staff.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Engenheiro Roberto Freire 2951 Bl 5 Lj 7 Capim Macio

title: Perfect!
author: Karina M
reviewBody: I went to celebrate my anniversary there, the place is super cozy and the candles are romantic. The food was wonderful, from the starter to the dessert (delicious Dutch pie). The price is right, some dishes are expensive because they are more sophisticated, but they also serve simple meals. The dishes didn't take long to be ready. I highlight the service of the waiter Deivison, who was super friendly and attentive throughout the dinner. I will come back several times and recommend everyone.

title: Legal
author: NFelipeMendes
reviewBody: It is a charming and well located pizzeria, which basically works with pieces of pizza, instead of whole pizzas. It does not have much variety, as it usually offers a limited menu of flavors per day. The pizza is good, but nothing exceptional.

title: Pleasant happy hour
author: mario_andrade
reviewBody: I have been with my family twice at happy hour. the atmosphere is very pleasant, with a beautiful decoration.The service is impeccable, the food was good, the drinks well prepared and the fair price. The only drawback is the air conditioning, which is very cold, even uncomfortable.

title: Always a good choice
author: feferrazpimentel
reviewBody: I met Cabana in 2009, returned in 2017 and now in 2018 and I can say that the quality is the same. The dish is very well served, the food gives you the feeling that it is fresh and besides being very tasty, it is also very abundant. I recommend the Filet de Carne de Sol and the PH salad that has a fantastic dressing. Photo of “elephant ear” (fillet of carne de sol)

address.streetAddress: Rua Joao Damasceno 24 A Farol de Sao Marcos

title: Couple vacation
author: FraneBreno
reviewBody: We really like the restaurant. Well located. Delicious fish, dish for two very well served. We went by a friend's recommendation and we were very satisfied. I highly recommend it.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Cabo Branco 2300 Praia de Cabo Branco

title: Best restaurant in the capital of Rio Grande do Norte
author: PauloBoaventura
reviewBody: Excellent atmosphere and food. Very good quality of the dishes and cordial service. Variety of prawns including tasty starters.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Very good!
author: camilad467
reviewBody: An excellent bar for those who want to drink something while listening to a rock. Fair beverage prices, provide 600ml beer in a single cup making the experience even better. Stupidly cold beer! I ate a rib sandwich that was sooooo worth it. The bar provides billiards and a game of chess.

title: Tasty Chinese cuisine
author: hugolmf
reviewBody: Peaceful setting. Varied menu. Good price. Best Chinese food in town. Yakisoba delicious!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Engenheiro Roberto Freire Km 1962 60 Capim Macio

title: One of the best Christmas pizzas
author: Marcus N
reviewBody: We went to dinner with two people on a Saturday night. We were not led to a table, but as the house was not full, it was not difficult to find a place to settle. We were attended to very quickly, as soon as we sat down. The atmosphere is very good, pleasing from couples having dinner, even families with children. We ordered a medium pizza, half parma with catupiry, half pepperoni, with wholemeal pasta, without a stuffed border. It quickly arrived at our table. The half parma with catupiry was excellent. Light and tasty. The dough was thin and well baked. The pepperoni half was not bad, but it was not in my taste. The ingredients were very good. It is noticed that the sausage is of quality. However, I thought there was a lot of tomato sauce. Although I didn't ruin the pizza, I believe that if the tomato sauce had been used more sparingly, I would have enjoyed my dinner even more.

address.streetAddress: Av Eng. Roberto Freire, 4330 Ponta Negra

title: Pleasant atmosphere in a tanned place
author: Leopetruska
reviewBody: Very tasty restaurant with buffet with very good service inside the Mangal das Garças. Family atmosphere and with very good regional food options. Excellent acai pie. Very well conditioned and of quality. Price a little high but the whole is worth it. It hurt in the end, as there was no umbrella or interest in taking protected customers to the vehicle. We had to wait more than an hour for the rain to pass.

address.streetAddress: Rua Dr. Assis Parque Ambiental Mangal das Garças, Cidade Velha

title: Picaha on the plate
author: Eloisa Orfila F
reviewBody: I ate a picanha on the wonderful plate, accompanied by a farofa and tropeiro beans, the price is good and so is the atmosphere. Very pleasant service.

address.streetAddress: Rua Marquês de Queluz, 728 Orla de Pituaçu, próximo ao parque.

title: Excellent!
author: JORGE B
reviewBody: Great cost / benefit. Regional foods, like sun meat with abundant and tasty curd cheese. Attentive waiters, good wifi.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Praia de Ponta Negra 8952 Ponta Negra

title: Good, but not great
author: mtnaves
reviewBody: Small restaurant, offering food with a personal touch from the chef. Short menu, with interesting options. Mass predominance. Fresh produce, but lacking a little flavor. It wouldn't be bad, but it isn't great either. Perhaps because it is just beginning, the waiters lack attention (and training?). We ordered a juice, it came wrong twice. We asked for a starter, the waiter did not order ... Dinner for two with wine (the cheapest in the house) for about R $ 250.

address.streetAddress: Scls 302/3 Bloco A - loja 10 - Asa Sul

title: One of the best POA sushi
author: giulianocapelettio
reviewBody: I had dinner at sushi by cleber yesterday. I ordered the tasting menu, I found the quantity of sushi and the quality to be excellent, I just couldn't find anything more for dessert. The service was good. I will be back for sure.

address.streetAddress: Rua Des. Espiridião de Lima Medeiros, 317 Três Figueiras

title: Amazing
author: Leandro L
reviewBody: A restaurant with exceptional cuisine, where all dishes are extremely tasty, and above all, this unit has a spectacular view of Fortaleza's waterfront. It is worth a lunch or dinner there, and the unique order is the International Shrimp that made the restaurant famous. Serves 4 people very well.

title: Good service
author: thalles_rafa
reviewBody: We chose the crab, the flagship of the house. Six generous crabs came. The beer is very cold. I recommend.

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont, 527 Praia de Atalaia

title: Divine
author: LilianS12345
reviewBody: Wonderful restaurant, extremely pleasant atmosphere, the dishes are well served and many are delicious. Going to Natal and not eating in Cameroon is impossible.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Excellent
author: Nilo G
reviewBody: Excellent restaurant, with a beautiful view, delicious food, good service, fair price! Super recommended!

address.streetAddress: Rua Borges dos Reis, 158 Rio Vermelho

title: Mandatory stop in Salvador
author: Eburgos23
reviewBody: Coco Bambu is a very good restaurant, has a very varied menu and at a fair price. My fiance and I ordered the international shrimp dish, which served us very well. To get a table we waited about 20 minutes, as it is a very busy restaurant, but it is a very cozy restaurant and the fact that it is full did not bother us. I will be back for sure.

address.streetAddress: Av Prof Magalhaes Neto, 1273 Lot Aquárius, Pituba

title: Very good!
author: lorenna_or
reviewBody: Differentiated restaurant, with a fixed menu according to each cuisine of a country. The day I went, Asian food was served, wonderful, appropriate for our taste. Recommended!

title: Terrible
author: 725patriciac
reviewBody: Warm environment, we ordered Sicilian risotto and file that came burnt and the risotto was anything but Sicilian, hot and stuffy, few waiters ... I don't recommend it and I won't be back.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Rio Madeira,3288 Porto Velho Shopping

title: Mineira food
author: Marcelo K
reviewBody: several options of traditional mining cuisine, in a rustic and spacious environment, close to nature. for those who enjoy broths and pizzas, a trip to dinner is recommended, with a very reasonable price.

title: Ground fire
author: jackilene
reviewBody: Magnificent food with many varieties of meat and on the buffet. The service is rated 10. They have a valet. The downside is the high price.

title: Excellent food and good service
author: thiagohoma
reviewBody: I went to the restaurant only once, this one time I ordered the fish dish with bread crust, I was really impressed, the food was very good, the service was also good. A single point, if you're in a hurry, I suggest you don't go, the food took a while to arrive.

title: Excellent option in Campo Grande!
author: 136karlag
reviewBody: Pleasant environment! Good service! Great drinks and the burrata is worth a try! The bourbon bee drink is 10!

title: Snack bar
author: Thereza B
reviewBody: Probably the most natural ones like it, but I didn't do my kind. It cannot be classified as a restaurant, but as a snack bar.

title: love
author: Jéssica G
reviewBody: great variety of breads, sweets, savory, has a good service, is well located, and everything is very tasty, I recommend

address.streetAddress: Rua Jose Maria Rios 908 Vl Ivonete

title: Sadness 222
author: mave_rick
reviewBody: In Brazil, "gourmet" food is confused with little food, that is, unlike a true (complete) gastronomic experience, here "gourmet" food comes down to a withered main course. If you want the full experience, you will pay separately for each step of the meal, a shameful greed! That was the case. The main course is not so expensive, despite the very small amount of food served. But I already knew that ... I didn't just know that the potato gnocchi over wild boar meat ragú (R $ 40,00 individual) would be so tasteless. Worse, in a moderately busy restaurant, the dish took 40 minutes to reach the table. Much worse: when asked if a salad served as a starter could complete a two-person meal, a servant with bad dishes addressed me this way: "look, master, this is a restaurant with fine cuisine, all the dishes are individual". Well, the issue was never financial, otherwise I would be in a cafeteria; I had the distinct impression that the servant was, perhaps, snubbing me. And you still called me "master"? I did not give him freedom, I treated him with respect and education, I deserved the proper treatment: sir. Simply sir ... but even that, Terrace 222 can't offer me. So, friends, get over this Sadness. Hotels with some (supposed) sophistication often have starred restaurants ... not the case. Food without salt (literally), cost: poor benefit and unfortunate service. Walk five minutes and have a much better dining experience in restaurants at the Shopping Fashion Mall. Or embrace Tristeza 222, and stay in the pit afterwards. I warned...

address.streetAddress: Avenida Aquarela do Brasil 75 Localizado dentro do Hotel Royal Tulip

title: Good food
author: Carlos Gabriel C
reviewBody: Nice place and good service. Offer and presentation of dishes with good variety. Good cost-benefit.

title: Lunch
author: amaliac922
reviewBody: Very excellent food, perfect service, dish for two, very good price, very clean, cozy atmosphere, delicious dessert, worth it, lunch and dinner.

title: I loved the bar.
author: Calzinha
reviewBody: Very pleasant place, good service, good music, privileged location, delicious food, good prices. Excellent program in Fortaleza

title: Formidable
author: liciaa2015
reviewBody: Cozy atmosphere, very good physical structure, well attended, excellent service, wonderful menu and the best iced tea I have ever drank. Auction at happy hour.

address.streetAddress: AV. TANCREDO NEVES, 148 Caminho das Árvores - Shopping da Bahia

title: Interesting proposal ... not so much flavors
author: kymotta
reviewBody: The menu is very nice, but the dishes didn't matter. The caipirinha also left something to be desired. What saved us was the service. It is not a place I recommend.

title: I didn't find all that
author: Well_Leite
reviewBody: this restaurant comes with an agreement when we arrived in the city, there was a lot of advertising and I didn’t find all of it not good and expensive food too

address.streetAddress: Avenida Praia de Ponta Negra 8952 Ponta Negra

title: The best of Christmas
author: amandalft
reviewBody: I have come to this restaurant a few times and I speak with propriety that it is the best restaurant in Natal without a doubt in my opinion. It is much better than Nau, mangai and all the others. Firstly, the setting is beautiful, second, there is parking, the waiters are always kind (coincidentally it is almost always a little old waiter who serves me, and he is extremely polite and friendly). Third, and the main element the food is great, well served, if you stop to analyze it is not that expensive. The only dish there that I saw expensive are the ones that have lobster, but lobster is naturally expensive. Congratulations on the large and clean shrimps. Suggestions: appetizer of caprese, dish for 3 people or 4 “international prawns” or “dijon prawns” and dessert “Romeu and Juliet”. You have to arrive early if you don't want to queue. Because the restaurant is very good, everyone wants to eat there. At the entrance you can be scared with so many people going super dressed to eat in the shrimp. But at least the first time I went, I was simple and I was well attended to anyway. Go the way you want. Note 10 for the camaroes restaurant, and keep it that way.

title: master
author: Monique O
