reviewBody: love the habibs. from anywhere ... it's okay that today your esfihas are not so attractive in relation to the price ... but it remains a great choice !!!

address.streetAddress: Av. Gov. Flavio Ribeiro Coutinho, 615 Manaira

title: Delicious food!
author: Juliabbarros
reviewBody: Pleasant atmosphere, ventilated outside, air conditioning inside. Very cold beer, assorted menu and you can choose with your eyes closed! Everything is good! Highlight for oxtail risotto !!

title: Delay, bad manners, delicious food
author: divinov2016
reviewBody: We were very poorly attended, food was very slow. Rude waiter. Lack of paper in the bathrooms. We came on a Sunday. I don't recommend it.

title: Really Original
author: janeamaral
reviewBody: For the third time in this restaurant, I only make myself surprised every time I go to dinner there! Really a new concept that Salvador was in need of! Congratulations to the chef for the original dishes that are renewed every day!

address.streetAddress: Alameda Das Algarobas, 74 Caminho das Arvores

title: Great meat! However, too noisy and crowded
author: None
reviewBody: The formula is simple: a buffet for starters, and then as much meat as you can eat! The meat is good ally, and they serve more than 10 different cuts. The service is very good, always trying to please. However, they focus a lot on pushing it to order more drinks. The only con is the place is very noisy and crowded. Nice restaurant at all for meat lovers !!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Reporter Nestor Moreira S/N Botafogo

title: Good food vs. questionable service
author: Fernando B
reviewBody: The food was really good, the service was being very good until the moment they got our order wrong. As we were on a protein diet, we chose a dish from the menu and requested to exchange the portion of rice for a portion of vegetables, however the cook cooked the vegetables together with the chosen dish and sent the portion of normal rice. We called the waiters again who placed the order, and they simply took out the rice and removed some vegetables, returning the same dish. I found it ridiculous for the price and recommendations of the place.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Praia de Ponta Negra 8952 Ponta Negra

title: Excellent service
author: Ricaneves
reviewBody: Excellent service, good food and acceptable cost. I recommend the lamb or the Rib-eye. The small size folders already serve those who are not very hungry.

title: Irreverent proposal.
author: CarlosDouglas
reviewBody: I had a good experience! I went with couples of friends, we had a very pleasant evening. We really enjoyed it! It may not be exactly a place for dinner, but the drinks, and the structure of the house are quite attractive. Well frequented environment, divided into 2 environments. It is worth knowing, I will certainly return.

title: Differentiated gastronomy
author: Maneis
reviewBody: Great option of Mediterranean cuisine, Arab specialties, dry and filled artisanal pasta with different types of sauce, noble meats, quiches and pies and to finish off sweets and desserts. The pizza is simply divine, thin and crunchy with several filling options, always with a touch more than special !!! Worth a try!!!

title: Mix
author: MARINEWTON
reviewBody: It has a dish that serves the whole Family, it's the Parmegianno Mix, very tasty !!! Don't miss out!

title: Variety
author: lelathompson
reviewBody: Delicious atmosphere, in the half light, super attentive attendants, and what can not be missing in a culinary establishment: delicious foods. It features a wide variety of pizzas, one more tempting than the other. Great for that warm up before the ballad!

address.streetAddress: Rua Desembargador Sampaio 263 Praia do Canto

title: Exquisite flavors
author: andrexandre
reviewBody: Super nice place and menu with great options. Good wine list. Excellent for a romantic dinner. Unmissable.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Excellent
author: Brunoufebp
reviewBody: Bodega is a typical northeastern restaurant. The atmosphere is very cozy, with an air-conditioned part and with very rustic decor, very typical from the Northeast. The service is always courteous, there are many delicious dishes and regional juices too. The price is a little expensive, but it is well worth it. The location is close to the edge of Ponta Verde beach, ideal for those who enjoy the boardwalk and do not want to move around to eat. I recommend!!

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: I didn't think anything was too much
author: 331luizs
reviewBody: I went after Lebanese Syrian cuisine but I think I was wrong. It's even more like a closed-sfihas fast-food without much distinction.

address.streetAddress: Largo do Machado, 29 Loja 32 - Catete, Galeria do Condor

title: Dinner
author: Bruno Jose F
reviewBody: It was a great family dinner !!! The food was wonderful, and with a mouth-watering salad just by looking! With the great service from Moraes we can enjoy the night with tranquility and without stress. The night got even better with the voice of Lia Godim !!!!

address.streetAddress: Av Prof Magalhaes Neto, 1273 Lot Aquárius, Pituba

title: Quality dropped too much
author: mlima51
reviewBody: Outback is always my choice for a meal when I go to Pátio Savassi. But I was there this weekend with my family and I was impressed how the quality dropped. The children's dish is incomparable, and the fillet with pasta that I always eat really bad. I make a constructive criticism here, as I have always loved the network.

address.streetAddress: Av. do Contorno, 6061, Savassi Shopping Pátio Savassi

title: The best in town
author: Tiago D
reviewBody: I was surprised by the quality of the steakhouse. It is attached to a gas station, in a less favored location, far from the center and the other "gastronomic bands" of the city; so much so that I have lived in Campo Grande for six months and had not yet gone through it. However, it is the best steakhouse in Campo Grande. On the first visit we opted for the buffet, without the carvery. The buffet variety is exceptional, a vegetarian would not feel bad there. The next day, we returned to full rotation, taking advantage of the holiday promotion. I tasted a spectacular ancho steak (which there is called entrecote), which I imagined would overshadow the other meats. However, the picanha tip on the skewer and the chicken heart are also memorable. The service is impeccable, especially from Maitre Pedro, extremely friendly and committed to serving. Too bad they don't open at night.

address.streetAddress: Av. Coronel Antonino, 3514 Anexo ao Posto Figueira

title: Lunch with cousins
author: Edsonjam
reviewBody: The place remains very pleasant, with a structure worthy of a first-rate restaurant, including waiters, etc. After the renovation, it gives a show in almost all the restaurants of São Luís, mainly in the item "PRICE", because they practically kept the same. Improvement points. - They removed from the menu the option of dishes for just one person. - I found the men's room small (top floor), considering the size of the room. Overall, the restaurant remains the best in São Luís, in my opinion.

title: Excellent meal
author: Amandasultanum
reviewBody: The menu is well summarized, but appeals to many palates. Be sure to order the pastry, the best I've ever eaten. The dish for 1 person is so well served that if you are like me, you like to order several starters, the dish serves 2. For dessert, the soft cake is all good! And to close with a flourish, the price .... very good! You have to arrive early, I waited about 30 minutes to get a table for 2 adults and 2 children.

title: Best sun meat on the island
author: marcellobatistaps
reviewBody: Without a doubt the carne de sol is the main dish of the house, it serves up to 4 people very well, it is very tasty and juicy. The atmosphere is very pleasant and the service from the waiters is reasonable.

title: great reasonable price
author: Josi L
reviewBody: this restaurant has 2 in natal one of the most prestigious because it has a shrimp anyway they take you by van in the hotel but don’t worry and so much advertising that you will surely know that the perfect service is not a cheap restaurant but the dishes are big and give it to 2 people so it pays off in half 85 reais the cheapest when I was great exquisite

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Food and culture!
author: brumigu
reviewBody: I recommend it to everyone looking for good food and music in the heart of Lapa. Rich and varied cultural program with music, literature and exhibitions. Formidable food and very fair price! Don't miss the cuts, sandwiches and vegetarian options. Highlight for the differentiated and warm service of the team!

title: great place to go
author: RONALDO P
reviewBody: place with good atmosphere, you can sunbathe and order some food, cold beer, good service, I just found the music too loud

address.streetAddress: Av. Silvio Carlos Viana, 27 Ponta Verde

title: Very good!
author: 612paolam
reviewBody: Really enjoyed! Great service. I loved the food. I went with a friend and ordered the mix of cevit only we chose only shrimp and the traditional cevit with potato chips. Very good and the price is super affordable and still has the 2016 certificate of excellence from TripAdvisor.

title: Bom Bonito and Cheap
author: Bárbara F
reviewBody: Great quality Japanese food. Good combos promotions. I loved it, great value for money. I recommend !!

title: Healthy coffee
author: GilMaragojipe
reviewBody: Handicraft is a small and cozy place with low carb food. The Paes and Salty are wonderful. A good breakfast, quiet, deserves to know and care not to overdo it so the bill doesn't get salty, makes you want to go out and try everything. It is on the same street as the Doc Bar in front of the Sá Marina lounge. Enjoy

title: No reason to return
author: ALF_010476
reviewBody: Place with outdoor tables which I like, however there is only one person serving the tables. There are a lot of street vendors circulating between the tables which is very uncomfortable. The bathroom is unique for men and women and very small. It has many brands of beers, but none without alcohol. The portion we ordered was good. Difficult to park close due to the number of bars on site.

title: An authentic French bistro in Salvador!
author: bavesfil
reviewBody: Impeccable ambience and service. Wonderful view and the meal from the entrance to the delicious dessert.

title: I recommend!
author: Carlos Wellingt... A
reviewBody: I happened to meet the Hamburgueria Descolado, now located on Avenida Almirante Barroso, in the center of Rio de Janeiro, right in front of Largo da Carioca. Excellent burger and very friendly service.

title: Very good food
author: igorf860
reviewBody: Very familiar atmosphere, fraternal service, excellent food. If it's on holidays or holidays, you may have to wait in line.

title: Thankful surprise
author: 701danielam
reviewBody: The Del Plin restaurant at the Village Mall was a pleasant surprise. On an island, surrounded by shops, from the underground kitchen there are well-prepared and tasty dishes. The atmosphere, although open, is elegant and pleasant. My husband and I went from Menu della Settimana, with great value for money. We both ate the Arancini and the salad (delicious, but no photo), I ordered the Tagliatelli al Pesto and Burrata and he the Saltimboca Alla Romana and both the dessert Cartas para Julietta. Very good! Our friends ordered other dishes from the traditional menu that they praised as well, although her pasta has gone a little over the point and was softer than desired.

title: Excellent hamburger
author: Luciano B
reviewBody: A house specialized in hamburgers, Apache has great options at a very attractive price. Cookies are worth trying. Very good.

title: A good idea well put together!
author: sidsp11
reviewBody: It is very good to see a good idea well executed. Good staff, attentive, well uniformed and seemed to me well trained Lean menu in lol dishes but worth the footprint of sandwich and salads well prepared, appetizing and everything with a very natural footprint. Plenty of drink options! Impossible to drink just one My observation on the food is that even though it is only very natural, the food could have a little more salt, after all salt enhances seasoning and without salt it seemed without seasoning (fetuccini photo) My sandwich is perfectly sized and well presented but if it weren't for the tare, life would be missing (wrap dd mushrooms photo) The iced coconut cake was incredible, wet just but could have a little more sugar, even if it's a natural sweetener. For dessert, the cheese bread at the entrance has a good tapioca footprint, but it could be more cheese bread with tapioca instead of tapioca with cheese.

title: Good, simple but expensive food
author: AnaKarolinaMCM
reviewBody: It is a self service style restaurant, the price of a kilo is relatively high for a restaurant that is not sophisticated and haute cuisine. Although the price is steep, I like the food there, there is nothing extraordinary, but there is a good variety of Chinese and Japanese food.

title: Romantic dinner
author: 828let_ciam
reviewBody: Cozy atmosphere, quality service! Super recommend! Spectacular service by everyone, especially by Clebson. I recommend.

title: Excellent!
author: 462julianav
reviewBody: I loved the place, an old garage that was super stylish and cozy with tables inside and outside. Hocus pocus beers in the range of 15 reais and a good menu of sandwiches and snacks, highlighting the hot dog, wonderful !!! Good choice for a happy hour.

title: Great option
author: Claudio N
reviewBody: Great options and very diverse dishes. Quiet and familiar place. Service always streamlined, note ten

title: Recife - Joao Pessoa
author: Ivoni A
reviewBody: Super nice, clean restaurant, service note 1000, excellent quality food, varied, air conditioning, regional dessert I recommend very good and excellent

title: Bar
author: dnrost
reviewBody: The Famecos bar at PUCRS is good. Good salty and very good service. The juice is very good. I recommend.

title: Wonderful food and very good price!
author: Matbonf
reviewBody: Great value for money, the restaurant has a really Portuguese atmosphere, the food is very high quality and even has fado singers. I highly recommend it and wish to return as soon as I return to João Pessoa. Grade 10

title: Beautiful to see, bad to eat.
author: BeethovenMM
reviewBody: Always well decorated and funky, Chef Mara's restaurants sin for farm service and not always tasty food. I do not recommend.

address.streetAddress: SHC / S - CL - Quadra 209 - Bloco B - Loja 05 Setor Comércio Local Sul

title: Splendorous
author: 283ricardor283
reviewBody: The restaurant alone is worth the visit. Lush architecture. Aside from that, the dishes are extremely tasty and well served, easily serving 3 people.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Odilon Gomes de Lima 1772 Bairro Cidade Jardim

title: Excellent meats
author: FERNANDOJNCORREIA
reviewBody: Cozy place, special cuts, very good steak, excellent service and very cold beer.

title: Real food, made with a familiar touch
author: marcelo c
reviewBody: Cook Mario Santoni, as he likes to be called, is actually a super chef, cooked for Italian families (martinelli, crespi, mataazzo, etc.), and now prepares a loving meal in his space, very close to São Paulo .super delights .....

address.streetAddress: Alameda Joaquim Eugenio de Lima 209 Cosme De Farias

title: Seafood
author: matervitae
reviewBody: Located in the gastronomic area of Shoping Salvador, pleasant atmosphere with live music with piano bar, and very delicious food, where the seafood stands out: octopus and wonderful oysters

title: The best of Cuiabá
author: viniciuss240
reviewBody: Ariane has the gift of maintaining an unquestionable quality standard. The executive lunch is great and so are the dinners. Prices are more expensive, but quality pays off. For those who like good gastronomy, in a good environment, with a good wine cellar, this is the place in Cuiabá.

title: Sufferable ...
author: I3229GFcarlose
reviewBody: The place is well located and has ample parking. Perhaps these are the only positive points. The meats are weak, the buffet is limited and horrible, the service of the carvery is precarious and we still had to stand in a line to pay the bill. The carvery is cheap R $ 44.00 (with the service fee), but it is to know and not return.

address.streetAddress: Rua Professora Maria Sales 705 Novo Horizonte

title: very good
author: NATALIA C
reviewBody: Very nice restaurant, very well served food, each dish serves more than 3 people and are extremely delicious.

title: Very good
author: 489marialuisag
reviewBody: Pleasant atmosphere, very tasteful, set menu according to the day of the week, with French service. All dishes were excellent and presented very well. Dessert was also delicious. In the same environment there are thrift stores and antique shops.

address.streetAddress: Rua 21, 485, Setor Central Esquina com Rua 24

title: Excellent meal
author: febatagin
reviewBody: As the name says, only pork is served! And everything is wonderful! We opted for the tasting menu to get to know it and it was a great choice! The chef makes a very crazy combination and it looks wonderful, like crackling with guava! We love it and recommend it! The only bad thing is that the queue is huge, so be patient!

title: Best Fried Fish in Belém
author: aloisioo922
reviewBody: Simple restaurant, with only one option: fried fish (as a snack and not for meals) A good portion of fried bream fillet, accompanied by flour and vinaigrette. The fish has a quality standard: always very well fried, almost imperceptible oil and with little salt. The music is of good quality and the beer is always cold. You must arrive early, around 7 pm and place your order soon. The portions of fish end soon as the frequency is always good. I've been going there for many years and without a doubt it's the best fried fish in town.

title: Very good
author: Perla M
reviewBody: It was a great experience. Very good lunch. It has great service, the place is clean and organized. it is ideal for a happy hour after work.

title: simple and tasty
author: Danceara
reviewBody: simple restaurant, but with air-conditioned space .. For meat lovers, this is a great place to visit.

title: One of the ones I like the most!
author: carollobato05
reviewBody: I love this restaurant! The food is delicious, with good options of fresh fish and a wonderful theme carvery. Another positive point is the service, I like many of the waiters there. Only the price is a little high, but it is worth the quality.

title: The banks of the Madeira River!
author: CarvalhoGabriela
reviewBody: If you want to have a good fish lunch, in a well decorated environment with a rustic, country style, with good service, acceptable waiting time, fair price, in a building that keeps the originality of the houses built on the edge of Madeirão at the time of its occupation, the right restaurant is Recanto do Tambaqui !!!! Great

address.streetAddress: Estrada de Santo Antonio 510 - Vila Candelaria - Prox. Caerd

title: Family dinner to celebrate life
author: Prof_Walter
reviewBody: Excellent service, food and music. The waiter Ronaldo was excellent as always. And his assistant Renan tb. 🥳

title: Very good!
author: lu78Espindola
reviewBody: I really liked the traditional atmosphere of the Northeast !!! The humor show is really cool! Perfect character services!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Presidente Cafe Filho 700 Praia dos artista.

title: A delight
author: aldemirmsj
reviewBody: The restaurant serves the most delicious steak I've ever eaten, differentiated seasoning, super polite and helpful staff, food with a flashy look, I loved it.

title: I RECOMMEND
author: facilitadorbusiness
reviewBody: PARADISO RISTORANTE & PIZZARIA is a cozy establishment for you to have a good meal, either alone or accompanied. If you want to know, contact us to make a reservation and do not run the risk of entering the queue. Reservations: (62) 3941-1159. Best cost benefit in the Marist sector. That is. Simply divine.

title: The food was great but the bar is poor
author: maurenrubert
reviewBody: We got to know Patagonia with great expectations, as the bar has a very beautiful appearance. When we arrived we were a little “lost” because we didn't know if we could sit or not, in short, without knowing how the house worked. No one came to offer help, even though there were 3 employees outside, apparently, doing nothing. We sat at a table outside, and no one came to talk to us. It was through the internet that I discovered how the house worked. The beer was ok. We ordered a meat and it was delicious !! Everything was perfect, the bread, the grilled vegetables, the meat, in short, it was very, very good. One thing I didn't like at all was the tables and the benches. SUPER UNCOMFORTABLE! I think the idea is that people stay there for a short time.

title: Pleasant and quiet environment.
author: Jairo L
reviewBody: Quiet place with excellent views, beautiful decoration, great food, especially the starters. The gourmet beers with the house label are excellent. The only thing left on the wine list is that the prices are very salty and far from reality.

title: Sensational
author: yellowblackbee
reviewBody: the arrival was an attraction in itself, because I asked the driver if it was a show room, explaining that it was the restaurant, beautiful. The food was impeccable, we ate seafood and an excellent dessert. The wines are well priced.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Odilon Gomes de Lima 1772 Bairro Cidade Jardim

title: Reasonable restaurant for a quick meal
author: Thais N
reviewBody: It offers a great diversity of dishes, all for two people. The food is tasty, but nothing incredible.

title: Where to find a good chop in Goiania
author: Genaldogyn
reviewBody: The chop is excellent, very cold, very good service, it takes place at the bar counter for those who are alone to get a good chat. Places with tables for small or large groups. Good location.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Dep. Jamel Cecilio, 3300 - Jardim Goias Shopping Flamboyant

title: One of the best in São Paulo
author: fernandom401
reviewBody: If I only had one chance to have dinner in São Paulo, I would go to Abbraccio. Tasty atmosphere, impeccable service, here I highlight the waiter Paulo from the Vila Olímpia unit who served us in an exceptional way presenting the menu, the wine list and with great suggestions for harmonization and the main thing is the food is excellent. In addition, the cost benefit is very good when it comes to São Paulo. I recommend!

title: Unforgettable pizza.
author: celiomendes1
reviewBody: Exceptional service, very cordiality from all employees. The quality of the food is the same ..

title: Excellent TripAdvisor recommendation
author: claudiacenciguimarae
reviewBody: We arrived in Goiânia for the Brazilian Congress of Dermatological Surgery, as usual, consulted on the application and it really was a sensational tip, great atmosphere, good service and impeccable food ... I recommend.

title: Paying the debt
author: Luis G
reviewBody: We were well attended by the waiter Hinacio and by surprise also from an old acquaintance Cláudio everything was great !! CONGRATULATIONS to everyone going for sure !!

title: Healthy eating
author: Adriana S
reviewBody: It is a great option for a healthier diet. I particularly love healthy sandwiches.

title: Terrible!
author: Maluegege
reviewBody: I paid R $ 50.00 for a pizza that honestly is worthless! Bland, small, ridiculous border, really a disappointment, the worst and most expensive pizza I have ever tasted.

title: Cozy
author: AnaPrescott
reviewBody: Good pizzas and pastas. Various snacks (optional) before dinner. It is on a very charming and welcoming street.

title: Very good
author: Isabelllaa
reviewBody: I've been to this very good sushi bar twice, attentive service, warm atmosphere, I recommend

title: Excellent!
author: Dennis C
reviewBody: Great service, pleasant atmosphere, even when I was there I had a young singer with an excellent repertoire.

title: Extended holiday
author: Dantegontijo
reviewBody: I had already done an evaluation and it deserves a replay. The restaurant remains with the same quality as always. Fast line and always on the sidewalk. But the menu and quality are worth it and the price, which is not salty. Various types of healthy food, including desserts, can be found. Two environments serve everyone. Worth a lot after a day at the beach !!

title: Excellent Restaurant
author: giovannamdm
reviewBody: The restaurant is wonderful, excellent professionals and extremely polite, fantastic food and many varieties. We were attended by Claudio who was polite and very friendly. Best sushi I've ever eaten

address.streetAddress: Rua Senador Vilas Boas R Sen Vilas Boas N 94

title: A must for meat lovers
author: None
reviewBody: The most satisfying meat restaurant 30+ different types of meat. Along with a freshly prepared huge selection of salad. Incredible place!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Reporter Nestor Moreira S/N Botafogo

title: Best burger and variety of beers
author: carlosfrederico77
reviewBody: Great surprise. The place is small with interesting decor. The hamburger is truly a sight. Simply the best in town, without a doubt, and one of the best I've ever tasted: I recommend the gorgon. Also impressive and variety of beers. There is no fixed menu, every week you can have different beers. I recommend Del Rey, Sergeant beer produced in small quantities, very good indeed. It harmonizes very well with gorgon.

title: the garden with tables at the front is a delight !!!
author: ctirre
reviewBody: Very pleasant environment !!! we prefer to stay in the garden at the entrance ... It was a very peaceful lunch.

title: Time-consuming service
author: Jonathas S
reviewBody: The 3 times I went to the Outback I was waiting for more than 40 min at the entrance until a table was cleared. The dishes are very good, but the service leaves something to be desired. Orders take a long time to be delivered and after waiting 40 min at the entrance what is expected is for orders to leave quickly.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Dep. Jamel Cecilio, 3300 - Jardim Goias Shopping Flamboyant

title: Pizza rotation
author: 912naiarar
reviewBody: Large location, well located. Delicious pizza, several cold options. Always packed, you need to arrive early so you don't have to wait at the door until you clear a table. It has private parking.

title: Great Place
author: gabrielsouldaestrada
reviewBody: It is worth it for those who are in the region. It is close to craft fairs and in front of a beautiful beach. I recommend

title: Go with sooo much time !!!
author: 536andr_l
reviewBody: The restaurant is more or less, the service more or less, the delay in leaving the dish is excessive to the extreme, more than an hour! You have to have time !! And nothing of much expectation !!

title: Nice place
author: gabimedeiros
reviewBody: Nice place, delicious food, good service, and variety on the menu, quality food at a fair price

title: Good food and live music
author: Eric B
reviewBody: On the day I visited, there was some really cool music, the meals are tasty, but it is charged at the kilo, which can make the price more expensive.

title: Gourmet Restaurant
author: DanielyMota
reviewBody: I really enjoyed the restaurant and the menu options. The service was very good, the atmosphere was pleasant and the food was wonderful. I recommend! A different experience from Brasilia's restaurants.

address.streetAddress: Scls 302/3 Bloco A - loja 10 - Asa Sul

title: Great bar
author: WalterBelda
reviewBody: Good option for a beer and a snack. Very traditional bar! Good cost-benefit. Recommend a visit

title: SEAFOOD RESTAURANT
author: paulocesard692
reviewBody: A qualified restaurant with good options for shrimp and fish. Serves dishes assembled with varied options of accompaniment. The service is fast and the food is good.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Americo Buaiz - Enseada do Sua, Vitoria - Es 200

title: Disappointment
author: MarciaBrandi
reviewBody: On the first Saturday of 2020, my husband and I decided to eat a feijoada, since we worked at the end of each week and we were off. We chose this one, which we frequented for some time ago. The first surprise was that we were prevented from enjoying a small feijoada, since we were in two people. Ok. We ordered feijoada for two. Poorly served and thin. We had a few beers and the final surprise was the bill. Very high. Too bad ... We will definitely not be back

address.streetAddress: Rua da Imprensa 310 Vila Sao Jose, Ipiranga

title: Regional food
author: talitarlg
reviewBody: Quirky atmosphere with a Northeastern theme, very good service, delicious food both with the self-service and a la carte system.

title: Great option for those who like fish and seafood!
author: Daniela L
reviewBody: Pleasant atmosphere, impeccable service and great options of fish and seafood. Good choice to go with family and friends.

title: VERY GOOD
author: Vanuza S
reviewBody: Surprising place, very pleasant for all types of public, suitable for those looking for good food and an extremely familiar environment. I highly recommend ... I can't forget to comment that it is a place well frequented by beautiful people!

title: Thousand Note !!
author: Ionaldo R
reviewBody: Very northeastern restaurant, every delicious dish, has a sun-covered meat, cheese, the rubacao is worth trying too, so I could talk about everyone because I took a little of each ... rsss ... The decor is very surreal with an all rural environment, everything organized, clean, pleasant. Of all this was the Best restaurant I visited in Maceió Congratulations!

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: very good franchise
author: Roberta G
reviewBody: A good option is to eat at this franchised store. Quality maintained as well as the hygiene of the place. All menu options were available on the day.

address.streetAddress: Av. Araguaia N0 376 Qd. 39 Lt. 2F Lojas A14 E A15

title: Australian flavor
author: 776patriciaf
reviewBody: Restaurant with tasty peculiarities. The draft beer, grilled onion, ice tea, Australian bread, Cessar salad, Cajun Rice, make up a distinctive, unmistakable and memorable cuisine for the visitor.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Dep. Jamel Cecilio, 3300 - Jardim Goias Shopping Flamboyant

title: Quick lunch
author: MarcioZeppelini
reviewBody: I am not very fond of self-service, but it is the best in the region. Good service and a barbecue with good cuts.

title: Dinner
author: Lanagalega
reviewBody: Great place, pleasant atmosphere, good location good service, I recommend it and would come back more often, u who want something relaxed this is the right place

title: Lack of training
author: Lucialeibel
reviewBody: Poor service Small portions Wrong dish information and no replacement Anyway, lack of training Expensive

title: Very good barbecue
author: luan4beta
reviewBody: I really enjoyed the barbecue, pleasant atmosphere, varied buffet ... I didn't like paying 11.00 in the parking lot, but I found everything with a fair price in relation to quality.

title: Service note 10
author: Japa2rio
reviewBody: We went to the restaurant on a Sunday and the place was packed! However, we only waited a few minutes because we had a reservation made over the internet. Regarding the dishes, in our group some found the dishes reasonable and others very good. The highlight for sure was the giant burger! I really enjoyed the drink of the day which was with berries and ginger! Finally, the service was rated 10!

title: Plentiful food!
author: Terezinha1230
reviewBody: Coco Bambu is perfect for those who eat a lot and accompanied ... The tables are large, the food is plentiful with seafood, meats and salads ... We had a wine, but there was a shop, juices, refrigeranters ... The air conditioning was perfect. All very good! We were lucky even when parking, as there was a parking space directly in front. This restaurant is worth checking out when visiting Teresina.

title: Sun dried meat
author: Pedro G
reviewBody: Both the sun meat and other roasts are well prepared and the side dishes are also well seasoned. The decor is beautiful.

title: Unpreparedness and disrespect for the customer
author: Vanessa s
reviewBody: Our first experience was disappointing. We went to socialize with our family, two tables, as usual each one was making their orders, in the end pay what was consumed by each couple or family, which is natural for any establishment, not at Famiglia Facin. We were the first to leave, we would check what we consume to make the payment. However, we were told by the cashier, rude and unprepared, that we should settle the total amount spent for the table, as our reservation was for 7 people and therefore the total payment of the table, disregarding the fact that we were 3 leaving, regardless of another 4 continue to consume. We should understand that if we were to make the arrangement this way, for consumption, the restaurant would end up being harmed. The professional changed her tone of voice, showing a lack of common sense, and even if she didn't want to let us explain what we would like to do, she stated that the table consumed x and that this amount should be paid. We spent at least 20 minutes on this roll. The situation was resolved when we then suggested that we invite the other family members to leave, that way we would close both tables, being the only way to get orders right. It even changed her face at this point, lowering the ball, Amadorismo! Tasty dishes, but with high prices for portion sizes. Waiter service very good, available and helpful. We do not recommend the restaurant, which is a pity for the beautiful setting and menu.

title: Spacious
author: Júlia A
reviewBody: My poke came with the rice all soggy, sticky and the taste was very acidic! The Poke sauce (I ordered the traditional one) also tasted like pure soy sauce. Understand that Hawaiian sauce is different from pure soy sauce. I do not recommend!

address.streetAddress: Alameda Doutor Carlos de Carvalho 1652 Fresh Live Market

title: Excellent for taking children
author: Gabriela G
reviewBody: Excellent space, good beer (Backer) delicious and abundant food (price a little salty) very cool to take the children because it has a mini farm, the little ones love it.

title: Nice food
author: Caruline
reviewBody: Good food, we ate a filet that was very tasty and a delicious fettuccine. One dish was enough for two people, we just added a salad to complement it. Open until later, we arrive at closing time, 11pm and still served us. Great service.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Beira Mar 2800 Fica no Varandão do Hotel Ponta Mar

title: Wonderful place
author: tataireal_
reviewBody: Wonderful place, quality food. The price is not cheap, but anyone who values an excellent meal is well worth it. Every time I'm in Aracaju, I have lunch there.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Ministro Geraldo Barreto Sobral 215 Shopping Jardins - Praça Arcos

title: good enough and cheap
author: estelamaris c
reviewBody: good food in exaggerated quantity, very good price, but the atmosphere is very simple and without any charm.

title: Excelent reception
author: Calzinha
reviewBody: Excellent service, delicious dishes, reasonable price, but it is worth paying a little more for the dishes. Revomendo

title: Tradition
author: Roberto M
reviewBody: Tradition in the Public Market of Porto Alegre. Good service, fair price, delicious products. Going to the market be sure to visit.

address.streetAddress: Rua Padre Chagas, 44 Moinhos de Vento

title: Tasty food, high delivery rate
author: 122marcosa
reviewBody: We order the dishes via the home delivery application. The meat kebab was very good. I thought the shape, in the shape of a polpetone, was strange, especially since the photos on the menu showed the kibbeh in the fusiform format, as I usually eat. The esfihas were excellent, among the best I ate. The delivery took place on time and the packaging came out perfect. However, the rate of 19 reais seemed high to me, and I never saw anything in that amount. With the exception of the delivery cost and the suggestion of better product information in the menu image, this is a great restaurant, and I recommend the visit.

title: It got much worse!
author: renatom60
reviewBody: I had already come several times, for the excellent menu and fair prices. Today I had a good disappointment to see that the menu has changed and got worse ... according to the waiter, they are trying to tropicalize the place. In addition, they are charging R $ 19.00 for a meager Original beer. Finally, I waited more than 15 minutes for a guy who didn't come. I canceled the order and left hungry.

address.streetAddress: Rua Costa Carvalho, 234 Pinheiros - São Paulo

title: restaurant
author: Luciana C
reviewBody: Excellent food and very pleasant atmosphere !!! The grilled lobster is delicious. I recommend. Fair price, at least cheaper than in my city (São Luís).

title: Great place for alternative meals
author: Ricardo L
reviewBody: I went more than 4 times with my friends and everyone approved. Very nice place and with prices that can fit in your pocket. They have many dining options, not to mention that the dishes are delicious. The location is in the very center of Recife and there are also several bus options nearby.

itemReviewed.name: Atracoes Do Sabor Restaurante e Lanchonete

title: Pleasant atmosphere, Italian standard pasta, excellent wine list: this is Di Salermo!
author: Ricardo_Freitas
reviewBody: I went with my family to Provincia Di Salermo last Saturday night to celebrate my wife's birthday and I was surprised by this tavern. Really good! Wonderful food, first class service, and excellent wines. We were very satisfied and intend to return again, too bad the price is above average, but it paid off. A negative point is the lack of parking which made us leave the car on the street, despite the valet service.

title: The best of the Imperial neighborhood
author: AndreFahur
reviewBody: Tratoria Del Campo arrived in the Imperial Quarter to stay. With an excellent service, varied menu there is no way not to like it! Rescuing the charm of the Imperial neighborhood, with refinement and wonderful food! I recommend !

title: Lunch No
author: Alexandre B
reviewBody: Executive dishes fall short in terms of protein / side dishes. I ordered a grilled salmon that disappeared on the plate so small. I do not recommend it to those who have lunch in the neighborhood.

title: The best restaurant in town!
author: Luiza P
reviewBody: Dedé always serving customers well, presenting us with irresistible dishes and with super affordable prices! The codfish cake is delicious !!!

itemReviewed.name: Cachaçaria do Dedé e Empório - Manauara Shopping

title: Filet note 10
author: triptipsandtravel
reviewBody: Pleasant and rustic atmosphere. The best steaks in the cities. Excellent service. Dish that can be shared by up to 3 people depending on hunger. Price compatible with what you offer. Worth it.

title: Great experience
author: Dayane R
reviewBody: Cozy place and impeccable food. The service in general was excellent, from the reservation, which we did in the late afternoon, until the departure. We love it!

title: The best.
author: Luis S
reviewBody: The best Japanese restaurant in BH. Flawless food. Perfect service. The house is a clean and pleasant environment.

title: Food
author: cilia61
reviewBody: I went to lunch with friends, I really liked the food, the starter acarajé was very good, fried without much oil, the service is good, the waiters are attentive. Anyone who wants seafood, this is the place.

title: Amazing
author: LucianaA822
reviewBody: Wonderful food! Divine. Best food of the trip. Perfect flavor! We ordered a shrimp roll, and two more seafood dishes! Each better than the other!

title: Beef and great broths.
author: adcampos
reviewBody: Restaurant with family atmosphere. Pleasant restaurant. The price, service and quality are excellent. I recommend.

address.streetAddress: Quadra 1303, Bloco B, quiosque s/n Cruzeiro Novo
Av República do Líbano, 256 Shopping RioMar Recife

title: Reference in "Beach Bar"
author: maurocB2974FI
reviewBody: A reference in a beach bar, Lopana offers excellent service, wonderful food! Not to mention the DJ q plays until 4 pm and then live music. A spectacular view of the Pajuçara beach and great parties during the back. the day the bar even offers a catamaran ride to the natural pools.

address.streetAddress: Av. Silvio Carlos Viana, 27 Ponta Verde

title: meal
author: rodrigo_mantai
reviewBody: Very well structured place, very nice local aesthetics, excellent food, very efficient service.
userLocation: São José do Rio Preto, Brasil

title: For all tastes
author: Pgarske
reviewBody: Buffet service with a wide variety of hot dishes and salads. Well served, seasoned and tasty. Has plate. Fill up fast.

title: Very good
author: Marcelinho E
reviewBody: Very good recommended everyone great service and the staff are very attentive and the friendly owner and very good food you will not regret it

title: Good and cheap
author: 49mariaaparecidas
reviewBody: The best cost benefit. A traditional Chinese restaurant with a varied menu, good service. I always go on Sundays, there is a queue but as I choose to stay outside I don't expect much and the acoustics are better. I recommend the pork rib with garlic and oil.

title: Kill hunger without spending too much
author: fcdneto
reviewBody: If you're a little broke this is the place to eat. Now you have the Italian pasta at a very affordable price! Too bad to end soon.

title: Quiet Lunch
author: Msmoacir
reviewBody: Very good place, well attended and with great service. It has parking and the atmosphere is very pleasant.

title: The rustic of the house with authentic Italian cuisine
author: Pavan_JB
reviewBody: Right in the most gastronomic region of SP, a very well decorated, cozy house that reminds us of the true climate of Italy. With a very well prepared kitchen team and a not very extensive menu, the dishes are true masterpieces. The service is also a high point in the house, which makes the experience extremely pleasant. It is worth programming and checking.

address.streetAddress: Rua Jeronimo da Veiga, 30 Itaim Bibi

title: best açai
author: valleskaba
reviewBody: The açaí of this place is the best it has .... very tasty and with little sugar ...... the price is a little high, but it is worth it for the quality of the product.

address.streetAddress: Avenida das Américas 7607 Loja 106, Novo Leblon

title: Good service
author: lucianakramer
reviewBody: Good atmosphere. Fast ordering. Air conditioning. But it is a more family-friendly environment, not romantic.

address.streetAddress: Av. JK 103, Norte 159 Saida para Paraiso

title: Famous Cuca, result that does not match
author: Carlos S
reviewBody: Another case of a restaurant highly valued, for having a Chef and owner, professor of cooking, and good at marketing. The place is nice and ended there. Confused service, and all the dishes were very bad. The lasagna was served with a lot of cheese and a little bolognese sauce, which was very thin and small. When complaining to the manager or maître, very politely said the Chef was very professional and wouldn't do anything wrong, everyone at the table laughed except her. I think he was related to the owner.

title: Excellent!
author: MateusD20
reviewBody: Shrimp Risotto is a great choice! Good service and pleasant atmosphere. High prices, but that compensate for the quality and satisfaction. To eat praying !!!!!

title: Speechless!
author: gabrielfricke
reviewBody: A great place to meet friends, drink good craft or commercial beers at great prices and eat a respectable hamburger also paying less than other hamburgers. And all of this in the heart of Botafogo. They just expanded and it looked great. I always come back;)

address.streetAddress: R. Voluntários da Pátria, Loja 9 Botafogo

title: Well served and fair price
author: LuizFelipeO
reviewBody: Fancy dishes, serving 3-4 people, with quality and fair price.

title: Thai delight
author: CatiaEmAlgumLugar
reviewBody: Dining at Thai Mee is a complete experience. The atmosphere is pleasant, with the right light, very good service and the food is delicious! The aromatic fried rice with shrimp, squid, fish and green beans is a good choice! It's spicy, but if you don't eat the pepper itself, it's just right!

title: Excellent rodizio.
author: AlexSanderReis
reviewBody: I love sushi-ya for its wonderful flavor. the sushi has a great size, flavor, variety of flavors, very good atmosphere, well organized and attentive staff.

title: One of the best restaurants in town
author: jo_oemmanuelc
reviewBody: Excellent food, great service and charming atmosphere. It is undoubtedly one of the best restaurants in Natal. I especially recommend the seafood board.

title: INIGUALAVEL
author: marcelomachado9999
reviewBody: Mangai of all hours: either at lunch, at dinner, or for snack. Fresh food at any time of day makes a difference in the best restaurant in Natal. There is no other

title: Great food, great service
author: Happiness312840
reviewBody: It was my third visit to Akuaba. The food remains delicious. This time, instead of the incredible moquecas, we ordered the castro alves fish. My husband is a fan of pirão, so he also ordered a portion of the pirão. Professional and friendly service, without being invasive. Yummy and cozy atmosphere, with indoor and outdoor tables. The dish arrived steaming, with a delicious aroma of dende, the fish in the perfect spot, full of shrimp, accompanied by rice and an original pure banana. I just hope they continue like this, congratulations ~!

title: I was alone, hungry and I passed the door
author: DenizeCruz
reviewBody: Participating in an event I missed lunch and went to the street to look for something tasty. Near my hotel I found this restaurant, despite the time, already in the middle of the afternoon, it was very busy and had a few vacant tables. I went in and ordered the dish "that comes out more" my resource when I don't know anything about where I am. I was offered a fish dish and a shrimp dish. I chose shrimp. I tried to negotiate 1/2 portion after seeing how big the dishes were on the other tables. Despite being alone I couldn't convince them to make an exception. I ordered a normal dish, which would give to 3 people. It arrived fast, hot, fragrant and tasty. Very rich, I think it was a dish for four. And the best: delicious. I struggled and managed to eat a third. The rest I left behind, sorry, but I looked around the sidewalk and saw no beggars or anyone else I could operate on my leftovers. The bill came exactly as I predicted by reading the menu, no surprise, and the restaurant is not a bargain - but worth every penny. I will return there every time I return to Fortaleza. I walked back to the hotel, to make the "kilo" there, when I call the elevator, I realize that it is Sidney Magal who expects the same elevator as me, and with a marble from Coco Bambunna hand. I was not the humic who bought a dish much bigger than my hunger that day ...

title: Lack of professionalism
author: jrserpa
reviewBody: We were in this restaurant with a group of friends and were disrespected by maitre Daniel. We were 21 people and a friend and I chose the same dish, Don Juanito, which was extremely salty. We spoke to the waiter who took the problem to the maitre d ', who rudely asked what we wanted done. We explained what was happening, that we had eaten that same dish before and that those were unfortunately very salty and that we would like the order to be redone. His answer was that the food would take a long time because there were so many orders in front of us. We questioned and were willing to wait. A few minutes later he returns from the kitchen saying that the chef and his team had found that the food was like that and that the problem was that we were not used to the spices. Actually, we are not in the habit of eating salty but seasoned foods. He then suggested that we order another dish, but he prevented me from asking for what I wanted, implying that my taste was not for that type of food. Who is this maitre d '? What does he know about my eating habits? What restaurant is this that has no manager to solve this embarrassing situation? Does the chef and his team accept criticism? Don't they ever make mistakes? Everyone at our table who tried the food was unanimous in saying that the food was salty and not spiced! Moral of the story, we both left without dinner !!! Unfortunate!!! I am used to going to the best restaurants in Brazil and the world and there has never been so much amateurism as this one. There is no use in a pleasant environment if the team is not prepared to solve problems and deal with criticism. I do not recommend!!!

address.streetAddress: Rua São Francisco de Assis, 93 Jatiúca

title: Service failure
author: carlosgamafilho
reviewBody: It is not the first time that I go to the place and regarding the environment and the food is always very good. This time we went to watch the cup game on Valentine's Day and it was a good experience, I can only point out two situations that need more attention. There was an exclusive menu for Valentine's Day, which I already consider bad for people who are already used to the place and its dishes. The funniest thing is that my group was at the place and during our stay between one order and another we were informed that from that moment on, only such a Valentine's Day menu would be available. Positive point for the place that realized that it would not work very well and decided to give up its schedule. Another drawback was that right after the game ended the television was immediately turned off, I know that the intention for the night was to prioritize boyfriends but it was at least a lack of education to expel some customers. This can be learning for the establishment.
