author: alcferreira
reviewBody: I had lunch at Pax Shoping Botafogo today. Beautiful view, courteous and helpful service, unusual dessert of very delicious apple waffles. But the buffet-style menu I found weak: hake is hake, and it is not fish for lunch at the local level ... there was practically no meat, just seafood - which limits customers' choices. Perhaps the à la carte menu will be more suitable to please ... I'll check it out next time!

title: Great food !!!
author: Andremorais30
reviewBody: Typical food from the Northeast, very tasty. Everything very clean and organized, service 1000 note, all very attentive. I will come back for sure.

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: Excellent cost benefit
author: Francisco de As... L
reviewBody: It is a self-service with characteristic of a la carte environment, well chilled, clean, well trained staff.

title: Still good
author: LUIZDAMAS75
reviewBody: Eating a good fish in Manaus has to be in simple fishmongers. Escape the sophisticated who want to gourmet everything and end up losing the essence of the dish. This restaurant is simple, it does not have the comfort of chic restaurants, but it does what it does well. A good and tasty fish. I recommend.

title: Good option for lunch
author: Heliana C
reviewBody: Great restaurant, being a good choice for those who eat little. Very varied steaks and delicious desserts.

title: VERY GOOD
author: arnaldo c
reviewBody: Service without any restrictions. Quite the contrary, very kind. Cold beer at a fair price. Toast of beer liquor by own manufacture.

title: reasonable
author: Yslamatos
reviewBody: I thought the place was good and the food, but I don't have much to say about this place, but you can go there and try every bit of the food they offer.

title: Unmissable
author: I3403CSfabiot
reviewBody: It is a must-visit restaurant ... everything perfect ... food, atmosphere and price ... the best of Natal ... worthy of reverence ...

title: Cool bar, but the draft beer could be better.
author: João M
reviewBody: The bar is really cool, courteous and friendly service. It is in a very nice region of Curitiba, in the middle of the historic center. For lovers of a good draft beer, however, it is a little frustrating. The draft beer is dominated by Ambev. In view of the name of the bar and its fame, I expected some variety of artisanal draft beers with a minimum of quality. But the menu only has draft beer from Brahma and Bohemia. If you are not a fan of gourmet draft beer, however, it is a very cool bar.

address.streetAddress: Rua Doutor Claudino dos Santos 63 Largo da Ordem

title: Best sushi in Recife, but ...
author: Adriano B
reviewBody: Tastiest sushi in Recife, but the place is very small and the smell of oil is very strong. When they correct this they get a score of 11.

title: Sensational!
author: Thaise N
reviewBody: The environment; service; the food ... we would rate 10000 if we could and we will definitely return !!!!

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: nice place
author: letiiciass
reviewBody: nice place with a diversified menu for both lunch and dinner .. service takes a little time.

address.streetAddress: AV. Brasilia, 1656, Entre Ruas Benjamin Constant E Quintino Bocaiuva

title: Wonderful!!!!
author: Cristiane C
reviewBody: Everything absolutely special! Ambience, service, delicious and well served dishes. I've known since the opening, I always order a different dish, I'm always surprised. I highly recommend it !!!

address.streetAddress: CLS 402 Bloco A loja 33 asa sul

title: Super Honest Churra
author: aureos2016
reviewBody: Cozy atmosphere and very attentive waiters. Highlighting the "Dinei". Juicy and tender meats. Ever. I have been attending for more than five years and the pattern is always untouchable. Excellent cost benefit. I recommend.

title: Another food franchise ...
author: hlfn1982
reviewBody: It's not that Outback is bad. It's just ordinary. It's just another chain of restaurants. For me, the queues are not justified. We went on Carnival Tuesday afternoon. There was no queue and we were well attended. We ordered as a starter a spicy shrimp with nachos. It is not bad, but far from being memorable. Then we ordered a plate of ribs, chicken breast and potatoes for two. Again, it's just OK. One thing can not be denied: they are perfect in barbecue sauce.

address.streetAddress: Av República do Líbano, 256 Shopping RioMar Recife

title: Rib Top
author: 278jorgealbertop
reviewBody: For those who like ribs there is an excellent place. Very good service. It wasn't the first time we went and it certainly wasn't the last. Great option, great service, fair price.

title: Good!
author: 371thaisag
reviewBody: I went to meet, I was between 40/50 min in the waiting, very interesting place. The restaurant has 3 rooms, I went on a rainy day and the bar at the entrance was not working. I don't eat Japanese food, my fiance eats and ordered the chef's and he really liked it! I realized that for one person it was served a lot, my fiance came out full. I ate a trio of mini burgers and found it delicious, the drinks were also great. The bill was about 200, I don't remember perfectly. Worth it!

title: Beautiful location, but few options and high price
author: MarciaGitirana
reviewBody: I was at Fagulha at the opening and I loved it, but over time the house has increased prices and reduced attention; In addition, whenever I went there, there was never my 1st, 2nd, and sometimes even the 3rd choice of wine and sparkling wine: that is, there is, but there is not. It's on the menu, but not in the cellar. And by coincidence there is always a lack of account. The house opened with the prospect of being a grill and ended up becoming a great luxury pizzeria. The meats are no longer the same after the Uruguayan cheff is gone and the prices for meats are very high.

title: Lousy service
author: Juliana B
reviewBody: I have never been to such a slow and clumsy carvery ... we spent a long time waiting for orders, we had to keep charging. Worse, when they arrived, the waiters did not know which table they had ordered. My husband's Temaki ran for 3 tables, until he had to inform that it was his! Even the drinks were slow to arrive! When we complained, the waiter laughed, turned his back and left! I don't tell anyone and I'm not going back there.

address.streetAddress: Av. Dom Luís, 1113 Shopping Buganvília- Lojas 18 e 19

title: Excellent
author: Josileide
reviewBody: I've been to this restaurant a few times. excellent food, pleasant atmosphere, very good service. Only one detail every time I went to dessert takes too long. I was devastated because every time it takes too long, but the last one took so long that I didn't wait.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Coronel Colares Moreira 1 Quadra 19 - Calhau

title: Dinner
author: adrianal696
reviewBody: Cool place, which at the same time manages to welcome couples with small children very well. Saturday night has pleasant live music. The service is great and the directions are great.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Doutor Chucri Zaidan, 902 Shopping Market Place

title: Divine and delicious food
author: ItanaCouto
reviewBody: I went to celebrate my birthday there for two reasons: his name honors the city I love the most and has 6 in his name which is the most special number for me. I was in SP four years ago, I didn't think anything was too much and the food disappointed me, but yesterday, I had a beautiful and delicious surprise. The atmosphere is beautiful, good service, they have a wide and varied menu. I opted for the brie cheese pastry with pepper jelly, four cheese risotto with shrimp and the strawberry cheesecake. Both were divine and delicious. All my friends also enjoyed the menu. You are to be congratulated! I loved it and recommend it!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Tancredo Neves 148 Shopping da Bahia

title: Haunted
author: LiMello
reviewBody: I celebrated my graduation in December 2015. I am delighted with the service, the location, the dishes served and the entrees. The place itself, has stories everywhere, fascinating decor and both the dishes and the place refer to Poles, Germans and Italians. Simplicity and sophistication in the service and explanations of each dish. It's worth visiting!

title: Wonderful!
author: gabriela_bandeira
reviewBody: Nice and cozy place, with excellent food and drinks !!! Educated staff and always willing to attend. Inside an excellent hostel

title: Drinking and meeting friends
author: Cristina B
reviewBody: Cozy place, great to meet friends, take a traditional submarine (take the small gifts) and eat delicious German food. A cool place to take your friends from outside Curitiba!

address.streetAddress: Rua Doutor Claudino dos Santos 63 Largo da Ordem

title: Place to enjoy good food, chat and be well attended
author: diegomartinsoficial
reviewBody: In this restaurant it is possible to do everything stated in the title, as well as be enchanted by the refinement of the place.

title: Fish
author: adrianoxadriano
reviewBody: Fish ... well located, pleasant atmosphere, good service, medium to high prices compared to others in the same category.

title: Best Portuguese food in the region
author: amariadomato
reviewBody: Intimate atmosphere, excellent service, kind and helpful staff. Beautiful and delicious presentation food. From the entrance the tasty dessert.

title: Excellent
author: LightPacker424116
reviewBody: The food was very good, the burger was excellent and in the right spot and the raviolli was very sensational! Great service from Sid.

title: Honest food at a reasonable price
author: jhenriquemed
reviewBody: I got to know the site through a collective shopping site, coupons, the restaurant has no "luxury" but the food is good, polite service. Worth it!

title: A pleasant experience in Northern cuisine
author: JoaquimA344
reviewBody: A moment of enchantment in the texture, color, flavor and perfume of the delicacies of Northern Brazil. Pupunha puree with fresh Pirarucu. Unsurpassed. Pink Shrimp Risotto with Respect Cub. Amapaense paella. Everything perfect in a pleasant atmosphere and a warm welcome from the Chef himself. Unforgettable

title: keeps the national standard
author: EMERSON G
reviewBody: I went to dinner in May 2017, and I noticed the same pattern of other restaurants in the group, that is, great! cold draft beer pacas and meat on the spot!

title: Very tasty environment
author: Wander B
reviewBody: When I arrived the restaurant was very full, so we ordered some drinks and starters while the table wandered and we were talking on the pool pergola and enjoying the view of São Paulo.When a table wandered, we ordered dishes that were very well prepared as well as desserts.Well worth it.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Brigadeiro Luis Antonio, 4700 Jardim Paulista

title: Delicious
author: monica462013
reviewBody: I loved visiting Frutaria, it is located on the chic street of São Paulo, Oscar Freire, you can see some artists from time to time. It has snacks, juices, salads and what I liked most was the açaí with avocado cream.

title: regional style bar
author: mgcouto
reviewBody: regional pub style bar, open air, easy place to park in front. slow service. good food.

address.streetAddress: Rua Mato Grosso 73 Parque Das Laranjeiras

title: Reference cafeteria
author: Alysson L
reviewBody: Excellent place for snacks, meals and even desserts. Impeccable service. 10% fee optional.

address.streetAddress: R Manoel Ferreira Machado, 429 Bairro Dos Estados

title: Wonderful Bamboo Coconut
author: Gabriela P
reviewBody: Wonderful and harmonious environment. Quite familiar. Menu with diversity of food and super tasty. I will always come back.

address.streetAddress: Av Prof Magalhaes Neto, 1273 Lot Aquárius, Pituba

title: La Tratoria - Parnamirim
author: Marcos R
reviewBody: We went for Sunday lunch and since the arrival we were surprised by the excellent receptivity. The waiter who served us (Jeferson) was extremely attentive, helpful and took away all our doubts regarding the choice of dishes. The environment has meticulous decoration and beautiful details. Very pleasant temperature on a day when Recife was full of sun. The starters, main courses and dessert were impeccable. I highly recommend it.

title: A touch of elegance and intimacy!
author: smmroliveira
reviewBody: Very accessible place, pleasant, with good taste and excellent cuisine. Perfect for having fun with friends over a good wine or even for a business lunch.

title: Best Sandwich
author: Rhayme
reviewBody: Exceptional! Sandwich all roasted over hot coals. Juicy hamburger. Sensational herbal sauce. Good service.

title: Delicious food with fair price
author: CarolFrazao
reviewBody: The atmosphere is pleasant, the place is quite large and has free parking on site. The restaurant is a kilo and has many options of meat, fish and side dishes, mixing the traditional barbecue with the typical cuisine of Pará. The price is right. It is worth going early, because after 1pm the restaurant is very crowded.

title: Beautiful rib
author: Levi C
reviewBody: Fast foods with quality only the waiting time gets a little discouraged but for the food it is even worth the wait, on average 40 to 60 minutes

address.streetAddress: Travessa Casalbuono, 120, Vila Guilherme Shopping Center Norte, Loja 24

title: Very nice environment
author: Victoria V
reviewBody: The very pleasant atmosphere of the fruit mix caipirinha was excellent. But the food was nothing exceptional, but it was tasty. Thanks for the environment ....

title: Very good!
author: Maryangela C
reviewBody: Kitchenette has a wonderful bakery / confectionery, with great sweets and breads and also on top a great, super cozy restaurant. I recommend the restaurant's mince, very tasty and the price is very good!

address.streetAddress: SHC / S - CL - Quadra 209 - Bloco B - Loja 05 Setor Comércio Local Sul

title: Excellent!
author: claudneir
reviewBody: Very good restaurant, with a very air conditioned environment, with live music (piano). Excellent food, with great varieties in the Buffet, including sushi, carvery with very diverse and very tasty meats. Dessert cart also very good. Good price, considering the quality of the service.

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont, S/N Bairro Coroa do Meio

title: Great
author: r0chaluiz
reviewBody: I was at Applebee's last month and was very well attended by the attendants. The place is very comfortable and well decorated. The food and dessert is of a very high quality.

title: Delicious!
author: Ana L
reviewBody: I loved this place, on the beach! Delicious food and even better price! One of the best cones I have ever eaten in my life!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Álvaro Otacílio, barraca 32 Ponta Verde

title: Best Lunch
author: Luismar_Carvalho
reviewBody: Great restaurant. A wonderful alligator meat. Whenever I'm in BH I come in it. I recommend. Service and pleasant climate.

address.streetAddress: Av. Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek 6001 Santa Maria

title: Monsoon
author: Guilherme C
reviewBody: We were very well attended by André monção. Food was very good. Very cool environment. I recommend

title: Tasty
author: rocambui
reviewBody: I have already visited the restaurant twice and enjoyed it the first time. Good atmosphere and now I found out that there is parking, a point for them, since the location is a little complicated (Av. Zahran). Food with a Minas Gerais footprint, has a good variety of meats, but I was served a fillet with bacon and it was raw, unfortunately my sister had a worse experience the fillet and the chicken were very rare and for those who chose to eat by the pound it is money thrown away. The dessert could have been better, with more variety.

title: quality and good service
author: FatimaDSB
reviewBody: quality and good service super attentive waiters, good place for good food, good wine and good conversation, it has a nice balcony because the neighborhood is trendy but quiet, you can enjoy life passing by.

address.streetAddress: Rua Aleixo Netto, 1204 - loja 2 - Praia do Canto

title: Quality and Fair Price
author: amigas_Fati
reviewBody: Old restaurant in Belo Horizonte, has a variety of a la carte dishes, cold beer and fair prices. The dishes are delicious and full. Highlight for all steaks and fish.

title: Liked it.
author: Desadol
reviewBody: This was the only restaurant in CWB that had vegan barreara. The taste is wonderful. I loved it. The environment is clean, harmonious and spacious. The only negative point of the restaurant, in my view, is that it is not vegan.

itemReviewed.name: Flor de Anis Gastronomia Vegetariana & Eventos

address.streetAddress: Rua Joao David Perneta 433, Hugo Lange

title: Good service and good variety on the menu!
author: Silverke
reviewBody: Good service, the restaurant is always full on weekends, a lot of variety on the menu, the food is tasty! I recommend! Good cost-benefit!

address.streetAddress: Rua da Independencia 924 Esquina Rua Ouvidor de Portugal, 01

title: Pleasant place, ideal for taking the family
author: Edwardo M
reviewBody: Very good food, not too high prices. Live music more at a good time, to talk, the beer came very cold

address.streetAddress: Rua Rui Barbosa, 2350 Esquina Com a Rua Sergipe

title: Best atendiment
author: SAragao
reviewBody: Cold draft beer, warm and tasty snacks. On Saturdays there is live music of the best quality. Perfect service.

address.streetAddress: Rua Ana Bilhar 1178 Esquina com Frederico Borges - Varjota

title: No goat can't stay
author: José Marcos S
reviewBody: Restaurant is well located, but there is little publicity, few people know, the service is pleasant, it can improve, it could be air-conditioned but everyone prefers to be under the trees, where tables and chairs are placed. It could increase the diversity of dishes.

address.streetAddress: Quadra 103 sul Avenida Lo 1 88 Sl Plano Diretor Sul

title: I recommend
author: FranIracelia
reviewBody: The atmosphere is very pleasant, the food is excellent and the service was great. It has ambient music, with piano on weekends. Everything excellent.

title: Good food
author: tonhao2015
reviewBody: Great barbecue, cold cuts and fresh and tasty seafood. Always cold beer. Excellent place.

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont, S/N Bairro Coroa do Meio

title: Very good
author: 849samueln
reviewBody: Free buffet with grills on the table .. In addition to great pasta and desserts. Excellent service, very helpful. Price I found a little bit salty.

title: Now with attached restaurant
author: Luis G
reviewBody: The place where the products were already sold now has a restaurant (to enter it is necessary to go through the store, similar to a bakery / grocery store). The upper room is small and unfortunately the outside area is very hot. The food is good, but the prices are high, the individual portions and the service slow and inattentive.

address.streetAddress: Rua Treze de Maio, 596 Bela Vista

title: Good job.
author: Megzinha1414
reviewBody: The place is very comfortable, with very good service and care. The food is seasoned in the right measure, with a wide variety of dishes and desserts of wonderful regional fruits. Family atmosphere, pleasant, comfortable, air conditioned and spacious. The price is the only salty thing.

title: Diligent
author: André A
reviewBody: The real empanadas are here. Prices vary between 8 and 12 reais. Small atmosphere with 8 tables, but very charming. It is worth checking

address.streetAddress: Avenida Jornalista Umberto Calderaro Filho 955-A Adrianopolis

title: Happy houer service
author: Sildácio A
reviewBody: I loved everything ... attendance SHOW DE BOLA by Erica and Cássio. Very interesting decor ... junina plus cup.

address.streetAddress: Setor comercial Norte Quadra 06 Shopping ID

title: Excellence in contemporary food.
author: Vandabm
reviewBody: Excellence in welcoming and diversity of dishes and wines with unique flavors for eating and tasting.

address.streetAddress: Avenida São Sebastião, 2873, Cuiabá, Mato Grosso Quilombo

title: Delicious Brunch
author: Trek423617
reviewBody: I spent Mother's Day, where my mother and I had a pleasant afternoon enjoying the brunch offered. The service was impeccable and the experience was wonderful! I recommend it and will be back without a doubt!

title: Super Indic
author: Renata P
reviewBody: I love the Skininha Grill, for the service and cold beer. I love the location and the food. Pleasant environment.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Edilson Brasil Soares 1621 Edson queiroz

title: eat well
author: marcelo b
reviewBody: typical things good food good restaurants beaches and very cozy hotels for people who like to live life

title: Interesting
author: Guilherme H
reviewBody: The place is very well maintained, works as a mini production line. The open kitchen and the entrance to the house is really cool, depending on where you sit to see the total operation. The idea of a tasting menu is interesting but the lack of a conventional menu, somewhat limits the way often. The dishes are creative and delicious.

title: Back to the farm's food
author: None
reviewBody: This place will go back in time for food from farms in Goiás. Decoration is also in the same style. It is self-service style, recommended and tasty, huge variety, but not for those on any type of diet. Too much fat and salt. The staff is not as friendly as you would expect. They spend a lot of time talking to each other while customers are waiting for water or other drinks. Payment is made when you leave. In one of the 2 times that I went there the cashier (a gentleman who may even be the owner) did not say a word to me. Totally ignored me, not even a "thank you". This place can be a great asset for local tourism if people treated customers the best

title: Everything very fresh and tasty
author: DiverRS
reviewBody: Pleasant atmosphere and great service. We tried a fish carpaccio and also an octopus. Good food. Fresh and good quality ingredients. Plentiful portions and adequate prices. A good option for those looking for something of the Mediterranean flavor.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek 1489 Vila Olimpia

title: Everything delicious !!!
author: Lícia G
reviewBody: Both the lunch menu and the sandwich menu, everything is delicious! At lunch, try a dish with chicken, never has a burger hit so much on a grilled chicken, delicious and juicy seasoning. The delicious burgers !! Another strong point is the Milkshake, we were unable to choose the preferred one. And to close mini churros ... hummmmm

title: Wonderful cuisine and ambience
author: 456tarsilas
reviewBody: I was at Casa Lisboa with my husband and we ate the delicious Bacalhau à Lagareiro. We love it. Good wine is good service. The wine list is a bit expensive, but the options are very good!

address.streetAddress: Rua Manuel Dias de Moraes, 35 Jd Apipema

title: It has everything with excellent quality
author: Braynner K
reviewBody: I visited with the family and we were very pleased with what we found. Fantastic service, great variety of foods. Everything very well done. The price is not the cheapest, but it is in line with the market considering what is offered.

address.streetAddress: Al Couto Magalhaes 844  Setor Pedro Ludovico Frente ao Hospital Lúcio Rebelo prox. ao Areião

title: Great option and cost-effective
author: SimoneFerreira
reviewBody: I love Fratelli. The pastas are great and the wine list is excellent. The seafood frying pan and the shrimp calzone are very tasty. I recommend it with pleasure.

title: The best sandwich in town
author: paulof159
reviewBody: Laça Burguer is not a gourmet sandwich, but because it is processed in an industrial kitchen it acquires a peculiar flavor. Points for mayonnaise made by the same person for years. The menu is varied and so is the movement. I went a few times and it is always full, in some moments the service is fast and in others it takes time. The place is spacious and has parking.

title: Bad service and mediocre food, on several visits to the restaurant.
author: Flyer818127
reviewBody: I know Arab cuisine well, countless national and international restaurants. This Arab is definitely not a welcoming restaurant. I went to family gatherings a few times, and friends' birthdays. The waiters are absolutely rude and moody. The manager present on occasions, likewise, rude and shooes customers. And in the food, what is most missing are the fabulous Arab spices.

title: Unlike anything, surprising!
author: Liliane C
reviewBody: Fantastic place! It is a mix of bakery, convenience store, greengrocer, wine cellar and restaurant. It has differentiated and imported products. The food is very good. It has a lot of variety. Ask for the price that is salty! Great place to have a coffee, have lunch or buy different things. The atmosphere is very pleasant. I'm a customer! Super recommend!

title: Tasty to the extreme!
author: André R
reviewBody: We met two Press Café in POA: at Shopping Moinhos de Vento and at Fundação Iberê Camargo. In both, we were very well attended !!! The puff pastry with dulce de leche is wonderful! It's a must!

address.streetAddress: Rua Hilário Ribeiro, 281 Moinhos de Vento

title: Angolan cuisine
author: lcgomexx
reviewBody: located in front of the sea at Penha beach in João Pessoa, the Muxima (Coração - in Quimbundo language spoken in Angola), besides fish, shrimp and other seafood, serves Angolan cuisine such as fish mufete (fried fish, fried cassava, banana, green sauce, palm beans, rice and salad) - tasty and great value for money. Simple and pleasant place

address.streetAddress: Rua Otacilio Silva da Silveira 160 Penha

title: Best meat
author: N0rinha
reviewBody: I went on a birthday celebrated there, very good service. Best quality meats, I haven't been to Nilo Peçanha's house yet, but I believe it must be of the same quality.

address.streetAddress: Rua Ramiro Barcelos 389 Na Esquina da Rua São Carlos

title: Excellent!
author: BinnoFrann
reviewBody: Wonderful typical menu with carefully prepared dishes, in an environment with little sophistication and high quality service.

title: Recommended
author: Roberta M
reviewBody: One of the best drinks I have ever tried: Coco Frozem. Tasty food and excellent service from the waiter Reginaldo ....

address.streetAddress: Rua Francisco Deslandes 900 Shopping Anchieta Garden Shopping Anchieta Garden

title: samba and good snacks
author: fercorralo
reviewBody: I went only once to the Dona Neusa bar but I really liked what I saw. inviting atmosphere to go with friends at Happy Hour, ambient samba, good snacks and for those who like to samba, the end of the bar has a circle there is a space with live samba, but I don't know what days it's open ...

title: Dinner
author: Daiara A
reviewBody: Great restaurant. Stupidly cold beer. And very good service from the waiter Jonceliano. Eduardo is the assistant Diego Silva.

title: Excellent
author: Hugo Arnaldo B
reviewBody: Excellent restaurant with typical Goiana food, with a pleasant quality service and very cold beer. The very tasty picanha, well prepared and tender

address.streetAddress: Av. T-2 Setor Bueno E Rua 10 Setor Oeste

title: One of my favorites
author: Julit0B
reviewBody: I really like this restaurant chain, I always go to the gardens unit and I have never been to this Tatuape unit, I thought it was as good! Keeps all the quality of the food fresh, the waiters' service excellent I found it even better than the gardens, in the end I even commented with the manager the great service I had during my lunch! It is one of my favorite restaurants and I will definitely come back more often in this unit

title: Geppos seaside - great restaurant
author: Thabata Z
reviewBody: With live show, calm and pleasant environment! We were very well attended by Souza! We liked the food so much that we went to the restaurant for 3 days !!!!

title: Cold draft beer with the best look in town!
author: Rogermix1959
reviewBody: 'The kabanas offers its customers a mouth-watering draft beer accompanied by great snacks and right in front of the most charming park in Goiânia. Great location!

address.streetAddress: Avenida T 3 2693 Qd 118 Lt 11 Avenida Jamel Cecilio 3300 - Flamboyant Shopping Center

title: Excellent option!
author: LuhannaUrya
reviewBody: Restaurant for those who want to have a light meal. Very varied juices and unusual options such as a diuretic juice. Amoooooo both day and night.

title: Wonderful
author: Michelle C
reviewBody: I went to meet the Emperor of Cameroon due to the comments I read here and the restaurant really exceeded my expectations. I ordered shrimp and pajuçara and the dish came quickly, it was the best food I ate in Maceió. The environment is partly air-conditioned and the service is excellent, the girls are super attentive. I recommend, I didn't leave Maceió without stopping by, I will definitely be back one day.

title: First-rate
author: 158jorges
reviewBody: Extremely pleasant place, whether for a program for two, either with family or friends. Tasty food at a fair price for what is served. An important tip is to arrive early. Not many tables are available and the place is busy.

address.streetAddress: Av. Leitão da Silva, 377 - Praia do Suá

title: Best option in Curitiba
author: julianoc394
reviewBody: Without a doubt one of the best pizza in Curitiba, very tasty and fair price. Excellent service in both delivery and restaurant. I recommend.

title: Best crawfish moqueca!
author: majudemiguel
reviewBody: Great price, great service, best crayfish moqueca in Vitória for sure! The Uber driver showed us the place and it was really worth it!

address.streetAddress: Rua Alcino Pereira Netto, 570 - Jardim Camburi Varzea

title: Chinese food
author: dermenezes
reviewBody: I used to have a lot of lunch in China, I love the spring rolls and the chicken fingers. The fact of being self-service helped a lot, because it is possible to eat only what you want, although the price is a little steep. Wide environment, reasonable service, usually takes a long time to be served.

title: Hot Salads
author: Z_K_SILVA
reviewBody: I was at the Bela Vista shopping store and it seemed to me that the place was organized and the salad that I put together was delicious, I recommend it mainly because of the price compared to several fastfoods that are on site. I put together a medium salad with protein and it met my expectations, I hope to return to the place more often.

title: Disappointing
author: Glaucicarla A
reviewBody: I was disappointed with the tent! The food is expensive, there is nothing special, you have no peace, every moment, a street vendor arrives to offer everything you can imagine! To use the pool you have to pay R $ 15 per person. What deserves praise is the structure which is excellent. But I don't think it's worth it! ;)

address.streetAddress: Av. Zeze Diogo 3125 Praia Do Futuro

title: To have lunch with the family
author: AngelicaSol
reviewBody: The food is excellent! For those who like super Indian fish with reasonable price and very good service.

title: Customized, humanized menu, cuisine that feeds, heals and inspires us.
author: nandocanti
reviewBody: The experience starts with looking at the architecture that combines the rustic and the classic with sustainability. Then the aroma of plants and herbs grown by the Chefs. Then by the feel of warm, human reception. Finally, for its fine, innovative cuisine that explores beyond the five senses. Special.

title: A very nice place
author: Lou R
reviewBody: A place where you will feel great. Friendliness and first-rate service by the great Raone.

address.streetAddress: Setor de Clubes Esportivos Sul, Trecho 2 , Conj. 41, s/n Asa Sul

title: To get to know the Northeastern cuisine
author: Charles P
reviewBody: It is a restaurant with buffet by the kilo that offers several dishes of the cuisine of the Northeast. Fair price and good service. Very recommendable for families.

title: Good
author: Andre_gadelha1
reviewBody: I went with great expectation to be in the south, the day I went the house was full, crowded, which did not help the service, the buffet was great, the meat, average, a lot of bad meat almost raw, I couldn't taste an emptiness to the point, I loved the cheese with guava, I tried it for the first time and I loved it.

title: Good Italian options.
author: Edublu
reviewBody: A nice place in the mall on Av. Paulista. Great gastronomic options and good service with fair prices

title: Very good
author: LUIS EDUARDO F
reviewBody: The Gohann restaurant has a wide variety of sushi, which can be by weight or carvery. The place is air conditioned and well frequented.

title: top restaurant
author: Osvaldo C
reviewBody: The restaurant options in Natal are huge and I could be sure of that, but without a doubt the Trilha do Camarão exceeded all expectations. Very well chosen menu option. Good live music. Super friendly owner who came to our table to see if everything was as desired, super attentive staff and with a price that is really worth what you pay.

title: regional food
author: baldin2015
reviewBody: typical regional restaurant ... very good, but the service is not very good, and very hot inside ..

title: Assessing
author: Lavinialopes
reviewBody: Wonderful, very good service, I loved it very much, friendly waiters, everything very wonderful, I loved the reception, I hope to always return

address.streetAddress: Av. República do Líbano, 251 Loja Nº: 3052

title: Good option
author: fabianesim
reviewBody: Good rodizio with a wide variety of salads and fish included in the rodizio, very good service, fair price, I recommend

title: Lunch break in Goiânia
author: 7tatih
reviewBody: Restaurant is in commercial building, paid parking in the building itself. Pleasant environment. For lunch there was the option of the executive dish, with starter, main course and dessert. Salad was good but you can taste the special sauce, tasty main course, but the dessert was very simple and I didn't have all the options available on the menu.

address.streetAddress: Avenida 136, Numero 797 Edificio New York, Marista

title: Very good
author: Yslla D
reviewBody: A restaurant with a cozy atmosphere, very pleasant. The crepes are wonderful! The dishes take a while to come out, so go without haste. But the atmosphere is nice for chatting and dating. Ideal for family, friends and couples. The menu is very diverse. As for the values, they are reasonable. Not too expensive, not too cheap.

title: Master!
author: karengS9140WB
reviewBody: I am passionate about the rotation of Mercearia Anos 30, whenever I can go there. In addition to the pizzas being very tasty (and there are so many flavors) the service is very good. The decor of the place is very pleasant and cozy.

title: No comments
author: igorjsaores
reviewBody: This restaurant is formidable, service is rated 1000, food of the best quality, super pleasant atmosphere.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Dep. Jamel Cecilio, 3300 - Jardim Goias Shopping Flamboyant

title: A pleasant surprise!
author: thalesk2014
reviewBody: Very good, positively surprised. Cozy restaurant, few tables, only two dishes, but both are perfect. We used Best Goumert and the cost benefit was even better. However it is not expensive, the dishes already with the starter and dessert are around 35 reais, more than fair price. I recommend!

address.streetAddress: Rua Vinte E Quatro de Outubro n. 855 Esquina com rua Presidente Castelo Branco

title: Excellent menu.
author: MagdaBonfim
reviewBody: Restaurant has a menu with delicious and diverse delicacies, pleasant atmosphere and good service, and has a very easy access location.

title: Only the forró was good
author: Angela A
reviewBody: We ordered a fish stew with shrimp, just awful. The waiters are very attentive, the only thing that was good.

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont - Passarela do Caranguejo Praia de Atalaia

title: The best French I've ever been
author: Elmanohenrique
reviewBody: One of the few restaurants where I felt like I was in Paris. Romantic atmosphere, music, service, food, with emphasis on soufflés and the wine list. Really a great choice for those who, like me, are always homesick for Paris!

title: Great food!
author: Fernanda P
reviewBody: I went to JK's San Paolo fornery! An excellent restaurant in the middle of the mall. It's very small, it looks like a kiosk, there's always a wait, but it's worth it for you to eat at a better restaurant and not at a fast food mall. The food is excellent and the tables very nice.

title: Dinner
author: mari_riibeiro
reviewBody: Great food, excellent service from Comadre Maria Jose, super responsive and attentive to the customer! Restaurant note 10, indico

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: I was a little disappointed
author: 825larissat
reviewBody: We went with a very high expectation for a friend's birthday, which she highly recommended! She booked the restaurant for 20 people, almost full capacity! It turns out, they only made available 1 Waiter to serve everyone! The restaurant is in Style tasting menu! You pay 130 reais and 6 mine dishes come between main entrance and dessert. But 1 person to attend 20, it was impossible! While some were eating the 3 course, others were on the first! People were leaving and I hadn't even eaten the final dish, let alone dessert! The explanations of the dishes were not given! And the foods, divided opinions! There was a meat ceviche that I hated! A cod dish that I thought was ok, but those on my table didn't like it! For dessert it was creme brule! The sugar layer was perfect, but the cream was really weird! It wasn't the original! I don't know what it was, but it didn't taste good! They tried to innovate with a nettle leaf cream, I didn't particularly like it! There was a seafood fondue that was seafood for you to "wet" in a moqueca. That one yes! Wonderful! Best dish! It could be just him big q I would be much happier! In general, I didn't like the facilities, furniture inside the house and dusty appearance, bathroom without a handle! A colorful vitrô window inside the bathroom facing the kitchen where you see people's shadows and hear everything! Medium without privacy. Three people had to leave at the time of entry for health reasons and yet it was fully charged by the three people! They charge 35 reais for the wine leaf and wanted to charge 10% on top of that amount, which we contest! I think the idea is good, but there are still many adjustments to make it a cool experience! Most people had the same opinion! So I wouldn't be back!

address.streetAddress: Rua Hilton Fontes de Lacerda Farol de Itapua

title: Nice service
author: Guilherme G
reviewBody: One of the best subways I have ever been on. I studied at the front and, whenever I went, I had a nice service :)

title: Very good!
author: Amanda F
reviewBody: Simple and delicious. Great service. A wonderful sauce is also offered. A good and cheap snack option.

title: Differentiated fast food, with a touch of northeastern food
author: GuilhermeI
reviewBody: For those from outside Fortaleza, eating at Bebelu is an interesting experience. In addition to the traditional, they have some sandwiches with a touch of Northeastern food. My favorite is "Pai D`Égua", which is a sandwich made of sun meat, rennet cheese, lettuce and tomato on flatbread. Great!

title: OUTBACK.
author: Elmer B
reviewBody: Excellent restaurant with excellent service and incredible dining options, in addition to a very pleasant atmosphere.

title: Variety of Arabic food
author: Annelise_Castro1981
reviewBody: Diversified buffet being a good option for those who go to the mall and do not have time. The advantage is the option of dishes that are not restricted to the Arab menu, pleasing other palates

title: Super legal
author: JUCICLEIDE BEZE... C
reviewBody: I love this restaurant! He's always synonymous with partying for me! Tasty dishes, attentive service, cozy atmosphere, with light and very cold beer. On your birthday there is always a surprise celebration if you tell the waiters !! As I love the restaurant and I always want to see it better, I think you could pay a little more attention to cleaning the floor (it is always slippery) and the bathrooms !!!

address.streetAddress: Travessa Casalbuono, 120, Vila Guilherme Shopping Center Norte, Loja 24

title: Irish Pub
author: Francieli K
reviewBody: Pleasant atmosphere, generous portions of snacks, wide choice of beers. Honest price. Regular service.

address.streetAddress: Rua Vieira de Castro 32 Bom Fim

title: price rising and quality falling
author: bobmauro1966
reviewBody: Whenever I'm in Rio, I have a few meals at Catete Grill. At carnival, I was there several times and what I noticed was that, although the variety remains huge, the refinement has diminished. But the price ...

title: Excellent Dinner
author: alepilot70
reviewBody: We were in two couples and our children. Very pleasant atmosphere in an easily accessible address with valet and parking at the door. An average of R $ 90 per person, with a varied menu. Meatball bruschettas are a delight. In fact, everything was delicious. The eggplant has a different cut than we are used to, I would avoid this dish. Dessert comes in small quantities, but all divine.

title: Great quality and fair price
author: pattybraga_
reviewBody: Great restaurant! Located right at the entrance to the Riomar shopping mall, with a cozy and rustic atmosphere. Very varied menu, containing good great drink options, starters, main dishes with shrimp, fish and meat. I really enjoyed Maria's service.

title: Bad. Weak
author: Walker_Y13
reviewBody: I don't recommend it because everything is weak. Menu like others but is in a corner of the mall and the service is the weak point

address.streetAddress: Piso Nova Lima (2º Piso) - Loja 046 BH Shopping

title: Picanha from Paraíba
author: Andre F
reviewBody: Local show, serves a sliced picanha in rodizio accompanied by vinaigrette, farofa, bread d'alho and mush of rennet cheese, amazing!

title: Good restaurant and cafeteria, market with few options.
author: Tbrito123
reviewBody: I frequented the place at the time of its inauguration, which had a proposal for a snack bar / bar / restaurant, but also with good options of products to buy, such as cheese, drinks and sweets importer. It drew attention, mainly for the good offer of some drinks. At the time, I ordered a sandwich with slices of steak, which was very bad, pure fat. I ended up canceling the order and eating at the buffet, which was fine. Currently the prices of products on the market are out of the ordinary, the city has many cheaper options, unless you want an extremely exclusive product. In contrast, the options for snack / bar and buffet have increased and so has the quality, attracting many people for this purpose.

title: Restaurant just above PE Standard
author: Jasper L
reviewBody: Good food, standard service, tasty draft beer, but it's hard to get tables. On weekends, they fight on the big screen, cool to take family and or corporate meetings. Beautiful people guaranteed

address.streetAddress: Rua Marquês de Valença, 50 Boa Viagem

title: Pleasant tour
author: 255henriquev
reviewBody: A well located gas station, very good cafeteria and restaurant, good food, clean bathrooms, parking and good service!

title: VERY GOOD
author: karlinhathiago
reviewBody: This restaurant surprised me. Super cozy place with excellent service. Very polite waiters who insist on serving you. Live music with a very good band. The menu is vast. It has all kinds of food. From chickens and meats to seafood. Dish for 2 serves very well. The coolest thing is the price. Cheap and fair prices. It's worth the visit.
userLocation: São Fidélis, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.streetAddress: Rua Pedro Fonseca Filho 9001 Ponta Negra

title: Excellent!
author: DiogoAU
reviewBody: Very good steakhouse, with presentations of typical gauchas dances and a first class meat rodizio. Great option for a tourist trip.

address.streetAddress: R. Otávio Francisco Caruso da Rocha, s/n Parque Maurício Sirotsky Sobrinho

title: Lousy service
author: trx0
reviewBody: More or less food! Very low quality service !!! Attendants, waiters, etc., all very lazy

address.streetAddress: Avenida Cristiano Machado 4000 Centerminas Minas Shopping, Loja 320, Piso 2

title: Great restaurant
author: flaviafragas
reviewBody: Great service, we were served by Mayara. Excellent lunch, very pleasant atmosphere. Beautiful and tasty dessert.

title: Very good
author: WanderleyMiguel
reviewBody: I went, for the first time, to dine at this restaurant. Despite its name, it has a varied menu, with pasta, shrimp and the like. Very good food, fast and kind service. It has a paid area for children to play. Liked it.

address.streetAddress: Rua Júlio Ibiapina 50 Avenida Beira Mar, Meireles

title: Good dishes
author: MadeiraRosa
reviewBody: Tasty and well served dishes, there are several in the city, all well located.

title: Reasonable
author: FernandaCorreia
reviewBody: I went for the second time, being close to home. At first, I found the foods too greasy. This second time, they were not greasy, but the sushi rice was very soggy. The temaki seaweed was not crunchy, but the salmon was very tasty. The portions served are very small, I believe it is to avoid waste. The location is good. Near the metro Conceição. Value below that practiced in other restaurants in the region. As the restaurant is also interior.

title: Note 10 !!
author: Luciana B
reviewBody: I live in Brasília and I know the NAU here. Still, we decided to have dinner at NAU during my Christmas vacation. LOVED IT! The environment is beautiful! There are a few tables next to the playroom, which I thought was excellent !! The food was delicious!! It was my 2 year old daughter's birthday and we got a dessert to sing congratulations. She loved it and so did we. Super recommended!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Odilon Gomes de Lima 1772 Bairro Cidade Jardim

title: reasonable !!
author: Marco S
reviewBody: and one of the meeting places for locals to have a cold beer with a tasty chicken snack! worth it liked!

title: GREAT PRICE
author: Sandra T
reviewBody: Best pizzas, affordable price and excellent service. When you arrive in the city of Rio Branco do not forget to visit this pizzeria.

title: Lunch
author: N74NXmarial
reviewBody: Delicious food, wonderful service from comadre Maria José and Thalia, beer dinner beer they loved beer

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: Good, Beautiful and Cheap!
author: robertao534
reviewBody: Excellent restaurant! Very good and well served food. The price is pretty cool! We love it! Opens for lunch and dinner.

title: Surprised ...
author: NAKCHUNG
reviewBody: We went to watch the sunset at graciosa beach and we took the opportunity to stop by the only stand with several tables exposed outside to refresh ourselves with a juice ... but, the menu caught our attention ... TUCUNARE TOCANTINENSE. ..wow ~ a delight! the fish is fried whole, but it tasted very tasty! the price for two very good too! be sure to try it!

title: Orimo customer service
author: Lorena M
reviewBody: Great service by the waiter, the food was good and lots of it, but the price a little steep.

address.streetAddress: Av. Dep. Jamel Cecílio, 3.300 Polo Gastronômico - Área Externa - Shopping Flamboyant - Jardim Goiás

title: Tasty regional food
author: GabrielaShodaime
reviewBody: One of the best restaurants in joão Pessoa. Excellent cuisine with many varieties and a very varied menu, with highlights for regional foods; In addition, it has a great location.

title: Great beach 35 km from the center of Maceió AL
author: elias44dn
reviewBody: Very well equipped leisure structure: it has a hammock and gazebo that offer comfort. Very requested place, with what it is necessary that the tourist arrives at the place until 8:45 h to get a good place. The enterprise, which receives many tourist buses, charges a fee of R $ 25.00 (twenty-five reais) per person (under 10 years old do not pay), which is not compensable for consumption. The food left something to be desired: we ordered breaded fish and shrimp baits; the breadcrumbs were quite thick, which made it impossible to taste the snacks, and the main taste was margarine. We think the prices are high. The access to the sea is great for bathing and in the afternoon the water was very warm.

address.streetAddress: Rodovia AL 101 Norte Condomínio Angra de Ipioca

title: Wonderful sweets
author: EMANOEL F
reviewBody: The sweets are very good, quite tasty. She accepts orders. Worth a try. Her job is wonderful.

title: very good
author: Maria Helena G
reviewBody: Very beautiful Italian restaurant, pleasant atmosphere, polite waiters and wonderful food. Very good cocktails. excellent desserts. a beautiful and cozy place

title: Good music and food.
author: FSwil
reviewBody: Very good for a Friday night with friends. Quality music and food Although it is a little expensive. Good for a friday night with friends. High quality food and good national rock music, a little expensive though.

address.streetAddress: Rua Dragão do Mar, 108 Centro Dragão do Mar de Arte e Cultura

title: Simply Divine
author: Ronaldo P
reviewBody: Cozy place facing the sea, you can choose the closed environment or the open air listening to an ambient sound, We can enjoy the cheese-stuffed shrimp called Chiclete de Camarão and a delicious parmegiana with a portion of rice, do not miss wonderful .

title: Good place to end the day after work
author: azuosepilef
reviewBody: Good place to end the day after work. Offers a self-service live with the accompaniments of the dishes.

title: Perfect location
author: repjacinto
reviewBody: I love the herb corner. Healthy option for those looking for. Good location. Executive lunch (chicken or fish) with great cost benefit, accompanied by salad, brown rice and the day I was mashed cassava. Wonderful juices. I recommend.

title: Restaurant that does not relax quality
author: Manoel M
reviewBody: Very good service. Exceptional location. Wonderful food taste. However, in this Branch of the "Cameroon" the dishes are smaller compatible with the prices that are also lower than the other Branches.

title: Nice
author: MarcelaLeal
reviewBody: Nice place! Very good food, service is often different. Just sin a little when it's full. But it meets expectations most of the time. Always a great option for dinner on the weekend and even during the week. Last time we went on a Tuesday and I ordered a lighter dish, grilled tuna with palm heart spaghetti and baby leaves and it was delicious! Starter: the garlic bread with heart is very good and the crispy potatoes too!

address.streetAddress: Rua Desembargador Sampaio, 332 - Praia do Canto

title: Good, tasty food and fair price
author: Lucas O
reviewBody: Having lunch at Jaya is a delight, whether for lunch, with friends or romantic. The house's vegetarian food is always varied, plentiful and with a lot of flavor. At times, the house is full, but generally the environment can handle all customers (now with the command system it is even better). I didn't try the Friday night pizza, but I had very positive feedback from friends, worth a try!

title: Excellent
author: Angela P
reviewBody: Strolling through Fortaleza, I chose the restaurant without knowing it was all good rs I was tired of eating fish and ordered a file mignon that was simply divine !!! The atmosphere is pleasant, attentive waiters and everything is wonderful. I recommend.

title: Terrible attendance
author: AlineCNP
reviewBody: Despite the high price, I had already gone several times with my boyfriend because the food was good, but I think none of this pays off when the customer is poorly served. You arrive and the place is a little cramped, when you can sit the waiters do not even look at your table, pass you several times, do not see that you are not drinking anything or offer you a drink. We complained at the cashier that we were leaving without drinking anything simply because the waiter didn't answer us. Unfortunately, the complaint had no effect, as it kept happening at other times, and we always gave feedback to the person at the checkout. Along with the third complaint, we took the opportunity to warn that we would never return to the place, we never really returned and neither did the people in our circle of friendship. This is how a place loses customer (S) and enriches the competitor.

title: different and excellent
author: lane n
reviewBody: Very varied food, snacks, pasta, tacos, meats and sandubas very different and delicious. I will come back.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Praia de Ponta Negra, 8876 A Ponta Negra

title: I LOVED IT
author: 403gabrielf
reviewBody: The best pizzeria in Brasilia. Light pasta, tasty filling, choice of borders and drinks. Has delivery service, super fast, the pizza arrives warm. The prices are great, it is worth checking the promotional offers during the week and loyalty plans.

address.streetAddress: Quadra Sclrn 709 Bloco G S/N Lj 33

title: Better and better
author: ViagemSA
reviewBody: In my opinion, Botequim is only improving. I always go with my family to this restaurant and the service has been getting more and more careful and the dishes are great. The picanha is good for three people and the feijoada (served on Fridays and Saturdays) is one of the best I've ever tried. The only snag is for the developer that they don't get it right, but apart from this item, there is usually no mistake. The minced meat Luis Luis is another wonderful dish, very well served. The atmosphere is simple, unsophisticated and great for weekend lunch, which is usually very busy and, depending on the time, the queue is right.

title: Excellent !!!
author: Rogerio S
reviewBody: The restaurant is pleasant, has great service and prices that are worth the cost benefit, we request 02 dishes the famous Chiclete de Camarão, which to be honest did not please much, very heavy dish looks like a shrimp with cheese. The second dish, Shrimp with Jerimum sauce, pleased me, when I return to Maceio I will definitely order this dish again.

title: Reasonable northeastern food
author: marceloh366
reviewBody: Very wide facility, in self service per kilo, quite a variety of northeastern food but of reasonable taste, nothing special. Reasonable price for quality. Correct service. It is certainly not a restaurant that I would return to!

address.streetAddress: Rua Desembargador Joao Vicente da Costa 8861

title: Very good
author: Lucas A
reviewBody: Great restaurants, with a lot of variety and good price, great location, finally great place to have your meal if you are on the beach in cabo branco

title: Super exquisite
author: Elayne S
reviewBody: La Palma is an excellent restaurant, refined place, pleasant atmosphere, excellent food, varied menu. The corn pudding, too tasty!

address.streetAddress: Rua Professor Jerson Martins 146 Esquina Com Noraldino de Lima, Atras Do Epa

title: Excellent
author: ApBianchi
reviewBody: The place is very nice, I have always been very well attended ... the food is very good, I often stay only at the entrance which is very well served and as good as snacks and food. The desserts are also worth trying ...

title: Copacabana Unit at 22:00
author: SinaraP
reviewBody: The first impression was good, full house and much more decorated, typically northeastern, the drink came quickly, but the entrance took 20 min to arrive, which is not a long wait when accompanied by having a beer, but my visit was only, then the time seemed longer ... The entrance arrived: fish broth, a little less full-bodied than I am used to, but it was delicious, very hot the way the Northeast likes and with pieces of shrimp ... for the broth note 8. As soon as I finished the broth the main course arrived, I ordered a delicious rib of fish accompanied by also delicious, but a small vinaigrette is a neat portion of Northeastern couscus that for my taste was a little tasteless, the main course, note 7. Service, friendly. I will be back to try other dishes.

address.streetAddress: Avenida do Nordeste, s/n Pavilhao de Sao Cristovao

title: delight of restaurasnte
author: daniellenc
reviewBody: Charming restauranrt but without great frills. Delicious cuts of meat associated with excellent seasoning without impairing the flavor of the meat. Salty just for the price, but worth a try.

title: Incredible ambience
author: Felipe S
reviewBody: Everything in the restaurant was very well thought out. Great atmosphere, great acoustics. Sleep despite being high does not disturb the conversation. Great decor. Great dishes of excellent quality. Great employees. Salty price but valid for the quality of services provided. I recommend!

address.streetAddress: Rua Julio de Castilho 758 Entre as Ruas Pinheiro Machado e Quintino Bocaiuva, bairro Olaria

title: Great meats
author: Antonio Carlos d
reviewBody: An excellent steakhouse. Wide variety of salads, wide variety of meats, great desserts and a very pleasant environment.

address.streetAddress: Rua General Teofilo Ribeiro de Arruda 122 Vicente Pinzon

title: Amazing
author: Alejandro S
reviewBody: The mate made in the river is very good, I don't know what they put in it, but I can't imitate it, it's just there, there's no better one

address.streetAddress: Av. Ayrton Senna, 3000 Loja 1007 1o. Pavimento Barra da Tijuca

title: Good dishes
author: 699ELISIO
reviewBody: A place like the good history of the city center. Good draft beer, good food. Good service from the staff. A very pleasant place to enjoy yourself and enjoy the good things of gastronomy. Large place, nice view. And, repeat, the quality of what is offered to meet the customer's taste. An appetizer - like bruschetta with Parmesan cheese - is already a way to satisfy the palate with the good draft beer. Then, let yourself be carried away by the good dishes that - at your whim - will be served, as you like, like steaks, other meats, etc. A caveat for management to think: in times of digital media - the house "does not yet have WI-FI - informed the waiter. This does not hinder the quality of the food, but it does interfere with the amenities the world offers its customers.
userLocation: São José do Rio Preto, SP

title: Snacks and music
author: Cleo M
reviewBody: The bar is an excellent option for those who want to enjoy good music, see beautiful people and taste great snacks! The environment is divided into different spaces and is in an excellent location in the city.

title: Don't miss out!
author: louyserego
reviewBody: Thematic bar, well decorated, good food, good drinks and a place of good old rock'n roll, the bar has a relaxed proposal for those who want to enjoy the night with friends; it is an excellent choice! It has a special beer list !!!! Depending on the day of the week, there is live music! Ah, first class service! It was well worth the visit!

title: Easter holiday in Natal
author: Thiago S
reviewBody: Excellent pizza. Very good price. The environment, however, leaves something to be desired. The service is also a highlight.

title: Strained but mediocre
author: Y1147OVeduardos
reviewBody: Unflavored ramen (I ordered soy sauce) and karaague were not exciting either. I ordered the "láyú" sesame oil and there was none available. In place, they brought "shichimi" pepper, which is for udon, which is not even on the menu.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Visconde de Guarapuava 2800 Cruzamento Com Marechal Floriano Peixoto,746

title: Quality is right here !!!
author: Laryrudek
reviewBody: Fantastic place, with a service note 10, pizzas simply magnificent. And best of all all the advertising that is made of the place really lives up to what it is in fact. I will come back for sure !!!!

title: Simplicity
author: Lucimara Aparec... G
reviewBody: No difficulties in arriving, quiet parking (inside and outside), very well received. The place is very pleasant, family-friendly and the number expected to be a Sunday. Tasty and plentiful food. The atmosphere is rustic, simple and with a special charm. The website is very faithful and with the necessary explanations to avoid any surprises, such as the non-acceptance of cards. I liked it, indicate and return for sure.

address.streetAddress: Estrada Municipal Prefeito Dr. Sakis Tellian, 3000 Serra Da Cantareira

title: Delicious food and great atmosphere
author: lureisss
reviewBody: The place is cute and even has a wide musical program at night. I went for lunch R $ 39 eat at ease: everything delicious. However, in the end the bill comes out much more than that for the drink, dessert and coffee that are charged separately. Delicious tangerine juice R $ 14, great dessert R $ 8 plus 10%. Still, it's worth it for the environment and the food.

title: The best of Christmas
author: krisnaaquino
reviewBody: The best Christmas restaurant! All dishes are wonderful, starting with the starters: Ceviche, shrimp pastry (with lots of shrimp) and caprese! Super nice environment and great cost benefit!

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Boo food
author: Leandrosousa
reviewBody: Good food the place is beautiful. A reasonable cost for the quality presented. I visited before the renovation, currently I think it has been expanded. Previously, the environment had a strong fishy smell.

address.streetAddress: Rua Maria Lacerda Montenegro, 1010B - Nova Parnamirim

title: Good Option!
author: say0u
reviewBody: Delicious meats with a la carte order. Lotadásso on weekends, which can cause delay in service.

title: Good.
author: Elisângela P
reviewBody: Very interesting atmosphere, pleasant service, good food. To get out of the routine, to be in a different place, it is worth the visit.

title: Delicious pizza !!
author: suzanferreira
reviewBody: This is one of those pizzas that you eat praying so delicious !! My favorite is Havaiana in the medium mass. The service is fast and very friendly. Small environment. There are parking spaces.

title: Wonderful!
author: hayane v
reviewBody: Very nice ... adooooreiii the pasta served, in addition to great service and very good prices. Super recommend!

title: Excellent pizza and good service
author: Matheus N
reviewBody: I went to dinner on Saturday and ordered Mamma Quaresma pizza (created by Chef Flávia), and it was WONDERFUL. Very tasty pasta and arrived fast. I recommend

address.streetAddress: Rua Saturnino de Brito, 50 Jardim Botânico

title: Hospitality and taste
author: 772m_riom
reviewBody: In one of the most beautiful places in the world, at Ponta Verde beach, this restaurant splendor is located, which combines haute cuisine with a hospitality that makes the best in the world envy. My tip is the Jangadeiros shrimp. And the caipirosca with or without siriguela alcohol.

address.streetAddress: R. Gen. João Saleiro Pitão, 1296 Ponta Verde

title: GOOD TO SEE FOOTBALL
author: zeloureironeto
reviewBody: Wide and a little noisy place, good for watching football. Prices are a little steep, but the food is good.

title: Wonderful lunch
author: Soninhatur
reviewBody: Food grade 10 the fiorentine and wonderful shrimp, great service from the waiter Vanderlei I highly recommend

address.streetAddress: Avenida Doutor Chucri Zaidan, 902 Shopping Market Place

title: Top Service
author: chico862
reviewBody: New, modern, spacious and very comfortable restaurant! The prawns are the attraction of the menu, which also has great meat options for those who don't like seafood. Exceptional service, polite and well trained waiters. The price is right, large dishes that serve several people. Great quality. Worth it. We will be back, for sure!

title: Beautiful Pizza !!!
author: Canichio
reviewBody: As I live in Sao Paulo I believe it is difficult to find an option outside of our territory, but this restaurant made me change my opinion, thin pasta, nice location, good service and good location, go without fear!

title: Great
author: Amanda L
reviewBody: Great cost benefit since you can choose what you want to eat ... very good to escape the "combined", the only other option is the other Japanese restaurants in Cuiabá.

address.streetAddress: Av. Getúlio Vargas. 1301 Esquina c/ R. Pres. Castelo Branco

title: Best of all!
author: ProaP1
reviewBody: Sushi and differentiated service! Cleber is a figure, very dear and attentive! Worth a try!

address.streetAddress: Rua Des. Espiridião de Lima Medeiros, 317 Três Figueiras

title: Hyper, Mega Tudo
author: Eurian D
reviewBody: The pizza in this place is excellent and the service is a thousand. The prices are well worth it and very well located.

title: Great Self of Arab Food
author: WellingtonTorres
reviewBody: The food is great. Everything very tasty and tasty. Very nice service. They worried If we already had a table Because it is a food court in a mall. The cigars, the ears all delicious. The price is quite salty, but for the quality it is worth it.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Paulista 1230 Shopping Cidade São Paulo

title: Good food
author: juracijunior
reviewBody: Great menu! You help yourself there, on the wood stove, literally! Everything was delicious. The problem is that there is no air conditioning. On very sunny days (which is very common in Porto Velho), you sweat a lot.

title: Unhappy surprise
author: lucianadourado
reviewBody: Lunch at Mani was a bad experience. I asked for lamb and the meat came simply "horrible" - rancid, full of nerves, in short, pitiful. The price is much higher than other restaurants of this same standard and, definitely, in my opinion, it was not worth a penny - not even for the environment that does not have a pleasant physical structure.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Brigadeiro Faria Lima 2232 Shopping Iguatemi - Livraria Cultura

title: Excellent
author: BethMenezes
reviewBody: The restaurant, in addition to having a very nice and different decoration, has an infinite variety of foods. Meats of all kinds, even goats, many garnishes, so you can eat whatever you want, there is everything there and very well seasoned. It also has very good and delicious juices. I recommend.

title: I love Rocca!
author: Roberta272013
reviewBody: I am a regular customer, I love the Ravenna menu, a differentiator from other pizzerias. Congratulations to Rocca for presenting the soteropolitanos with an excellent service and quality in the pizzas, in addition to its environment that is super pleasant. Note 10 to Rocca Forneria !!!

address.streetAddress: Rua das Hortênsias, 564 - Praça Ana Lúcia Magalhães Pituba

title: Excellent option!
author: RaquelfOliver
reviewBody: Excellent pizzeria, with great rotation of pizzas, and a great atmosphere. Excellent quality and service.

title: Saturday lunch
author: alefelicetti
reviewBody: Great service. Great food. I recommend the dessert cocada. Congratulations to Gleison and Aguiar !!!

title: Great
author: ACamini
reviewBody: Variety of foods at reasonable prices. It has attentive and efficient waiters. Located on the edge of Maceió Closed and outdoor environment.

title: Amazing!!
author: MarcoAnronioNeves
reviewBody: Simply wonderful food !! Even better environment! We tried the Cocrante de Massa Filó, Main Dishes: Fish of the day. In Tucupi with manioc flour. (Crunchy and delicious). Red ...... sensational !!!

title: Unique quality
author: AianC
reviewBody: The place naturally welcomes and enchants. The Docks is a beautiful place. But everything can be much better with fresh beer from Amazon taken on time, at the right point. The menu is varied and the food very good. Try all the beers, enjoy the view and happiness comes easily.

address.streetAddress: Estacao das Docas na Baia de Guajara. Rua Boulevard Castilhos França, 707 - Armazém 1

title: Good cost-benefit
author: zocaborges
reviewBody: the price of the kilo is 45.00 and there is also a la carte. In the buffet there is Japanese and Chinese food, in the Japanese there is an exaggeration in cream-cheese but it doesn't compromise much, an air-conditioned place in a quiet street.

title: It's in the roll of the best Christmas restaurants
author: Storyteller689685
reviewBody: With easy access, Cameroon is constituted by an elegant and pleasant environment. From those restaurants with wonderful lighting, gentle waiters and a great variety of dishes, not only shrimp, but also other meats. The desserts are wonderful. Indicate cheese and guava. The price is right.

title: Regional cuisine
author: MariaGP29
reviewBody: It is a restaurant where you pay for the weight of the dish. There are many options of northeastern cuisine common in the states of Pernambuco, Paraíba, Rio Grande do Norte and Ceará. Despite having fish-based dishes, its strong point is country cuisine. (Sun meat, goat, buchada, free-range chicken, etc.). The desserts are varied and delicious with many options of homemade sweets, typical cakes, cheeses, etc. . At night a regional supper is also served, with soups, cassava, sweet potatoes, tapioca, munguzá, etc. The decoration also follows the country line. It has Boa Viagem and Casa Forte.

address.streetAddress: Av. Fernando Simões Barbosa, 1200 Boa Viagem

title: Hidden
author: Vitor_Espinheira
reviewBody: Simple but very nice restaurant in front of the sea at the very end of Pina beach. Dear chef is the roast beef but it is worth the fish and other dishes that are well served even for 3 people. Very good.

title: Must respect the Anti-smoking Law
author: farahluiz80
reviewBody: Wonderful food, but ZERO respect. I just left the restaurant after an amazing dinner, but one thing bothered me a lot; a group of about 8 people, very loud (but so far ok), smoking their electronic cigarettes inside the restaurant, which, under federal anti-smoking law, is prohibited. When questioning a waiter about this, he told me, ashamed, that this group goes to the restaurant every Friday and smokes. These regulars have already guided and talked to the owners of the restaurant and even so, this continues. Since the owners do not take decent action, I will report the restaurant for breaking the law. But even so, I have to say that the food is delicious, the atmosphere is very tasty and all the staff are super kind. I will return to the restaurant, on a next visit to Curitiba, and as long as I don't have to stay in the same environment as the smokers.

title: Reasonable.
author: Mirellasb
reviewBody: Good service. Nice food. The day I went it was full. So it took a little while to replace the food. But I thought the meats were good. Good price.

title: Nice food
author: Luciano G
reviewBody: The dishes served with fish are wonderful .. however the service of the waiters in the rodizio system left a lot to be desired .. everyone without patience and a lot of mechanics ... just pass the table running .. with little education and practically throw the food in your dish!!

address.streetAddress: Rua Dr. João Rosa pires, 1030 Amambaí

title: Highlight for the food and service of Muratto da Praia
author: AFONSOM_12
reviewBody: Recently, I had the opportunity to visit Muratto da Praia, located on the crab walkway. I highlight Mr. Saulo's personalized service, together with his team. The suggestion of salmon with dried tomato risotto was exceptional. I prefer the air of informality in this restaurant over the other also located in Atalaia.

title: Corner restaurant and bar
author: Fabio Hiroto M
reviewBody: Typical restaurant bar in São Paulo. With simple and good food. It is located on a corner near Av. Paulista. Happy hour is very busy. There are tables on the sidewalk and are subject to beggars and people trying to sell everything.

title: Our is worth it.
author: NarenNatureza
reviewBody: Good service, and the staff is fast, they worked well, it was worth it. I recommend it to anyone and don't delay.

title: Coffee fast food with poor service
author: BrazilianSky
reviewBody: Coffees, snacks and the like with more affordable prices than normal for a shopping mall in São Paulo. The coffee was well taken, but friendliness and goodwill are not the strength of the employees here.

address.streetAddress: Travessa Casalbuono, 120 Shopping Center Norte, Loja do estacionamento

title: Incredible carvery!
author: Mmluz
reviewBody: This pizzeria has great deals! In addition to a carvery filled with options, you can still get 2 pizzas for the price of one on promotion days. Ideal to take the whole family, celebrations or order delivery.

address.streetAddress: Praça Brigadeiro Faria Rocha, s/n Rio Vermelho

title: New option in the city
author: Fernanda P
reviewBody: Great option for those who like carvery, be it barbecue or Japanese food. The location is good, as well as the price and service.

itemReviewed.name: Churrascaria Sal e Brasa São Luís

title: Almost good...
author: VicenteTomazi
reviewBody: I went to a restaurant for dinner with a friend. I don't know if it was due to the fact that it was on sale - 35 reais per person - at the buffet with a carvery - but the fact was that the meats were too old and even though they alerted the waiters, they continued to serve us the same meat. Left something to be desired ...

address.streetAddress: Av. Roberto Freire, 1070 - Capim Macio Capim Macio

title: Traditional Bahian food restaurant
author: HermesL61
reviewBody: One of the oldest and most traditional restaurants in the city. Pleasant atmosphere and affordable price. It is worth knowing it.

title: We love!!!
author: FabiGoncalves
reviewBody: Delicious crepes and drinks !!! Differentiated decoration and excellent service! My husband and I loved the place and went twice in the week we stayed in Natal! Excellent location, service and very tasty food! Fair price and well served dishes!

address.streetAddress: Rua Aristides Porpino Filho 3111 Alto de Ponta Negra

title: Quite nice dump
author: Juan L
reviewBody: The restaurant is small and pleasant. The dishes were delicious and the service was good. The price is a little steep.

title: Good
author: Yslla D
reviewBody: Visiting @mipastini today. House with fair price, handmade pasta and well served dish. Only a few adjustments are necessary: the meat was very salty and the cheese sauce was very thick.

title: Reasonable
author: Danilo d
reviewBody: More fame than taste. More than an hour of waiting and no surprises in the food. We eat shrimp on the crust with brie cheese risotto. It seems that they forgot to put salt. The only good thing is the portion sizes.

title: Better than I ever ate
author: kamilupi
reviewBody: For me it is the best burger I have ever been to, they have a small space but still they can handle everything and serve their customers very well, wonderful hamburger, the desserts are divine, the pudding is great the cheesecake pie is the best d all the chocolate cake at last the desserts are great and always fresh. Highly recommend going.

title: Pleasure in tasting good snacks and Portuguese products.
author: Nazaolive
reviewBody: Excellent food and genuinely Portuguese products and unparalleled service, both from the attendants and the owners.

title: Delicious ramen
author: RenataNetto
reviewBody: I went with friends who introduced me to the fantastic ramen from the house. Dish well served and staff very attentive. Concerned with the quality standard, they remade the dish before serving.

title: Delicious Picanha
author: edrudd
reviewBody: The picanha is very good !! Extremely delicious and juicy. The fries are also very good. But the restaurant lacks the option of rice without onion. The chocolate milkshake is no big deal.

title: Delicious food, fair price, simple but careful service
author: rafaelnorberto
reviewBody: Well-seasoned and abundant food, a friendly atmosphere with attentive staff. At lunchtime it is not the place for "that event", but if you want to eat good food between the day's runs, it is worth it. I always leave satisfied! At night, there is a great happy hour. Among the foods, there is the best beans you will eat outside Grandma's house. The chicken beirut is great too, as are the salads (gimba and vip, especially), which are very well made. In addition, I recommend the pork steak, the supreme chicken (with bacon and caturpiry) and any of the super fancy hamburgers there. It is worth mentioning the somewhat familiar simplicity of the place, something I really like, and the fair price. I will always keep going!

address.streetAddress: Rua Doutor Gentil Leite Martins 108 Vl Nova Caledonia

title: Very good service
author: fsoido
reviewBody: Very well located, on Cabo Branco beach, the Bar do Cuscuz has a wide variety of food and snack options. The service was quick and the waiters were very attentive. We ordered tapioca dumplings for starters and a yellow hake for the main dish on the grill. Both were well served. The fish was excellent, however, I found the side dishes to be slightly spiced. As for the tapioca dices, as a positive point, they were very dry, they were not soaked in the fat as we see in some other places, and one point to be improved is the dipping sauce. For me, rosé sauce doesn't go with this snack, I think this sauce is too "heavy", a pepper jelly, for example, would go better. I recommend the visit and, when I'm in João Pessoa, I'll be able to visit again to try other options on the menu.

title: Impeccable environment
author: Carolina Midori H
reviewBody: The restaurant has a spectacular atmosphere, full of details and rich in characteristic Italian decor. The dishes are well presented, but not so well served (eat well, without exaggeration). The service is good, but it could be better - I say in relation to the speed of orders and delay when requesting a waiter. I just don't give a 5 because we went to celebrate our anniversary, and even though my boyfriend agreed with the waiter to bring the cotton candy cake, the waiter disappeared and the order ended up being forgotten. That was the only drawback, but I highly recommend this place. Worth knowing!

title: Sushi in Candelária
author: Jose L
reviewBody: In the Candelária neighborhood, if you want to enjoy Japanese food, you can go to Sushi Home, which offers fair prices.

title: First class service and exceptional cuisine!
author: Angelo B
reviewBody: Very friendly and attentive service, for example my wife who is allergic to shrimp received a toast because I ordered a special dish from the chef that came with prawns and lobsters. The dish was delicious and beautifully presented. So that my wife would not be sad she received a small courtesy of her choice. For that kind of care and for the quality of the service as a whole, this place deserves my recommendation.

title: WANT TO EAT WELL, GO THERE ....
author: Sônia Maria P
reviewBody: The restaurant is not so beautiful, the waiters are not so friendly, but very efficient. Now, the food ... what food! if you want to indulge yourself, try the shrimp cakes, the breaded steak or the shrimp and fish moqueca ..... everything is great. For those who like sandwiches, the steak tenderloin steak with cheese and vinaigrette is divine ... I highly recommend it ..... just going there to taste it .... another really good thing is the caipirinha ... I took the sake, worth tasting ....

address.streetAddress: Rua Vieira de Morais 1034 Campo Belo

title: Excellent choice
author: anselmoe2014
