reviewBody: Whenever I return to Rio I come here. The cover charge is very good, the pasta, the minestrone. I recommend the creme brulee for dessert. The place is small, outside the tourist itinerary. Good choice for lunch or dinner.

title: Samīshefu - A beautiful Japanese surprise in Ponta Negra
author: Jose L
reviewBody: The Samīshefu restaurant is located in Conjunto Ponta Negra! It presents good variety, good quality and adequate prices. The environment is light and has great service. We will be back !!

title: Everything perfect
author: luizfernandoc767
reviewBody: I ordered a chorizo steak and I remembered Argentina well, perfect service, waiter on account of my table, price of the light dish that goes perfectly with a wide variety of salad service 70.00 !!! Worth it.

address.streetAddress: Av. Tancredo Neves, 909 Caminho das Árvores

title: Happiness on arriving irritation on leaving
author: Ricardo E
reviewBody: The proposal of the restaurant is grade 10! The problem is that it is only in the proposal ... The scenery and infrastructure are jaw-dropping and there is a space for water sports, a unique combination with POTENTIAL of a good afternoon of joy, but it does not happen. If the restaurant is managed by a chef, I would expect another stance in its management in several aspects: 0- customer SMOKES in the establishment, 1- menu WITHOUT description of the dishes, 2- MISPER MANAGEMENT and training of the waiters, 3- ABSENCE from a beverage station to relieve the attendance, 4- HIGH PRICE of the dishes, 5- DELAY in the delivery of the dishes, 6- DO NOT accept credit card. The establishment is in a calm and peaceful place with beautiful natural scenery, all of which does not combine with smoking. Smoking customers disperse and share their 'odorless' smoke to all customers, it is unpleasant and the establishment does not have a clear stance to prevent this problem. Where have you seen a restaurant without a description of the dishes? To accomplish this task the waiters, who are disputed by the customers for tapas, have the function of describing the dishes, which makes it embarrassing and risky because either you choose the meal by name with costs around 70 reais per dish and per person or else you believe in the knowledge of the same as the description of the dishes and hold it to describe ALL the menu but the staff do not know the dishes, not really. For example, the dish we ate was lobster provencal, which according to the waiter was based on sour cream and we received a dish based on lemon ... Ridiculous Low number of waiters and all poorly trained, worse than market stall , ill will of some, constant running, result: customers have to fight to get their attention. Poor management because the basic principle of each waiter to work by sector does not exist, I observed ¾ of the waiters serving a single sector. In a large space, I would expect a drink station near the tables to relieve the waiters' travel to the base and a system to record orders via radio or other wireless technology. This would reduce the wait time for the waiters and increase their productivity. The prices of the dishes are very expensive, and we still wait 1 hour to receive it. Camarões in Natal-RN, offers dishes with a price slightly above for 2 and maybe 3 people. Tastier dishes, much more, super efficient service food delivered quickly, a reference. Detail, Cameroon in Natal-RN is considered one of the 5 best restaurants in the country ... Even with all this suffering, we even thought about consuming 2 dishes, but you will hardly walk with 2 or 3 R $ 100.00 bills on the street without purpose ... Ridiculous ... My experience was terrible in all criteria except the view, but this is free at Orla do Por do Sol. I do not recommend visiting this establishment, but if you still want to go, go prepared to your happiness turns into boredom ... Ricardo Emidio

title: A complete place.
author: FernandaBucker
reviewBody: Whether for a happy hour, lunch or dinner, this restaurant manages to serve great snacks to the most exquisite dishes with great flavor and good presentation. Draft beer and beer always cold, with cafeteria options also on the menu, ranging from pizzas, sandwiches to more elaborate dishes. You can order snacks per kilo or a la carte. Fresh and tasty breads are also sold on site !! A complete place !! Very recommended!

address.streetAddress: Av. Visc. de Souza Franco, 776 Boulevard

title: Super recommended!
author: katiabinotti
reviewBody: The bar's atmosphere is very pleasant and the service is exceptional .. I recommend the different varieties of caipirinhas, owl beer and feijoada!

title: I really enjoyed the restaurant
author: Débora C
reviewBody: I loved the food, undoubtedly a great restaurant option for those who want to eat good meat, the wine list is very diverse, there are half bottles and even separate glasses. However, what was left to be desired was the service, the wine came at room temperature and the garlic bread came cold, then we replenished the bread and they ended up serving us a warm garlic bread and the way we would have liked the first.

title: Good
author: Jacyara
reviewBody: Various sandwich options, very tasty. It is very close to the centenary square, at Farol. The structure could be a little better, especially when compared to the competition.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Santa Rita de Cássia, 38 Farol

title: I liked the place
author: erikspacheco
reviewBody: A quiet option with good drinks and good food, I just don't know if we can call it a pub, because it has time to end, at the most I think it's worth a pass.

title: Tasty crepes
author: ANTONIO H
reviewBody: My family and I always go to Voyage for any lunch, snack or dinner. At lunch you have several options of savory crepes or when buying a delicious stroganoff, you get a sweet mini crepe as a toast.

title: Sensational
author: biancad489
reviewBody: Great place, nice, well decorated and very beautiful! I tried the Aztec beer draft with tequila and lemon and it's very good! The cheddar sauce of the canoe potato is DIVINE! Pleasant service and little waiting on a Saturday night! Super recommend!

title: Medium
author: robertai846
reviewBody: Good food, but average. Nothing exceptional. We went with a greater expectation since it is a famous chef's restaurant (Erik Jacquin). Very high price for what you offer. It's not worth it.

title: Where is he?
author: Fabiana_Vieira
reviewBody: After seeing some notes and visiting friends, I decided to get to know. I love new and different things. I confess that I was not surprised. From the pictures I imagined a dark place, full of Star Wars mysteries, in fact it is a bar, very clear by the way, on the day I went, a Thursday, I didn't see any characters, nothing much. Everyone seemed to want us to leave soon. The black burger is really delicious and the potato with the smell of licking its lips. The place is a little thematic, but much less than I expected for what was published. I was disappointed for not having seen and taken a picture with any character. If that is the differential of the house, then let it be known when there is, or always there is.

title: Amazing
author: Renata G
reviewBody: Think of a place with incredible decor, with a beautiful view in a wonderful location. Xian was a pleasant and pleasant surprise. From the friendly reception at the door by Bianca to the service at the table by Diogo. Ronaldo is a separate employee. Amazing! Helpful, attentive, fun, light and pleasant. It made our experience unforgettable! I would like to thank the whole team !! Keep up the amazing work !! Would go back and indicate without blinking!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Almirante Silvio de Noronha 365 Localizado na cobertura do Bossa Nova Mall

title: Self-service. Decent. Great deserts
author: None
reviewBody: A place for quick and healthy meals in the city center, if you are in João Pessoa. Humble, but good simple food. Deserts are great with homemade flavor.

address.streetAddress: Praca Joao Pessoa 63 Passo D Areia

title: Bistro with quality and honest price
author: Marisa M
reviewBody: French cuisine is well represented in this restaurant in Boa Viagem, few restaurants in Recife, have on their menu the combination of flavors and varieties that this restaurant presents, coupled with that the good service and cozy place make this restaurant a good option in Praia from Boa Viagem

title: Wonderful dinner
author: fabiodE4128ZO
reviewBody: Excellent service from all the staff The meter that served us Souza, very attentive, cuts, efficient, we love the service. Very good food, delicious sardines. We will be back for sure. I recommend

itemReviewed.name: Adega Santiago Barra - Rio de Janeiro

address.streetAddress: Av. das Américas, 3900 Shopping Village Mall, 2º Andar

title: Average food and $ urreal price
author: carolcarneiro2015
reviewBody: I paid 30 reais on a sandwich the size of 1 cm from Subway. No drink. 6 reais in a water. A dose of Smirnoff costs 21 reais. What is the reason for this?

address.streetAddress: Avenida Epitacio Pessoa S/N Parque de Cantagalo, Lagoa

title: Good food with great view
author: Rui2000
reviewBody: Well located restaurant overlooking Praia da Areia Preta. The food is good, adequate for the price q is not high. A great place to have lunch and enjoy the view. Service as expected. Only the environment is not the best but the view is worth it.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Governador Silvio Pedroza 54 Areia Preta

title: Perfection!
author: FernandaA186
reviewBody: The way to the restaurant is beautiful, the view is a surprise ... The food is perfect, and the wine list is delicious! Going to the pleasant is an experience :)

title: A delight!
author: 272paulof
reviewBody: Great service, wonderful food, Simple place, super tidy, very family atmosphere, I recommend !!

title: Very nice and nice
author: maieskykr
reviewBody: Very good, nice atmosphere, huge variety of food, starter, taste, to the sound of a piano, all in luxury with beautiful view of the sea, excellent service, I recommend for sure. When I went the price of the carvery was 52.00 per person, I did not find it so expensive for the location and structure of the restaurant.

address.streetAddress: Av Almirante Tamandaré 900 Beira Mar de Tambau

title: Our favorite restaurant in Ipanema
author: LuisLinhares
reviewBody: Very good restaurant to go after the beach, in a good location, a few meters from the beach. It works with the customer asking the portions of the attendants, who are serving the dish to the customer's taste. Natural food, with salads, hot dishes and freshly grilled meats, with the option of ordering beans. Price above the average for a kilo, but worth it. There is always a queue at the door, but the check-in and check-out is constant, wandering the table on both floors all the time.

title: Very good
author: GustavoGT
reviewBody: Top notch food. Good service and privileged view. A good option for dinner. Variety of dishes and an excellent wine list.

title: great
author: D9372BNangeloc
reviewBody: always have lunch or dinner there, great quality food with a fair and cheap price, many varieties of food and drinks

address.streetAddress: Rua Prof Herbert Baldus , 195 Vila Sao Francisco

title: Best sandwich in Brazil!
author: PedroPl
reviewBody: Very good and very stuffed sandwiches, excellent price and excellent service. Super recommended!

title: Nice and harmonic place
author: gustavoreview
reviewBody: Restaurant in a totally unexpected place. Superb service and good quality food. The difference is in the environment, which mixes the rustic, familiar and romantic. Great for an unexpected romantic dinner.

address.streetAddress: Rua Cabrobó, 357 casa A Rua Cabrobó, 357 casa A

title: Could be better
author: 412elianey
reviewBody: I decided to know through the evaluations made here. I went with my family, for breakfast, Sunday. We had no problems getting a table for 3, we were taken care of quickly, but after the request, the delay was enormous. In addition, we ordered coffee and it didn't come. We alerted the waiter. Still, it didn't come. We complain once again. The cafe arrived when we had already eaten and the waiter, despite apologizing, blamed the kitchen. The products served are of excellent quality, although expensive, but the service we had, made our experience a bad one.

title: Very good!
author: fgvagro
reviewBody: Located in the highest part of Ponta Negra, the restaurant is very tasty. Normal prices for a coastal city. I recommend.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Praia de Ponta Negra 8952 Ponta Negra

title: Sensational!
author: Lucasoliveiramartins
reviewBody: I have been a customer of the house for some time, I have always been very well attended, in addition to the food being of excellent quality. Fresh fish, very good food, innovations in dishes that are very good and well appreciated, and satisfaction guaranteed at a fair price, both for lunch and dinner! Whenever I can I go and whenever I can I take friends and indicate the place!

title: Service Standard
author: deLafuente80
reviewBody: Not to mention the hamburger, which is excellent, the service impresses with the standard of training and order agility.

address.streetAddress: Jeronimo Pimentel, Nº 242 Esquina Com Almirante Wandenkolk

title: Pizza and great people
author: Karina R
reviewBody: Simple place, but make no mistake, delicious pizza, both the dough and the fillings. Other than that, excellent service, friendly and supportive people. I recommend!

address.streetAddress: Conjunto Smdb Conjunto 12 Bloco C St De Mansoes Dom Bosco

title: Very good. Different and very good food.
author: ancor2
reviewBody: Food far above average. The stock broths are excellent. The seafood one is fantastic. Guaiamun very good. Fish was very tasty.

address.streetAddress: Rua Nogueira de Souza 363 Bairro Pina

title: French rack to repeat
author: Suzi B
reviewBody: Boteco Colarinho surprises with the meats. The French rack (500g) was on point: succulent, served with the typical taste of gelha. It is worth to accompany with tropeiro beans.

title: Social food
author: jamersonabilio
reviewBody: The place is a good environment for social gatherings, the food is also good, but sometimes the waiter takes the meat.

address.streetAddress: R. Fernando Luis Henrique dos Santos, 713 Bessa

title: Liked it
author: 504wagnerc
reviewBody: I went the night with friends and family to chat. Pleasant atmosphere with modern style decor. Attentive waiters. Good wines. At least we were happy to choose. We tried a French and a Portuguese and with the pizza, it was very good. We went early, around 19h, because of parking, which is on the street. Good experience.

title: Excellent dinner
author: giuliatartaro
reviewBody: Excellent dinner and service! Quality food and very tasty. Very friendly and extremely attentive waiters! Amazing experience.

title: Sunday Feijoada
author: cavalcantdeivyd
reviewBody: Very good feijoada. It is a good cost benefit for the weekend. It has a generous portion that easily serves two to three people. The service is quality, organized. You have the option of Mocotó / Panelada or you can also have a meal at the place, which is a single price and you can eat at will.

address.streetAddress: Rua H 20 Quadra 08, Casa 19. Parque Shalon

title: Horrible
author: ArnaldoSergio
reviewBody: Gosh get away from this restaurant I was served a terribly bad duck confit. The shinistzel I ate, I put a photo on it, it was so dry and hard that it was impossible to cut with the knife. I was extremely disappointed

title: Poor Ritz: changed! Grimace of pain!
author: Augusto B
reviewBody: At the door I realized that the audience is different. Most older people in the region. Little light, almost dark contrasting with the "old" bar, which was very bright and dynamic. Regular couples and a grimacing environment hurt. It is still valid for the food and attention of the attendants, but the Party of another era is over. Boring as a bar where you can expect joy, kids, etc.

title: Best pasta from Porto Alegre
author: Diogo55
reviewBody: Pleasant atmosphere, perfect service, excellent wine list and wonderful pasta. The amounts charged are fair.

title: Service
author: Thiago A
reviewBody: Once again Thiago Felipe's impeccable service with always great food. Happy hour promotions are very worthwhile.

address.streetAddress: Rua Francisco Deslandes 900 Shopping Anchieta Garden Shopping Anchieta Garden

title: I love fruits
author: celminha
reviewBody: wide variety of vegetables, fruits, cooked and minced meats, shredded chicken, turkey ham, various juices,

title: Good choice for the evening
author: thiago b
reviewBody: The beach bar in Fortaleza is a good option for the end of the afternoon! It faces the beach with a very beautiful view! Late afternoon there are several people walking on the edge! Right in front there is a bridge that goes to the high seas, it is worth the walk !! The beach bar is famous for its excellent quality snacks !! The chicken drumstick and crab are a good choice!

title: Normal
author: Nomelck
reviewBody: Ventilated, easy to access and crowded! The broths are good, but not all that they paint! But in general it will do!

title: Multiple account errors
author: Regis N
reviewBody: In a single night, they added products twice to our account. Always for more. If it was not due to malice, it is very lack of organization.

title: Excellent cost benefit
author: katiketne
reviewBody: Everything excellent: service, atmosphere, drinks and food! I love the mix of langoustines and prawns lightly piled with a touch of lemon! Delicious!

title: The best of Cuiabá
author: Ana Maria B
reviewBody: He also won as the best in the Midwest. Beautiful place levels too. Flawless cutlery great. Top service wonderful food. Only bad thing is the parking which is small. Everything is good well prepared fresh and super fair price with $ 100.00 including dessert.

title: Excellent bar
author: josuen293
reviewBody: Very good place to eat snacks. It has a buffet with all kinds of shrimp taste and nuts self service. Very good service, kugar always packed good to go early. Fair price for variety and quality.

title: Sensational!
author: Mauricio P
reviewBody: Best restaurant of Minas Gerais food that I have been, besides being a great cost benefit. Impossible to go to Maceió and not to go to Divina Gula! The dish I recommend is tropeiro beans, just to remember the mouth water!

address.streetAddress: Rua Eng Paulo B Nogueira 85 Jatiúca

title: I had a terrible disappointment I went to pay with meal voucher and the few places in Belem that I accepted
author: oswaldobritto
reviewBody: I ordered a pizza at the hotel to pay with a meal voucher, I confirmed by phone and when I passed the front, the pizza courier asked for the card to pass, the card did not pass, he left the pizza I ate a piece he came back, he did not pass the other machine, then put the manager on the line I said I don't have a balance, just VR or check if you want as I'm staying here I leave the money at the concierge. The Manager did not accept asked to take the pizza back half eaten .... a fiasco, I wondered what they would do ,,,, then passing in the front at the Gio (a bar that was already fashionable but serves for a happy hour ) I saw that they had a buffet and at the buffet there was pizza I imagined that the remnants of my pizza ended up at the Buffet, think well look ahead there is another restaurant in Generalissimo that is more worth it in the redondenzas has Mango, there are other options that are worth more worth it, do you decide buffet or pizza? I did not enjoy the service, the delay in the bureaucracy, the lack of confidence in the tourist, look that I was in business it was a fiasco I never went back there and worse it is a reputable pizzeria ... attention!

title: Japanese food in BH
author: 781marcial
reviewBody: Deliiiiciaaaa! Beautiful environment! Cold sake ... Delicious dishes at a fair price Varied menu and diversified menu!

title: Best Meat in Brasilia
author: GrandTour625790
reviewBody: I always go to Toro with my husband and we are very well attended. The meat is wonderful and has the best Juliana salad from Brasília. I would like to record the friendliness and super courteous service of the Rafa, sensational! Congratulations to the whole team, Luisa and Gabriel Andrade

address.streetAddress: Cls 104 Bloco C Loja 29 - Asa Sul

title: Arabic food
author: MikeBlunk
reviewBody: Excellent Arab food restaurant. The food is good, the atmosphere is pleasant and the service is good. There are good options for vegetarians.

title: Good food, bad service!
author: 278julianac
reviewBody: Good restaurant, very well set; the service however leaves a lot to be desired! I report what happened to us: reservation made, first customers to arrive, we asked for entrance, and then we asked for main course, and after 50 minutes, we were surprised by the maitre d 'telling us that "there was an error in the printer and our order had not been printed" , consequently it would take longer. And behold, our order arrived in 1 hour and 10 minutes! Tables next to us, with subsequent orders, were already in the cafezinho! Ok, mistakes happen, but ,,, complimentary desserts (02) were offered ... But I would not return, and the comment is for improving the service!

address.streetAddress: Rua Jose de Godoy E Vasconcelos 109

title: Mixed sheet metal is the choice
author: dflopes
reviewBody: The mixed plate feeds 2 adults and two. children, or 3 adults. It has parking but is full. Another drawback is the constant entry of vendors - whether sitting on the sidewalk or the 2nd floor of the establishment. It is worth visiting the Icoaraci and the abundance of the dish.

title: very good
author: Ernandes-Goi
reviewBody: a good bar, for those looking for a cold drink, good prices, good service, you have to know the place, I really recommend

address.streetAddress: Rua Barao de Melgaco 1035 Lga Nova

title: very good options
author: Juan C
reviewBody: the restaurant has great food, a pity that recently changed to the system per kilo. the price for a person who eats a lot varies around 30 to 40.

address.streetAddress: Rua Doutor Rafael De Barros, 40 1º Andar

title: COULD BE BETTER
author: michelea771
reviewBody: The atmosphere is pleasant, but the prices do not match the food presented, it is good, but only, it does not have a differential in which you leave the restaurant thinking of returning.

title: Very good service
author: joao_rdantas
reviewBody: Restaurant with very different and beautiful architecture, with a very beautiful view (morning / afternoon) of Morro do Careca. The starter is well done and the pizza is very good. It is not the cheapest but it is worth it. only problem is that there were a lot of people and I waited more than half an hour to enter.

address.streetAddress: Av Eng. Roberto Freire, 4330 Ponta Negra

title: Innovative
author: RicardoPalestrante
reviewBody: I recommend the PAC Chili hamburger gurme flavor. The price is right, the service is top and the location is great. Those in São Luís cannot miss the opportunity to visit PAC Lanches

address.streetAddress: Avenida Sao Luis Rei De Franca, 48

title: Best Japanese in Rio de Janeiro !!!
author: Vinicius_Pessoa87
reviewBody: I am suspicious to speak, as it is my favorite Japanese restaurant ... Full menu, affordable price, pleasant atmosphere and great service. The best unit is Recreio Shopping, but as it is further away, I am always in one of Barra Shopping units !!!

address.streetAddress: Av. Das Américas, 7700 - Loja 113 Barra Da Tijuca

title: Grilled fish
author: teresaalice
reviewBody: Cold drink and it is worth trying a typical food from Maranhão which is the rice "pullá". The atmosphere is good and on the beach. Taking care of the tides ... In low, the beach is far.

title: The best cost benefit from Cuiabá.
author: Doroti L
reviewBody: Cozy, quiet place, courteous and efficient service. Very tasty dishes always with special attention from Chef Euza and owner Eduardo. I recommend the cod dishes. The cod salad is simply divine, and to taste while praying.

title: Fresh and tasty food
author: Ceci_Q_2020
reviewBody: I love going to lunch at Toshca, especially for those looking for a healthy diet, the salads there are very tasty, all fresh. Not to mention the curds and kebabs that are perfect. Really like!

title: Good food!
author: Camila L
reviewBody: Super well located restaurant, by the sea, with spectacular service !!! The food is also very good, with good options of dishes. I ate a plantain gnocchi with divine sun meat!

title: Arrive early
author: Gabriela D
reviewBody: I went to the restaurant on the eve of the holiday with my boyfriend. We waited 20 minutes, as it was full and we had not made a reservation. We both ordered meat, which came delicious and at the right point. The restaurant has a lively atmosphere with music.

title: Great place with healthy food.
author: guarenghi_la
reviewBody: Free buffet restaurant (always including 2 options of juices and desserts, plus a choice of soup / broth), with a wide choice of salads, which most calls my attention. The menu is always varied, and you can access it through the website. Quality service with its own parking, and has a loyalty program, for every 10 meals paid, you get one as a courtesy.

title: Carvery
author: Helloydes T
reviewBody: Great service, wonderful and comfortable buffet, excellent barbecue, with all kinds of meat! Parking on site.

title: Wonderful
author: khiussttynlivanr
reviewBody: A fantastic place. Wonderful typical decor with a touch of history and conservation. Typical dishes of Bahian cuisine. The best restaurant in Bahia. Personalized and very attentive service. Very affordable prices.

title: Outdoor dining
author: MLSSilva
reviewBody: Great food and great atmosphere. We stayed in the upper part, uncovered, with only the sea breeze as "air conditioning". The service was fast and efficient. I recommend!

title: Choop made in the house
author: Gladson F
reviewBody: Pleasant atmosphere to enjoy a cold beer, produced on site. Negative point absence of air conditioning ...

address.streetAddress: AV. Brasilia, 1656, Entre Ruas Benjamin Constant E Quintino Bocaiuva

title: Really number 1 in Maceió!
author: Michelle L
reviewBody: The title of n.1 is deserved! Cozy, clean environment. A welcoming welcome. Very attentive service-highlight for the waiter André! We had a really well served dish for 3 people - Pero Vaz de Camilha Shrimp (with manioc and parmesan risotto, coconut milk and rennet cheese cubes). And then the mouth-watering dessert !!! Bodega do Sertão oven cocada (the oldest family restaurant in the city) is nothing more than the soft and hot coconut under tapioca ice cream! Unmissable!

address.streetAddress: R. Gen. João Saleiro Pitão, 1296 Ponta Verde

title: Honest
author: danielsJ9166UE
reviewBody: Excellent cost-benefit ratio. Omelet is nothing to stop the block but is it worth what it costs? Who better? Paribar next door, but priced well above

address.streetAddress: Avenida Raimundo Pereira de Magalhaes 1465 Shopping Tiete Plaza

title: Excellent option.
author: Vianna58
reviewBody: Good restaurant with Italian-inspired menu, light and very good pizzas, fresh pasta or well-done pasta with good sauces, excellent options on the menu, good wines and excellent service, indoor and outdoor table options. Worth the visit.

title: Wonderful
author: VivianeFleury
reviewBody: Wow! very good! The restaurant is located in the best shopping center in Goiânia, the Flamboyant. The atmosphere is beautiful, pleasant and the food is excellent and very abundant. It's always very busy, so it's a good idea to book early.

address.streetAddress: Av. Dep. Jamel Cecílio, 3.300 Polo Gastronômico - Área Externa - Shopping Flamboyant - Jardim Goiás

title: Bad cost x benefit
author: Giovanna P
reviewBody: I was in this restaurant two years ago, I ate an a la carte dish and today when I returned to Campo Grande, I decided to try the carvery. If regret would kill ... It's not horrible food, but it's not even half the price charged. Well, but pretty normal. I love to eat well and I don't mind the price as long as the food is good, but paying 71.00 per person to eat what I ate at this restaurant, it hurts my soul. Want to eat good fish in Campo Grande? Go to the fair. It's cheap and ten! Fish house, great service, more or less food and absurd price. As a tourist, I don't recommend it.

address.streetAddress: Rua Dr. João Rosa pires, 1030 Amambaí

title: Lunch
author: joaobatistar976
reviewBody: The table of cold cuts and diverse salads, pies and Brie cheese, accompanied by apricot jam, would be enough for Mahalo to be suggested but there are always three delicious options of main dishes. All this with a meticulous service, of excellent quality.

title: Great açaí
author: Helna G
reviewBody: Great açaí with good options for a limited budget and well located. The only thing that is lacking is the service.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Min Geraldo Barreto Sobral, 215 Shopping Jardins

title: Liked it
author: elietelrsilva
reviewBody: Simple place, but very tidy and organized, service ten, foods with a very good taste and excellent appearance.

address.streetAddress: Praca Benedita da Silva Lobo 40 St Coimbra

title: Great place for those with children!
author: jeaninne v
reviewBody: The food is very tasty, with attractive values. The place is also great with very helpful waiters. I've been there several times and always at lunchtime on weekends. Even full, we were very well attended. There is a large space for children with attractions for very young children and video games for the older ones. I strongly recommend!!!

address.streetAddress: Rua R11N 895 Qd L16 Lt 01 E

title: Simple and good food and service
author: FernandoFaria
reviewBody: Around the Boa Viagem region it is perhaps the best option for a seafood dish, with a good variety of fruits for a hit. With options of individual dishes the dinner came cheap, well service and, what is worth a lot, fast. The only criticism is that the opening hours require a calculation rule, because for a day, or group of days, a different time.

title: Excellent, just more attention to the Grubster
author: vanderlima83
reviewBody: Starter: rice ball. Main: Black tagliateli with octopus, octopus risotto. EXCELLENT dishes !!! Very pleasant atmosphere despite small and good service. The ONLY thing however was having to notify for the 2nd time that we had booked via Grubster (30% discount, had warned the waiter as soon as we sat down) as soon as the bill came ... this lack of care inevitably makes us think that it is actually a restaurant strategy to see if the distracted customer pays without the discount ... I went with my fiancée at lunch.

title: Delicious.
author: Betinho2014
reviewBody: Thought about pancakes, stop by this place and taste the delights that are served there, delight me with them, nice place, variety and great price.

title: Tasty
author: fernandof543
reviewBody: The restaurant has a privileged place in the center of Rio and a beautiful view of Niteroi. Carpadio focused on seafood, but has other options. Great!

title: It went down.
author: 848m_nicas
reviewBody: The nachos arrived quickly, the enamored option gave the option of 2 sauces were good. I preferred guacamole. Tacos also arrived fast and were good, I found it a little sickening. We ordered dried meat. The nachos cost 23 and the tacos 30. We ordered some passion fruit drinks that I don't remember the name but they were good. Regarding the structure I thought it could be more lit mainly on the steps. For example I was going to take a drop right on arrival. The bathroom could also be cleaner ... And as a suggestion, I think the employees could get more into the atmosphere of the restaurant ... I don’t know more about it ... something different ...

title: One of the best moquecas in ES
author: adautovieira12
reviewBody: It is certainly one of the best moquecas in ES. The restaurant is always packed, but the service is very good.

address.streetAddress: Rua Joaquim Lírio, 753 - Praia do Canto

title: Top
author: Diogo M
reviewBody: I like the Bugaloo franchise, the snacks are fast, cheap and delicious. I especially recommend the Ceaser salad.

title: worth it
author: alvaro a
reviewBody: Good menu, cold beer and fair price. Ambient sound on the weekend with seresteiro singers from the land.

address.streetAddress: Praça José Bisteni Jd. Tropical III

title: Dinner
author: AbgailG1
reviewBody: Carne de sol na nata is the best dish, excellent service, we were served by Adriana and fia. Northeastern quality food

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: Dinner with my son
author: Edudal1977
reviewBody: We went to the restaurant emperor of prawns on the beach (11/12/17), we ordered a portion of chicken fried in garlic, if it came 5 pieces of chicken it was a lot. Main course, we ordered flambéed prawns for two people, the seasoning was good, there was very little food, the shrimp came in modest quantity, little rice ... I would not return.

title: Good goat!
author: Fernanda C
reviewBody: Well the goat dish we ordered, I don't know how to evaluate if it was expensive, but I thought the price was very reasonable. I don't recommend the caipirinha!

address.streetAddress: Rua Marquês de Valença, 50 Boa Viagem

title: Wonderful!
author: thamyresilveira
reviewBody: I was at the restaurant in 2014 and 2018. I will certainly return when I visit João Pessoa again. The architecture is reminiscent of a boat and is incredible. The atmosphere is pleasant and the food is wonderful. I recommend the shrimp dish.

title: Best Shrimp
author: Marcelosetin
reviewBody: Best shrimp in Maceió, excellent dishes, excellent service and cold draft beer, great experience with very good prices.

title: Delicious lunch and honest value!
author: linacolnaghi
reviewBody: Very good lunch, with a super varied salad and antipasti buffet. I was surprised with the gastronomy and the value, super affordable with salad, starter, dish and dessert. great lunch option in Porto Alegre.

title: Birthday celebration
author: mapadeviajante
reviewBody: I went to cocobambu again and took my parents to know and to celebrate my father's birthday. Very good service from Fernando. Great and plentiful food as always and congratulations with a free ice cream cake!

title: Practical snack
author: ClikaLago
reviewBody: I really like it, even more because I have a vegetarian option! Practical and quick snack with affordable price. It has options for all tastes.

address.streetAddress: BR 364, Lote U1 - Rio Branco - Acre

title: Excellent meal
author: Morganna R
reviewBody: Healthy food with a good amount of vegetables prepared in different ways. Honest, beautiful and creative food. Special affection for two pies, one with corn and another with starch and cheese, I think, absolutely excellent! I recommend it and I will be back whenever I am in town!

title: The best Bahian food restaurant in Brazil is in BH !!
author: Georgesalles
reviewBody: At the entrance, there to be received by the Bahian woman, there is no doubt what the restaurant is about. Attendants very sympathetic and dressed in character bring the hearty and tasty crab cakes, disassembled acarajé that can be whole or in portions and the moquecas that have no explanation of how good they are. Place to go and come back more often.

title: ONLY HAS A NAME ...
author: FERNANDO O
reviewBody: Restaurant does not match his reputation, because the meat, which is the specialty of the establishment, is far below a steakhouse, to other options in Natal that are not steakhouses, but the meat is much better!

title: Tradition with a good hint of many cultures
author: Rochele L
reviewBody: A traditional carioca house with several different environments, with space for all tastes and opinions. Nice to meet people from all over the world. It is one of the places in which you cannot miss for those who go to the Marvelous City!

title: Disappointment
author: danielelpb
reviewBody: I came to celebrate my wedding anniversary and for that we made a reservation ... when we arrived, we were informed that the reservation, in fact, is not a reservation. We had to wait. That was just the beginning of the fiasco. The service of the house was terrible. An unwillingness to impress. Finally, the house is not prepared to deal with customers' food allergies. Never...

title: Great family environment
author: danielb2rres
reviewBody: Sensational lunch. We were very well attended by Gilberto. Super tasty food. Super nice music and atmosphere.

address.streetAddress: Av Prof Magalhaes Neto, 1273 Lot Aquárius, Pituba

title: MISCELLANEOUS DISHES, What bothers is the exaggeration of processed cheese that they add to the food
author: Orivaldo Alenc... S
reviewBody: I like Nae. The region has varied food, dishes not found in other oriental restaurants. they serve a salmon carpaccio with a very good 'special' sauce, in addition to harumakis that are a delight. However, I have noticed that the service has been bad ... the last time, the waiter, unmotivated I don't know why, the lack of education came. To give you an idea, my wife, who like me, traditionally had lunch at Nae, vowed never to return. Watch out Nae ... talk, train your attendants.

title: Positive experience
author: AlexiaKnopf
reviewBody: Delicious food, the real taste of Italy ... cozy atmosphere, attentive service and a cute little dog to pet ❤

title: Two famous food
author: Aline C
reviewBody: I loved the dishes with names of the famous ... The atmosphere is also very good ... not to mention the food of course ...

title: Delicious and cozy!
author: pollyserrao
reviewBody: The atmosphere is incredible, extremely well decorated and cozy, with a farmhouse look. Add the wonderful view of the city, and we have a warm and unforgettable atmosphere. The food is both simple and sophisticated, with generous and delicious portions! Highlight for the chicken, just perfect! The service is also excellent, with very friendly waiters. Definitely a find!

title: Good food and well served
author: _cecilia_valenti
reviewBody: Italian food, but with a very varied menu and dishes that serve two people. Great service and very cozy. Good restaurant.

itemReviewed.name: Abbraccio Cucina Italiana - Shopping Market Place

address.streetAddress: Avenida Doutor Chucri Zaidan, 902 Shopping Market Place. Piso 1

title: Quality first
author: _tonhomax
reviewBody: Excellent restaurant. It is possible to find a variety of dishes, flavors and styles. The drink list is a show. Excelent reception. Large and valet parking. Super recommended.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Coronel Colares Moreira 1 Quadra 19 - Calhau

title: The price does not live up to the dish!
author: Cassia_Nishizawa
reviewBody: Upon arriving at the restaurant we had to face 30 minutes of waiting for a table. For the starter we ordered bruschetta that came only 1 single slice. The salmon salad known as the best, had nothing special. The pasta, which is the strong point of the house, was hard-working and not al dente. The sauce was too much for the amount of pasta. They give you the option in most suggestions to be half-portion or whole. The atmosphere is modern, the atmosphere is casual, but cramped (tables next to each other) and a lot of noise. Anyway, the experience did not please my taste and the dishes do not live up to the exorbitant prices.

title: Moqueca 10
author: nardapaula
reviewBody: Attentive service, great location, very tasty dishes. The moqueca is 10. Unique crab shell and very tender sun meat. In addition, they are concerned with customer satisfaction. I can't wait to go back ...

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont, 957 - Praia de Atalaia, Aracaju - SE Orla da praia de Atalaia

title: go downtown at night ...
author: Oswrod
reviewBody: various environments with Brazilian music, and sometimes with famous old singers! nice food! security service outside with valet for the car, so even at night, leaving, we feel safe!

title: Good, cheap and abundant
author: lucianajuliabruno
reviewBody: I think the best definition of carne de sol 1008 is this: good, cheap and abundant. If you want to eat well, have excellent service and pay a fair price, you will be going to the right place. It is a very tasty meat and best of all, made with care and speed. When I can't go there I ask for delivery and everything comes warm and delicious.

address.streetAddress: 150 - Qd. Rua 1008 23 Lt. 8 Setor Pedro Ludovico

title: Italian dishes in well-made portions
author: Luis T
reviewBody: Located in the new Shoping Cidade de São Paulo, it offers an Italian menu with dishes of the day in starter conditions, main course and dessert. Set in a canteen, good service and good food. Reasonable price on the dish of the day.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Paulista, 1230 Shopping Cidade São Paulo, 4º Piso

title: Excellent place
author: CaioLucio
reviewBody: It has a great atmosphere and good options for food, fruits, soups and broths. I went there for several nights and I don't regret it. It has a good price and is advantageous

title: Very good!
author: CassioBispo
reviewBody: Eating açaí in Salvador, a wonder, for açaí lovers, you will find several options and cool off in that Bahian heat, the price is very nice too. I recommend!

title: Wonderful Salvador
author: Adilson R
reviewBody: I was with my family in Salvador in January / 2016. I was visiting the historic center and before visiting the Church of São Francisco we went to this restaurant, by the way, excellent. Helpful and helpful staff. Excellent food offering typical and conventional dishes. We recommend.

address.streetAddress: Terreiro de Jesus Em frente a Igreja de São Francisco

title: Disrespect for the customer
author: Valeria P
reviewBody: Unfortunately my experience in the Preface was not very good. On 09/30/2013 we went in four people to have lunch there. Each ordered a dish and we also ordered a wine. Three dishes were very good. I ordered a tuna with mashed potato (I think that was the side dish), but the tuna was pure sea air. I tried, tasted two pieces, but I couldn't eat! I called the waiter and informed him - this tuna is pure sea salt - to which he replied: "Didn't you like it?" And that was really it. I returned the dish whole. No one was able to offer me anything else or offer me a discount. At the time of account - INTEGRAL with 10%! I paid without complaining, although I felt assaulted. Bad result for them because I never go back there ... They lost the client.

title: Great food and service
author: Thais L
reviewBody: Very good service, the waiter (Estrela) who attended us was very attentive. The food was very tasty, in addition to a pleasant atmosphere with live music,

address.streetAddress: Av Prof Magalhaes Neto, 1273 Lot Aquárius, Pituba

title: More beautiful than good
author: ferreiraisadora
reviewBody: We went to lunch on Sunday, my fiance and I. The environment is beautiful and pleasant. It has a garden with waterfall q brings a lot of tranquility to the environment. The waiters are attentive and make you feel at ease. We opted for the carvery, as we were hungry. The starters are the common ones in most Japanese restaurants: cucumber, shimeji ... They have an interesting variety of sushi with sweet and sour options, with pout pout. The sushi was good, but not spectacular. They serve a flambé sushi on the table, which is more curious than good. Anyway, we like the environment more, which is really delicious, than the food. We pay about 70 - 80 reais for each carvery (except drinks and dessert).

address.streetAddress: Largo Nossa Senhora do Bom Parto 37

title: SENSATIONAL FISH ROUND
author: 798fernandop
reviewBody: A must see in Cuiabá. I've never had such tasty fish. And the attraction is alligator meat. But there is much more, pirarucu, pintou, pacu, matrinxã, Piraputanga, tilapia in varied recipes, even kibe of fish. I will definitely return

title: Very good service
author: Felipe M
reviewBody: Great choice for making daily meals, very cut service by Dona Zilda. You will like it, the food is excellent!

title: Funny !
author: 960fabianec
reviewBody: Beautifully decorated place, samba, I really liked the lapa, but I found it very touristy, practically just gringo, maybe because it was on a farm, the house was also empty. And the caipivodka was horrible, small and with low quality fruit. But the food, music and service were perfect !!

title: Delicious hamburger
author: betoagricio
reviewBody: Delicious hamburger with very dry and tasty potatoes ... without a doubt the best hamburger in São Paulo! Slow and casual service ... noisy place !! Brigadier dessert is also a great choice ... delicious!

title: Crazy thing
author: BrazilJacoBrazil
reviewBody: Lots of prime meat, really well made, juicy and delicious meats. There are no adjectives to describe how tasty the carvery is there. Unfortunately, I only go to the company for lunch once a year, because the amount they charge is as surreal as the quality of the carvery.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Reporter Nestor Moreira S/N Botafogo

title: It grew in size and decreased quality
author: 75paulop
reviewBody: Expanding the business while maintaining quality is the biggest challenge for any company. Temakeria will have problems with that. Yesterday was the first time I went there after the physical space was increased. Disappointment. It looked like I wasn't eating at Temakeria. The dishes were not as elaborate as before. And neither does the taste. The sushi seemed to be ready and stored in the refrigerator. The same is true of the “hots”, which were warm to cold. Lowered the quality. If it was my first time there, I would definitely not return. But as I had been there before, I still think, with great willingness, to “try” some other day.

title: Varied lunch
author: DudaF
reviewBody: Great lunch, varieties in vegetarian options and grilled meat options! Dessert options, all clean, organized with parking and easy access

address.streetAddress: AV. Brasilia, 1656, Entre Ruas Benjamin Constant E Quintino Bocaiuva

title: The best feijoada option on the island !!
author: Luelma
reviewBody: Be sure to visit and enjoy the Feijoada Sabor buffet. Atmosphere, service and food divine !!!

address.streetAddress: Rua H 20 Quadra 08, Casa 19. Parque Shalon

title: Real black heading
author: Daniloan
reviewBody: You, who are really a real black, should go to this establishment. I was positively impressed.

title: Wonderful cod
author: Raíssa C
reviewBody: For those who like cod, this is the place. Very varied menu, with at least four different cod dishes. Those who don't like it also have a time, the menu has other apparently good options.

title: 1st night in Curió
author: Laiany S
reviewBody: Excellent home, very TOP service wonderful drinks, very good and fast food, everything super fast. I recommend everyone to know the curió. Waiter Thiago very attentive and with excellent food and drink tips, we loved it very much.

title: Lack of organization
author: Sightsee698726
reviewBody: The idea of the place is cool: Choose the meat for the people to make. However, the dynamics are very confusing. You have to buy everything before going to the table, including drinks, which is very regulating. Every purchase you make is 10% embedded in the account, that is, it does not pay to buy gradually. In addition, the large movement in the bar makes serving difficult. Very slow and poorly organized. You need to improve a lot to be good.

title: Good roasters
author: Gabriel B
reviewBody: Contested rotisserie, highlights for the pork cuts and the rib that when done well is unbeatable. Get there early as the queue is huge.

title: Outback is Outback
author: E9765YHeduardod
reviewBody: As always, standard outback, good, beautiful and cost vs benefit. I ate fondue (salty and sweet, R $ 120), very cheap compared to other dishes. I did not find the most beautiful that I still consider the one of the shopping city são paulo or the most empty of the shopping frei Caneca. the worst experience I had is with the shopping sp market. still, I always recommend outback.

title: The best of all
author: gilseuda m
reviewBody: Top quality restaurant, wonderful and welcoming service, not to mention the wonderful and very typical food. Congratulations!!!

address.streetAddress: Rua Libertador, 102 Nossa Sra. das Graças

title: Very good
author: MateusP330
reviewBody: The place is worth it for the advertising, the food was perfect, both the meat and the side dishes, I was shocked at the value of the beer, but nothing that crumbles the restaurant, I point out.

title: OK bar
author: Bernardo P
reviewBody: I highlight the menu, very varied, and the environment. The service left a little to be desired, and I was not informed about the artistic cover charge. Ah, the codfish cake was extremely greasy ...

address.streetAddress: Rua Doutor Amancio de Carvalho 262 Vila Mariana

title: Great location
author: ThiagoC3987
reviewBody: Excellent place to meet friends and have fun. Great food and cold draft beer, plus a welcoming atmosphere

address.streetAddress: Rua Senador Villas Boas, 86 - Praca Popular

title: Good
author: Joao M
reviewBody: Excellent cost benefit. The free buffet at R $ 23.90 including dessert is quite varied and tasty. It is probably only served at night, but I'm not sure. Very good service.

title: Exceptional!!!
author: Mirella_Avelino
reviewBody: The whole set, from the environment, service and preparation of the dishes, deserve all the admiration, respect and indication! Fine restaurant with refinement in every detail !! Suitable for family, friends, business and also for a date for two !!

title: The best of French cuisine
author: pfasantos
reviewBody: If we are looking for a peaceful, healthy environment with good music, we find Douce France in Natal. Tasty dishes, especially fillets with pasta and crepes, maintain the tradition of the house I met at the end of the last century when it was run by the couple Eloá and André with the partnership of a French lady. Mr. Alberto, current owner, was part of the house team and, although the location is not the same elegant house next to Praça Cívica, he manages to keep together the best of potiguar society.

title: Cool bar!
author: rogere909
reviewBody: Great atmosphere, playlist of the day did not disappoint. Good choice. The attendant Atalanta was very attentive, friendly, had mastery of the entire menu and showed us the best dishes.

address.streetAddress: Rua Almirante Alexandrino, 399 Entrada pela Rua Correa da Sa

title: Charm, taste and good price
author: Renata2805
reviewBody: Super charming and cozy restaurant. The waiters are very attentive and polite. The food was delicious and the price was very good! Highly recommend !! Be sure to have the red wine sangria!

title: It was good, but for the same price I ate something a little better
author: Grégoire D
reviewBody: There you have to go to eat Northeastern dishes, like sun meat etc ... This is where many people from Natal go regularly. It is not worth it to eat shrimp, for example, but regional meat specialties. I say why I originally went to eat sun meat with red onion and bottle butter and ended up eating shrimp (reluctantly). The comparison with Cameroon was inevitable. Although very good the dish lacked a little salt. Crab cakes are not good. Greasy and greasy, lots of pasta and little crab taste. The rest was very good. Highly recommend for typical food.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Praia de Ponta Negra 8952 Ponta Negra

title: Good
author: viniciusrtelles
reviewBody: Great Italian restaurant for both lunch and dinner. Varied menu and good wine options, good service.

title: Excellent
author: Andressa A
reviewBody: My husband and I went to the restaurant next to the riverside, which by the way was great with the tasting menu option. So we ate a little of everything. I took my 4-month-old baby and it was very good, the environment super quiet and very clean.

address.streetAddress: Rua Ramiro Barcelos 389 Na Esquina da Rua São Carlos

title: Traditional bar with excellent bar food
author: Jailsonrp
reviewBody: I was with co-workers after a stressful day, you have the option of cold beer, good snacks and with super attentive waiters.

title: paraense food
author: ubaldo n
reviewBody: very close to the Dock Station. I met by chance and loved to taste a typical dish from Pará here. I recommend

title: It has everything!
author: Juliana O
reviewBody: Restaurant per kilo with many options, both for those who want to try regional food and for those who don't. In terms of desserts there is also a lot, everything is wonderful. The price matches the quality of the food and the environment.

address.streetAddress: Av. Fernando Simões Barbosa, 1200 Boa Viagem

title: My birthday!
author: Solange D
reviewBody: I loved getting to know this beautiful and cozy space. Wonderful food! Attendance note 1000! Congratulations!

title: Perfect place!
author: Marcelo G
reviewBody: Perfect place, and very cozy! Thank you for being pet-friendly and welcoming me with my puppy!

title: Medium
author: Claudiaholanda
reviewBody: I found the food too mediocre. My dish and my husband's arrived cold, besides not being tasty, it didn't look well done, the meat might have been better if it hadn't arrived cold. The drink was not good, the service is good, but it is an expensive place to find everything more or less. I know that a lot of people indicate in the city, I may not have had luck that day, but I didn't come back to be sure.

title: Excellent cost / benefit
author: erikafN5887LF
reviewBody: Spectacular food. I went there more than once! The dish is suitable for 3-4 people. I suggest the filet sun meat, the stew and the shellfish They are delicious

title: Typical Dishes
author: Eubisergi
reviewBody: At Conversa Fiada from 7 pm to 9 pm and 30 am, you can enjoy your favorite snack for just R $ 20.90. Shrimp, carne do sol, pork ribs, chicken, pilombeta, french fries, pastries, acarajé, cheese cake, kebab, fruit salad, various types of cheese, pepperoni, diced salted pork, mush and shrimp broths, sururu and more. It's too tasty. It is worth checking.

title: For lovers of good food.
author: KassiaC49
reviewBody: A complete restaurant. With great food, drink, service and average price. It has a very varied menu that appeals to all tastes

title: German too good
author: 736anakarlam
reviewBody: It is a German restaurant, however it also serves other dishes other than typical German cuisine, such as fish, pasta and meat. I ordered a trout with almonds and Swiss potatoes, the dish was very good and it is well served, I could share it with another woman (who doesn't eat much) I paid around 62 reais for this dish. There are options on the menu of dishes with half a portion, usually meats. It has a fish with catupiry and Swiss potato divine. In fact everything you order at this restaurant is good. Good wine list. I just wasn't really enchanted by the desserts, at that point I found the desserts weak, so with little assortment, basically fruits cooked and bathed in syrup, petit gateau, papaya cream with cassis.

title: Disappointment
author: esleij
reviewBody: I went to watch the Brazilian game in the pantry with friends, very good screen, but only that was good, the game audio was low and bad. Regarding the service, the waiters were rude, took too long to answer. The food was also bad, I asked for an executive dish that cost R $ 25.90 which seemed to be an adequate value, but when it arrived it boiled down to a few fries full of fat and withered, a small portion of white rice, a cold farofa of egg and a steak withered just, it was better to have eaten at home. With regard to drinks, prices were high but compatible with those practically by other establishments in the region.

address.streetAddress: R. das Paineiras, 06 Lote 06 Loja 01 - Shopping One Mall

title: Very good!
author: arghjoe
reviewBody: Very good food, the termite in the mustard was one of the meats that I liked the most, the value of the self service is not very expensive.

title: Maceió Tour
author: 87francinem
reviewBody: What a top steakhouse !!! Excellent service on the menu, affordable price. Very good, I highly recommend it.

address.streetAddress: R. Prof. Ernani de Figueiredo Magalhaes, 41 Cruz das Almas

title: Yummy grilled
author: Marco Aurelio G
reviewBody: A very tasty grill, served with an accompaniment that can be chosen from the small buffet or with portions. It is located at Shopping Caboatã, in Imbuí, on the 1st floor. A kilo costs R $ 36.90

title: Traditional, still good
author: Paulo M
reviewBody: First-rate Caipirinha. For snacks, choose those indicated in the big box at the bottom. There is not much explanation of the dishes served, if you want more attentive service, go elsewhere. I consider it a good bar

title: ELEGANT PLACE FOOD TOP PRICE GOOD
author: ericsP6827LL
reviewBody: everything was wonderful, beautiful cozy place, good food, fair price, fine food, excellent location

title: Left to be desired
author: scarvlh
reviewBody: I didn't have a good experience this time that I went to the Fisherman, terrible service. I participated in the carvery, which is not cheap and I had to wait about 20 min to start ordering, ugly dishes (made anyway), without flavor, whatever came without my asking. Totally sorry, and look, I went on Monday at 9pm and the restaurant was not full !!

title: Disappointed
author: Ricardo R
reviewBody: The restaurant at 412 Norte is nicely decorated with colorful mosaics and lanterns. The presence of a clay filter in the salon deserves praise, with fresh water for customers. The menu is varied, within the Mediterranean theme. Highlight for the Moroccan filo and the chicken prime. I have been to the restaurant on many occasions, but today I was extremely disappointed. I ordered a fresh baked fish: it was baked fish, but it was not fresh. Strange flavor and rubbery consistency. I hope it was an exception, but I am still very disappointed.

title: I love the Vezpa pizza
author: Ribamar O
reviewBody: I like to go there to eat the vezpa pizza or buy it to take home. I think it's delicious. It has a good range of pizzas. I find the pasta delicious as well as the various fillings.

title: Place of place
author: falecomrafael
reviewBody: The place is beautiful and the food is super tasty and light 🤟 I recommend the starters and juices that have a very diverse mix of fruits / herbs.

title: Attendance
author: Getulio L
reviewBody: We were attended by a Maitre style “enchants customer”, Leonardo. The attention, education and skill, made up for the mistake on the plate, (salad with lettuce), immediately replaced by the original order.

address.streetAddress: Qd SCN, Qd 06, Conjunto A Shopping ID

title: Frustration
author: atilaa2017
reviewBody: A great structure to be explored, in a prime area, overlooking the lake! Unfortunately service is to be desired. The Buffet had few options, there was no sushi piece with shrimp, or any special. It was disappointing.

address.streetAddress: TR Sce/sul Trecho 2 Conjunto 57 Loja A Em frente a Ponte JK,vista incrível

title: Paradise for vegans
author: Maria F
reviewBody: It is a restaurant that pleases both vegetarians and omnivores. It always offers a wide variety of food in a very cozy place. The service is very good and at the exit you can still have a cup of coffee on the house.

title: Disappointment
author: bernardobrandaoDF
reviewBody: Unfortunately they treat customers badly. It was once a respectful house for customers. The Portuguese gentleman, who appears to be the owner, of the counter looks into our eyes and says he doesn't need a customer.

title: eat well!
author: Carlosaugusto2001
reviewBody: It is among the best in the city, has a very varied menu of regional foods, pastas, barbecues and sophisticated foods, has many salads and desserts. the price is fair and is great for more formal lunches.
userLocation: Natal, Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil

title: Point
author: Lidiannysales
reviewBody: The beer is always cold and the atmosphere is very pleasant, there are also some skewers that are very good. I recommend!!!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Juiz Joao Almeida 1532 Jd Sulacap

title: Good
author: Erika M
reviewBody: The restaurant has options of carvery shrimp (R $ 60.00) and a la carte. The food is delicious and the atmosphere is delicious. It has live music that makes the environment more pleasant. The cashew caipirinha was not good but the pineapple one is worth asking for.

title: exclusive food
author: tpcdaniela1977
reviewBody: In Goiânia it is a great option for those who want different food, I always go to the restaurant, and when I need to receive visits I go quickly to the Toscha emporium and I always receive compliments about the menu.

address.streetAddress: Av. Jamel Cecílio, 3.300 Flamboyant Shopping Center, Jardim Goiás

title: Standard of Excellence and Perfection
author: Enildo B
reviewBody: The Olinda and Tamandaré dishes were perfect! The service was excellent. And my daughter had a lot of fun in the park. The waiter Ricardo José served us perfectly

address.streetAddress: Avenida Coronel Teixeira, 5705 Ponta Negra, Shopping Ponta Negra

title: Sick and the dishes don't follow a pattern
author: 587anaelisam
reviewBody: I went with a friend to meet Tutto and we ordered stuffed mushrooms at the entrance. They arrived, we ate, nothing much. The next table asked for the same thing and twice as many mushrooms came to them, that is, the dishes do not follow a pattern. As a main course we ordered potato gnocchi with cheese sauce, which is extremely nauseating. The bill was 150'real, with two waters and two ice tea. I won't be back.

title: OMG!
author: Elisa M
reviewBody: What a fantastic restaurant! Both for its architectural exuberance and for the delicious dishes served! Sophisticated atmosphere and quality service! The shrimp dishes were the ones we got to know on the two occasions we were there. What I liked most was one that I don't remember the name, but it was prawns accompanied by creamy risotto with basil. Kids space complete with monitors! I highly recommend it!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Odilon Gomes de Lima 1772 Bairro Cidade Jardim

title: Excellent
author: Hélio S
reviewBody: My family and I like the flavors of the pizzas, the quality, the prices, the juices and the way to eat with gloves, since it is very practical considering that the pizzas are very crunchy. In addition, the service is very fast.

title: Fantastic
author: Juliana S
reviewBody: Great food. In high season the restaurant is very crowded and you need to have a little patience, but it is worth the effort. Nice atmosphere, very good food. One of my favorites from Maceió, I never miss a single visit to Maceió.

address.streetAddress: Rua São Francisco de Assis, 93 Jatiúca

title: Best Food
author: Adriele V
reviewBody: Very good, the food is wonderful, especially the ribs, and the service leaves nothing to be desired, all very helpful

title: Good and expensive!
author: fblumentritt
reviewBody: A very hidden place, charming .... good food ... but very high price for what they offer. The service is very precarious on a busy day. I probably wouldn't go back.

address.streetAddress: Rua Dinarte Ribeiro, 116 Moinhos de Vento

title: Homemade Bakery
author: Leandro-PiESi
reviewBody: Homemade bakery with excellent cheese bread, strained coffee and fried plantains .. A very cozy atmosphere, worth it ..

title: To know
author: Flavio A
reviewBody: It is a different option for those who have visited other places in São Luis. You just need to improve the environment.

title: Very good.
author: MarcosLSMatos
reviewBody: There is no better Japanese restaurant in BH. Rodizio is very good and has a price that I couldn't find. When I'm in BH I just go there or try others. Reminds me of São Paulo.

title: Satisfaction!
author: Renan J
reviewBody: Very satisfied with the service and the dish. The order was jenipapeiro shrimp where the prawns are served inside the jerimum accompanied by rice and farofa. The dish quietly serves 3 people. The restaurant offers a line of special beers from therezopolis, which is not very common in João Pessoa.

title: Japanese + Peruvian
author: Noe E
reviewBody: Very nice, friendly place, food is a Japanese and Peruvian mix, very interesting. Very good ceviches, uses and abuses of passion fruit sauce. The 1st waiter did not know how to describe the dishes, he was promptly replaced by another waiter who was excellent. Prices according to the location.

address.streetAddress: Estrada da Gavea 899 São Conrado Fashion Mall

title: Restaurant thousand note
author: robson_e_pamela
reviewBody: Wonderful restaurant! Wonderful food all a delight! I would like to congratulate Metri Manoel for the great service and affection with customers!

title: Delicious seafood
author: SafiaZarzar
reviewBody: Restaurant with sophisticated air and great service. I liked the presentation of the dishes and the quality of the food at a fair price. Best crab cone I've ever eaten!

address.streetAddress: Rua Padre Carapuceiro, 777 Shopping Recife, Loja P326, 1° Piso

title: Tradition
author: Christian S
reviewBody: To know the gaucho cuisine and tradition, it is very worthwhile. Barbecue with many varieties of meat and others in carvery, salads and dessert. Even vegetarians are happy! Allied to this, traditionalist music and presentation of typical dances. Bah, tchê, loco de especial !!

address.streetAddress: R. Otávio Francisco Caruso da Rocha, s/n Parque Maurício Sirotsky Sobrinho

title: Simply Delicious
author: ricfiguer
reviewBody: Great place with draft beer and special craft beers! A la carte service with a varied menu of portions and cuts. I recommend the fillet mignon with stuffed potato, simply perfect!

title: great service and buffet
author: Cezar V
reviewBody: excellent place, reasonable price, excellent service, varied buffet, great facilities and location.

address.streetAddress: Av. Agamenon Magalhães, 2132 Próximo ao colégio da policia militar de Pernambuco

title: A pearl
author: aniblms
reviewBody: One of the best pizzerias in town! The atmosphere does not attract attention by itself, but the dishes and pizza are of excellent quality. Tourist or local, don't miss it, it's worth it!

title: Excellent surprise
author: Nine202
reviewBody: We went on the recommendation of the concierge, because we were very tired and the restaurant offers transfers. Excellent place, small, hidden in a lane of Av. Oceânica, already in Rio Vermelho. Informal, neat decor, live music. Delicious muqueca, cold drink and efficient service. Excellent prices. We sat on the terrace, watching the waves crash across the street. Excellent evening.

title: Portuguese food
author: Diego B
reviewBody: Very traditional restaurant in Copacabana. Like cod, very good, well served. I recommend the German pie for dessert, but there are several with Portuguese cuisine. It is not a cheap restaurant, but it is very well served.

title: Restaurante week
author: 691reniag
reviewBody: I was in 2 units of Saj this month and I was delighted, service, atmosphere and food grade 10 ... Ahh and fair prices

itemReviewed.name: Saj Jardins - Restaurante Árabe, Culinária Libanesa

title: Excellent variety of dishes.
author: coiros
reviewBody: Very good, cozy place and great food. Pasta is prepared with great care in addition to the excellent buffet.

title: Very good.
author: Lenore M C
reviewBody: Maintains the standard, always very good. If you like Cheese burguer, you'll like it. I like the environment and the quality. I advise for a meal when you're just in the mood for something quick.

title: Good food
author: anabbr2019
reviewBody: Walter was, in the 70s, a good, abundant and cheap place. It remains good. Plenty of traditional dishes, like a minute ago, complete. Now it is chosen separately making it expensive. A feather. But the food is still very tasty. It is not a place for a group gathering with more than 10 people, as space is limited. The noise spreads a lot, despite the acoustic control panels installed on the walls and ceiling. It does not have parking, in fact it never did when it worked elsewhere, which is a shame.

title: Super cozy atmosphere.
author: RuteOliveira
reviewBody: The restaurant has a super cozy atmosphere, reserved, great for intimate meetings. The menu is varied, with a self-service and a la carte buffet.

address.streetAddress: Rua Dep. Antonio Florencio de Queiroz, 12 Ponta Negra

title: Too bad.
author: LucasKM
reviewBody: Place seems to stand still in time. R $ 80 an individual dish that looks like it came from the microwave. Never.

title: Great option
author: Mauricio L
reviewBody: Excellent option for a good snack and that cold craft beer. Several options at a fair price in a very pleasant environment and spectacular service. The owner is very helpful and the attendant Jeremiah is a unique person. I definitely recommend
userLocation: Venda Nova do Imigrante, Espirito Santo, Brazil

title: Great sandwiches, small atmosphere.
author: NATALIA-WEYNE
reviewBody: I went outside rush hour, so sitting was not that complicated. The experience was well worth it, but be prepared for the size of the place, which is very small.

title: Cozy but ....
author: cristianosalles1977
reviewBody: I was at the establishment on 03/05 to celebrate my wife's birthday with my wife and my nephews .... the place is cozy, but the service takes time. It took them a long time to deliver the drinks and showed disinterest by taking too long to light the candles when the dessert ice cream was already melting. The quality of the food is also not among the best ...

title: Chic Bar
author: thaisn08
reviewBody: I didn't try any dish, but looking at the menu I saw that the prices are a little expensive. On the other hand, the red fruit and lemon caipiroska are wonderful. And I found their price within what I usually pay in other places. It is a great place to go with family or drink with friends. The atmosphere is very refined.

title: Surprise!
author: AThiebaut
reviewBody: Sensational crepes, price a little salty. The atmosphere is very cool, at the bottom of a gallery. At the beginning, nothing happens around the place, but when you enter, you notice how wide the space is, with two environments (internal and external) and always with plenty of people. I recommend.

title: Delicious and healthy
author: anginha07
reviewBody: I loved the restaurant, very creative and delicious dishes, it is in a beautiful and very tasty environment, order the banana moqueca, the quinoa pudding is also unforgettable!

address.streetAddress: Avenida das Americas 8585 Barra da Tijuca

title: Birthday
author: Fernando C
reviewBody: Top service, guys without comments, we'll be back without a doubt. Good food and I recommend it without debt.

address.streetAddress: Rua Desembargador Augusto Loureiro Lima 151 Petrópolis

title: Light and tasty food
author: bcfarelli
reviewBody: I loved the fact that it had great vegetarian options. Dishes well served and very well seasoned. Pleasant environment. I just thought that the sound didn't match the environment.

address.streetAddress: Av. Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek 627 Vila Nova Conceição

title: Already was better
author: Ana Lidia M
reviewBody: The restaurant itself is good, but the food was better. As soon as they opened it was a well-served food, with great service. Today the service has already dropped a little.

address.streetAddress: Rua Jequitiba St Morada Do Sol Taquaralto

title: wonderful
author: Jose J
reviewBody: a place for families, couples, the elderly, singles .... a great place to spend the day, very calm and serene service, live music ... what a singer they have there. A wonderful repertoire, it is very worthwhile to spend the day enjoying this paradise and of course, a fantastic sea..recommended. Dish options for one person, waiters take turns serving, pool and bathrooms are clean and maintained ...

address.streetAddress: Rodovia AL 101 Norte Condomínio Angra de Ipioca

title: Very good
author: Pedrofuhrer
reviewBody: Nice place, very good food and great service. The waiting system is very good. I recommend the burger, great.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Brigadeiro Faria Lima 2232 Shopping Iguatemi - Livraria Cultura

title: Wonderful
author: denisejaudy
reviewBody: I really like the country flavor food, there are several varieties for you to choose and enjoy the best local food

title: Great!!!
author: CesarSales
reviewBody: I was with my wife on June 11th anticipating Valentine's Day and we are sure that we made the right choice !! Open wine with 10 wine options including sparkling, white, rose and red from different countries !! We love the dishes and the amazing service !!! We were already welcomed by the owner who took us to the table with a smile on his face after we were very well attended by everyone !!! Beautiful, cozy, harmonious environment !! We will be back many, many times and of course we recommend this place too much !!! 1000 service, delicious food, beautiful place !! Congratulations to all of the Province of Salerno !!

title: Bad food, unprofessional attitude.
author: RodrigoMQ
reviewBody: I went to dinner with friends at Mercearia 130. I ordered a trout with accompanying vegetables. The trout was great, but the vegetables were not fresh, they really tasted like they were starting to spoil. Some of my friends tried and agreed, others did not. It may be because I have a very sensitive and keen sense of smell. But so far so good, the night could be saved. But I called the manager and he came up with a thousand stories, which always ended with him trying to convince me that the vegetables were great and I was wrong. At no time did he suggest changing the accompaniment or asking me what he wanted to get out of there satisfied. I won't be back and I don't recommend it.

address.streetAddress: Rua Bernardo Guimarães, 2267 Entre Av Olegário Maciel e Rua Santa Catarina

title: "Excellent"
author: DudaUtta
reviewBody: The Rock and Ribs Jaracati shopping offers diversity on the menu, the attendants are agile and the food is exceptional! And as for delivery, it arrives quickly, warmly, and has well-trained and very polite motoboys.

title: Great food, good service, good cost benefit.
author: Camila C
reviewBody: The dish we ordered, fish with corn cream was excellent, we ate well in 3 people. The service is good, the staff are friendly and the view from the restaurant to the lagoon is very beautiful.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Doutor Julio Marques Luz 50 Jatiúca

title: Perfect simplicity
author: 830felipel
reviewBody: What a barbecue !!! The rotation is simple, just traditional cuts. There is no steak and no need. There is no need! The rib couldn't be better. The perfect void. Another great highlight: the mayonnaise salad! Service is fast. As soon as you sit down and the festival begins. Price is more than honest, it's really cheap!

title: Banana chopp is the order!
author: betinh0r
reviewBody: I found the banana chopp, very tasty and tasty aroma very interesting. I ordered an executive dish of shredded ribs very tasty. Service ok, good food and very nice environment and good to go with friends to have a happy hour. I really liked the cost benefit

title: Best Red Velvet in Recife
author: CourtyardRecife
reviewBody: My experience was incredible at Analu, from Red Velvet that I tasted, with the hug Tight, pastel party drink. Not to mention the super cozy atmosphere and fair price.

address.streetAddress: Rua Estudante Jeremias Bastos n 405 Pina

title: Price well below the others, but very basic food
author: Affonso M
reviewBody: The price of this restaurant close to the other prices in the Capital is very good. However, the food does not have great varieties and complexities. Quite basic for fast food in the city center to continue tourism. It is not a reference to know the local gastronomy.

title: Windward filet dish
author: Ricardooiitpv
reviewBody: Great vanderlei waiter indication, great atmosphere and 100% waiter service ..... obg vanderlei great service. ... I indicate without fear

address.streetAddress: Setor de Clubes Esportivos Sul, Trecho 2 , Conj. 41, s/n Asa Sul

title: Sensational!
author: mateusveronese
reviewBody: Very beautiful and cozy place, the service is exceptional, the food is wonderful, worth checking out!

address.streetAddress: Rua Recanto das Águas, 299 Residencial Damha loja 01

title: Fabulous
author: 304gianf
reviewBody: One of the best restaurants I've ever been to in São Paulo. The atmosphere is simple and pleasant, the patio at the back is very cozy. The service is attentive and cordial, as it should be and at the restaurant level. For the first time, the tasting menu is worth it, where it is possible to learn the menu and it is fair in value for the excellence of the dishes. The starters, squid, lamb and tuberculosis ... very very good.

title: Impeccable!
author: Connie B
reviewBody: It is difficult to eat well in Natal with one exception: Camarões Potiguar! And without exaggeration. We were in all the restaurants indicated as “excellent or very good” and NONE has the quality and service of “Camarões Potiguar! Excellent food and impeccable service. Finding "defects" in this restaurant seems to me to be "virtuosity" for someone who mistakenly conceives gastronomy as "perfection". Obviously, there are dishes that can be "improved". but the kitchen concept is exquisite! In 11 days of stay in Natal, we ate at least one meal a day in Potiguar.

title: The best of Christmas !!
author: Juliana R
reviewBody: The best Christmas restaurant. Excellent location, varied menu and everything very good, fair price and impeccable service. The best spinach risotto I've ever eaten and everything from seafood. It has a great wine list.

title: Amazing
author: Erica L
reviewBody: Great restaurant to enjoy an amazing dinner. Great food, service and ambience. Many varieties of fish, fried in the sea, crabs and fantastic crabs.

title: Excellent
author: marciovaz2016
reviewBody: Very well located, this pastry is located in the municipal market, at the end of Av T 63, always warm and crispy, a delight.

title: Best sun meat
author: laripmaia
reviewBody: You can't go to Natal and not eat the best sun meat. Very tasty, soft. We were very well attended and the food arrived very quickly. The view, then, is not even mentioned. Everything is very beautiful.

title: Prize
author: claudiamc2017
reviewBody: Lazanha of the gods but the whole menu is sensational. Goddess but very expensive. Cozy little space, light, soft decor, impeccable service.

title: A very tasty place
author: Miguel Angelo A
reviewBody: Good food, efficient and friendly waiters, varied emporium with various imported products. private parking, delicious pizzas

title: First line in fish
author: Paul0s3
reviewBody: This traditional fish restaurant in the city, has an excellent carvery and fish derivatives, with regional, curious, and very tasty options. It is worth the pass.

title: Class A decoration !!!
author: mhkimura15
reviewBody: Sensational place, excellent service brilliant menu with very good prices I will always come back !!!!

title: CLASS, QUALITY AND GOOD SERVICE
author: Ana Cristina B
