reviewBody: Very well decorated, with a pleasant atmosphere with the option of interesting choices. The best pizza in BH and many other Italian foods. Suffice to say that BH's Italianada is all there. First class service. Many attentive waiters, the maitre d ', the receptionist, valets ... that is: general!

title: I do not recommend
author: Tatiane R
reviewBody: I went to the place for a family birthday, I didn't like the place, the food was salty and cold, it may have been the day, but I prefer not to pay dearly to go through it again.

address.streetAddress: Rua Marechal Mascarenhas de Moraes 278 B

title: Very charming, excellent in seafood
author: Malú S
reviewBody: The place is very pleasant, it has a very varied menu, a complete wine cellar, excellent service, great service, the dishes are very well served, the price is compatible with the environment, not to mention that it has a beautiful look, right in the middle of the sea, I recommend it. Whoever is in the city, have to stop by, they won't regret it.

title: Excellent
author: Tuliohemetrio
reviewBody: Excellent menu, fantastic roasted pupunha palm heart, wonderful meats with sensational seasoning and flavor. Excellent service, the Attendant Rafael being an education, friendliness and competence. We will always be back

title: Place where Italian products are found
author: CarlosEduardoT91
reviewBody: When they go to the municipal market, it is worth visiting the emporiums, a place where you can find Italian products of the highest quality.

address.streetAddress: Rua da Cantareira 306 Mercado Municipal de São Paulo Portão

title: Delivery
author: Andre_Matos_Jlle
reviewBody: I placed my order through the Ifood app and it was great! I received it ahead of schedule, and the pizza was spectacular! Congratulations to all of you

title: Excellent service and dishes
author: Rafaela A
reviewBody: The Restaurant gets a great menu, excellent dishes, a reference environment, warm and pleasant with great service from the staff.

title: GOOD!
author: ThamyPonce
reviewBody: Good for lunch, it's just not very easy to get parking, but the food is good, the barbecue is delicious and the service is fast.

title: Sunday lunch
author: elisiani s
reviewBody: It is so good that there is a line to enter. Many people. You have to go early. My son loved the candies on the counter. The employee gave it to him and was also joking. Very educ

title: Lunch
author: DANIELE R
reviewBody: We paid a visit at lunch on the 12th of November, we consumed the Carne sol sertão and the pork ribs barbecue. Wonderful service. Especially the waiters Abraão, Ricardo, Valdenia and Felipe Brito. Super attentive.

title: Formidable
author: Paula F
reviewBody: I always go to the restaurant for special celebrations, especially when I go with large groups. The food is great, very well seasoned and the quantity is more than enough. When we order a plate for two, we always have three to eat. When we ask four to six to eat. The service is great. The owner of the place is always there and is super attentive.

address.streetAddress: Rua Senador Rui Carneiro, 220 Recreio dos Bandeirantes

title: Good food and excellent service
author: cicerofidelis
reviewBody: Good food and excellent service, but the price is not so pleasant. Price exerted by other restaurants but which has more varieties. I believe it is due to being 'high season', I intend to return.

title: Charming townhouse and delicious menu
author: Patipapp
reviewBody: Nez Bistrô Casa Forte is a charming townhouse restoring on the outskirts of Praça da Casa Forte in Recife. The decor at night is even more cozy, with emphasis on the pictures on the walls and candles on the tables. The menu is very tasty, highlighting the Foie Terrine and Forest Fruit Jelly (Entrance) and the Carré Bordalês (Carré of Uruguayan lamb). Option of children's dishes. Excellent service.

address.streetAddress: Rua Praça de Casa Forte, 314 Casa Forte

title: Sun, sea and enjoyment.
author: AngelaF3851
reviewBody: Cheerful, relaxed atmosphere. The tent is not a mere beach hut. Its facilities are comfortable with environments to enjoy the sun, the sea and even stay in the shade in reserved spaces. In addition to routine snacks, it is possible to have meals. Highlight for the broth of sururu (seafood from the region), hiding place (dish made with sun-dried meat and pepperoni sausage cut into cubes and covered with puree of aimpim (manioc) with gratin cheese, portion of acarajé, in addition to drinks made with fruits, coconut water, and others. A place to spend a pleasant day enjoying nature.

address.streetAddress: Rua Desembargador Manoel de Andrade Teixeira 266 Praias do Flamengo

title: Bezerra's Espetaria
author: Luciana_natalice
reviewBody: A great skewer. Pleasant atmosphere and good service. The price is a little steep, but it's worth it!

title: Simple and delicious food
author: dancezar
reviewBody: Show service, large portions, very good food and great value for money. I recommend delicious beef jerky

title: Very good
author: Patrícia M
reviewBody: The restaurant is super nice. It has ample area, kids space and service compatible with the expected for the place.

title: Horrible. Do not go!
author: gabiwt
reviewBody: Guys .. I ordered a Salmon Temaki .. The fish seems not to be clean, the rice is gooey .. I died of disgust .. And the HotHoll was pure oil !!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!! Terrible!

title: Delicious food and excellent service
author: Efraim O
reviewBody: I loved the Camarao with leek and the excellent service from Priscila, located in the first garden on the beach of Boa Viagem - Recife- PE !!!!!!!

title: Brother's birthday
author: Andrea F
reviewBody: Excellent Restaurant Well served the food I recommend the Waiter Manolo We will certainly be back but once

address.streetAddress: Av Prof Magalhaes Neto, 1273 Lot Aquárius, Pituba

title: NICE
author: leumaia2009
reviewBody: that the girls offer us or hope to choose the type of drink is to be desired the moment we order the chosen dish they leave right away comes the bummer of calling to make another order do not think outside that sometimes they have faces that mercy is not all ok hugs

address.streetAddress: Rua Odilon Santos, 205 Shopping Rio Vermelho

title: Where to eat the best Açai
author: ShushuRiodeJaneiro
reviewBody: Place where you can eat the best açaí in Rio de Janeiro, where you have the opportunity to create and assemble your salad with the right to choose 13 items, and the best sandwiches and crepes.

title: EXCELLENT
author: Ag0stinh0B
reviewBody: Excellent Chinese restaurant, with modern readings. Pleasant atmosphere, beautiful decor and high level food, with very good service.

title: One of the best casters in SP!
author: 878moirah
reviewBody: I have frequented Djapa since its beginning in Mogi das Cruzes and Arujá. Excellent carvery, fresh and tasty food. Impeccable service. I've lost count as many times as I've visited and it's always an excellent choice! Thanks today for Anselmo's service, who like all other employees are sensational! Thanks for lunch!

title: Good tapioca, very good service
author: reinaldoi2018
reviewBody: Good choice of tapioca, freshly made. Good option for a snack, or even dinner. Among the savory options is that of sun meat with qualho cheese.

title: Good, but no news
author: 234julianab
reviewBody: For those coming from São Paulo it is a worsened version of our bamboo coconut, the dishes are the same, the atmosphere is a little different. But I didn't see anything super delicious. I don't know if I would return. Prices equal to bamboo coconut from São Paulo.

title: Terribly awful.
author: Carlos S
reviewBody: I don’t eat sweets, so I can’t evaluate the ones from this bakery, but in savory I’m a graduate master. The pies have thick and brittle dough and excess flour filling, with some heart of palm dices and no olives. The drumsticks, greasy and with a grossly shattered chicken filling, have no flavor. The pizzas, I think, are made with dough and excess mozzarella of questionable quality, and so melted, that they fall out of the pieces of the disc. The fillet sandwich was returned after two bites, of so many nerves and tallow in the meat, they exchanged for another one, just as bad. The lunch buffet is in a bad mood, with the food thrown in the cold and overcooked dishes anyway. The poor service makes an ideal pair with the dishes. You don't see a smile, it looks like they're out of obligation. The manager, then, is rude, not attending to customers and ignoring what happens around them. I do not recommend and flee this place.

itemReviewed.name: Paes e Doces Beija Flor Do Itaim

title: excellent service and wonderful food
author: juju19472013
reviewBody: impeccable service, elaborately prepared food and came to the table, super hot. I highly recommend

title: Great dishes!
author: Wendell_Pereira
reviewBody: Cozy atmosphere, perfect and efficient service; great reception by the cheff and owner, very friendly and helpful! They produce some typical Peruvian things here, to offer in the dishes; Highlight for Trout stuffed with spinach; simply delicious !!

title: Nice food
author: ihaberle
reviewBody: The food is good with great value for money, but the place is small and, depending on the time, tables are missing. The service is a little slow too, but nothing absurd. It's worth it if you're in the region.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Raimundo Pereira de Magalhaes 4394 Jd Iris

title: Friends environment
author: Lucasjefferson
reviewBody: for those who want to have a cevejinha with friends, you must visit this wonderful place in campo grande ms.

title: Delicious pizza
author: ErnaniDemarchi
reviewBody: Excellent pizza with a fair price, close to the Mercure hotel and the hospital, a decorated room with quality, we were well served at dinner by Priscila, very attentive where she recommended the rustic pomodori pizza (with mozzarella, turkey breast, tomato, champignon, black olives and parmesan) and sun meat with catupiry, the house still serves craft beer

title: Delicious
author: Júnia A
reviewBody: Wonderful restaurant, good place to gather friends, family and couples. The service is spectacular, the seasoning is wonderful. The prices of the dishes are high, but it is a suitable place for those who want to know the delights in Natal.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Much care and love in everything that is prepared and offered
author: Marlus2014
reviewBody: I have known this Buffet for some good years ... I believe a good 20 years, since it was in the Garibaldi Society. All the events I attended, led by Cheff Leda and their children, have always been spectacular. I already had the opportunity to hire the services of this Buffet and I was always very well attended, with an honest price. I recommend!

title: Good food .... But the service ... Terrible !!
author: Fred K
reviewBody: From the reception, to put a name on the waiting list, to the service of the waiter, the service was terrible. Zero score for cordiality and information. The food itself, good! But due to the level of service, I don't go back there. There are several other restaurants that serve Lamen with quality, but the service is great too.

address.streetAddress: Rua Galvao Bueno 466 Liberdade, Japanese district

title: Good but ... man !!
author: Carlos C
reviewBody: I ordered a small pepperoni pizza ... and I paid R $ 34.00 with a 600 ml soda ... then they say Brasília is expensive ... but I ate it all ... very tasty ... I recommend it despite the price .

title: Pizza and Snack Rodizio
author: RicardoOliveira26
reviewBody: A very nice restaurant, well located, I was always well attended by the waiters, good prices for lunch and dinner. At dinner the flagship is the pizza and snack rodizio at a cost of R $ 22.90, per person, the pizzas are good and the snack too, but there is not a great variety, even for the price you pay, but if eat well. Those who do not want to pay rodizio can order a la carte. Just so as not to forget the rodizio works from 18; 30h to 21:30.

title: Cheap and good food
author: tassipelomundo
reviewBody: Beachside bar with good and cheap food. Good service. Worth a dinner or a snack in the late afternoon. Beer in the range of 5 reais (600ml).

title: Different.
author: vallima
reviewBody: The proposal of the pizzeria is very nice, with very thin dough, you eat with gloves ... I just didn’t like the atmosphere, which is luxurious and comfortable, but very dark!

address.streetAddress: Rua João Damasceno 21 Quadra 9 – Ponta do Farol

title: Wrong Delivery. Again
author: ElizCLopes
reviewBody: Don't count on delivery. They miss orders. It is the third time I ask for something, calmly and slowly and it comes wrong

title: Rua Dias Ferreira
author: dicasdaira
reviewBody: Very good tapioca dices Incredible drinks Great price wines Community tables A little dark

title: I wasn't even answered
author: leticiaulhoa
reviewBody: On Wednesday, empty restaurant; the meter leads us to the table, my daughter goes to the playroom ..... 15 minutes pass and I am not answered. I took my daughter out of the playroom in tears, but went to eat pizza somewhere else. Before I told the meter what happened and it didn't even offer a courtesy for me to stay in the place. Regrettable service

title: Much delay
author: Bê A
reviewBody: Much delay to serve the dishes and when the super dry salmon came. I returned the plate. The manager was polite and gave a brigadeiro toast, but I didn't like the restaurant.

address.streetAddress: Rua Doutor Alceu de Campos Rodrigues, 230

title: Perfect and nice great place !!!
author: Roneimalbec
reviewBody: For fvr come to know the quality linked to good taste. A great fish, perfect service and AFFORDABLE PRICE !!!! Very worth what you pay !!!

title: Best discovery
author: wolffenbuttel
reviewBody: We discovered this restaurant by chance looking for vegetarian and oriental places in the north. It was the best surprise and food discovery of recent times. Good, homemade, healthy food. Worth a visit ❤️

title: Drink with those who understand beer!
author: 861guilhermen
reviewBody: Excellent micropub! I highly recommend it! It's great to drink with those who understand beer! Ah, the handmade hamburger is also excellent!

address.streetAddress: Condominio San Diego Quadra 1 Rua 1 Lote 257

title: Great view and good food!
author: larissam734
reviewBody: Nice place, good food and great service from Noah. The place has an outdoor space that allows a view of the sea to feel the breeze.

title: Great cost / benefit ratio
author: edsonbrand
reviewBody: You can trust the trendy options of the house. Really smooth and very good taste. Pleasant environment and nice space dedicated to the little ones

address.streetAddress: Av Prof Magalhaes Neto, 1273 Lot Aquárius, Pituba

title: Great service
author: jacque_mazzuchelli
reviewBody: Great service. It is very worthwhile to go to happy hour, both for draft beer and drinks.

address.streetAddress: Av. do Contorno, 6061, Savassi Shopping Pátio Savassi

title: Celebrating special date in a special place
author: Paulo R
reviewBody: Very interesting place located in the Hotel Pullman, the environment is very beautiful, mirrored and it is possible to see the kitchen where the delicacies are prepared. The waiter Saulo was always very attentive, professional and courteous. Greetings to chef Adriano, who, knowing it was a festive date, presented us with a dessert! I recommend !

address.streetAddress: Rua Olimpiadas, 205 dentro do hotel Pullman Vila Olímpia

title: Delivery
author: Thay-and-Gui
reviewBody: I asked for delivery by the app of B's own Burger .. there would be 2 B of barbaro but other sandwiches were delivered :( it was very frustrating because this is my favorite burger and I always buy it personally and at delivery due to the combination of flavors that I love, I tried to call try to change but no one answered .. i ended up eating what came so as not to get hungry .. of course it was good because the hamburgers are excellent, but it is very annoying to wish and pay for something and receive another ..

address.streetAddress: Avenida das Americas 8585 Vogue Square Mall - loja 105

title: Great Option
author: LucianoS899
reviewBody: I was recently at the restaurant for dinner and really enjoyed it. From the environment, the service, kids space and especially the food, everything was excellent.

address.streetAddress: Rua Manoel Arruda Cavalcanti 805 S2003 e S2004 - Espaço Gourmet

title: feel at home and great cost benefit
author: Mauricio G
reviewBody: we have been to the restaurant since opening and still maintain a great standard of quality and impeccable service. the cost benefit is very good, especially on weekday lunches. the sushimen are creative but maintain a more traditional line without western inventions that put an end to the aesthetics and flavor of sushi. The capfish sashimi is always extraordinarily fresh! Any problem call one of the partners, Wendell.

title: Perfect restaurant
author: Fabiane R
reviewBody: I had lunch there before I left, the food is wonderful and the quantity that comes for 2 people is a lot, you can eat 3 or 4 calm.

title: Nice
author: Eurian D
reviewBody: It is a very good place, but I confess I expected more. The name draws attention because it is an "appeal" to the city. It's a safe place, good prices and good service, but I didn't like it very much.

title: Very good food, but overpriced and bad service.
author: cesarximenes
reviewBody: I went with my family just Adegão to eat cod. Actually both the codfish starter and the main course were excellent, but the service is very bad. I had to keep begging to get a beer at my table. Regarding prices .... too. If you want to charge expensive, ok! But the service has to be proportional to the price!

title: Excellent
author: Rsalaniz
reviewBody: Spectacular beer list accompanied by great snacks. The chef's burger is sensational. The location is also very good.

title: wonderful food
author: firmino f
reviewBody: very good food, service and price! I loved the place and the price, wonderful to be with family and friends

title: Good pizza and good service
author: Daniele R
reviewBody: Nice and nice place, the rustic decor makes the atmosphere very cozy! Perfect for a family outing. The price is right and the menu is very diverse. Tips: Northeastern and Jamaican ... hummm

title: Delicious
author: luciacarlaz
reviewBody: Waiter Celso's service was great, a very delicious dessert and the best pudding in the world to eat praying !! Congratulations to all of you !

title: My favorite
author: FrankHenrique
reviewBody: The restaurant I like most in João Pessoa. First class service and super tasty food. It is located in the low tambaú near the fair.

title: I never regret
author: letaraujo
reviewBody: When the family comes here at home it has become a tradition to ask at Baggio. A lot of people complain about the price, but I never regret taking it with them, because the pizza always comes with mouth watering, regardless of the flavor chosen. Highlight for fig with almonds, my favorite.

title: BEST CHRISTMAS RESTAURANT !!!
author: robertatoppeldep
reviewBody: Amazing!!! Simple place, but with great service and wonderful food. Shrimp carvery, freshly prepared, with fresh ingredients. There are more than twenty dishes, to eat without haste. The waiters serve calmly, so you can taste the food. In addition to the shrimp, they serve grilled fish, rump steak, rump, sun meat, salads. The shrimp mayonnaise was special, with more shrimp than potatoes. Very good price R $ 55,000 per person. I highly recommend it. !!!!

title: Lunch (I recommend)
author: eliane0liveira
reviewBody: Nice place, good food. I ordered La Isla, the salmon was extraordinary, but the squid passed the point and the shrimp was full of lemon which took away the flavor. I tried the Pink lemonade and liked it. Next time I'll ask you to take the lemon out of the shrimp.

title: Good memory
author: Fborge
reviewBody: Traditional Italian food restaurant, participant of the club dish of good memories, simple and pleasant with excellent food and good service. Try the condensed milk pudding with Padano money.

address.streetAddress: Rua Elias Tommasi Sobrinho 130, Santa Lucia - ao lado do Colegio Leonardo da Vinci

title: Disappointing
author: Jutomazelli
reviewBody: 3 time we set out to go to Coco, but without a doubt this was the worst! Garcon showed us a dish and we went for it! No flavor, cold, expensive and made us leave indignant! Too bad we chose Coco again! I'm not coming back!

title: I recommend!
author: Mika R
reviewBody: Every day I go to the kitchenette I fall more in love with the food! The atmosphere is very cozy, I certainly recommend it!

address.streetAddress: SHC / S - CL - Quadra 209 - Bloco B - Loja 05 Setor Comércio Local Sul

title: Very expensive
author: Sandra N
reviewBody: Excellent food, beautiful place and good service, but very expensive. It is not worth the cost x benefit. Both food and drink are expensive.

title: Fast and delicious skewers
author: josev_niaf
reviewBody: It is a well located establishment, with fast service! Every time I went the skewers were very good, and friends always like it! It has a good variety, from vegetables to various types of meat. The tables are on the sidewalk and also indoors. Worth the visit for a tasty and quick snack! Fair prices!

title: Regional food
author: 364eduardod
reviewBody: Those who come to Meceió have to go to Bodega do Sertão, it is a place that brings different foods from the region, it has a buffet where there is a girl explaining all the dishes, the pleasant atmosphere, the waiters are very friendly, especially the Pedrinho we ask for for him to take a picture of us and he, promptly, went to get northeastern hats and a shotgun upstairs to make the photo look cool, and there is a great concern with hygiene

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: Very bland food!
author: ricardoaZ7439VQ
reviewBody: We ordered "our mincemeat" and moqueca for a late lunch on a Sunday, around 4 pm. The minced meat was warm and cold and the seasoning was very light, even too much. The moqueca had a cream of acaça (rice) that was even cool the idea to accompany the moqueca, but, the cream had almost no seasoning, and the moqueca also, almost without seasoning. I even put some of the pepper to see if it gave more "joy" to the dish, but even the pepper had almost no heat. Food without life and without any personality. Very nice atmosphere, attentive service, but for the food, it was the first and only visit. Moqueca 53 reais, minced 62. We will not return.

title: Great Bar
author: Clovis2014
reviewBody: Great Bar, with excellent tastes and great food. Pleasant atmosphere, with good service. Undoubtedly one of the best bars in Rio de Janeiro.

title: Flawless boteco food
author: Sol D
reviewBody: Generous portions !!!! Great food, simple location, perfect attendants !!!!! I rarely ask for fried food, but the ones here are worth it, very honest prices, for the quality of the food served I would say it is great value for money I recommend it !!!

title: FeedBack Adega do Sul
author: Fabiano C
reviewBody: Pleasant atmosphere with valet service. Carvery service q exceptional meat quality, in addition to the varied cold buffet. Regarding Japanese food, it leaves something to be desired. Price a little salty but on average a good carvery.

title: Birthday Lunch
author: VictorStaconovexe
reviewBody: Very pleasant atmosphere, attentive waiters and carvery with good options for vegetarians.

title: Excellent Winery
author: thaiserribeiro
reviewBody: Super recommend! Cozy, wonderful food, friendly staff, great service and value for money! I went for the first time in January / 15 and returned now in early September / 18.

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: Excellent option for Happy Hour, with varied Beer List
author: Alan Dener C
reviewBody: In addition to the vast list of beers (separated by country), this restaurant offers excellent options of super differentiated meats. Accompanied by good friends and / or a romantic couple, it becomes an excellent option to spend good moments in Belorizontine nightclubs (I think it doesn't open during the day) !! Highly recommend !!

address.streetAddress: Rua Francisco Deslandes, n°1038 Lojas 02 e 03

title: Delicious fit food
author: 511naneb
reviewBody: Plenty of functional foods. All very tasty and generous portions. Good option for a chat with friends.

title: Wonderful!
author: tassiabnascimento
reviewBody: We spent 4 days in the city and went to dinner twice in Cameroon, we liked it so much ... the dishes are exceptional, wonderful food, impeccable presentation. The only caveat is that on the first visit to the restaurant, after the end of dinner, two waiters came to our table offering some shots and we refused, they insisted that it was to "end" the night better, given the insistence, we understand that it was a courtesy from and the shots were charged to the final bill.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Very good service
author: leila1951
reviewBody: I really enjoyed Japanese food. Nice place. Good service. Good drink. It is not cheap but it is worth going with friends.

title: Crab
author: CDias14
reviewBody: A crab by the beach, a delicious mush and a cold beer, the vision of paradise really. The service leaves a little to be desired, but nothing that gets in the way.

title: The Porteira, Very good
author: Clebson F
reviewBody: Very good, I ate roasted chicken and meat barbecue, I loved it. The food is excellent, of excellent quality. I recommend it to everyone, there are several places in the city and also in Salvador shopping mall, which by the way is very good for a quick or executive lunch.

address.streetAddress: Av. Marechal Costa e Silva, s/n Dique do Tororó

title: Best seafood restaurant in Recife
author: CARLA SAN R
reviewBody: Guaiamum Gigante is the best seafood restaurant in Recife. Its only flaw is the price. Apparently, this unit on Avenida Boa Viagem was about to close its doors, but the one on the Tower remains firm and strong!

title: Top
author: Carla A
reviewBody: Rio Scenarium is top! I've been there a few times and even celebrated my birthday there. The place has an exuberant decoration, it is mega spacious, it has about 3 floors. There's good music! And quality food! In addition to cultural diversity because you meet people from different parts of the world.

title: Not worth it
author: alf_ucha
reviewBody: Lost in attendance, a juice takes thirty minutes. Caipirinha with chilled mulled wine flavor. At lunch they serve a la carte and are unable to attend. The dish was cold, the fish was overcooked ... no doubt it is not worth paying almost 300 for this service! I do not recommend, the SP is much better.

address.streetAddress: Avenida das Americas 3900 Shopping Village Mall - 3 Piso

title: a good cod
author: genevan d
reviewBody: food with good seasoning with a good excellent service to take friends and also family for a good taste.

title: Restaurante Camarões Potiguar
author: Luiz_Canhoni
reviewBody: Very nice restaurant, with excellent food and plenty. I recommend arriving early as the restaurant is in high demand and the waiting list is long.

title: Holiday dinner
author: Dayane M
reviewBody: We were well attended, the food was delicious, came in very generous portions, the waiter who served us very attentive Irapuã!

title: Leblon's worst Japanese
author: Gigi-Brito-Rio
reviewBody: On my husband's plate, which was a duck Magret, a worm came on the flower that decorated it. My dish, a tuna poke, was “washed” and tasteless. Lousy restaurant with even worse service. We will never come back.

title: Very good!
author: 600izabelam
reviewBody: Beautiful place, perfect in every detail of the decoration, wonderful self-service buffet, sun-dried meat with cream, hidden, among others, the sweets are an attraction apart !! I loved it, the value is not the cheapest, but for what is offered, it is very worth it!

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: worth it!
author: cinoelia
reviewBody: traditional bar and restaurant in Belém, with an excellent location and a refined atmosphere, the only drawback is facing a long queue to enter, but it is worth it.

title: Beautiful!!
author: mariaregina2017
reviewBody: Very good service, with attentive waiters and staff. Beautiful decor and wonderful view. Delicious caipirinha with cashew, mint and tangerine. Food well prepared. Open kitchen and very clean !!

title: Real moqueca from Salvador
author: abgoulart
reviewBody: The food is incredible. We suffered a little from the heat but it was very worth it. We will be back for sure. It gets very crowded so it's best to arrive early.

address.streetAddress: Av. Teixeira Barros, s/n - Centro Comercial do Conjunto dos Comerciários Brotas

title: Best buffet
author: anacarolinag168
reviewBody: This restaurant is wonderful! Varied buffet and quality ingredients. Cod, shrimp, fillet, pasta: everything first! Always good to arrive early to take advantage of the variety of options. The dessert buffet is also varied. The price is steep, but it's worth it. The ceviche is wonderful!

title: Simply Delicious
author: Kelly C
reviewBody: It's not tourist talk ... this restaurant is one of the best in Maceió. We tried three dishes, and the three were perfect, but the favorite was the prawn pajuçara (here's the tip) !!

title: Excellent Italian.
author: N9425KXsergioc
reviewBody: All very good. Thiago's service, the atmosphere is cozy, and the food was wonderful, I had a duck risotto that was top, very tasty. It's a good dessert, profiterolis. Excellent evening.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Armando Lombardi 800 Barra da Tijuca

title: Good food
author: Janes R
reviewBody: Well-known restaurant in town and well recommended. We ate the buffet on Sunday and everything was very good. The value of the meal is the same as the restaurants of the same level. The dessert that was included was delicious. We also ordered two pizzas on another occasion, which are certainly good, but nothing exceptional. The pizzas are quite expensive due to their size. On both occasions we were very well attended, although at lunch there was a little delay. A tip for lunch is to arrive after 12:00. because we arrived shortly after 11 and we were waiting a long time. And as we started to eat early, we missed some options at the carvery that were only available around 1 pm.

title: Unique flavors!
author: carolcancaro
reviewBody: Think of a very good food and the best: soooo well served! I chose the meat, 2 medallions of filet with herb crust (wonderful) and tasted all the side dishes, one better than the other, which are served by the waiters at the table and you can eat at will. The farofa, the polenta with watercress and the chayote gratin are a case apart from so good! Super nice service, very friendly waiters, you only have to arrive early because the place is small and there is always a queue.

title: I recommend
author: Kirna K
reviewBody: Excellent service by the waiter Souza! Quality food, good music and super nice atmosphere! Super recommend!

title: Too good
author: Sebastião F
reviewBody: Excellent service, quick lunch, delicious food for more are to be congratulated, I will always come back

address.streetAddress: Av. Das Araucárias, Ed. Real Quality

title: Good cost benefit - self service
author: MCoelho23
reviewBody: I always went by but I didn't know it was good, I liked it, it's a big place. I'm not really a barbecue, but it's a good option. I loved the grape juice

address.streetAddress: Avenida Nsa Sra de Copacabana, 796-A Copacabana

title: good taste
author: izan m
reviewBody: excellent place with an excellent and diversified menu thus maintaining a line of tasteful customers.

title: Real Burger
author: Kelly L
reviewBody: Juicy and well seasoned meat, fresh bread and harmony in the flavors of the sandwich. I found this in a meal I had in this small and very pleasant place. Quick and delicious meal. I recommend!

title: EXCELLENT SERVICE !!!
author: Agostinho C
reviewBody: I've been going to this restaurant for a year and a half and I'm just in love. Steak Ancho with those rustic potatoes and Japanese manioc flour, that ... sensational. The gateau chocolate dessert took me to heaven. The price is super affordable. Very quiet environment, with background music (allows you to talk without having to shout). For smokers, like me, there is the parklet. The wines harmonize very well with the food. And to finish I have to highlight the waiter Rafael !! He always served me with excellence and great sympathy.

itemReviewed.name: La Vinicola Wine Bar e Fingerfood

address.streetAddress: Rua Sao Paulo 1815 Portaria na Rua Gonçalves Dias 1922

title: Really really good food.
author: DayanA780
reviewBody: The food is really good and quite varied. The Amazonian bream is a must and very delicious.

title: A restaurant that surprises
author: nelsonm116
reviewBody: Santa Fé is worth visiting. Good service, attentive valet, and good food. Despite being on the edge of Flamengo with Gloria, the place is pleasant and can even be for a romantic dinner with a view of Praia do Flamengo, in fact in lack of good restaurants. Certainly with the renovation that stopped in the middle of Hotel Glória, we thought that the gastronomic quality of Santa Fé would suffer the same degradation that they did in the traditional hotel, but this did not happen and I recommend to everyone a visit to this good restaurant, whose prices despite a little "salty" is worth the visit.

title: Very very expensive restaurant!
author: MeloGra1
reviewBody: It is an excellent steakhouse, service of 1 quality, a lot of variety in exotic meats, the buffet is also very good, variety of salads and cold cuts to choose and to taste, what sins is the price, very expensive, I believe that there are countless places so good and even better for much cheaper and affordable prices! But if the problem is not the money, it is worth it!

title: Good Pizza
author: Alexandre G
reviewBody: The pizzas of the carvery are very delicious, especially for those who like thin dough. There is a good variety of flavors and the service is excellent.

title: Portuguese surprise, for sure
author: Albino_Amaral
reviewBody: I went to this restaurant taken by those brochures distributed in the hotels. To my wife's and my surprise, we ate one of the best cod dishes of all we've ever tried. The service is attentive, with some waiters who have worked at the house for many years. We strongly recommend it. For dessert, we look at a sensational egg whites pudding.

title: Already was better.
author: adsonamt
reviewBody: He preferred the old way, with broth rotation and tranquility (which was the differential of the restaurant). The atmosphere was more familiar. Now the night is a bar, with live music (and cover charge) or football. They reduced the options for broths and the carvery buffet. Live music ends up driving away anyone who just wants to have a quiet meal. It got worse. Unfortunately.

title: Gum Shrimp
author: ValterRinke
reviewBody: Very beautiful environment, great service, try the shrimp gum is very good, it was worth the value

title: Natural and salads good and practical
author: solonbenayon
reviewBody: A quality self-service restaurant, very well located one block from Ipanema beach and with salads and hot dishes at a very good price. A good option for those who are visiting Ipanema and want a quick, quality meal at a fair price.

title: Nice place for happy hour
author: Francisco J
reviewBody: A nice place for a happy hour with friends. The Spanish style ambience appeals. The tapas are small, something that was disappointing. But of great quality. I recommend it to anyone looking for a place to enjoy tastes - tapas.

title: Reasonable option
author: Otto S
reviewBody: Reasonable lunch option in the center of Porto Alegre. But the wing is always very tasty. Worth the request !!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Julio de Castilhos 398 Menino Deus

title: Healthy
author: Bruna L
reviewBody: Best option for a healthy and inexpensive snack. The Rua do Futuro unit has many tables and an ice machine (many units do not offer ice). The downside is that there are few parking spaces.

title: Amazing dish of the day
author: Heloisa F
reviewBody: I went at lunch with a friend, without much expectation. One of the dishes of the day was a shrimp stew that was sensational. Very well served. The service leaves something to be desired. The price is salty for lunch time with dish of the day.

title: Good cost-benefit
author: VivianCionek
reviewBody: It has several options of dishes and all are tasty. The price is good and the service is calm. The environment is clean.

address.streetAddress: Rua Barao de Souza Leao, 335, Loja 3

title: Irresistible dishes with an even better price.
author: izidorobahu
reviewBody: I met the choppao through a colleague from Cuiabá, the 5 days I stayed in Cuiabá with my mother, she wanted nothing more than fish! Choppao was a great choice because it offers a menu with a wide range of dishes. I ate a delicious Filet Mignon stuffed with ham and cheese covered with Bechamel sauce and surrounded by a creamy mashed potato with sour cream, which on the menu said it served two people but served 3 haha. My mom asked for a baked pint with sauce that I don't remember for sure but it was a great choice since she ate almost everything haha, as a good fish lover, not only me but like her, we also recommend choppao for people looking for a great option menu and also affordable prices. In both dishes we don't spend more than 180 reais remembering that 4 people eat very well.

address.streetAddress: Praça 8 de Abril - Goiabeiras Bairro Goiabeiras, proximo ao centro da cidade.

title: Always top!
author: Fernandomese
reviewBody: Very top restaurant, the first launched and worth visiting. I chose to follow the hamburger regardless of having a menu with several options. Good service, excellent location, super recommend!

title: Good food.
author: jhefreymenezes
reviewBody: The food is indisputable. Wonderful! Basic service, hot sparkling wine. Two pastas, homemade petit gateua dessert (phenomenal) 1 bottle of sparkling wine. Total R $ 314.00 Worth the visit, but all care and valid.

title: Excellent
author: artcarvalho
reviewBody: Very good restaurant, for Happy Hour it is a very pleasant environment! Cold beer and snack portions!

title: Good pizza
author: gomidesm2017
reviewBody: Despite always passing by, I went only once, and it is a place that deserves a return. We went for the only time in 12 people and everyone liked it ... I'll be back soon.

title: Very good !
author: Ronald C
reviewBody: Best carbonara in town. Friendly, good service, pleasant atmosphere. To go back and recommend to friends!

address.streetAddress: Rua Elesbao Linhares N 15, Shopping Day By Day Praia Do Canto

title: Great choice of Italian restaurant!
author: eriquinhatravel
reviewBody: Extremely cozy place with great service. I had the opportunity to go to the restaurant week as well as outside and I was treated with the same courtesy. With regard to the promotion menu, I highlight the starter salad with endive, nuts and gorgonzola, really a trip on the palate. Main course and dessert are not far behind.

address.streetAddress: CLS 402 Bloco A loja 33 asa sul

title: Excellent
author: None
reviewBody: The food is good, very well prepared. The place is comfortable and quite pleasant. We are always surprised me. It is our first choice in Porto Alegre - RS.

title: Traditional
author: Foscorreia
reviewBody: In old Recife, a place with interesting history. High level Portuguese cuisine, highlighting the top hat, fantastic super traditional dessert from Recife.

title: dinner with friends
author: Felipe M
reviewBody: Wonderful restaurant, very pleasant atmosphere, great decor, delicious and plentiful food! Great for going with a group.

address.streetAddress: Setor de Clubes Esportivos Sul, Trecho 2 , Conj. 41, s/n Asa Sul

title: Light
author: bellycastro
reviewBody: An excellent option for those who like healthy food. It is in the center of Goiânia. The tapioca rodizio is a delight, worth a try.

title: Porto Alegrense Institution
author: In H
reviewBody: I know the tradition of the house by fame, but if it depends on the sandwich, they are really at a very high level.

address.streetAddress: Rua Erasto Roxo de Araujo Correa, 12 Bairro Boa Vista

title: Day at the beach
author: 890sandros
reviewBody: Great for those who want to enjoy a beautiful beach with an infrastructure. Good food, good accommodation is a beautiful shower of fresh water for those who hate being tanned by salt water.

address.streetAddress: Rodovia AL 101 Norte Condomínio Angra de Ipioca

title: Back to the roots
author: ANTONIO H
reviewBody: Resturant very well located with easy access and with 2 paid and covered and unpaid parking. With a wide variety of foods, the strongest being the Northeastern food. I recommend it because it is as good as the lake mangai.

address.streetAddress: Setor comercial Norte Quadra 06 Shopping ID

title: Very good
author: Lillian A
reviewBody: Good food, good service, reasonable price. Clean environment, I will come back more often. Great location. Easy access.

title: Excellent meal.
author: JussaraB_13
reviewBody: The restaurant has an excellent carvery, a complete buffet of salads and other side dishes, seafood (including lobster) in quantity, all well prepared and tasty. The service is very good. Really, a good place to dine with friends.

address.streetAddress: Av. Agamenon Magalhães, 2132 Próximo ao colégio da policia militar de Pernambuco

title: Dinner
author: C6477EMmarianar
reviewBody: Very cozy place, delicious food .. typical alogoense! If you are looking for a place that is well served, it's very family, with wonderful service from Aninha, you can come here at Bodega do Sertão which is the best in town!

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: Didier
author: Vitor E
reviewBody: Excellent, you feel in a Parisian bistro, honest in the price of the dishes and the wine list —————————- / - / ————— / - / - / - // —-

title: Good food, not so much atmosphere
author: NelsinhoSiqueira
reviewBody: I really like the food in the restaurant, but the atmosphere is a little unpleasant, I explain. The restaurant's acoustics are terrible which makes the experience a little heavy!

title: Good pizza poor service
author: cecilias22
reviewBody: We went to Shopping Higienópolis to take a slice of vegetarian pizza, which is a novelty in slices. Other than that the pizza was good!

address.streetAddress: Alameda Dom Emanuel Gomes, Esq. Rua 1131. Setor Marista - Goiania-GO

title: Unequaled
author: Michael S
reviewBody: For those who like fish need to go prepared to eat a lot. The carvery is wonderful with emphasis on pacú, painted, salmon.

address.streetAddress: Rua Dr. João Rosa pires, 1030 Amambaí

title: Almost on the beach.
author: Desfrutando
reviewBody: Almost on the beach. The shrimp. The crab cone. And a cocktail. Everything very good and pleasing to the eye. Worth it. Congratulations to the Chef. The taste of the shrimp in the pineapple is spectacular. We will be back!

title: Amazing
author: Gustavo M
reviewBody: Excellent food, fair price and a very cozy and refined atmosphere. Perhaps it is one of the best fish I have ever eaten. It's worth the visit.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Good atmosphere and good food
author: 833jaianaa
reviewBody: Very good restaurant, excellent quality food, very familiar atmosphere. I love the warm bread basket that is served as a starter.

title: great cost benefit
author: Michele_Melo
reviewBody: Excellent draft beer! very good service! Try the Parisian noodles! Diverse and very good menu.

title: Good meat
author: Luiza_Chara
reviewBody: The restaurant is delicious, and filling up is no problem because there are two restaurants next to each other, in addition to waiting for the table to eat a delicious polenta! The meat is tender, but if it's packed it's not very fast

title: Codfish cake and a chopinho rhyming with flavor!
author: tourguidegentilnunes
reviewBody: If there is a place where a chopinho rhymes with the first codfish cake, this place is from Braga, relaxed, beautiful people and a good beach two blocks away for you to enjoy on the Leblon sands!

title: SENSATIONAL
author: tonymarquezine
reviewBody: Worth the amount paid! Food, service, accommodation ... all of the best quality! Food unlike anything I've ever eaten!

title: Quality Japanese
author: Thobias Z
reviewBody: We acquired a promotion to consume the Festival at Sashiburi and decided to visit the Moinhos unit, since we had only attended the Lindóia unit. The Festival is the same, they start serving the sunomono salad, starters, a boat with sushi and sashimi and the specials. All very well prepared and tasty. Spare parts, with emphasis on the giant temaki. Unique however was the service. The waiter looked a little flustered despite the slow movement of the second. More than once we had to request again what we had already requested. But we were quite satisfied.

title: Reservation not respected.
author: Danielle P
reviewBody: On December 5th, I booked a table for 13 people for December 20th, but to my sad surprise my reservation was not respected. And the staff and the owner himself were rude in explaining that he had no table reserved. I had to go to another restaurant. Danielle Pinho

address.streetAddress: Av. Almirante Silvio de Noronha, 365 Shopping Bossa Nova

title: Delicious and affordable food
author: GabyMontevallo
reviewBody: I loved the service and the food is exceptional. I will definitely go back! I ordered the gnocchi which is their recommendation and chose the 4 cheese sauce. Another option for those who like shrimp is the shrimp and chicken broth that is served with rice.

title: It is by no means the best restaurant in Brasilia
author: Debora_Maffia
reviewBody: I went to the restaurant on Wednesday to enjoy the tasting menu with my husband and, in his words, "celebrate your birthday, but not the celebrated 50 years of at Saveur Bistrot". It is an average restaurant with very well-trained waiters, but the taste is far from the best in town. I believe this TripAdvisor review is being manipulated.

title: BBB
author: pehauck
reviewBody: Good, beautiful and cheap. This restaurant has a lot of dining options. Very good pizzas, well served snacks, pasta and meat.

title: Note 1000!
author: KaBaptistella
reviewBody: Cheerful atmosphere, wonderful food, the staff welcomes us with smiles and games. The waiter Buiú suggested us the Moqueca de Robalo with Pitú and Aratu, the latter did not know if we would like it and he was super kind and knowing what he was offering he said: “If you don't like it, you can return it”. we return later. I recommend good food, abundant and fresh, Buiú sensational service as well as the other employees.

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont, 957 - Praia de Atalaia, Aracaju - SE Orla da praia de Atalaia

title: Exellent night
author: naiarapontes
reviewBody: Murilo served us very well and I loved getting to know this meat. Patagonian draft beer is a show.

address.streetAddress: Quadra Sig Quadra 8 Lote 2375 Ao lado do Nazo Sushi Bar e Primeiro Bar

title: very good, but the quality of care has been falling.
author: Clary_Yama
reviewBody: Good regional food, reasonable price. The service was already better. It is worth knowing. All characterized.

title: Bad service
author: carolineatn
reviewBody: Super nice place, good live music, delicious food but the problem is getting a waiter! Just playing in front of them !!! Best to book Pq fills!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Engenheiro Luiz Gomes Cardim Sangirardi 20

title: Boteco food!
author: Kikonascimento
reviewBody: Bagacinho is very good! Pub food, cold beer and football on the screen. It's that environment

address.streetAddress: Rua Comendador Bernardo Catarino 171 Vl Santucci

title: Perfect
author: Gabriela L
reviewBody: Beautiful, cozy, modern restaurant with a great price! Best of all are the delicious dishes with great presentation. Delicious drinks! One of the best restaurants in Recife! Varied menu. Great service. I recommend. Satisfaction Guaranteed!

address.streetAddress: Rua Prof. Eduardo Wanderley Filho, 187 Boa Viagem

title: Best chicken in brown sauce!
author: manoelagbf
reviewBody: Very traditional Minas Gerais restaurant. The chicken in the brown sauce, besides being very tasty, is very hearty. Caprice in the side dishes, like okra and angu. Fair price. I highly recommend it.

title: A pleasant surprise
author: Flavio A
reviewBody: The best cost-benefit ratio in relation to the bars we find in São Luís. It serves everything from snacks to meals. Very good to go with friends.

address.streetAddress: Avenida dos Holandeses 1 Engenho Do Mato

title: Eat cheap
author: Jacques L
reviewBody: It is an establishment specialized in savory (fried or baked), it is a cheap price. Food is arranged at the end of the store. There are many places to sit. It accepts the main meal vouchers and is not far from the São Bento metro station.

title: Simply amazing!
author: daniellan2015
reviewBody: Nice place, delicious food, perfect service! The au gratin oysters are fabulous! Worth knowing!

title: Pizzeria in the late afternoon
author: ricardo-ota
reviewBody: Units in Jatiúca and in the mall with excellent thin crust pizzas. Beautiful, welcoming service

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Antônio G. de Barros, 188 Jatiúca

title: Lunch
author: Geisa R
reviewBody: Great service by Valdeci, very attentive and pleasant. Bacalhau ao Braz was delicious! Pleasant environment.

itemReviewed.name: Adega Santiago Barra - Rio de Janeiro

address.streetAddress: Av. das Américas, 3900 Shopping Village Mall, 2º Andar

title: Very good
author: Aalexei
reviewBody: With refined decor and atmosphere, very busy, excellent service from staff, very good food in particular sandwich, price a little salty but worth every penny spent.

title: Weak!
author: csevo
reviewBody: From the traveling friends, I asked for a roast beef Beirut, it looked very well done, but as I was cutting it, I realized it wasn't roast beef, it was a fillet with fat and everything, in addition to a sauce that looks like Madeira in the meat, I don't know where that is can be framed as a roast beef, it was not a good experience.

title: Very good
author: SusanaT964
reviewBody: The atmosphere is super pleasant, the decor is beautiful, without exaggeration and visual pollution. Many waiters serving, when a dish we ordered started to take a little while already informed us that it was because the products were being prepared, but the service is very fast. Tasty food, the drinks are visually striking, but I found that they abuse the amount of ice in the glasses a little, substantially decreases the amount of whatever the order is. I'm just not going to evaluate it better because the music got too loud after a certain hour. It's not really a nightclub for the sound to get too loud, it hindered the conversation with those at the table. I didn't like it much more.

title: Excellent dish and service!
author: tbrunnerbsb
reviewBody: We went to the ship with a collective purchase coupon. There was no need for prior scheduling. We ordered a portion of prawns in butter with fried manioc and a Shrimp Fortuna do Mar at the beginning. Everything was just delicious! And the service from waiter João was excellent! We will definitely be back!

address.streetAddress: Setor de Clubes Esportivos Sul, Trecho 2 , Conj. 41, s/n Asa Sul

title: Gourmet without gourmetizing radius
author: Gisele A
reviewBody: The service is excellent, the place is discreet and cozy, the menu is full of options that accompany the meat. One of the best places to eat meat in Curitiba. I suggest trying the entry caponata.

title: Good option at Frei Caneca shopping mall
author: I2304EXfabios
reviewBody: Last Saturday I went to New York City for lunch. The food is good at reasonable prices (neither cheap nor too expensive). I ordered a cheese salad for myself and a Filet mignon with parmesan risotto for my wife. The sandwich was great: big, the 200 g meat very tasty. The desserts were also great: I ordered a petit gateau and my wife a condensed milk pudding. I just thought that the service was not great: sometimes I looked for a waiter to order something and I couldn't find anyone in the salon.

address.streetAddress: Rua Frei Caneca 569 Shopping Frei Caneca

title: Excellent food and excellent service
author: rafaelpinto84
reviewBody: Super cozy restaurant, delicious food, very cold chop and note 10 service !!! Super Recommend

address.streetAddress: Rua Professor Carlos Ott 79 Stella Maris

title: Nice food
author: maricviana
reviewBody: The food is very tasty and the service is friendly, but, close to the other options in BH, it loses some points.

itemReviewed.name: Est! Est!! Est!!! Autentica Cucina Italiana

title: Excellent
author: CCantarelli
reviewBody: in my opinion it was the best restaurant we know in town. Everything perfect: very friendly service

title: Bad service
author: rdraposo
reviewBody: Good food, but high price and bad service. The waiter looked like he was doing me a favor. Lack of kindness in the service. I'm not going back to the Meireles unit.

title: Wonderful Argentine
author: MariPeres
reviewBody: I love Che, I usually go at least once a month. The meats are very delicious and the side dishes too. The wine list is very good and they always offer promotions on certain wines. The place is very beautiful, half light, ideal for dining as a couple or taking friends. I recommend!

title: Restaurant for lovers of Northeastern food
author: Neylatribus
reviewBody: Restaurant with many northeastern foods, such as mutton, hidden meat, sun dried meat, couscous, flour of everything you can imagine and tasty desserts. The restaurant also contains some animal sculptures that you can make nice photographs and keep a good memory. gives

title: Great place
author: Isabelle G
reviewBody: I really like the food, the service, although the location is a bit distant for those on the black side, but it is totally worth going.

address.streetAddress: Av. Bernardo Vieira, 3775 Shopping Midway Mall

title: Regional food
author: flaviabilio
reviewBody: The coolest thing on the menu is the glossary right on the first page with the explanation of the dishes. It has a rustic appearance and is located on an avenue very close to the beach.

title: Very good food in Goitacazes
author: ctdourado
reviewBody: A very good self-service, several types of hot food, very good food. If you are a vegetarian, salads of all kinds, for all tastes. Various types of snacks and sweets, for a breakfast and an afternoon snack. Prices are not very cheap, but it is worth it. The service is very good.

title: Excellent
author: 948marilizaa
reviewBody: Great food, super relaxed atmosphere! Attentive waiters! Good to go as a couple, with friends or family! When they go, be sure to order the side dish made of potatoes and cream cheese or gorgonzola filling! Too good!! The wine list is great and the waiters know what goes with what !! They are super congratulations !!

title: I recommend
author: Flavinha_Romanoli
reviewBody: Good and beautiful place. Food well prepared. Efficient service, average price elsewhere. Super recommended!
userLocation: São João da Boa Vista, SP

address.streetAddress: Avenida Praia de Ponta Negra 8952 Ponta Negra

title: very good
author: Raquelcap
reviewBody: elegant and cozy restaurant. we went one night for dinner with a couple of friends and we managed to enjoy it a lot. the food is very good and the decor is very classic. worth knowing.

title: Great restaurant in Fortaleza
author: Elba A
reviewBody: Great location of the restaurant, super nice, not counting the attentive service of the waiter Sidney. We enjoyed a very tasty international shrimp, of excellent quality, and very well served, it could only have come a little warmer. The dessert was a hot baked coconut with ice cream to eat praying! Great.

title: Excellent meal
author: RodrigoR1291
reviewBody: Excellent food, I recommend the Bacalhau no Azeite, very good, worth it, reasonable price, nice place

title: Button
author: KARULINI
reviewBody: Typical boteco paulistano ... The mix of dumplings are delicious: cod, sun meat and rice. Very good place for those who want to watch football games, especially Corinthians, due to the large number of fans who were there.

title: Quality panel
author: Marcelo d
reviewBody: The O Panelão restaurant is a typical Bahian food and very well prepared. Very homemade and high quality food. I really liked it !!!

title: Best Korean food EVERRRR
author: djmarimel
reviewBody: Very good Korean restaurant, sensational service, attendant explains how the grill works and cuts the meat, there are many side dishes, all very delicious. The flagship of the house is the Rib and the Duck, I tried the rib and the picanha, the seasoning is really wonderful, we finished the rib quickly. The price is a little steep but it is well worth it. We paid R $ 120 but the price is for 3 people peacefully, if there are 4 women who eat a little too much. All dishes come with salad, rice, omelet, salted gelatin and much more. I recommend it and I'm already dying to go back.

title: Excellent place
author: igormG7950WV
reviewBody: Although the price is a little steep, the experience is worth it. The dishes are special and the service is excellent. I recommend!

title: Assorted skewers
author: PereiraDecio
reviewBody: The place is small, but cozy. Offers a good draft beer and some Japanese beers. Its main attraction are several types of skewers. Tiny ones are reasonably priced. Others, like Okura and Nassu, that is, okra and aubergine, are interesting but very expensive for the type of vegetable. Offers other Japanese dishes.

title: Place to regret having gone
author: carlapfz
reviewBody: Poor place, although expensive. Rotation at 90.00 and has no shimeji ... The service is poor and very relaxed. We feel that they do not have much intention to please customers. At the tables there are pencils and commands for customers to mark their orders. You mark it, give it to the waiter, sit down and wait. A lot is wrong. When it comes, justice is done, the food is good. But I don't think it's worth the effort or the expense. There are better and more friendly places. I recommend crossing the street and going to the Portuguese bar Manoel and Joaquim, right in front. Don't waste time or money.

title: Simple ambience with fine cuisine
author: Maria Eliza C
reviewBody: The restaurant offers a varied cuisine and the dishes are neat. I believe, however, that the environment could be a little more comfortable, to match the excellent gastronomy.

address.streetAddress: Rua Rio Grande do Sul 1236 Santo Agostinho

title: Great fish away from the sea
author: c_ssiaa
reviewBody: For those who live in BH, far from the sea and love to eat good fish at fair prices, the right place is here: Fried fish! The place, simple, but the wonderful fish! The tilapia cake is a must!

title: Top !
author: rseta
reviewBody: Excellent, the starters and the main ones are very tops !!! Worth it ! The restaurant is small, with some tables and a shared counter. Good prices !!

title: Very tasty pizza
author: ricardooliveira67
reviewBody: Yesterday I arrived at the store and ordered a pizza all over Marguerita and despite the queue it left on time ... the very friendly attendants felt welcomed ... I am very satisfied and I intend to return more often with my family.

address.streetAddress: Av. Washington Soares, 85 Praça de Alimentação - 2º Piso

title: Exotic delights from Pará
author: elianevalcacio
reviewBody: Coxinha with pupunha batter, duck patty in tucupi and I don't know what else. Everything delicious. Get ready: spending a week in Belém equals a few extra pounds

title: Perfect
author: Roberta O
reviewBody: Best shrimp in strawberry I have ever eaten. Cozy environment. Service note 10. Waiting when full is worth it and is always faster than indicated. Secure parking.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: It came around and the food
author: None
reviewBody: The vegetables were so prepared it is difficult to identify them. The fish was not much better. A salad buffet for 24 reais consists of 5 lettuce leaves and two slices of tomato. Bread also costs 24 reais. Shame because the restaurant's decor is nice. AVOID.

address.streetAddress: Rua Terceira Ordem de São Francisco, 8 Pelourinho

title: Special place
author: maizaluanna
reviewBody: Cuiabá is to be congratulated as a new kitchen corner restaurant and Comfort has been 4 times and I really liked it. Food, service and environment are in perfect harmony.

title: Sensational! !!!!
author: JulioJ497
reviewBody: Place of excellent taste, very good food In my opinion the best restaurant in Natal. !!!!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Odilon Gomes de Lima 1772 Bairro Cidade Jardim

title: Good option
author: Joao M
reviewBody: Elegant restaurant, class A, with a great table of cold cuts and good meats. First-rate service. Prices compatible with the location.

title: Best fishmonger in Cuiabá / MT
author: danyloa
reviewBody: I recommend this fish shop to everyone, its rodizio is complete with excellent fish and recipes, among them: alligator, matrinxã and the painted fish. The value is a little salty, but in the end the cost the benefit is very good.

title: Excellent dishes and service
author: BrunoFonseca88
reviewBody: Very attentive waiters (Laudelino and Antonio), concerned with delivering quality and perfection in the preparation of the dishes. Accuracy at the point of meat and seasoning.

title: Very good
author: RodrigoFernandes1977
reviewBody: Great place for you to spend a whole day, can be alone or with family. You eat well and have fun. The only thing though is the presence of call girls surrounding the gringos, but nothing that bothers a family to enjoy the day

address.streetAddress: Av. Zeze Diogo 3125 Praia Do Futuro

title: WONDERFUL!!!
author: Celsoaprendiz
reviewBody: Place where you eat very well, super variety! Excellent service and I am particularly grateful to João de Marechal and Godoy for excellent waiters and expert connoisseurs of the cuts presented.

address.streetAddress: R. Prof. Ernani de Figueiredo Magalhaes, 41 Cruz das Almas

title: Crab eating
author: 641erikac
reviewBody: It is our place. We always schedule to eat the best crab in Salvador, at Cely's cabin. Everything was very tasty, I recommend all the restaurant food at this restaurant.

title: A stuffed file ....
author: gazrodrigues
reviewBody: An incomparable flavor the Filet stuffed with sauce served. Juicy, soft, and delicious taste. And there is also a file with cream, equally tasty

title: Excellent!
author: FerPVH
reviewBody: For me, the best restaurant for dinner, at 2, with friends, with family ... fair prices for what you deliver. The entire menu is excellent, and the atmosphere is unique, especially the cellar. More than recommended.

title: Best happy hour place with friends
author: wladmirDmarco
reviewBody: Pleasant atmosphere, although very crowded on weekends, with a very diverse menu, delicious food, responsive service ... I recommend the spicy lamb sausage ... My second home !!!

title: Show
author: 21Van
reviewBody: I was there last year, at my brother's wedding. They provide a space for events, which is incredible for holding events. The view is beautiful. The service and food, wonderful.

address.streetAddress: Setor de Clubes Esportivos Sul, Trecho 2 , Conj. 41, s/n Asa Sul

title: Quiet night
author: MarleneDAlmeida
reviewBody: I liked it very muchPleasant place with a tasty snack, highlighting the sururu broth and the sun meat hideout, a delight Service in reasonable time, with attentive waiters, good taste in decoration and quality electronic music, frequented by young people, children and middle age, has for everyone, on the shore watching the moonlight.

address.streetAddress: Av. Silvio Carlos Viana, 27 Ponta Verde

title: Different place, pleasant atmosphere, beautiful view!
author: Isadora C
reviewBody: Excellent place to go with friends and have a few drinks. Customer service note 10! Modern and elegant decor, good music, beautiful people! The price is in the middle of the best places in Goiânia and the house leaves nothing to be desired if purchased from houses in SP or RJ! Worth knowing!

address.streetAddress: Avenida T 10 N 208 Terraço Ed. New times square. St. Bueno

title: Good D +
author: OcimarMondego
reviewBody: Very good restaurant, with variety of all types of shrimp preparations, where the rodizio is the highlight ...

title: Already was better
author: adrianoo175
reviewBody: When it opened, I could say that it served the best picanha in Goiania, however, over time the quality of the dishes dropped, as well as the service. I think it can improve to be like it used to be.

title: Excellent in everything !!!!
author: T6569TYcarolinec
reviewBody: We went with a group of friends and we only have compliments, the location is great, the service is very good and the food ???? Our one of the best japas in SP for sure.

title: Wonderful!
author: grislene P
reviewBody: The restaurant is sensational and the service is impeccable. Without a doubt the best shrimp we ate in Natal. In addition the portions are quite plentiful. They feed 3 people without a doubt. For dessert we had a glass of Romeo and Juliet which is surprisingly delicious. The price of the dish (average of R $ 120.00 for 3 people) is fair considering what is offered. I recommend everyone to go to Natal.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Wonderful
author: lucianosteil
reviewBody: Great location, on the edge of Ponta Verde beach. Good service. Great food. Background music or live. A little pricey but worth it. I just didn't like the coconut water that comes in the glass.

address.streetAddress: Av. Silvio Carlos Viana, 27 Ponta Verde

title: Natureba
author: MarcioCamelo
reviewBody: Ideal place for those looking for a healthier diet, as it has light snacks and various juices.

title: Unfortunate
author: Marcelo N
reviewBody: Today was the second and last attempt to have lunch at this restaurant. The first time I disagreed with the point of the meat and was informed by the maitre d 'that it was so and that the waiter should have informed me earlier. After much conversation I managed to change the dish. In today's attempt, I stayed for 2 hours waiting for the order without any satisfaction from the team that served us. Only after the complaint of some tables and also ours did we receive our dishes that were cold. It is unfortunate to go to a restaurant that charges disproportionate value for the quality of the service it provides. I don't come back or recommend it.

title: Pleasant at a good price
author: robgiglios
reviewBody: Good, tasty food, well served, at a fair price. Pleasant restaurant environment; despite being on a canal street, there is a closed, air-conditioned space unemune to possible external odors. There are days with live music.

title: Marvelous skewer
author: jumariscal
reviewBody: Best quality skewer !! Fair price. Attendance note 1000 !!! The Owner is always present and very charismatic !! Congratulations!!

title: Delicious home-style food!
author: Manoela O
reviewBody: Great restaurant for those who enjoy healthy food! Simple and cozy atmosphere! Very affordable price!

address.streetAddress: Rua Fonte do Boi, 3B Rio Vermelho

title: Italian flavor and cozy atmosphere
author: jco41
reviewBody: I went on a birthday at the place, a closed environment for 30 guests, well decorated and we ate a carvery and pizza with a genuine Italian flavor.

address.streetAddress: Av. Sen. Filinto Müller, 220 Duque De Caxias

title: Relaxed
author: 922gimenar
reviewBody: Jair's bar is a traditional spot in Barão Geraldo. Always with a lot of movement, live music and delicious food. Famous for the coxinhas, it also offers options of mixed and hidden portions that are delicious. They charge for parking in front of the bar, and for large groups the ideal is to book.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Longuinho Lemes do Prado 91 Centro

title: Great place
author: VanRCruz
reviewBody: The hamburger is not the best in the world, but it is very tasty! A cozy and ideal place to go with friends to snack on the basis of a good conversation and cordial service. I recommend!

title: Great weather
author: FlavioBlau
reviewBody: Very spacious, airy or air-conditioned. It caters for all tastes. Varied menu and traditional pizza flavors with. Very thin pasta, where the local marketing and eating by hand, I preferred the traditional flatware. But surprising was the table, traditional petit gateau, dulce de leche cake and the ice cream was tapioca with peanuts! Fantastic, the traditional was far behind !!

address.streetAddress: Rua João Damasceno 21 Quadra 9 – Ponta do Farol

title: Great food, fair price
author: Fabiolaloureiro
reviewBody: Friendly waiters, stay near the window to look at the view of Barra beach. Try the crawfish ravioli!

title: Crab of the hour.
author: Marquinhos D
reviewBody: Every Sunday, rain or shine, I'm in Barramares to eat a wonderful crab, both in water and salt and in coconut milk, it's worth it.
userLocation: Natal, Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil

title: Fantastic place to rest from the excursion marathon
author: leandrom4
reviewBody: Very beautiful hotel, offering very comfortable sun loungers on the edge of an almost deserted and beautiful beach. We went on the last day of the trip and it served to slow down to return home. A fee is paid, which I do not remember for sure.

address.streetAddress: Rodovia AL 101 Norte Condomínio Angra de Ipioca

title: Tradition in the center of Manaus
author: normafo
reviewBody: It is a common bar but with an enviable location, starting at 5 pm, you literally put your tables on the street. It serves good beer brands and has interesting snacks at the stand that is set up next to the parking space.

title: Great!!!
author: Jerd A
reviewBody: Great food in perfect surroundings. Any dish that you order will like it very much. The shrimp risotto was the best I've ever eaten, but with the crisis it's not so good. It was just like the others.

title: very good
author: Rafael L
reviewBody: the price is affordable, the snacks are very tasty, the service is efficient and agile, it is worth checking out.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Brigadeiro Luis Antonio 454 Bela Vista

title: Family atmosphere.
author: paulobuenomorais
reviewBody: Buffet with a wide variety of dishes, and self-service. You pay per kilo. Reasonable price, and not too big table space. Food with homemade flavor, no exaggeration in spices, good service. Good for lunch with friends, family or business.

title: Very cool place!
author: hntcft
reviewBody: Very nice restaurant, very well structured menu and good wine list ... On the day I went I didn't have the chosen wine cellar, but the other option was equally good. Worth the visit ... Just a GPS to get there, as the path can be confusing.

title: Friend's birthday
author: fabi_oe176
reviewBody: Very cool, sensational family atmosphere! Good service and very tasty and varied food! The price is good and consistent with the location, I have been 2 times and will be back many more times.

title: Typically German!
author: Anderson M
reviewBody: Typical German restaurant, from the decoration, dishes and clothing of the staff. Ordering a certain type of draft beer, he "wins" a small mug for decoration.

address.streetAddress: Rua Doutor Claudino dos Santos 63 Largo da Ordem

title: REASONABLE SERVICE
author: Paradise734360
reviewBody: It wasn't the best, the place was a little dirty, things were broken, I didn't really like the atmosphere. The cappucino I ordered I didn’t like it, they don’t serve breakfast with croassant as in the bigger places.

title: Buffet
author: 286danielaw
reviewBody: Located in the lower city neighborhood. It is a very family restaurant. Buffet very filling. Free parking.

title: Very good.
author: Cristian R
reviewBody: Excellent food, great service, very nice lugat, good prices since each dish is for two to three people. . Recommended.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Delicious !!!!!
author: Euroaventura
reviewBody: Typical Italian restaurant, very cozy atmosphere, excellent food, very generous portion, good wine list. As for the service ... simply IMPECCABLE ... a rare pattern to be found. Extremely polite, helpful and kind staff. Note 1000

title: Specular pasta !!
author: Kopaka
reviewBody: Delicious pasta dishes, and very well prepared. Pasta, breads and homemade desserts. Perfect service.

title: Very beautiful place
author: ValeriaMiyazaki
reviewBody: Starting with the very different architecture seen from the outside, the view that the restaurant has. The decor is very tasteful. Service note 10. We tried the vegetarian moqueca and dessert cassava cake with rapadura ice cream and tapioca dices closed the delicious evening.

address.streetAddress: Setor de Clubes Esportivos Sul, Trecho 2 , Conj. 41, s/n Asa Sul

title: Best Paraense Lunch
author: andersonb10
reviewBody: One of the best places I have ever visited in Belém, not only for the wonderful food but also for the service, I was treated very well ... I will always return

address.streetAddress: Avenida Boulevard Castilhos Franca N 744 Esquina com a Avenida Presidente Vargas

title: Perfect!
author: Vinícius A
reviewBody: First class service, light and tasty pizza, price not so salty compared to other environments of the same level! Better than that is difficult!

title: Excellent
author: victorncb
reviewBody: Delicious pasta, quality filling and sensational sauce! The service is great and the pizza is one of the best I've ever eaten.

title: Disappointment
author: ofredmeira
reviewBody: Food is not totally fresh, service very confused and unprepared, very beautiful place but I will not be back.

title: Great pizzeria.
author: LarryB1957
reviewBody: For those who want to taste a wonderful pizza, you should visit this little Bistro in Cidade Baixa. Great service, cold Paulaner beer. Old, small and elegant mansion in a super charming street.

title: Best restaurant in the northeast
author: andersong524
reviewBody: As the title says, this is the best restaurant in the entire Northeast. Plenty of food and dessert options. Great!

title: Excellent experience!
author: TCandido
reviewBody: Very nice and well located restaurant. Service was excellent and the food very good. It is worth the experience of Asian cuisine, with due reservations. Overall, excellent and worth the visit.

address.streetAddress: Av. Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek 627 Vila Nova Conceição

title: Good cost-benefit
author: Gabriel_Pro08
reviewBody: A restaurant that offers good value for money. Good food. It is not a very varied rotation, but it suits the basics well. Very good service. I recommend.

title: Very good.
author: Matheus C
reviewBody: Certainly one of the best Japanese foods in Porto Alegre. For those who like it worth going, the price is not the best but the food is!

address.streetAddress: Rua Des. Espiridião de Lima Medeiros, 317 Três Figueiras

title: A great experience
author: Giovana C
reviewBody: With the proposal of bringing haute cuisine to the table, the restaurant in Rio de Janeiro surprised us in all aspects, quality of food, service and price consistent with what is proposed (especially when compared to the options found nearby). Waiters always ready, attentive and kind. We went on Easter week and at the farewell we were given wonderful chocolate tasting! Worth the visit!

title: Nice place
author: AlexYoMo
reviewBody: It is worth for the environment and the best view of the city of Belo Horizonte. Meats are quite normal, not bad, but far from magnificent. The service is courteous, but there is a lack of standards and training. You cannot charge the same price for example at a top steakhouse in the city. But it is worth the visit.

title: Typical food
author: Selma M
reviewBody: Excellent restaurant, good service, cleanliness, speed to serve and the main delicious and well served food! Wonderful sun meat!

title: Very good
author: fabiovascodagama
reviewBody: A rich environment, rich in diversities. A big house that offers a little of everything, even music you can find there. Contains good prices for books, spices ...

title: Great option in the center of the river
author: rafaelafsampaio
reviewBody: Cozy atmosphere, delicious food! The escalopinho with piamontese rice is wonderful! Sauteed potatoes are great and you can find good wines at reasonable prices. It's worth the visit!

address.streetAddress: Rua Alcântara Machado, 48 - loja A Centro

title: Dinner
author: mait_f2019
reviewBody: 02/02 we went to meet Miss Saigon. Great Vietnamese restaurant that surprised us positively! Spectacular cuisine and place.

address.streetAddress: Alameda dos Jurupis 1374 Próximo ao Shopping Ibirapuera em 400 metros e Metrô Lilás-Estação Eucaliptos em 500 metros.

title: Fantastic carvery
author: PSMarques
reviewBody: Fish rotation with lots of variety and a lot of flavor. Dishes really well prepared and with a fantastic flavor. Great service!

title: Lunch
author: Wandisley F
reviewBody: Carne de Sol Sertaneja. The food was very good, just the manioc grated on top that I didn't like. The pineapple juice was excellent. The atmosphere was very good, good music and the service was excellent. Waiters: Abraão, Felipe, Paulinho, Mariano and Isaías.

title: folks
author: Renata V
reviewBody: I really liked the buffet, the food in general. Good service., Clean place., The environment just needs more fans or air conditioning.

address.streetAddress: Rua Joaquim Alves, 160 Praia de Iracema

title: Good by tradition
author: WagnerOrlandi
reviewBody: The place will always be a tourist spot in sp, the square that is located is friendly. The restaurant is ok, nothing extraordinary and with a traditional atmosphere like the waiters. Bauru and other dishes I tried are well made. Just this. I think you need to reinvent yourself.

title: Holiday
author: Davison S
reviewBody: Very good service by Balbino, very attentive and helpful. Pleasant and comfortable environment. Delicious food and very well served.

address.streetAddress: Qd SCN, Qd 06, Conjunto A Shopping ID

title: Lunch between friends
author: Rodrigo L
reviewBody: Good service performed by the waiter Júlio Cesar, Gabriel and Abraão. Good food and pleasant atmosphere.

title: Good pizza!
author: Quézia C
reviewBody: You can break the branch for those who live near Campo Grande, Hipodromo, crossroads ... Anyone who wants a good pizza can order there and it is not that expensive. There are other franchises in the pizzeria too.

title: A piece of Italy in Recife
author: OtavioM101
