reviewBody: It was a Friday, the eve of a long holiday, when friend and confrere Rômulo, vice-president of the Italian Chamber of Commerce, invited me to join a Petit Committee that would visit this restaurant. I invited a friend and at 9pm we arrived at Ristorante. We were already enchanted with the 1st entry, a festival of bruschettas in Italian bread made at the Ristorante itself. The main dishes were so pleasing that they ended up being shared by diners. I recommend the oxtail with watercress or the alla fiorentina steak. For dessert I suggest the unmissable tiramisu.

address.streetAddress: Estr. Real do Poço, 177 Poço da Panela

title: a haven
author: Camila R
reviewBody: Delicious homemade food, great service and fair price. besides the place without being super nice, it's worth it.

address.streetAddress: Rua Marechal Floriano Peixoto 766 Caminho dos Antiquários

title: Wonderful barbecue
author: Bruna O
reviewBody: If you are looking for a delicious barbecue, you can be sure that it is a great choice. Excellent food, and great service.

address.streetAddress: Av República do Líbano, 256 Shopping RioMar Recife

title: Delicious!!!
author: Vania C
reviewBody: Food abundant, tasty, excellent cost benefit !! Good environment to be with friends and family. Be sure to eat the picanha, the dish for 3 people serves 5 adults.

address.streetAddress: 150 - Qd. Rua 1008 23 Lt. 8 Setor Pedro Ludovico

title: Family restaurant!
author: Wendel L
reviewBody: Familiar and cozy place. Quality service and food. Congratulations to the owners !!! When you're there, you don't feel like going back, because the place is inhospitable and completely different from everything you have in São Paulo. Located next to the Forest Reserve, there is still the social work that is done with the City Hall of Mairiporã, with Health Post and College, without getting any compensation from that. Just look for Dona Iracema and talk to her. Even though she is the owner, she stays in the kitchen preparing wonderful snacks and is always on hand to resolve any doubts and serve customers, telling the story of the place. It is worthwhile to go to mass in the Chapel of São José Operário, which is their property, but is given to the Heralds of the Gospel who do a wonderful job!

address.streetAddress: Estrada Municipal Prefeito Dr. Sakis Tellian, 3000 Serra Da Cantareira

title: Delicious and only food
author: RAFAEL G
reviewBody: Simple place with excellent food, kebabs with unique flavor, incomparable. The location is very good, with no parking problems. The big problem is the service, which I found very weak, the attendants seem to be "dying", we wait a long time to be served (this is because the place was not busy) and even more until the dishes are ready. It is worth it for the quality of the food, dispensable by the advance.

address.streetAddress: Rua T-32, 275 - quadra 12, lote 12 Setor Bueno

title: Cool atmosphere, great food, fair price!
author: Juliana Matos F
reviewBody: Excellent snacks! At happy hour there was a beer promotion, very good! My friends and I went to visit the city at the time of São João, everything was decorated, very good! We hit the spot there every afternoon! There is a playground for children too! I just didn't like the sun meat in the cream, it tastes like sour cream and whey to me.

title: Disappointment
author: polianabz
reviewBody: Yesterday we went to the restaurant, never again ... I read several negative comments about the restaurant and especially about the size of the portions, but I had liked the Restaurant Week menu. I arrived and immediately asked the waiter about the portion size, since I had read several negative comments - he said that the entire menu and the chef had changed, so there was no need to worry. We ordered the Restaurant Week menu and was shocked by the portion sizes. The main course didn't even have 50 g of meat. We went out and had to complete lunch elsewhere, I had never been there, especially in a Menu of the Week. The food is just Ok and the portion size eliminates any possibility of going back to the restaurant.

title: TOP!
author: Juliana F
reviewBody: The best seafood restaurant I've ever been to (and I like that, huh). Huge dishes (4 people) a fantastic seasoning. Giant prawns! Soooo worth it!

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Attendance
author: Anderson A
reviewBody: Great food, atmosphere and service, especially the waiter Renato who served us very well. They are to be congratulated!

title: The best Christmas restaurant!
author: adilsons950
reviewBody: If you like a sophisticated restaurant, luxury service and delicious food, you need to visit (and eat!) At this restaurant! I consider it the best Christmas restaurant!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Odilon Gomes de Lima 1772 Bairro Cidade Jardim

title: Juja - delicious
author: MauricioR1483
reviewBody: I arrived before the house opened and without reservation, I was well received and I ate wonderfully well. Surprised me ! Congratulations to the team and the owner. See photos

itemReviewed.name: Casa de Juja - Ateliê de Gastronomia

title: Cozy place and delicious food
author: lucafilho
reviewBody: The place is a big old house. Guarding the ancient architecture that contrasts with the skyscrapers of Sampa. The place is cozy. Attentive waiters and very good food!

title: Very good
author: Marcio M
reviewBody: Good service, sunbed rental for 10 reais, cheap beer, snacks at the same prices as the others.

title: Excellent Italian restaurant
author: Annakasg
reviewBody: Perfect service, wonderful food. Both homemade pasta, pepper sauces and thin crust pizzas are a delight. Super recommended for those looking for a well made food and a place with first class service.

title: worth it
author: filipe a
reviewBody: cost benefit is great ,, you eat well for a low price. the service is excellent. the place is simple but well conditioned. it is worth it especially for those who want to save money and eat well!

title: Cozy place and great food
author: moisesb959
reviewBody: One of the best restaurants I have ever seen in commerce. A wide variety of food and at a fair price. On Fridays they put live music at lunchtime with an excellent quality of repertoire. I was surprised. Excellent location. Visit you will not regret it.

title: Tasty!
author: Q3329IJgabrielam
reviewBody: I liked the proposal of the place .. but it is not a place to eat and chat. You order, pay and the order is ready quickly. The turnover is great .. the hamburger is delicious and the price is nice. I will definitely come back.

title: AMAZING
author: pizzariasanfe
reviewBody: Perfect service, best place ever visited in Fortaleza, nice place, warm atmosphere we love the visit, very well prepared dishes.

title: Wonderful view
author: l_ciogr
reviewBody: Simple place, but with a wonderful view, great service and a good variation in the seafood item.

address.streetAddress: Rua Helena Muller 30 Bairro Jesus de Nazareth

title: Well more or less
author: Eduardo V
reviewBody: Maybe it was our bad luck, but the meats (entrecot) that we ordered to the point came VERY rare and, as if that were not enough, hard. In a meat restaurant, the least you expect is a cut of noble meats with tenderness and flavor. For us, it was a very bad impression. As for the service, we can say that it was regular.

address.streetAddress: Rua Ten. Cel. Fabrício Pilar, 791 Mont Serrat

title: I loved it!
author: ClarissaB181
reviewBody: The place is super simple, but the food is very delicious and I loved that it has a super family service.

title: Beautiful ornamentation
author: Gilberto P
reviewBody: Great restaurant located on the edge of Atalaia beach, and was decorated for the World Cup games. Excellent food and satisfactory service.

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont - Passarela do Caranguejo Praia de Atalaia

title: A delight
author: Raquel V
reviewBody: Good food, cold beer, pleasant atmosphere. Good for a good conversation, meeting friends and enjoying a skewer.

title: Lunch with lcinete
author: robertnascimento
reviewBody: I went last Friday to visit the restaurant and I was positively surprised by the restaurant. I didn't give anything for the entrance to the place, but the meal I ate was excellent. Everything, flavor, escalope point, etc. I will return with my wife to taste other dishes. Thank you for the treatment.

title: Farm
author: alessandravgs
reviewBody: He went to Fazendola a few times for a pizza rotation, always very good. But they wanted to invest in Japanese and I have already eaten twice and none of them left me satisfied. Try to go outside that is in front of the restaurant!

title: Buffet of Broths
author: MS0ares
reviewBody: For those who like broths, Ideal has a buffet on Monday for all tastes. But I went to taste the pork rib on the barbecue. I was a little disappointed in it, it tastes very good, but the barbecue sauce was very thin.

title: Great experience
author: pmnoc
reviewBody: Wines at a fair price, tasty food, correct service. Dishes take a while, but excusable for the good quality.

title: Beers from all over the world!
author: mariapaulademattoss
reviewBody: Delirium is a bar in Ipanema with beers from all over the world and for all tastes! In addition to the private label, it has a very wide menu for drink lovers! Order a portion of gorgonzola pastries to accompany and enjoy!

title: location with wonderful views. ok service. ok dish.
author: grazielemx
reviewBody: The place has a beautiful view to the sea and the service is good. The starters are good, like the fillet carved with potatoes. The fish grilled in the sauce I found a bit tasteless.

title: Well more or less ...
author: Zenilda P
reviewBody: I don't know if the problem was going with a lot of expectations, but I was disappointed. I ordered a pasta that was without any seasoning. At the next table, two people had asked for the suggestion of the day and called the waiter back because, the dish that promised a fish with shrimp sauce, had no shrimp ... after the two complained about the kitchen, they added the prawns to the dish . At our table, whoever ordered the fish said that the dish was more bad than "more or less". Nice atmosphere, well decorated, but the food, in my opinion, is not worth the queue at the entrance.

title: Best winery in Maceió!
author: lorenzatanure
reviewBody: Varied menu and excellence in seafood, the lobster sauce with black pasta and vegetables is spectacular! Refined atmosphere, beautiful decor, installed capacity to receive large numbers of people. Top service! I recommend.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Doutor Antônio Gomes de Barros 150 Jatiuca

title: Meeting with friends
author: silmafarma
reviewBody: They could organize themselves so that the people who wait for the table do not circulate in the restaurant, waiting by the tables.

title: Caprice to meet! Excellence in cooking!
author: Pastora Maria E... L
reviewBody: Going to Natal this restaurant has to be visited. The waiting line lives up! Wonderful service! eye-pleasing space. Great food. Generous portion. Unforgettable food. Fair price for what you offer. super recommend!
userLocation: Poços de Caldas, Minas Gerais, Brazil

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Simple but with good food
author: FloraAbdalla
reviewBody: Khadije is a mix of Lebanese food delivery, small restaurant and emporium. Very simple but clean place. The waitress is very friendly and asks. The sfiha is tasty, the fried kibe a little bit massive but tasty. Hummus, very good grape leaf cigar. We brought some sweets home and they were also good. I even found semolina sweets (Hricet Lauz, grandma spoke Heristilouse) and remembered my childhood. If you want to go to an Arab restaurant, without ostentation, just to taste the cuisine, it's really worth it. Price ..... not unlike the most highly regarded. In fact, this is common when the cuisine is international.

title: Arnaldo's Steakhouse, Av, Prudente de Moraes - Natal-RN
author: Luciana_natalice
reviewBody: Well located restaurant where the main meat is hot meat. Portions are well served. Ambience is a little warm, as it has no air conditioning.

title: Terrible! Very bad service!
author: emilianoportela
reviewBody: We didn't even eat such neglect with which we were treated. Sitting for half an hour, they didn't bother to put towels on tables or take orders. After half an hour, when we thought they were going to bring the starters, they came to ask us if we had asked for fish or chicken bait. Horrible! It has to improve a lot to be called a restaurant.

title: Good and well priced
author: FernandaBucker
reviewBody: A good restaurant on the edge of Atalaia. We ordered the shrimp in the coconut, which is served with rice with raisins and mashed potatoes. Good dish and good size to satisfy 2 people. Price of the dish around 65 reais. I do not know if it was the day, but it disappointed us because the caipvodka was missing and the ladies' bathroom was wide open, without cleaning (around 2 pm on a Saturday).

title: Best of bh
author: VitorBomfim
reviewBody: The menu is lean and the prices are high, but consistent with the quality of the dishes and service. The service is uncluttered and efficient, the wine list has options with affordable prices, I went on the great rose Virgile (R $ 60). At the beginning, we ordered salmon tartar (good) and tomato tartine (delicious). For dinner, we eat curry shrimp with pumpkin ravioli and pork jowl with manioc, both a must. For dessert, a sensational chocolate tart with fleur de sel and caramel.

title: Friendly Italian restaurant
author: None
reviewBody: The atmosphere was pleasant and the food was great. Definitely a dining experience. There is even a band playing classic Italian songs.

title: Excellent !!!
author: orlandopedrofilho
reviewBody: Well located, easy to park, cozy place, excellent service, well prepared menu and compatible price.

title: Visit to cocôbanbu
author: Thompson B
reviewBody: Great service, the waiter Dessio was super attentive. To Dessio and Dourado team, congratulations on your service.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Doutor Chucri Zaidan, 902 Shopping Market Place

title: Master
author: Marta C
reviewBody: Restaurant located in the Tropical shopping mall, with excellent access and excellent quality service. Sushi doesn't even have to say it's splendid.

address.streetAddress: Av Colares Moreira, 400 - Bl F Cs 3 Renascença

title: Perfect Pizza
author: diegor145
reviewBody: Anyone who knows me knows that I'm a big pizza lover. I've had the chance to try several pizzerias in different locations in Brazil and abroad and I can say that Nono Ludovico is the best of all in the rodizio format. The flavors and the preparation of the pizzas are careful and take quality ingredients. The wood oven helps to make it even better. The wait staff is good.

title: GOOD MEALS
author: gloria f
reviewBody: Very good restaurant, excellent service, great location, affordable price, varied food has serv service, very tasty rodizio varied type of meat, worth checking out.

title: best parmegianna I've ever eaten!
author: Andrea A
reviewBody: very good atmosphere, despite finding the sofa tables very close to each other. mega fast service. best parmegianna I've ever eaten. it's just a little bad to find a place to stop, other than that, it's perfect. I always come back!

title: almojanta
author: MessiasAngeloF
reviewBody: Spectacular service. Especially by my friend Manoel and his entire team. Pleasant atmosphere, air conditioning at the right temperature.

title: Wonderful
author: fearaujos
reviewBody: He was at home on a full Saturday and we were hungry ... At the time we remember, let's go to the Ritz ... The laziness hit and in the blink of an eye we remember that he was delivering. We ordered a Gongorzola Hamburger with rice balls and a main dish Linguine de Zucchini with Shrimp. Everything was hot in just 40 minutes .. That's why I LOVE the quality Ritz always at your fingertips.

title: The face of Rio!
author: Bethania C
reviewBody: Nice place, relaxed, healthy food, varied juices (I love the tangerine). Good place to go in the late afternoon after the beach. Your dog is welcome here! There are always beautiful people! The açaí is great too! Really like!
userLocation: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

author: Viviane B

author: curtics
reviewBody: Looking for an alternative to dinner, I came across Yozo. Well recommended on your facebook page, we decided to visit. And it is not that the recommendation was true !!! Great service, well prepared and super fresh food (more than important in a Japanese restaurant) and super pleasant atmosphere. I liked it and recommend it.

title: SAME
author: Cristiane R
reviewBody: Just like everyone else, including the lack of cleanliness in the bathrooms, in addition to the few always dirty, it has good parking and is easily accessible for those who are driving, for those on foot it is half desert at night

title: Reasonable - Service leaves much to be desired
author: 520isabelt
reviewBody: We visited the restaurant on a Friday. As the place is small and we arrived relatively early, we didn't have to wait long to be able to sit. Although the food is tasty, the service leaves much to be desired. We even saw a queue fight because the waiters hadn’t organized the waiting list properly. The wine list is also extremely limited and the waiter who served us did not know how to answer a question about the types of wines on the menu. Nor did he offer to call anyone who knew. Anyway, nothing special about the restaurant.

title: Excellent in everything!
author: Aimé Fleury P
reviewBody: The restaurant is excellent in everything: service, quality of food, price, location. It is impossible to go to Natal and not know this restaurant ... it is an unmissable option for lunch in the capital. I ate a dish with shrimp and basil sauce very good ... it is also worth mentioning the starter shrimp pastries, excellent !!! I recommend and will be back.

title: Nice food
author: thaisd67
reviewBody: The food is good, but I don't think anything spectacular. Environment I don't like it very much, I think it's a little tight ..

title: Good on Tuesdays

reviewBody: On Tuesdays there is a promotion, you buy a crab and take two. The second crab is small and the first is medium.

title: Perfect
author: viridiana2015
reviewBody: Cevicheria with perfect food, very attentive service. I loved everything I ate. very tasty ceviche, great starters.

title: Disappointed!
author: deborahborges
reviewBody: I have come several times and have already indicated to many people because it had a differential: an optional refill combo with rustic potato and onion. I did not come for a few months and when I returned, I asked for the combo and told the waitress clearly that I could already bring the potato AND the onion, before the sandwich. They only brought the potato, and when we charged the onion, a surprise: there was no longer her inclusion in the combo. We talked explaining what had happened, that we were already customers and we didn't know about the change, since it wasn't as expressed on the menu, and that at the time of the order, we made it clear that we wanted both, and even so, nobody had informed us about the change. As there were two of us and we ordered 2 combos and we had only consumed one potato each (which are part of a refill, to eat as much, ask as many as you want) we asked to see the possibility of canceling a combo and leaving only one, so we would not ask for more potato and the onion that is now sold separately. The waitress also talked to the owner, who denied it at the same time and did not bother to at least apologize for the disagreement caused by the unpreparedness of employees. Being treated well, in my opinion, is crucial to the success of an establishment, I was not upset with the denial, but with the way it was given and who dealt with the situation. From then on, only disappointment. Potato that was once delicious, soaked. Since we ordered the combo more for the onion, we ordered the portion separately and it has nothing to do with the flavor from before. The onion tastes like nothing. If that weren't enough, the delay for delivering the sandwich was 1 hour and 40 minutes, because they put the orders of the uber eats / ifood staff in front. Finally, I gave up and asked to cancel. I've never had to do that in my life. I left without eating the sandwich and only ate potato once because it never comes to your table. I don't recommend it to anyone else and I won't be back. Shame!!!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Alexandre de Morais Quadra 28 Lote 03 Parque Amazonia

title: Wonderful
author: RenataVilepa
reviewBody: This restaurant is not well known, but it is worth the visit. It is important to make a reservation, because you are a frequent visitor. The atmosphere is super romantic, it is in front of a square in Joá, and the food, oh, no talk. Delicious. The pasta has no equal is to eat while praying and the dessert is even better. The service is noda 1000. And the price is right..Then it's to taste and enjoy ..

title: Galeto note 1000
author: salolinhares
reviewBody: It is very worthwhile to know this restaurant, as it has a 1000 variety and is very large. Great choice in salads and the meats are great.

title: It's already part of history
author: imfontes
reviewBody: I've been going to this restaurant since I started dating my wife. There is always a tasty and varied menu. There is a lot of good in the new menu, but as expected, the price has gone up a bit and is on the edge of an expensive place in my view. But it’s still worth it.

title: Family lunch
author: Marcio W
reviewBody: Excellent service. I totally recommend it. Many thanks to Jonceliano for contributing to this. Success.

title: Go hungry
author: ernmd
reviewBody: for 2 people at lunch and we ordered codfish balls and a dish for 2 codfish. Generous dish for 4. Excellent quality and attentive service. Weakness: bathroom - pray p not having many customers.

title: Wonderful!!
author: Cláudia T
reviewBody: Excellent service. Thought about every detail. The best Carpaccio ever! Fantastic meat! Option for all tastes. Show!!

address.streetAddress: Rua Francisco Deslandes, n°1038 Lojas 02 e 03

title: The best Japanese I've ever been
author: BlueJay277
reviewBody: The dishes are served in a carvery. Great service and nice location. Advise beforehand what you do not intend to eat. Fantastic apple crème brûlée dessert.

title: Junior manager very, very strict and insensitive,
author: Paulo K
reviewBody: Yesterday, 09/17/2016, I took my family to mamma jamma at Casa Shopping. After the pizzas, my 11 year old daughter wants just one for her, on the plate, but with 2 flavors. So I asked the junior manager for the situation, which was for a child. etc. ANSWER: THE HOUSE IS FULL, CANNOT. I wondered if the kitchen would take 20 or 30 seconds to do this. Congratulations on your attitude, NEVER GO BACK IN THIS PLACE. I take the opportunity to ask, why do not deliver the invoice when paid. NEVER deliver me. Is this RIGOR all selective? We will see.

address.streetAddress: Rua Saturnino de Brito, 50 Jardim Botânico

title: One of my favorite places in São Paulo
author: bronzejoana
reviewBody: Delicious atmosphere, southern flavors and impeccable drinks. The signature drinks are very tasty, and the aperol sprits are exquisite. The highlight for me on the menu is the matambre with chatasca (sliced stuffed rib meat, accompanied by banana tortilla and farofa with dried meat - just writing here I am already salivating here). If you find it half dry, order a portion of extra sauce, it's worth it! The chicken with pumpkin dough is also surprising, as is the feijoada. I'm suspicious, I love this place!

title: Best environment
author: Michel16013
reviewBody: Service from Roberta, a very high-level employee, super polite, efficient Wonderful food, I loved the drink

address.streetAddress: Av Senador Virgilio Tavora, 597 Esquina com a Rua República do Líbano

title: Best fish restaurant
author: Falcomdu
reviewBody: One of the best or the best restaurant to eat a good fish in Goiânia, delicious and hearty dishes, noa and bustling midway there and an older "staff" if looking for a trendy bar would not be there.

title: Fast and low, but without losing flavor
author: RejanGuedes-Bruni
reviewBody: Salads, pasta, grills or snacks make this São Paulo house a reference for good products and price. The soups are a lovely surprise: I became addicted to the tapioquinha (baroa potato) with funghi. The desserts are equally tasty, with emphasis on the diverse ice cream cups. Worth the visit, without needing an airport (especially at this stage of major events in Brazil!)

title: Very good
author: Frederico N
reviewBody: Excellent cuts of meat. Very good service, and fair price for the quality of the food. I'll be back for sure

title: Good for quick meals
author: Marcelo O
reviewBody: according to some places it is the best parmigiana in the city, really very good. with several options of light dishes for quick meals.

title: I will be back with great pleasure and mouth water !!
author: Mariliapeixotonandes
reviewBody: Excellent service !! Very good food! Highlight for the Brandade of codfish starter! Great! Order olive oil from dark bottles as some are not ... Approved !!

title: Good choice
author: Luciano C
reviewBody: Great restaurant with great atmosphere and great choice! Being open 24 hours also makes it always one of the most chosen options.

title: Ok experience
author: jessicaogawa
reviewBody: Very long wait that increases the expectation, however the food is tasty but nothing exceptional. Relaxed atmosphere and great service from the waiters, especially the waiter Wenderson with valuable touches on the menu. Thanks for the good laughs and company.

title: Best chicken in town
author: Bruna V
reviewBody: The best boneless chicken in town. Good service and great food! Environment without air conditioner, but airy.

title: French Culinary
author: Victor B
reviewBody: Pleasant atmosphere, always tasty and very hearty dishes. Attentive service and fair prices, aligned with quality and standard. Good option both with family and friends.

title: great cost benefit
author: luzclarinha27
reviewBody: very modest snack, with a simple atmosphere. It makes up for the price, which is very cheap. The sandwich is very tasty too.

title: Fish is with them
author: Paulo C
reviewBody: Going to Cuiabá and not Going to Peixaria Coxipó was not to Cuiabá. Staff well prepared to serve and make the best freshwater fish. Pintados, cachaça, pacú and snacks like lambaris. I don't know how to specify who is better, because everyone we try is wonderful !!! Going to Cuiabá do not shy away from going to Coxipó. I miss you for sure.

title: Good executive buffet
author: VictorRRamos
reviewBody: Beautiful, pleasant restaurant with good service. It has an executive lunch buffet during the week, which has great cost x benefit. Good draft beer, also a great option for happy hour.

title: Excellent!!!!
author: MARIANA P
reviewBody: Super nice atmosphere and attentive to details. Numerous beer labels to be explored and a delicious taste. Excellent service and a unique team !!! Congratulations!!!

address.streetAddress: Rua João Damasceno, 1 Condomínio Unique, Loja 6, Ponta do Farol

title: It's embarrassing ...
author: Rob303631
reviewBody: I arrive at the house and sit at the table alone. Since this is a wine store restaurant, I request a wine list. Answer: "we have no menu because we have 800 wines." And precisely, how am I going to choose between 800 without a card? "Ah, you can choose the food and WE recommend it!". That is, you have to take what they push you. I ask: since I am alone, I would like to know at least what is in wine by the glass or half a bottle. The girl says that for wine by the glass you have to ask another waiter, who takes too long. When he comes, he says there is no wine in a glass! A wine house without wine by the glass! In the meantime, another waiter comes, and without waiting, nothing puts a plate of cheese on the table. But I didn't ask for that ... Yes, but don't you want to? It's a special dish that we have this week. No, I want to choose my wine and then a food, please. What about wine in a half bottle? "Ah, there are many, you can't list". You can go and see on that shelf. I go there and have 5 (not 500 or 5,000) wines in half a bottle. I choose a Viognier from Escorihuela Gascon. I return to the table. "Do you like very cold wine?" See, if this is a wine house, you should know how to serve a wine, but too cold, no wine is served. And they put the wine in a bucket with ice because "we don't have any cold white wine, it needs to be frozen on the customer's table". Ah, ok ... I wait another 15 minutes, while that doesn't even come with the food menu. They open the wine, and it's completely spoiled. "Are you sure?" Asks the waiter. Just test it ... I don't even think about asking for another one because they would have to freeze another bottle, and I leave without eating anything and drinking nothing.

title: Cool
author: asb2907
reviewBody: Always a pleasant experience. The dishes are delicious, the service is attentive, the decor unique and fun. On weekends the bar becomes a dance floor. I always take tourists and they love the experience. The dishes are expensive and so are the drinks.

title: Excellent!
author: JROJ
reviewBody: This restaurant is to be congratulated! It is no wonder that it is always sought when people think about eating well. The service is impeccable, all the waiters are very attentive and willing to do their best to make you feel great! not to mention the disposition of cold cuts! Very recommended!

title: sophisticated restaurant
author: caio L
reviewBody: very good service, relatively small and cozy restaurant, good for those who escape the crowds, very tasty food.

title: Sophisticated place, terrible food.
author: Rafaela M
reviewBody: Unfortunately I had an unpleasant experience at Chez Oscar Freire. We had a fraternization yesterday, the reception, super nice and courteous service, but we had a bad impression about the food. We were in 11 people and ALL were sick, regardless of their requested dishes, which were varied. I suggest you review this point.

title: Waste of time
author: th4deu
reviewBody: I went to the restaurant and ordered the premium rodizio. 40 minutes later, watching EVERYBODY AROUND MY ROOM being attended to, I gave up and left. Unfortunately the restaurant is unable to accommodate the number of tables it proposes. I recommend Marukame to anyone who doesn't want to waste time.

title: Great beach
author: Claudio_H2570
reviewBody: It is, in fact, a beach club. You pay to enter but the infrastructure is excellent. Very comfortable, very pleasant. It also has swimming pools, which is good for children. Attentive staff and great service. Good food.

title: Great atmosphere
author: Gustavo_Barros_Rec

author: MiToardik

title: It's good but nothing different from other houses of its kind
author: sidsp11

Service fell in the exchange of people. This for me is training. I think it is very bad to remove the fruit creams that were on the menu at the beginning.

title: Good for less
author: lckaka
reviewBody: Driven by positive reviews I ended up in this restaurant. Guys, 4 or 5 full balls should be given to exceptional locations. It is not the case here. Starting with the service team, all discouraged with a "I didn't want to be here" face, this really caught my attention. I ordered the shrimp stew; super boring. So, my conclusion is that of a common place, to go from time to time, without great pretensions.

title: spacious

author: rsaquino
reviewBody: Beautiful view, a marvel during the week at the end of the day. On weekends it gets very crowded and ends up being unbearable. The shrimp pastry is good and the beer is always cold. IMPORTANT - The purpose of the location is to enjoy the view.

title: Sensational Lunch !!!!!
author: 603marisas
reviewBody: The DR LASER Family had the privilege of visiting the traditional "Remanso do Tucunaré" for lunch. Because we had a "tight" time, we went straight to the main dishes ... Ribs of Tambaqui, Moqueca de Dourado with Shrimps, Tambaqui and Dourados Fritos ... My God !!!!! What a SENSATIONAL lunch !!!!! Every one has no freshness ... Good service and wonderful food !!!!! If you are in Porto Velho you CANNOT LEAVE LUNCH at Remanso do Tucunaré !!!!

title: Very good
author: Jennifer F
reviewBody: The value of the carvery is very good. Good food and because it is in the downtown area where almost everything is expensive, there was the best I found.

title: Pleasant environment
author: JTurati
reviewBody: Restaurant with pleasant atmosphere, beautiful and unusual decoration, great pizza and excellent service when serving.

title: Weak, very weak ..
author: viniciusm694
reviewBody: I was at the place on a Sunday, at lunchtime .. We were 5 people and we went for the good reviews that the restaurant has on TripAdvisor. However, it was a general disappointment .. restaurant very weak for what they are willing to offer .. Atmosphere even pleasant, but the food very weak .. each one ordered a different dish and nobody liked it .. Seafood risotto only had shrimp and some pieces of salmon and octopus .. Polenta do ossobuco was a corn flour thickened with cheese (cloying) .. Cod was served with some vegetables and vegetables, but everything was pale and tasteless. Anyway, it was a terrible choice and I don't recommend it to anyone .. OBS: If the gastronomy was bad, the "art" part was even worse .. restaurant decorated with pictures of the owner with his wife everywhere .. haha ..

itemReviewed.name: Du Chef Arte e Gastronomia By Lucius Gaudenzi

address.streetAddress: Rua Afonso Celso, 70 Farol da Barra

title: Amazing
author: Guilhermelcam
reviewBody: The combination of oriental flavors is very well prepared and prepared by the chef. The atmosphere is good and the service is very good. Highlight for the terracotta warriors at the entrance.

title: Excellent
author: Wagner F
reviewBody: It offers a variety of dishes, mainly regional. The space is cozy, I only advise arriving early to find a place to sit and enjoy the delicacies that the restaurant offers.

address.streetAddress: Av Gov Magalhães Barata, 830 São Brás

title: Lots of flavor
author: Timparisotto
reviewBody: Best restaurant with typical Bahian food. Super easy access, very friendly staff and the taste ..... wonderful.

title: Terrible attendance
author: Yuridippold
reviewBody: Lousy service, order came wrong when I ask the waiter and the meitre said it was right and did not review the bill ... I paid normally, but I leave the testimony here.

address.streetAddress: Rua Ronald de Carvalho55 Loja A e B Praça do Lido

title: If you are a wine lover you must come!
author: tanymonteiro
reviewBody: Wines from different countries in glasses of 30, 60 and 120ml at different prices. The food menu is not extensive but everything is very tasty. Ideal for special occasions and if possible, book early.

address.streetAddress: Rua Doutor Alceu de Campos Rodrigues, 218

title: Sensational experience
author: letpolak
reviewBody: We went to Casa do Porco and asked for the “tasting menu” (value 110.00 per person) and I can say that: it is a very nice experience, as they serve a unit of practically the entire menu, and these are things that we read, with we sure wouldn't ask. I don't like avocado, I loved a canapé made of pururuca with guacamole. The only problem is waiting in line, which is at least 2 hours. The cheff went to our table, super friendly and we even took a picture. I would definitely return and will recommend.

title: The best contemporary in town
author: 681valeriar
reviewBody: With unmatched flavor this restaurant has a varied menu with fish, meat, pasta, ducks and etc. We can't get enough of the balanced flavor that we find in each dish. Today the photo goes to the magret (duck). The service is provided by waiters beyond kind in an elegant restaurant (although it may be better than it is in its conservation). I love the fish over a banana nest. Worth the dinner!

address.streetAddress: Rua Desp. Humberto Guimarães, 877 Ponta Verde

title: GREAT
author: glorinez a
reviewBody: Great Food, CHOPP ICE CREAM, great service, pleasant atmosphere, 1000 note, menu is very varied, ideal place to chat with friends

address.streetAddress: Rua Doutor Claudino dos Santos 63 Largo da Ordem

title: Excellent restaurant
author: jeancarloleite
reviewBody: Without a doubt one of the best restaurant I have ever eaten. Luxury is not very good! But when it comes to the taste of the food, I can say that it was sensational.

title: Good arab food
author: 382Marcia
reviewBody: The restaurant is in the external area of a gallery which makes it a very pleasant environment. The service is professional and attentive and the meat spaghetti is great. have difficulties

title: Very good moqueca
author: vitoriazm
reviewBody: Shrimp stew very tasty, worth it. They could only improve the amount of shrimp, proportional to the tomato and onion. It comes with mush, rice, farofa and black-eyed beans. Attentive waiters. Tables have a good view of the waterfront, a negative point is due to many homeless people who are constantly asking for things at the counter that separates the restaurant from the street.

title: Late afternoon
author: YunaBrasilia
reviewBody: We were in 3 people, it was relatively empty, but the attendants were in a hurry, Time consuming service! Good food Not worth the price! The artistic cover charge is charged, without warnings, in the note! I asked because there was no information when we arrived and then I was informed that it was optional! Too bad it is not worth what it charges!

address.streetAddress: Shis Ql 10, S/n LT1/33 Pontão do Lago Sul

title: Excellent!
author: PercevalCarvalho
reviewBody: Excellent gastronomy and restaurant in a privileged location in the city. Well presented food, hygiene, cozy atmosphere.

title: Silly handle promotion
author: tiagob232
reviewBody: I received an SMS informing of a promotion of Lobster Moqueca with Shrimps for 2 people for R $ 119.90, I decided to try it out. We arrived at the place very well presented and comfortable. At the beginning we asked for a "marine cover", however we are told that the house was without shrimp and squid ... first disappointment, and I imagined how a moqueca would come out of the promotion since they were without shrimp. Friends arrived and we ordered 4 moquecas from SMS and a moqueca from plantains and fish bait. They confused banana moqueca with whiting, we refused and were not charged, and I reinforced that I would like banana moqueca that was on the menu, I am informed that they would not be serving it too because it is very difficult to prepare and needs to be reserved in advance. ... second disappointment (and I was actually angry, since I know this is a lame excuse). As for the moqueca of the promotion, shrimp if you found one you were awarded, lobster a few small pieces (the famous lobster catado), tomato and onion at will. Without coconut milk, palm oil, coriander, cumin or any spices ... that is, the moqueca half more mouth in the world. When closing the account it ended around R $ 150 per couple I was very disappointed. I checked the prices of the dishes outside the promotion, they are even reasonable if they are of quality, but due to the treatment I had, I do not come back and I do not recommend anyone to go, much less in the promotion catches silly sms.

title: lasagna
author: Eronildo123
reviewBody: the lasagna was delicious, with a lot of cheese and macaroni in the right measure, the well-seasoned bolognese sauce

title: Excellent
author: M7812LHalexandreb
reviewBody: Varied foods and very generous portions. It is worth going and trying the feijoada pastry. The beer is always cold and the waiters are super friendly. I recommend.

title: Very good service, flaws in the production of the dishes
author: BLONDERUBIA
reviewBody: I loved the place and the service, with prepared and friendly staff, but there are some things to be desired, such as: Piedmontese rice only has sour cream, it has no taste, no salt, no mushrooms, no cheese. Oswaldo Aranha is honest, but garlic, which is the main attraction, comes very little and we have to ask for more. The cover charge is tasty. Espresso is R $ 4.00. Salmon with a quinoa crust could be much better, because the quinoa comes separate and raw, a crust that is good, nothing! The dessert of chestnut pie with chocolate and ice cream is delicious and very well served! But the atmosphere is very pleasant and the friendly and fast service is worth it.

title: VERY GOOD!!!
author: julianarigon
reviewBody: Luckily we asked for an indication at the hostel that we were staying and they told us that place. Very good!! A fish with shrimp that makes you want to take the next flight to eat there again. Portion very well served! He felt sorry for not being able to finish the dish, it was so delicious.

title: Very good atmosphere
author: Anderson S
reviewBody: Much more very good food, very pleasant atmosphere, perfect place to go with friends or as a couple, the whole franc serves up to 4 people playing is a lot of food, and with a very good flavor. I RECOMMEND. I will go again when I travel to Belo Horizonte.

title: The best shrimp in the region
author: Heber S
reviewBody: If you are looking for a cozy place, with good drinks and quality food, this is the place. Cozy, welcoming atmosphere that goes beyond the expected security.

address.streetAddress: Av. Dep. Jamel Cecílio, 3.300 Polo Gastronômico - Área Externa - Shopping Flamboyant - Jardim Goiás

title: Sensational option in downtown Rio
author: ftorres2017
reviewBody: Despite all the problems in Rio and the city center, Cheff Frederic manages to bring a piece of France with Rio's sympathy. Good for a business lunch, with friends or family, at a fair price. Long live Brasserie Rosario!

title: Late Mother's Day
author: Nomad298549
reviewBody: The service was impeccable. Coco Bambu pattern food. In Águas Claras there is no better restaurant. There was no waiting, even though we arrived in prime time.

title: Great!! Best steakhouse
author: rogerioasantos
reviewBody: My fiancee and I visited the restaurant on the Corpus Christi holiday, for dinner. We had a great reception. The location is extremely pleasant. Our service was coordinated by Leandro, who introduced us to the wide variety of drinks and indicated two. For the entrance we asked for a "tartare", which was delicious (I forgot the photo lol). We were introduced to the owner Mr. Jean, very helpful and attentive, made a brief presentation of "Urus" and "Meats" and, provided a presentation of some cuts available in the house, the presentation was great! Soon after, we asked Leandro's suggestion for the main dish, then we ordered the "Urus Porterhouse" and three side dishes, as shown in the photo. Everything was perfect, meat in the ideal spot, light seasoning, in short, we were satisfied. Finally, we ordered a very delicious dessert (photo). We were very pleased with the environment, drinks, food, a vast wine list, well-trained employees and, yet, prices are not unrealistic. They are to be congratulated. We have already become customers. ** WE RECOMMEND ** !!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Brasilia 146 Anexo ao Shopping 3 Américas

title: Dinner
author: 324luizantoniol
reviewBody: Small restaurant, but the pizza was very good. Service needs to improve, as the waiter seemed lost. Recommend the location, fair price

title: Great
author: savi63
reviewBody: Speechless .... just try it. Great the SAMPLED and first-rate steak. Very good wine canteen

address.streetAddress: Rua Eng Paulo B Nogueira 85 Jatiúca

title: Nice surprise.
author: angelotabet
reviewBody: Opened a few days ago, the Nau has already won a prominent place in the Brasilian market. Installed in a beautiful building that could also receive an art gallery for its beauty, it offers us a kitchen where seafood is the highlight. Great. Everything is very beautiful in the house, from the tables and chairs, lighting, water mirror space, decoration and balcony with a view of the JK bridge, to the bathrooms that are simply beautiful. There is a clear concern with the beauty of the project. It was made to surprise, please and succeed. Fast, trained staff and maitres who know the menu. And there is also covered parking. I intend to be a loyal customer. Congratulations.

address.streetAddress: Setor de Clubes Esportivos Sul, Trecho 2 , Conj. 41, s/n Asa Sul

title: Very good restaurant with excellent location.
author: rodrigostaico
reviewBody: We ate a shrimp stew that was delicious with a great seasoning for two. We were at the house, but there is another one on the beach, a huge tent that informed us that it has more options including Japanese food. The price is good and worth a visit.

title: Mineira food - always good!
author: sirleid
reviewBody: Highlight for the broths! I ate a bogged cow! Well served, accompanies basket of bread. The parmegiana file dish is also very good! Cozy atmosphere and good service. Bottle beer 600 ml ...

title: Bar
author: 483andr_s
reviewBody: Modernized bar, cold draft beer and good quality snacks. As it is in a mall (even outside), it is that standardized thing, without distinction. But it is worth a late afternoon visit.

address.streetAddress: Setor Comercial Norte Q 5 Brasìlia shopping a - Asa Norte

title: Pleasant night
author: Lugaresromanticos
reviewBody: I went to the ça va on 06/17/19 the quiet atmosphere, good service gave me good suggestions of dishes and wine worth visiting

title: very good
author: fgo346
reviewBody: lunch or dinner the place offers a pleasant and suitable environment for the most diverse situations! has rooms reserved for events and socializing.

title: I don't know how it's still working
author: 188pedrob
reviewBody: I'll bet with anyone. I don't know how the owner hasn't gone bankrupt yet. Restaurant lives on the fly, even on Fridays and Saturdays at night. I had the displeasure of going with another couple of friends. Cold food, tiny portions and abusive price. Ah! There was also a charge for the artistic cover charge, which also sucks. I was already forgetting: the waiter who served us took a few breaks to smoke on the street. Can you believe it? I don't even need to talk about the breath.

address.streetAddress: Rua Frei Manoel da Cruz Jaragua

title: Interesting
author: 149giancarlof
reviewBody: I went to enter the sheridan, but it was full. We decided to go to Brisket. It's like a village there, you don't pay until 20:00. Foods are nice and tasty goods. There's an interesting drink called red highball that is cool. Service is sometimes confusing. The music, an international pop rock, was very good.

title: Good
author: amanda s
reviewBody: great option from snacks to sandwiches, always warm bread, fast service the bad that the place is small and if there are a lot of people there is a tight heat, exceptional service. I will definitely return to the place.

title: Nice place
author: leonarc28
reviewBody: I like cachacaria for the diversity of options and for having a cuisine that I particularly like ... but I still think that they could greatly improve the service that is always their weak point ...

itemReviewed.name: Cachaçaria do Dedé e Empório - Manauara Shopping

title: Savor with Faith
author: SorayaVS
reviewBody: Santa Fé, besides being a pleasant place, has an appetizing and varied buffet. It recently reopened after an accident, but it reopened even better. It has excellent wine labels and, if you have no preference, accept the suggestions of the sommelier and the chef, as they are all great. Enjoy!

title: Excellent food
author: Fernanda V
reviewBody: I went to Noah for dinner with a friend. We decided to order a starter, a main course and a dessert to share. At the beginning we ordered the burrata, which came with some toast with a light taste of lemon. It was wonderful! Best burrata I've ever eaten. For the main course we ordered the shrimp risotto with strawberry that came inside a pineapple that was cut in half. We were impressed with how tasty the combination of shrimp and strawberry was (which was very smooth on the plate). Furthermore, VERY well served. Despite being an expensive dish, it came with a lot of shrimp and was easy to share (since we ordered starter and dessert too). For dessert we ordered the brownie, which came with strawberry, caramel, white chocolate truffle and served with hot chocolate sauce. All wonderful!

address.streetAddress: Quadra Cls 408 Loja 25 Bloco C - Asa sul

title: Almojanta ???? It takes absurd
author: paulocc2013
reviewBody: Few diners in the room, but an incomprehensible delay for 04 dishes. After asking how long it would take, we were treated harshly. Never. I lost my appetite. Only here to be challenged by attendants. Customer here is wrong

address.streetAddress: Av. Silvio Carlos Viana, 27 Ponta Verde

title: Mom and me
author: FelipeD1953
reviewBody: The “Captain's” service is excellent and the atmosphere is very pleasant, I always go with my family and always recommend it to everyone.

title: Good food
author: None
reviewBody: This place has good food at a good price. The atmosphere of the place is ideal to spend with friends

title: For those who want excitement
author: fernandaroesler
reviewBody: The place is big, with great structure and varied menu. Good for families with children, as there is even a swimming pool and play area. I do not recommend it for anyone who wants peace, because at all times spent peddlers offering massage, selling beach stuff, playing forró de pé de cerra. But for those who are strolling through Fortaleza it is a good choice for a day at the beach ... However, in general, the sea is rough.

address.streetAddress: Av. Zeze Diogo 3125 Praia Do Futuro

title: Shrimp all good!
author: Ana146706
reviewBody: The place is very simple, in a street with some inns and hotels, but the food is good and you can eat well! The service is very good, I recommend it and look at it several times with a collective purchase coupon. Go without regret! Good service in both units.

address.streetAddress: Rua Joaquim Alves, 160 Praia de Iracema

title: Delicious
author: Giuliana A
reviewBody: Think of a perfect moqueca? Only in the basement do you think that. Various moquecas, of first quality, one better than the other. Definitely the best capixaba moqueca I've ever tasted, including the banana moqueca! Great!

address.streetAddress: Rua Joaquim Lírio, 753 - Praia do Canto

title: Delicious food and reasonable price
author: mambarros
reviewBody: I was at Abraccio at Shopping Rio Disigner, where I was very well attended. The pasta I ordered was very tasty.

address.streetAddress: Barra da Tijuca Shoping Barra Design

title: Best pastel
author: Audemarr
reviewBody: I consider the best pastry in town. Freshly made and with a variety of flavors, I recommend the sun meat and pizza.

address.streetAddress: Rua Presidente Costa E Silva 959 S Pedro

title: Great, well decorated is well located
author: VagnerFernandes
reviewBody: Wide variety of seafood dishes. It is worth enjoying the good service and excellence of the quality of the food.

address.streetAddress: Setor de Clubes Esportivos Sul, Trecho 2 , Conj. 41, s/n Asa Sul

title: Dinner with family and friends
author: allynekelly
reviewBody: Wonderful environment ... spacious, cozy, excellent service. But twice differently I was disappointed with the dish which I didn't think was in the standards of Coco Bamboo from Fortaleza.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Coronel Teixeira, 5705 Ponta Negra, Shopping Ponta Negra

title: Top
author: Kamila B
reviewBody: Very good food. Dishes well served! Very good seasoning! Super attentive and friendly waiters. Super Indic

address.streetAddress: Avenida Praia de Ponta Negra 8952 Ponta Negra

title: Very good rodizio
author: 536ubiratanc
reviewBody: Excluding meats with emphasis on the shrimp on the breath and the picanha ... in addition to the delicious pheasant ... to drink it has a delicious cocktail .. affordable price

title: Excellent
author: A_Bergholz
reviewBody: Sophisticated and pleasant atmosphere with a very courteous service. The options are delicious. Very recommendable.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Doutor Antônio Gomes de Barros 150 Jatiuca

title: Beautiful union of French with the Northeast
author: 562antoniof
reviewBody: The proposal of the bistrot is well matched, with the union of French gastronomy with the typical elements of the Northeast. The experience of enjoying a petit gateau to the sound of Alcione is surreal.

address.streetAddress: Av Brigadeiro Eduardo Gomes 546 Praia Lagoa da Anta

title: Great restaurant.
author: Marcos Tadeu d
reviewBody: We went with a group of friends. Excellent food and ambience. Capote with sauce, sun meat and cold beer.

title: Full rotation and good value for money
author: Matheus P
reviewBody: At first the price of the carvery is a little scary, but it is totally justified. There was not a single dish on the menu that was not excellent. Variety of the menu and the special carvery is incredible. Highlight for the filet mignon with wonderful shitaque and crab cone. Service from Vinícius and Gildo and everyone in the house was exceptional. The dessert is great and difficult to choose since the carvery only includes one option without repetition. The hazelnut ice cream with banana is a good one.

title: The acclimation fashion.
author: Caio D
reviewBody: Privileged place. Paid parking. Wonderful food. Fair price. Receptive and cordial service. Ice-cold Brahma draft beer. Good variety of food.

title: Good environment
author: erikspacheco
reviewBody: I’ve been 03 times, I think it’s a happy environment, as far as meat is concerned, note that the Argentine eats almost raw meat, so order the meat to the point a little bit more, at least I did it and it worked, the side dishes are excellent.

address.streetAddress: Quadra Sig Quadra 8 Lote 2375 Ao lado do Nazo Sushi Bar e Primeiro Bar

title: Variety of meats.
author: lucenamg
reviewBody: Variety of dishes, meats, salads. Not counting the great service. What is not on the buffet is just ask the attentive waiters. I ate seafood, beef, pork, chicken, fish in one place. I ate wild boar and lamb chops too. Very good!!!

title: Mandatory stop on Jampa nights
author: Eneas P
reviewBody: Young and relaxed atmosphere, occasionally with live music. The bad side is that it is very difficult to find free tables in the weekends, which are very close to each other.

title: Excellent Bar
author: RFMGYN
reviewBody: Great option for the family. The variety of food is almost infinite, pleases everyone, and if you don't have it on the menu, they do it the way the customer asks. Staff is excellent. The toy library is gigantic and full of monitors. Excellent for families with young children. I highly recommend it.

title: Lunch
author: adrianopmariano
reviewBody: Very good, reasonably priced lunch for the quantity and quality of the food served. Entree with meat pasties and sensational pepper jelly. Wonderful sun meat, I recommend!

title: Gostozos sandwiches
author: João Paulo O
reviewBody: The Subway chain, which is already well known, counts on this unit that has a good service and great cost benefit like all the others.

address.streetAddress: Rua Portão da Piedade, 155, LUC-356, 3º Piso

title: Great restaurant
author: RodrigoCMourao
reviewBody: Very cozy atmosphere and excellent service, we were very well received and served, all very attentive. The food is divine, we first tried the leek cream with peas and I confess that I was surprised by the taste. The dishes we ordered came at the right time, with the meat at the right point and temperature. Without a doubt the place is highly recommended.

title: Excellent variety in the carvery
author: MatheusM86
reviewBody: This pizzeria is famous for the variety of flavors in rodizio. Both sweet and savory pizzas taste wonderful. I recommend the coalho cheese with rapadura. Very good.

address.streetAddress: SCLS Quadra 214, Bloco C, Loja 14 Setor Comércio Local Sul

title: Lots of variety
author: RenatoBonis
reviewBody: Restaurant by the kilo, with lots of variety and very nice regional cuisine. The decor is very well done.

title: Sirloin with catupiry x Chicken with catupiry
author: oJOYCEo
reviewBody: I confess that I don't know which one to ask for and so I ask half of one and half of the other, as both are delicious.

address.streetAddress: Rua Sete de Setembro, 336 Tabuleiro dos Martins

title: Simple place
author: Bruna F
reviewBody: For those who like to drink beer and it doesn't matter with simplicity a good order and ivana's bar and the price is also good

address.streetAddress: Rua 1007 131 Q 11 Lt 1 Setor Pedro Ludovico

title: Uruguayan Parrilla in Porto Alegre!
author: Cla_20142014
reviewBody: A great option for those who enjoy a traditional Uruguayan barbecue. It has good service and tasty cuisine, with a cozy atmosphere. Worth knowing.

title: Tasty lunch
author: mairas697
reviewBody: This restaurant specializing in special meats, also has other options of dishes such as the shrimp Porto which is sensational. The strip steak accompanied by biro biro rice and a roast cockroach are a must. Order the churros and the Bulgarian for dessert.

title: TOP seafood
author: Exploration321962
reviewBody: The service was not excellent, but it was good. Super cold, sub-zero draft beer. If I had to give a grade it would give 9.0.

address.streetAddress: Av. República do Líbano, 251 Loja Nº: 3052

title: Everything is good.
author: MartaVillamil
reviewBody: The shrimp with coconut milk, puree of strawberry and rice of milk and chestnuts, the pina colada. Everything was very good. The service of the waiter Jean deserves to be highlighted, congratulations.

title: Incredible crunchy termite!
author: Paula N
reviewBody: We went on Sunday afternoon. We were 2 adults and 1 child, not very hungry. We ordered the crispy termite for one person (R $ 70). To our surprise, it was accompanied by white rice, vinaigrette, French bread, cassava cooked with bacon, wonderful leaf salad (tomato leaves, sun-dried tomatoes, quail egg, pickles, arugula onion etc.) farofa and their pepper sauce that didn't is for amateurs. This dish (for 1 person) is for 3 hungry adults! The termite was so well done that it melted in your mouth. Incredible service, very clean bathroom (including changing facilities), pleasant atmosphere. More than fair price for delicious food. I will return, I recommend!

address.streetAddress: Rua Heitor Penteado 474 Vl Eunice Nova

title: Simply the best!
author: 407cynthiao
reviewBody: Cozy and tidy environment. Great service, varied menu and good wine list. The desserts are also excellent, especially the dulce de leche crepe with tapioca ice cream. Without a doubt, it is the best restaurant in Aracaju.

title: Variety of sweets
author: Karla C
reviewBody: Wide variety of sweets of all types, including Portuguese, all very well made. Simple, cold environment, as well as the service, where people could be more friendly. They also accept orders for cakes and pies, very delicious!

title: Wonderful experience
author: 512amandaz
reviewBody: Excellent service from waiters Souza and Rodrigo and the manager Jaci, were able to indicate an excellent dish, exactly as we were looking for. A sensational breaded cod. We haven't experienced anything so good in a long time !!

itemReviewed.name: Adega Santiago Barra - Rio de Janeiro

address.streetAddress: Av. das Américas, 3900 Shopping Village Mall, 2º Andar

title: The salad is the protagonist.
author: 663robertog
reviewBody: I don't usually evaluate shopping restaurants, but here we go: we ordered 2 combos with salad + protein (fish and chicken) + carbohydrate (rice and potatoes). Everything was very tasty, I thought it was worth it, but I have to note 2 issues: the first is that the proteins were small, especially the fish whose size was shameful; the second is that there was a promotional sign saying that for a further 5 reais it took twice as much protein. At the time we asked, the attendant said that the promotion was no longer valid. Now, we know that the offer obliges the provider !! The company has to pay attention, right ?? Anyway, if you really want to eat salad and don't really care about the size of the side dishes, there is a good place.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Ibirapuera, 3103 Shopping Ibirapuera, Loja 137, Moema

title: The oldest in Brazil
author: cicerolimma
reviewBody: Considered the oldest restaurant in Brazil preserving an aristocratic air, an environment frequented by politicians and businessmen from Pernambuco. Exquisite and bold cuisine with fish, seafood and especially the jaw-dropping cod. Weekends are best booked. Super recommended.

title: DELICIOUS SNACKS
author: Tyallyson T
reviewBody: Outdoor environment, pleasant, great to have a drink with friends and make conversation, excellent service, good quality food. Escondidinho de jerky is a delight.

title: Excellent option
author: ricardo_Tiago1
reviewBody: Wonderful place, excellent service, almost every week I go with my children, family atmosphere, I recommend it to everyone, the food is good the super cold drinks, pleasant sound, I really like this place!

title: Great restaurant ...
author: RodrigoBelo
reviewBody: I love this restaurant, because it has an excellent location, close to work ... I love the sun meat, that's what I always ask for and recommend to friends. It has a good service. I recommend.

title: Excellent traditional fish
author: LuizAPC
reviewBody: Traditional fishmonger, which is not as popular as the others, but for me it has the best fish in Cuiabá. Do not invent mixtures go to the basic Ventrecha de Pacumã, File de Pintado, Muqueca de Pintado, Pirão, rice, salads, farofas and that fried banana that cannot be missing. At the end try the Furundum (traditional Cuiabano sweet). Excellent cost benefit.

address.streetAddress: Av. Manoel José de Arruda Museu Do Rio

title: Delicious taste!
author: Naama K
reviewBody: You can't leave this tapioca without trying it, and I'm sure you'll want more! Indicate: Condensed milk, cheese and coconut!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Almirante Tamandare S/N Em Frente Ao Hotel Tambau, Box 04

title: Impeccable
author: Departure53248
reviewBody: Pleasant atmosphere, efficient service and excellent quality dishes. Prices compatible with the standard of the restaurant.

address.streetAddress: Ladeira do Gabriel 334 Cloc Marina Residence

title: Gastronomic paradise
author: Juliana F
reviewBody: A true masterpiece of architecture and gastronomy. Excelent reception. Cozy atmosphere. Great dishes.

title: Unique savior
author: FabioS534
reviewBody: Upon entering Casa de Tereza, an old mansion in Rio Vermelho, you are enveloped in an extremely cozy atmosphere. Choose one of the five lounges and get ready for an unusual cultural gastronomic experience. There everything is done with details ... the decoration, the crockery, the cutlery, the tables, the menu. Very good and diverse wine list and drinks. You can choose between typical and regional dishes and, for sure, you will be delighted with your choice. We ordered "Bruscheta de Línguiça" as a starter (exceptional) and "Moqueca Mista" and "Picanha de Carne de Sol", to eat praying that the dishes are so good. Dessert: coconut dessert with plum honey! Very important detail: the service is a thousand! All extremely kind, polite, demonstrating that they are really concerned with offering you an unforgettable experience. CONGRATULATIONS!!

title: Cozy!
author: VALERIA B
reviewBody: This bar is open 24 hours. I thought this was really cool! It is well owned by two floors. We ordered a snack there in Curitiba famous that is the jaguar meat. We didn't like it because the meat, as it was raw, was tasteless ... without seasoning ... The bar is well frequented and has a varied menu. The cold draft beer.

title: Excellent the food the service
author: lumen413
reviewBody: We always dine on Sundays it is wonderful, the pasta served is of excellent quality and the sangria and 1000 note

title: Low cost
author: SamiaCris
reviewBody: As it costs a lot to eat in the malls in Brasília, I was struck by a trout fillet promotion with two classic side dishes for R $ 21.90. I opted for boiled vegetables and potato chips, but the potato came crumbly, if I wanted that there I had asked for potato straw. The vegetables were overcooked, almost mashed. The fish was good. It was worth considering if you would spend no less than R $ 30.00 in any other local restaurant.

title: Excellent
author: Carlosloureiro03
reviewBody: It started out more as a gourmet butcher than a restaurant. Gradually it established itself as one of the best meat restaurants in BH. You have the advantage of being able to choose the best products and test them in the restaurant. This combination of gourmet butcher and restaurant is unbeatable because nothing beats the quality of the primary products used to make excellent cuisine. The portions are generous and delicious and the price is compatible.

address.streetAddress: Rua Francisco Deslandes, n°1038 Lojas 02 e 03

title: Lovely view!
author: daianemaltez
reviewBody: The view from the back of the bar is a delight at night !! A beautiful view of Todos os Santos Bay! The beer is cold and at a fair price! The service is good. They do not accept credit cards, only debit and cash.

title: Top
author: Ramonteixeira
reviewBody: Excellent rotation, excellent service, very pleasant atmosphere, affordable price, pick-up service at the door.

address.streetAddress: Av. Roberto Freire, 1070 - Capim Macio Capim Macio

title: Excellent food
author: RitaRodricgues
reviewBody: Excellent regional food with a wide variety of dishes, with emphasis on "mutton rice". Very recommended !!!

title: Homemade candies
author: André C
reviewBody: "Homemade" chocolates, but elaborated with refinement and sophistication. I found them a little greasy, but they are still delicious.

title: Excellent Food and Place
author: Humberto2Junior
reviewBody: Excellent place, very beautiful and pleasant, has plenty of place, the food is delicious and arrives very fast. The service was first rate, with a super polite and explanatory waiter. Don't forget to taste the caipiroskas are very good.

title: Reasonable
author: 216gabrielg
reviewBody: It was already 5 stars, today the service dropped a lot, waiters only serve when the customer makes a lot of effort, the portion of the food decreased, but the taste remains great.

title: Forró with Tapioca
author: MarianaSPires
reviewBody: We visited Pirata Bar on a Friday, on the night of Forró with Tapioca. We love everything! The place is very pleasant, spacious, unique decoration. Very attentive staff. The menu does not have as many varieties as other restaurants, but everything that is served is very tasty, in addition to presenting a fair price. We love the forró bands. Undoubtedly, it is the best place for tourists to get to know and dance the traditional Ceará forró. Until 7pm, there is no charge for admission. I recommend extra attention to anyone who goes to this bar, as the neighborhood is not policed, very poorly lit and somewhat dangerous. But inside the establishments there is no danger, only on the streets, paths, etc.

title: Excellent Service
author: silviohs1
reviewBody: Excellent quality and service (manager, waiters and receptionist). Just as a suggestion, they could charge a different price or the same for lunch for customers who want to consume Japanese food for dinner.

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont, S/N Bairro Coroa do Meio

title: Good and next to the hill of the bald
author: Luiz Fernando B
reviewBody: Good location, there is a diversity (not great) of food and drinks. The service is cordial and is next to the hill of the bald, very cool to enjoy the view of the hill + the beach itself. The night seems to be a little more busy but I was unable to visit.

title: Excellence in gastronomy
author: DarlanMalfatti
reviewBody: The best cuisine for those who like to enjoy a good ala-carte with the best prawns, noble fish files, cod, meats, etc., and the best specialized service !!

title: Great sushi and service
author: iaraconsul
reviewBody: Very good sushi, lots of variety. Waiter Leonardo very attentive, calm and cozy. I'll be back more often.

title: regional food
author: mcz-al
reviewBody: environment that looks like a taipa house, excellent regional food and varieties.obs. owner a friendliness.

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Júlio Marques Luz, 62 Jatiuca

title: The best self-service in Recife!
author: Pepegouveia
reviewBody: The excellent and varied buffet at Chica Pitanga includes great salads, varied meats and seafood, all of the highest quality. For dinner, there are also regional dishes. For dessert, it is difficult to choose one of the varied options for pies. And the tangerine strawberry juice is delicious!

title: Wonderful!!!
author: Luciana B
reviewBody: Super cozy place, delicious and abundant food and the service is sensational !! We love!! They are to be congratulated!!!

title: It remains one of the best in the city.
author: Xandaoalencar
reviewBody: It is that restaurant off the tourist trail, but with excellent regional food. I took a group of friends from São Paulo and they all loved it. I'm a fan and I recommend it.

title: Good to see game over the weekend
author: melcanziani
reviewBody: Simple place but it has a super affordable menu, plus a place with no worries about clothes and stuff!

title: Good food guarantee
author: RoniePerdigao
reviewBody: Casa de Juja is synonymous with gastronomic excellence. One of my favorite restaurants in São Luís. The place is cozy, pleasant, the service is very good and the food is wonderful. Juja, always very polite and attentive in all the times I was there.

itemReviewed.name: Casa de Juja - Ateliê de Gastronomia

title: great
author: lunnaos
reviewBody: excellent and cozy place, high price but compatible with the place. worth it for a romantic dinner

title: Pleasant but expensive
author: Local1RM
reviewBody: The atmosphere is pleasant, excellent for a happy hour with friends or to have a beer with the husband. The service is excellent, with friendly waiters. The only thing, however, is the cost-benefit when considering the portion sizes and the price.

title: Rustic restaurant, good service and good dishes
author: Marcelo S
reviewBody: Good dishes, spacious and rustic environment. It has an area with toys and monitors for children. Well-prepared portions and broths. Good and pleasant service.

title: Very good
author: jo_ofabianob
reviewBody: Great service, very good menu, affordable price, suitable for all occasions, the location is also well located

title: Executive of the day
author: Eduardo S
reviewBody: I went to lunch at Q-Burger and my option was an executive of the day (hamburger, fries and soda) for R $ 29.90. I found it super fair, the snack is not great, but it is good, the separate mayonnaise is very good, there are several options on the menu and the place is nice. It's worth it, it's fair.

title: Dinner
author: Allan F
reviewBody: Excellent service (Jonathan). Tasty food (lamb skewer + cheese and molasses) - I recommend it.

title: Very good!!!
author: gersonj198
reviewBody: I was in that place with my wife, one of the most famous places in Máceio, it's very good ... their strongest is the shrimp gum !!! We ordered this and liked it very much ... we couldn't eat everything (portion for two people) but the place is really cool. Cost benefit difficult to say ... but if you want good cuisine it is worth it. There is a transfer from many hotels from the hotel to the restaurant ... it pays off a lot ..

title: typical foods from Amapá
author: rogerioab
reviewBody: And the restaurant where the best Macapa fish is eaten as a regional seasoning. very good service and prices compatible with the quality of the meal served. Comfortable and easily located facilities.

title: Good option
author: Flávio A
reviewBody: Good food and ambience. Prices a little high. A good option for tourists visiting Maceió. I recommend. The day I visited had music to the sound of Dj.

address.streetAddress: Av. Silvio Carlos Viana, 27 Ponta Verde

title: Good restaurant in Rio Vermelho
author: sandrinha77
reviewBody: Good restaurant, it is not "wonderful" but it meets the cleaning, well-seasoned aspects, the staff is fast, the price is compatible for Salvador, nothing exorbitant, a Teppan and a combination of sushi and beer was 90 reais, not bad for the neighborhood.

address.streetAddress: Rua Fonte do Boil 16 Rio Vermelho

title: Casa Das Bifanas
author: Alexxis M
reviewBody: The Casa Das Bifanas Restaurant has very good food; the place is very pleasant, the service is very good and the food is great; I liked very much; worth it.

title: Wonderful place
author: JaqueSMI
reviewBody: the location is great in front of the beach of the future, that you enjoy beautiful scenery, great service, ideal for spending a day

address.streetAddress: Av. Zeze Diogo 3125 Praia Do Futuro

title: fish, shade, sea and cold beer
author: Elanne8531
reviewBody: You can buy your fish and seafood to take home and if you want to eat at the place, ask to fry it on the spot!

title: "Jartar"
author: Rudy R
reviewBody: I had dinner with my family, the restaurant offers transfer hotel x restaurant x hotel, we ordered a plate of pork steak and one of filet with rennet cheese, we were satisfied, the milk rice, it is a different dish worth trying.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Praia de Ponta Negra 8952 Ponta Negra

title: Tradition
author: viviguertz
reviewBody: The draft beer is great, good place to talk, waiter and owner know the regulars. Delicious snacks, with some very traditional.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Protasio Alves 1709 Esq. Eca de Queiroz

title: Good
author: Marcelomuricy
reviewBody: The restaurant is made by the pound, has a wide variety of foods, but the main ones are Minas Gerais cuisine. The tropeiro beans were excellent, I found the value of the dish super affordable. Only the dessert that I found a little expensive ... A piece of pie 6 reais. Lol

address.streetAddress: Avenida Murilo Dantas 941 Praça do Farol

title: Dinner
author: minda_otero
reviewBody: At the end of the night the order is a no-frills and abundant food, the dirt is the best, for all tastes I recommend

title: Delicious
author: S4030HEmariam
reviewBody: Salvador Shopping Restaurant with several options of dishes, all very tasty, both meat and side dishes. It's really worth it.

title: Excellent vegetarian restaurant
author: K2239OYlilianc
reviewBody: Very tasty food, I hadn't been there for over 20 years and I was happily surprised by the deliciousness of the food. Very simple, quiet environment (no music or TV, I loved it!), R $ 20.00 free buffet, juice and tea. Much cheaper than other "famous" vegetarians here. It has a shop with natural products, pizzas, etc. I recommend it, it's worth it!

title: Rustic
author: Arnando A
reviewBody: Rustic location in Salvador. Well-prepared food, served with care, love and attention, you realize all of this.

title: Sensational Service
author: Gustavo R
reviewBody: Sensational service from the waiter Leonardo! It made our dinner extremely pleasant. Very friendly and helpful!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Doutor Chucri Zaidan, 902 Shopping Market Place

title: Differentiated restaurant
author: Igor A
reviewBody: The atmosphere of this place is perfect, well decorated and cozy, there are good options for dishes, from steak to seafood, desserts and etc. The food is different, haute cuisine, tasty, to be enjoyed, as it comes in small quantities, the price is a little high, but it is worth it, especially for a dinner for two.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Praia de Muriu, 9132 Ponta Negra

title: Very good pizza!
author: Pgripa13
reviewBody: The pizza is perfect! Thin and well stuffed dough! I just found the place a little strange! At least the table we stayed at was very close to the street! But for the pizza it is very worth it! I would definitely go back. We went to the Jardim Camburi unit.

address.streetAddress: Rua Desembargador Sampaio 263 Praia do Canto

title: Great snack
author: ellyo766
reviewBody: Snack neat in a simple and relaxed place, family atmosphere, without luxury and frills, reasonable price. That's what I can say for now, as this is the first time I've come but I'm sure to be back.

title: Fresh, tasty and very well executed food!
author: manupops
reviewBody: Delicious Italian simplicity very well executed. In my 2 visits, I ate 2 excellent pastas. Good price too. Pleasant family atmosphere! Too bad the restaurant is part of the Avenue where buses pass so fast, cars too. They make a lot of noise. When I return to Fortaleza, I will return here for dinner !!

title: Good wine shop, but no restaurant!
author: Mmfrade
reviewBody: I am a frequent customer of the Grand Cru of São Paulo and when I saw it in Belém I expected the same level of products. The wines are good and similar, but the dishes are little varied, portions small, expensive and not very tasty. I recommend the store to buy wine, but I don't think it's worth having dinner.

title: To relax
author: pcbm2017
reviewBody: At first glance it seems like a place for you to sit and have a beer and eat something on the beach promenade, however there are many, many sellers and beggars at your table all the time, nothing cool about that.

title: BRAZILIAN AND ORIENTAL FOOD
author: Aurea P
reviewBody: Excellent and varied menu, with excellent service. very nice place, clean, air conditioned, the price is not small but it really pays off !!!!!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 8956 Ponta Negra

title: Dinner
author: il0c
reviewBody: Waiter Ronaldo Martins provided an excellent service. Congratulations on your dedication to professionalism and excellence.

address.streetAddress: Rua República da Armênia 1154 Água Fria

title: Unbeatable
author: O2973KYpatriciam
reviewBody: Esfiha Quente is a classic in downtown Goiânia, and no wonder. Salty snacks are delicious and always new. The juices are varied and very well made. I just wanted to remember.

title: Good food
author: Noninho
reviewBody: At the Beach Stop, Stella Maris-Salvador, has a pleasant atmosphere, with live music on the weekends. The flagship is the shrimp pastry, excellent, the other foods are also good. Great option!

address.streetAddress: Rua Jose Augusto Tourinho Dantas 214 Praia

title: Disappointment
author: marisamakler
reviewBody: I was extremely disappointed with Maní, especially in terms of service. With a reservation made for the opening hours, that is, the house was not full yet, our order took more than 1: 30hs, being that they said the children's dishes would advance but they arrived only about 5-10 min before the damage to the dishes. As for the dishes, another disappointment. My order was a pasta with a mix of mushrooms and white truffles. I didn't feel the truffles at all and the dish was not balanced at all, extremely acid to tell the truth.
