We do not even order dessert with the risk of taking too long to bring them since being with children is not easy to wait. As for the other dishes on the table, the fish and the fish were not very fresh and the other dishes were nothing much. A pity because the restaurant has a cozy atmosphere, but it is not worth the visit.

title: Sensational
author: Laisclb
reviewBody: Wonderful restaurant. Good food, first class service and cozy atmosphere. I ordered a prime ribs that comes with two side dishes, we chose vulcanic potatoes and Panko farofa and gorgonzola sauce, everything was divine. I will be back many times

address.streetAddress: R. Maria Tomásia, 746 Vizinho ao Barneys Burger

title: Excellent food, service and view - but does not accept cards
author: Lapa2000
reviewBody: Pomodorino belongs to the same owners as Fiorino na. Tijuca, first in the series, by Artigiano and Anna in Ipanema. Excellent cover, very good pasta dishes and at a reasonable cost. Good wine list with options for all price ranges, especially those of Italian origin. The quality of the pasta is excellent, and the service is very good. Pomodorino stands out from its "brothers" for its location facing the Rodrigo de Freitas lagoon, with beautiful views. The only sense of this network is not to accept credit cards.

address.streetAddress: 1104 Epitacio Pessoa Av. Lagoa Nao Santo Cristo, Como Consta Na Pagina

title: very good
author: Rafaelmattos
reviewBody: the rice with octopus and shrimp is excellent. simple, traditional place in salvador. excellent lemonade. very good, I recommend

address.streetAddress: Rua Borges dos Reis 24-A Rio Vermelho

title: Amazing
author: Renato M
reviewBody: Very good cozy atmosphere .. swine rib very good decoration is beautiful excellent service is worth

address.streetAddress: Rua Comendador Araujo 731 Batel, Shopping Crystal

title: A good restaurant
author: maurodY5878YC
reviewBody: Good restaurant with a varied menu, inspired by Italian cuisine. great option to leave the cinema or theater in a pleasant environment.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Tulio de Rose 80 Shopping Bourbon Country

title: I recommend
author: ThalitaFAssis
reviewBody: Service note thousand and wonderful food !!! Formaggio pasta made inside cheese, you have to try it! Loved it!

title: Great!
author: tadeuavila
reviewBody: Wonderful view, at the foot of Morro do Careca. Very good service, excellent food, very nice decor. Worth it!!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Erivan Franca, 230 muito próximo, o morro careca ... na praia

title: Typical food
author: julio p
reviewBody: Place with differentiated seasoning from other restaurants in the city, pleasant place, easy access, the price is not abusive. Even visiting or living in Palmas you can have the pleasure of good food from the north and different from the others. Show place.

address.streetAddress: Rua 104 sul Rua SE 5 Poco Rico

title: Great Pasta
author: saulmafran
reviewBody: Cozy place, with new decor and ambience, with great pasta, drinks and more news. I always take advantage of the promotions of this place!

address.streetAddress: SHIN CA 4, Lago Norte Iguatemi Shopping

title: Excellent regional food
author: Machado2014
reviewBody: Great regional food, with typical dishes and tb Mediterranean cuisine. Well located and excellent service. There is also an option for those who are vegetarian. The desserts are also excellent. For me the best restaurant of regional food in Brazil.

title: Lunch
author: Lissiane A
reviewBody: Beef from the country. Wonderful dish. My favorite of the restaurant. Super nice atmosphere and impeccable service. Waitstaff super friendly and attentive Daniel and Abraham.

title: Convenience
author: 491fl_viab
reviewBody: Because it is a franchise it is basically the same as all the others, but with one more difference, it has an integrated soverteria "Bacio Gelato" delicious ice creams and also its location is very good and is close to two local fairs, the fair of the moon and sun fair.

address.streetAddress: Av. República do Líbano, 2512 Setor Oeste

title: Kale-Butter Pizza
author: VeraP61
reviewBody: It may seem strange, but the kale pizza is very good. Fried mozzarella, "crispy" is placed over the mozzarella. The environment is tastefully decorated; it has air conditioning and the waiters are very attentive.

address.streetAddress: Rua Professor Lourival Gomes Machado 308 Próximo à Alameda Afonso Schmidt, bairro de Santana

title: Great option
author: 460marcusj
reviewBody: Good food, assorted buffet. Grill and pasta island. Juices and soft drinks at will and good desserts. Good atmosphere and service.

title: Excellent food in a quiet location.
author: Xandão Conceiçã... S
reviewBody: The restaurant has an incomparable quality in the quality of its pizzas, the atmosphere is peaceful and very pleasant.

title: Comfort and Safety
author: Thieme M
reviewBody: This hotel is close to shopping and a commercial center in the Manaus free zone. Excellent accommodation and on Saturdays there is a traditional feijoada.

title: I loved everything!
author: Carolina Flores D
reviewBody: What a clean and pleasant environment, all very tasty. The service was great too! The omelet with parma surprised me lol Congratulations!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Nossa Senhora de Copacabana 1313 Copacabana

title: Sensational!
author: sylviopaulf
reviewBody: Sensational! The suggestion of entry is to try one of each option of fish eggs. A variety boat with octopus and various types of fish, from traditional salmon and tuna to local fish like Serra. If you are still able, order a skin served individually, but the size is worth about 3. Traditional, spacious and very attentive service.

title: Very good
author: EdwarR
reviewBody: I am a resident of Aracaju, I go to Candela at least once a week. I really like the dishes, always well prepared by Juliana. Highlight for cheviche and rice with seafood. And the great price.

title: Very good
author: Beto_Matulevic
reviewBody: Sensational place, service note 10, very tasty dishes. The restaurant is associated with Prato da Boa Souvenir and the 2017 is a must. I recommend.

title: Very good cuisine
author: cidsaopaulo
reviewBody: Very good starters. For my main course, I ordered a boar cup with polenta and mushrooms that was delicious, excellent cooking point, tender, tender and tasty. Really enjoyed. A tip: if you don't arrive early you will have to wait. At Sunday lunch we went, at 12:45 pm I had no more table.

title: Friends Forever!
author: Adriana O
reviewBody: We were well received by Erika and Marcos Júnior for excellent food! Super recommend! Note thousand for you !!

address.streetAddress: Setor comercial Norte Quadra 06 Shopping ID

title: Best bar in Recife for sure
author: diasmoraes
reviewBody: Great prices, excellent service, special drinks, excellent menu and the best mincemeat I've ever eaten.

title: Terrible attendance
author: Fatima_R_L
reviewBody: The place is very beautiful. But I believe I went on a bad day. The pizzas are bad and the service is even worse. I would have liked to try the codfish but the waiter tried hard not to answer it. It passed straight and had no question of answering. First and last time I come to this terrible place.

title: French Comiga
author: Layfe
reviewBody: Small environment but delicious dishes. I asked for a prawn in pumpunha but it was missing. And the main dish is the house.

title: Differentiated flavor
author: Aline R
reviewBody: I loved it. All very tasty. It is more expensive than the similar and already traditional Tuscan but I found it much more tasty. I recommend. I will always come back.

title: Very good
author: SamS1000
reviewBody: I really liked it. We said that we had a flight and they rushed the food, even though the restaurant was full. Good food and fair price.

address.streetAddress: Rua Iraci Nunes Nadior 316 St Oeste

title: Everything's good!!!
author: 221renatad
reviewBody: Starter, main and dessert: everything was wonderful !!!! Mirella and Giuseppe, thanks for the reception! Rest assured that we will be back soon!

title: Low Cost at All Costs
author: Adilson S
reviewBody: Visiting João Pessoa and after having lunch at the food court, I decided to have a real açaí. I had the option of Calzoni but I preferred to bet on a specialized house, which in this case would be Manaçaí. The experience was frustrating, starting with MILK FLOUR. For God's sake, where did you get that terrible milk flour? Haven't you learned that there is only one milk flour? To finish the açaí was pure ice. In short, it needs to improve a lot to be a reference as a specialized place in Açaí

address.streetAddress: Avenida Hilton Souto Maior 3901 Praca de Alimentacao Do Mangabeira Shopping, Mangabeira

title: Boteco Rock and Roll
author: Severino N
reviewBody: Good for listening to good rock, beers, snacks and a game of pool. On Saturdays at night, the public flocks to the sidewalk and often the street in front. Music ranges from Raimundos, Led Zeppelin to Artic Monkeys. The spot has already changed its name (it was the old Come Jazz, Bebe Blues), but maintains the tradition with the rock audience of the beach. Don't expect excellent service: if you want beer on the spot, pick it up at the counter.

title: Love
author: Lylyssa
reviewBody: I've always been passionate about Pizza Hut's pizza, the restaurant is inside the Mag Shoppinh and has a nice atmosphere, we only had problems with the starter we ordered, a garlic bread that was very poorly made, but the pizza was divine.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Governador Flavio Ribeiro Coutinho 115 Lj 37

title: Very good!
author: Joceli F
reviewBody: The place is very comfortable, the outside area has blankets to warm the customers. The waiters are attentive and willing to explain each type of draft beer, whose options (by the way, many! Great place for those who want to venture out and get to know different draft beer) are displayed on a slate at the bar. I indicate Karmeliet!

title: Great! I recommend
author: christianefb2
reviewBody: Excellent service, delicious and very well served food, unique seasoning and good variety, all with a special Arab flavor.

address.streetAddress: Quadra Cls 404 Bloco a loja 11 Loja 11

title: Excellent commercial lunch !!
author: Marcelo B
reviewBody: Always with excellent options of hot dishes, in addition to salads and a good variety of desserts. The taste is excellent, in addition to the atmosphere that is very pleasant. The service is impeccable, very attentive.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Professor Magalhaes Neto 1550 Dist Monte Verde

title: Delicious food
author: Paula C
reviewBody: I arrived at Pecora Nera through a blog post. The first time I went, he had not yet completed a year of operation and it was already a success, but of these exclusives, that few know and that only attended with reservation. I found it wonderful, from the starters to the desserts. Good wine list, good service, tasty atmosphere. Prices are not low, but I don't consider it expensive because the restaurant delivers what it promises. I already paid a little cheaper in places without the lowest quality, it is more worth saving to eat well.

title: Great service
author: rosemeire_stz
reviewBody: Excellent service, varied menu for all tastes and wonderful seasoning and great location.

title: Delicious cupcakes
author: Dante0009
reviewBody: Another good option in the central region for those who like a coffee with muffins of various flavors. Very good

title: It started badly, but reversed well.
author: T1981QVthomass
reviewBody: My girlfriend and I arrived at the restaurant around 8 pm and put the name in line. There were only 2 tables in front of us and we decided to wait. Afterwards, a family of 3 people arrived. After almost 30 minutes of waiting, the tables in front of us had already been accommodated and we were waiting for our turn, until a restaurant employee accommodated the family who arrived after us. Upon seeing this, I went to complain to the employee responsible for the waiting line who told us "these are house rules" ?????? House rules to skip the line ??? So I went to complain to the employee who called the family, who, when he saw what was wrong, apologized and found a place to sit. The restaurant's atmosphere is super pleasant. The waiter who served us was also very helpful and polite. And the food is good and served well. In general, the initial stress almost made me give up on the restaurant, especially when the famous "house rules" were given as an excuse, but after that it was a good experience.

title: excellent choice in Maceió
author: Rogerio V
reviewBody: Cheese, cold draft beer and good service. the decoration of the chandeliers with carboys and bottles give a refined air, good bathrooms and the value is on average

address.streetAddress: Rua Eng Paulo B Nogueira 85 Jatiúca

title: Very good
author: FERNANDO i
reviewBody: Food and surroundings are great for enjoying the night in the neighborhood of Boa Viagem. The prices are also good, worth knowing.

itemReviewed.name: Restaurante e Pizzaria Ilha Da Kosta I

address.streetAddress: Rua Padre Bernardino Pessoa, 50 Boa Viagem

title: delicious
author: everson p
reviewBody: an excellent restaurant, located one block from the sea from the beach of boa viagem, has a varied menu, with fair prices. worth knowing.

address.streetAddress: Rua Barao de Souza Leao, 335, Loja 3

title: Rotation
author: Renata R
reviewBody: Very good variety and location, very affordable price !!! only problem is the delay of the dishes, the wait between one pizza and another is long! the 2nd floor is even worse !!! other than that, I liked it and I'm a customer!

title: Not Pleased
author: Thiago P
reviewBody: Unlike other Chinese restaurants, this one did not please my taste ... something more was missing ... a very different flavor from traditional Chinese.

title: Point on Wednesday nights!
author: juliana s
reviewBody: If you are looking for entertainment mainly on Wednesday night in Teresina, this is the place !!! Thematic environment (rustic style) with drinks and regional foods. There is always a country band or duo performing.

title: a great night !!!!!!!!!!!!!!
author: Roberta A
reviewBody: their creamy shrimp rice is just wonderful and the service is very fast and the atmosphere very peaceful, really a great price-very affordable !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: very good meat rodizio
author: Flavio Q
reviewBody: The service is very good. The meats of good quality. The hygiene of the place and the place are of good quality. Price compatible with the services in general.
userLocation: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont, S/N Bairro Coroa do Meio

title: Tasty pizza with fair price
author: carloshE9335ZI
reviewBody: I went with my family on a Friday night and we became customers, we are always attended by the owners and the pastas are tasty made with Italian flour type: 00. Worth the visit and as a tip try the chef's fantasy.

address.streetAddress: Rua Pompeu Loureiro, 5 Copacabana Loja A

title: Good regional food, in a simple yet welcoming atmosphere, and honest service.
author: andreromeo
reviewBody: Simple restaurant, worth the visit for the well done food

title: Snack Well
author: marcelofcm
reviewBody: Great snack options with the most diverse snacks from Belém, I recommend it to the good ones who love snacks.

title: Relaxed
author: RICARD0PAUL0
reviewBody: Diversity in the exclusively Spanish menu, from entradinhas, food, summer red, good cost x benefit, they have another similar house that I was also called Maripili, ask for jamon starter

title: Great buffet
author: CarolinaPB
reviewBody: For the price we paid, I was impressed with the buffet. Very delicious food and attentive service. But there are many flies, maybe even because of the location, because the place appeared to be very clean.

title: Our best dinner
author: Osmar S
reviewBody: Good atmosphere, great service and the best flavored food I've ever tasted here, thanks loved it.

title: Always a good experience !!
author: Raquel B
reviewBody: We went a few times and joined our list of favorite restaurants. Exquisite service. Short but fair wine list. Exceptional food. Cozy atmosphere. Always recommend!

title: Rustic environment and toy library for the little ones
author: GrazielaZH
reviewBody: Delicious pizza, rustic atmosphere, cold beer and toy library for the little ones. Worth knowing!

title: Excelent reception
author: robertapmartins
reviewBody: Very good food with several options, including meals. the service is excellent, from the waiters and the manager. It's really worth it.

title: Not worth it
author: Thaís Helena A
reviewBody: The environment is beautiful. But the service leaves a lot to be desired. The drinks took more than 20 minutes to arrive, including things that could be served quickly, like soda. The waitresses were thick on more than one occasion. Not to mention that there was a cloud of mosquitoes all night next to our table! And the bathroom without toilet paper. Anyway, the food was good, but the whole thing wasn't worth it. I'm not coming back because it is expensive. Don't come!

title: Good as part of romantic package
author: Bruna V
reviewBody: We were at the restaurant as part of a romantic package at Hotel San Raphael. The menu offers varied options for those who choose this category, and the atmosphere and service were very good. It is good to reserve a good amount if you go outside the package (which has drinks charged separately), since the value of the bill easily exceeds R $ 200 if you want something good for two people).

address.streetAddress: Largo do Arouche 212 Hotel San Michel

title: Very good rodizio
author: nadia_tanigawa
reviewBody: Very good sushi and sashimi rotation. Hot dishes also good. The price matches the quality of the dishes.

title: Great
author: Jaqueline S
reviewBody: Impeccable service, exceptional food, very pleasant atmosphere, in short ... a place to experience memorable moments!

title: Nothing more...
author: Priscilla F
reviewBody: I always went to Hamburgueria do Sujinho (which is next to the restaurant), but this weekend, I decided to try the restaurant's "parmegiana". I liked it, but it wasn't "great". I found it weak, as only accompanying rice and 2 (small) steaks for R $ 53.00 per dish. Salad and other side dishes paid separately. Payment is only in cash and to park the car next door is also paid. I definitely prefer Hamburgueria!

title: Lunch
author: Josélia D
reviewBody: The restaurant offers little variety of dishes. Normally on Saturdays there is a queue. But the food is tasty.

title: We like the experience ... !!!
author: Alex P
reviewBody: It was the best a la carte, we ate in Recife .... we had lunch at Bode do No de Olinda ..... simply beautiful, spectacular place .... very good food, great service 10 ..... hearty food and with normal values - being to Recife (the most expensive capital we visited) couple with two children (5/13) - we spent R $ 180.00 .... it was worth the experience, we recommend ... !!!

address.streetAddress: Rua Doutor João Guilherme de Pontes Sobrinho, 245

title: Great family meal ...
author: 131isabelo
reviewBody: It has a friendly staff, quality service, divine cheese bread and excellent quality meat. They forgot about the babies ... they don't have high chairs and baby changing facilities and they also have to control the temperature of the AC that looked like the north pole in the toilets. Besides, a great meal. Very successful !!!

address.streetAddress: Rua Professor Coutinho Frois 10 Trump Rio de Janeiro

title: I expected more
author: NatashaTRG
reviewBody: I went after the macaroni prepared in the cheese, I saw some places that they made and this was the closest and with a good evaluation. But although the preparation was interesting, the food itself was nothing special, I think people enjoy craft beer more, but I'm not a fan, I just went to lunch. I tried to have a drink with peach syrup, which theoretically would take the bitterness out of the beer, but it didn't work. The food is very well served for two people and prepared there in front of you, in addition to the cheese there is a sauce with mushrooms that makes the difference, only with the cheese it is dull. We ordered a meat to accompany, entrecote and the herb sauce was very good. Anyway, the food was not bad, it was good, but my expectation was very high and the taste was ok.

title: Thinking about dinner
author: Anna Lucia S
reviewBody: We went to 1008 for dinner. To wait for a couple who would go to the restaurant with us we ordered a portion. The portion was wonderful as were the drinks. We ended up not having dinner because the portion was plentiful. The place is pleasant, well ventilated and excellent service! We will be back.

address.streetAddress: 150 - Qd. Rua 1008 23 Lt. 8 Setor Pedro Ludovico

title: Great service
author: Al_Farinazzo
reviewBody: On the beach, with great views and good food. Pleasant location and great service. I recommend.

title: Good option
author: Julienne N
reviewBody: Free buffet with plenty of variety and a very good price! Well located, right in the center and close to the beach. Excellent service.
userLocation: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

title: Good variety of chopps
author: Eduardo S
reviewBody: Good variety of chopps and tasty snacks. The environment is also pleasant. A good place to enjoy with friends.

title: Worth every penny
author: alepasqualine
reviewBody: Great service, meats well served, too cheap for the quality of the products !!! Table of cold excellent, worth it !!!

address.streetAddress: Av. Santos Dumont, S/N Bairro Coroa do Meio

title: The singer had to tell the waiter that I had arrived
author: lefrasao
reviewBody: I arrived and sat for 10 minutes at the table, waiting for the waiter to appear. Which only appeared after the singer (voice and keyboard) went to warn me that I was there. And I don't go unnoticed with red hair! I ordered the food, it didn't have the beans I ordered. Okay, so I ordered another bean. The meat came past the point, the beans were salty and reheated, it was not new. I spent a long time trying to call the waiter to bring a napkin to the table and nothing. And I only asked for the bill because another waiter arrived at a table next to mine. Expensive food for the quality and horrible service, in a place full of tourists. I'm not going back there!

title: Excellent
author: Bejacf
reviewBody: super nice place, outstanding service, excellent food. they serve a sensational "rodizio of garnishes. meats of the first quality. super recommended.

title: Perfect Italian Food
author: Jarbas B
reviewBody: Located in Shopping Praia de Belas has excellent service. Great food and compatible price.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Carneiro da Fontoura 85 Zona Rural

title: Appetizing
author: Daniela S
reviewBody: The food is wonderful, great service, they make a very tasty pepper ... Affordable price! The crab is very appetizing !!!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Doutor Julio Marques Luz 50 Jatiúca

title: Discovering the flavor in João Pessoa
author: francogianmcarlo
reviewBody: The best restaurant in João Pessoa, delicious food, abundant, with quality ingredients and well prepared. I went to dinner with friends and my wife. She and I ordered a fish stew that easily served 3 people. Wonderful place is a must. Grade 10.

title: Quality food!
author: Ketne S
reviewBody: I'm from Recife and this type of restaurant here is quite expensive, so I found the prices very affordable and the quality of the food is excellent. Good service and pleasant atmosphere! Would go back easy :)

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Best place to eat shrimp
author: Elizângela M
reviewBody: Adooooorrrrooooo !!! Best place to eat shrimp in Recife! Various options of snacks and dishes, ALL tasty !! Hit point always there !! It has a branch in the shopping mall Recife, of equal quality !!! And the service is very good!

title: Great Italian food
author: Crippa75
reviewBody: From the service, to the starters, cover, main course and dessert, everything was in line with the level of a high-end restaurant, where the star of the dishes are high quality products and technique. Be sure to try dishes with the famous taggiasca olives, there called Tuscan olive. Although small, they are an explosion of Mediterranean flavors.

title: I loved it
author: anevidor
reviewBody: We went to dinner at the recommendation of a couple of friends who already knew the restaurant. At the entrance we asked for a half moon, which is a kind of dumplings stuffed with shredded beeeem chicken and the main dish was the famous hat: and he did well in the face of his fame! Really very tasty, a kind of omelet in 2 layers with meat stuffing in strips with different vegetables and a tasty sauce in the middle, to accompany serve some very thin pancakes. We love it! The total price was 120 reais!

title: Wonderful
author: 18julianag
reviewBody: I highly recommend Excellent food, impeccable service and fair price The bread at the entrance is wonderful

itemReviewed.name: Abbraccio Cucina Italiana - Shopping Market Place

address.streetAddress: Avenida Doutor Chucri Zaidan, 902 Shopping Market Place. Piso 1

title: Simple and tasty
author: Geison C
reviewBody: Good variety of snacks and very attractive prices. The service is very good and the prices are very inviting. Worth knowing.

title: Bakery or Snack Bar
author: hipismo
reviewBody: The place is great for a casual snack, but, in my opinion, it cannot be defined as a restaurant. The snacks are delicious, the place is organized and the employees are normal.

title: Great option l
author: Luiz_Gustavo
reviewBody: Great service, Claudia served us very well !!! Ideal place to bring family or friends and a business meeting !!

title: Excellent service
author: Mislaniasantana
reviewBody: Attendant Larissa very attentive, sensational service. Pleasant, lively atmosphere. Worth knowing

address.streetAddress: Avenida Paulista 1230 Shopping Cidade De São Paulo

title: Cool !
author: SimoneT869
reviewBody: The bar / restaurant is very cool, with a great location and views of Barra. Choose one of the tables on the balcony. The drinks and portions are very good.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Sete de Setembro 3959 Porto De Barra

title: Mineira food
author: FELIPE83W
reviewBody: Restaurant with rustic decor, pleasant atmosphere, with typical foods from Minas Gerais and Goiás, good service

address.streetAddress: RUA RUI BARBOSA, 739 Atrás do colégio Carmela Dutra

title: Arrive 11:30
author: Bia L
reviewBody: The pig house has a super cool atmosphere. Ask for all tickets and be surprised. :) Watch out for the queue, which can take two hours. Arrive early, or much later.

title: Variety
author: mariaatc
reviewBody: It is very good to taste in this restaurant, in addition to the traditional chicken, grilled meats in very special cuts, in addition to the very tasty pasta, one of its treasures.

title: Happy Hour with BBQ
author: Jucinei P
reviewBody: Excellent place to have a cold and eat a barbecue with tropeiro beans, on the days I went, there was live music and the kiosky was not so full. I recommend

address.streetAddress: Quadra 1303, Bloco B, quiosque s/n Cruzeiro Novo

title: Excellent meal
author: gustavos636
reviewBody: Excellent food, exemplary service, welcoming atmosphere! We were attended by Branco, who provided us with an excellent dinner! As a suggestion, it would only offer a wider variety of beers or at least Heineken!

itemReviewed.name: Casa de Juja - Ateliê de Gastronomia

title: Very nice
author: Mariana C
reviewBody: Delicious location, wonderful visuals, delicious pastries and always cold beer, but the cost is not very low, the Antarctic Original beer costs an average of R $ 11.00.

title: Dinner
author: VictoriaTamasevicius
reviewBody: Very good restaurant, great service too, super fast service and excellent food, never miss

address.streetAddress: Avenida Doutor Chucri Zaidan, 902 Shopping Market Place

title: Wonderful
author: H5797XPmariap
reviewBody: First class service, delicious food, cozy place. Everything perfect. Without a doubt the best restaurant in Vitória.

address.streetAddress: Rua Desembargador Sampaio, 332 - Praia do Canto

title: pattern food coconut bamboo
author: thiagop629
reviewBody: it has an outdoor area and live music. the menu is the same as coconut bamboo in other restaurants in brazil. I had a very good shrimp risotto.

title: Cheap and fast dog
author: francisco M
reviewBody: Simple dog, affordable price, reasonable service. The location is excellent, located on an avenue with many snack options.

title: Excellent option for family with children
author: Familia81
reviewBody: Excellent option for family with children. Tasty food and fair price. Discomfort is the flannel on the street.

address.streetAddress: Rua Eng Paulo B Nogueira 85 Jatiúca

title: Italian with sophistication
author: lmzn
reviewBody: Small but very cozy space, tasteful decor, kind staff and the main thing is delicious food. Small menu, but with options that suit all tastes. Wonderful vegetarian dishes! The spaghetti point was perfect, quite al dente. Sugo sauce in the right measure. The incredible pesto with a unique lemon scent. For dessert, gianduia canoles. There's no mistake! Go patiently to endure the wait. Yesterday we waited 1h30min on a Carnival Monday. But we stayed outside, which is very tasty, eating some entrees and enjoying the night with friends! It passed quickly and in the final balance, it was worth the wait!

address.streetAddress: Rua Jeronimo da Veiga, 30 Itaim Bibi

title: Best experience !!
author: mahzarzur
reviewBody: Don't miss the opportunity to live the best Japanese food experience in town! Excellent service, true 5 star restaurant.

title: The new is the best!
author: Alessandra S
reviewBody: The food of all Cateretês is great! But the new Cateretê, near the Flamboyant, is the best! Huge, selected environment, with children's area. The steaks are excellent, but top ten for the lamb! The service is first rate. It's kind of expensive, but there are promotions at lunch and at the beginning of the week.

address.streetAddress: Av. T-2 Setor Bueno E Rua 10 Setor Oeste

title: One of the best breweries in town!
author: fernandotagliarini
reviewBody: I visited the place with friends and the first impression was good. Right at the entrance there is a shop with a good variety of beers and souvenirs, and afterwards comes the bar, with a beautiful refrigerator behind and more than 20 options of beers on tap. There are two very cool and spacious environments. The entire house is decorated with numerous beer advertising posters that add a special touch. We ordered portions, all of them delicious, but the one that most caught our attention was the coxinha with catupiry: delicious! The beers were great, of course, and were well accompanied by the gourmet burger - good choice! The waiters fumble a little with orders, but overall the service was good. Do not go expecting the same variety of beers found at Empório Alto de Pinheiros, but I recommend the visit for the environment. Oh, and prepare your pocket: the visit doesn't come cheap.

title: Flavor and refinement
author: Chryka
reviewBody: Wonderful restaurant. The look of the sea already leaves us dazzled. Each person's dishes are different, making a beautiful composition on the table. Impeccable service, wonderful suggestion. Varied menu, impeccably prepared dishes.

title: Cold beer and relaxed atmosphere
author: pzinhp
reviewBody: I loved the Brazier! Good pizza, freshly made snacks, super cold beer and live music at the FDS! I highly recommend it to all visitors to the city.

title: Art Deco ambience with traditional food
author: robertocV3769MB
reviewBody: The green Art Deco building full of original details still supports with its well trained and electric waiters, the post of an excellent place in Lagoa where you eat well and fast at very honest prices! Each dish can be easily shared by two people with normal hunger!

title: Best restaurant
author: FranciscoS2119
reviewBody: Congratulations Paco !!! It's great, your kitchen was wonderful, excellent dishes, cracking beers !! Parrilla top

title: Excellent price.
author: jaimesales
reviewBody: I have always eaten at the spoleto, good food, great price, cordial patient service, good option for those in a hurry.

address.streetAddress: Av. Bernardo Vieira, 3775 loja 201 A Tirol

title: As always met expectations
author: IgorGameleiro
reviewBody: As always met expectations with succulent meats and great service. The waiter Ricardo, as well as the entire Caminito team, is to be congratulated!

address.streetAddress: Quadra Sig Quadra 8 Lote 2375 Ao lado do Nazo Sushi Bar e Primeiro Bar

title: Delicious food and good service
author: Guaciara
reviewBody: We ordered shrimp bobó and it was delicious, as was the juice. The service is very good, the place is beautiful, the bathroom clean and pleasant, it has a changing room. Recommended!

title: service and quality
author: thiagoo9
reviewBody: always a good option for those who enjoy very good food combined with good service. Orange juice with strawberry is one of the best juices I've ever had

address.streetAddress: Travessa Casalbuono, 120, Vila Guilherme Shopping Center Norte, Loja 24

title: If you like Heineken don't come here ...
author: B3764MDantoniom
reviewBody: In full Friday 1 hour after we seated 10 people .... Still on the 7th Heineken and waiter / manager arrive saying that Heineken is over cold 🤔☹️

address.streetAddress: Avenida Visconde de Souza Franco 776 Boulevard Shopping

title: Divine
author: Flavia-Tobias
reviewBody: I don't eat seafood. I went with my husband. For him one of the best restaurants there is. Recommended the pastel de camarao for fans. I had a wonderful salad. With chicken without the slightest taste of fish. Great desserts. Fair price because the dishes are very full. Pleasant environment. Unmissable.

title: Sensational
author: Maria V
reviewBody: The shrimp dishes do justice to the place and the name of the restaurant. They arrive at the table as true works of art. Tasty to the extreme. Desserts to leave anyone jaw-dropping. Very recommended !!! It has a great reception structure with pager for table waiting and mini tastings.

title: Lunch time
author: None
reviewBody: This review is only valid for lunch. Good food, good price, Excelent services. This restaurant is located in the bustling and economical area of Faria Lima Avenue. It has an atmosphere that makes you feel at home and actually looks an indian home. Lots of Indian food options. Try the chicken with red curry, delicious.

title: Buffet of the minute
author: Leatoralles
reviewBody: Wonderful! It looks like you're in Paris. Fair price, pleasant atmosphere, very homemade food made by you and the mothers. Typical desserts from southern Brazil.
userLocation: Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil

address.streetAddress: Praca Doutor Mauricio Cardoso 53 Moinhos de Vento

title: Refinement and sophistication
author: MauricioPrad0
reviewBody: Selected ambience, with food for the most exquisite palates, with prime meat, in addition to the seafood that is the main attraction. The desserts are perfect. It is worth going, the price is high, more is well paid.

address.streetAddress: Av. Agamenon Magalhães, 2132 Próximo ao colégio da policia militar de Pernambuco

title: Offer of skewers not very varied. Cost benefit does not pay
author: Mafalda Cristin... B
reviewBody: It leaves something to be desired in the offer of varied skewers. Beer without varieties, stuck to a brand. Good service and pleasant atmosphere

address.streetAddress: Avenida Jose Goncalves de Medeiros 138 Prq Residencial Nova Franca

title: Excellent!
author: Gabrielbggomes
reviewBody: Very delicious food! One of the best lambs I've ever eaten. Plenty of meat options and an interesting buffett

title: Thin pizza and fun dessert
author: Giselle A
reviewBody: In this new Companhia Paulista restaurant in my city, the pizza is different, with different flavors and very fine, as we like. Well-made pasta and unusual flavors ... Tacacá, Parma Ham and Gourmet Margueritta (with buffalo mozzarella). The desserts are fun, with popsicles, chocolate balls that fall apart. My kids loved it (and me too!)

address.streetAddress: Tv Benjamin Constant 1415 Entre Bras e Nazare

title: The best
author: Kalyne C
reviewBody: Did you think of shrimp and good food? You can't come to Natal without going through this restaurant. Delicious food, very pleasant atmosphere, the service is great and super fast, the dishes take no time to serve and the location is wonderful. Get ready for a waiting line ...

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Best tapioca I've ever eaten
author: laisfernandess
reviewBody: Cozy and stylish place. The tables are placed on a ground with sand and you have the feeling of being eating by the beach. The attendants are very friendly and the menu is wonderful. More than 20 tapioca options, ranging from R $ 8 - coconut tapioca - up to R $ 40 and are quite large. The average price is R $ 25. I ordered the sun-dried meat with rennet cheese and it's wonderful. My husband ate Canto do Mangue - with crab meat and loved it. I highly recommend it.

address.streetAddress: Rua Manoel AB de Araujo 130A Alto de Ponta Negra

title: "good"
author: marcos m
reviewBody: Very nice bar with great service, although not too big, always fits one more, with perfect codfish cake and cold beer

title: Cozy Place
author: Sandemberger
reviewBody: The reception is good, and very fast. Granders room and impeccable organization. Certainly a special place
userLocation: Natal, Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil

address.streetAddress: Avenida Governador Silvio Pedroza 15 Areia Preta

title: Mamis Birthday
author: samillyas
reviewBody: I would like to thank you for the commitment and quality of service provided by the waiter EDUARDO and JONCELIANO. The Coco Bambu chain is always the choice of our family. In particular, we love to celebrate our gatherings here at Dom Pastel, the best of all! Thank you for the excellence in the service provided. Your professionals have an excellent professional attitude, and at the same time, celebrate each celebration with us!

title: Razoalvel
author: Lucas M
reviewBody: The service is good, I passed by the place quickly and didn't get to lunch, it was easy to find the establishment.

title: Excellent!!
author: Francisco T
reviewBody: It is very worthwhile to make the reservation and enjoy the atmosphere that the house provides. The tasting menu is eye-catching for its presentation and flavor. Super recommended !!!

title: feijoada
author: Maria De Fatima A
reviewBody: The place is very pleasant. The feijoada (served on Saturdays) is good, consistent with the price charged. I will definitely come back

address.streetAddress: Rua Fernando Luiz Henriques dos Santos 1501

title: Too much advertising for little restaurant
author: 267vitorh
reviewBody: The restaurant is large and well ventilated, but the service is terrible, they seem not to be concerned with the customer. When we arrived, there was a buffet option per kilo with northeastern foods and everyday foods, nothing much, by the way. The only positive point is the cocada, dessert.

title: Need to reformulate, but it's good
author: Marina D
reviewBody: I still consider it one of the best for its tradition, but it needs to reformulate some things like the festival. Still, there I can eat tuna in rodizio, which in other restaurants this option is not even offered.

title: Best cost-benefit. I recommend !!
author: Fernanda A
reviewBody: Matuto is a clean and organized truck, located next to the Catete subway station, which serves a hamburger flavor a day and a variety of tapioca flavors. There are always special beers too. The prices are VERY FAIR !! The hamburger always costs 18 reais. Tapioca ranges from 10 to 13 reais. If you add more ingredient, of course it costs more. About the burger: the blend and the salads (lettuce, tomato and pickles) are always the same. Cheese, bread and mayonnaise vary. I find the burger options very interesting. Yesterday I ate the hamburger complete with cheddar, chimichurri mayonnaise and green pepper bread. I think the ingredients can be more tasty and vigorous, and the blend with a little more salt, but in general, the burger is delicious. Yes, it's worth it! Tapiocas are DELICIOUS and CAPRICHADAS !!! Super recommended! In addition to good food, the owner is very attentive and they always leave the street clean at the end of the day. We have to appreciate that !!

title: Red meat and fish? This is the place
author: luizclaudiod547
reviewBody: Nice place, impeccable service and full and tasty dishes. Lamb, fish and delicious entrees. Very cold beer and interesting wine list. Very good to go with family or friends. When I go, I prefer to go for lunch, because the food is very abundant and I eat very little at night. If they say it can be for three people, it certainly serves four. The sun meat is very soft and well made. Lamb and fish also very well served and tasty. To improve, there is also an area for children that is very wide, airy and with new and interesting toys. I suggest calling to reserve a table at night, at peak times, because it is very crowded. The owner is always there, asking how the service is doing and if the dishes are pleasing. It is worth checking. As for the price, they deliver what they charge. Good Cost x Benefit.

title: Great cost benefit
author: Andre_Wohlfahrt
reviewBody: I have been several times and I am always very well attended. Great food and a wide variety of dishes. Good parking and good price.

title: Shrimp Sequential
author: Alexandro A
reviewBody: Great prawn carvery !!! They do sequential type of dishes placing all the promised dishes. 20 of shrimp, but sun meat, fish (I loved the barbecue) and cod salad, among others. Great cost benefit. I recommend!!!

title: Most famous saladeria in town
author: janaynan2016
reviewBody: Green salads, juices and crepes. Pleasant environment (mostly non-air-conditioned). Delicious sauces add a special touch to salads. Disadvantage is that the protein portion is small.

title: The best I've ever been
author: Fernanda V
reviewBody: Sensational restaurant, there was absolutely nothing bad, you notice that the ingredients are selected, all top notch and very worth the rodizio for R $ 89.90, I prefer to pay this and eat with this high quality than to pay a rodizio of 65 and think I threw my money in the trash! go and be happy

title: Seaside Shrimp
author: gabrielalana
reviewBody: Great restaurant, super attentive waiters, the food is always PERFECT! Good drinks, sound and atmosphere I highly recommend.

title: Fresh pasta, ready-made lasagna and an unmatched mini-pizza!
author: HFreire
reviewBody: A traditional street shop, without seats, very close to the Gal.Osório do Metro station in Ipanema, which produces fresh pasta that can be finished at home with sauces sold separately. Lasagna can be prepared in the customer's container. At the counter the mini-pizza that is baked at all times is second to none and is well worth the visit. Sweets complete the offer and there is delivery to Z. Sul.

title: Eat well
author: Roberto L
reviewBody: Simple place, good service and very good food. The specialty of the house is the Tambaqui rib that I recommend. It has great price and quality.

title: Good food
author: BIANCA O
reviewBody: Excellent food, great place, very polite and friendly staff. However, the price is very high, that is, very expensive.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Coronel Colares Moreira 1 Quadra 19 - Calhau

title: Sensational!
author: AnaG639
reviewBody: I go whenever I want to eat Indian food, I don't even remember the last time I went to another Indian restaurant. Spectacular food, fast and excellent service.

title: Excellent Burger at a fair price
author: ruyf860
reviewBody: Good option for a good price! I got the hamburger to eat at home "to go" but I could see that the restaurant is better than it appears in photos!

title: Unforgettable food !!!!
author: Verônica N
reviewBody: Excellent Italian restaurant located in the Gourmet area of Shopping Morumbi. Exceptional wine list, very well decorated and cozy atmosphere and the food is a show apart. I ordered a medallion dish of filet mignon with brie cheese in marsala wine sauce with risotto with gran padano cheese. Very well served and "licking my lips" so delicious. I recommend this restaurant for romantic dinners. It is super worth it !!!!

title: Excellent
author: Luizantonioinacio
reviewBody: Very delicious food. The buffet is dynamic, always with new salads. All very well prepared. Ideal for a post-beach

title: Incredible food
author: SergioAndrade1
reviewBody: I read several reviews and thought: "it must be an exaggeration". But when my black Ravioli stuffed with shrimp in Mango Chutney arrived, I had to eat on my knees. Apart from the location and the nice, pleasant atmosphere.

title: Bar with one of the best boteco foods in Salvador
author: olivansantos2015
reviewBody: Many options of boteco food, with good service and fair prices, with a familiar and eclectic atmosphere.

itemReviewed.name: Bar Do Jonas - o Tempero Da Terra

address.streetAddress: Rua Professor Gerson Pinto SN Centro

title: "O" Boteco!
author: carlosper2
reviewBody: The best caipirinha in São Paulo! You can go at Av.Faria Lima or at the convenience of Morumbi shopping. Delicious beats and great caipirinhas, all very original with a fair price for the proposal. Pleasant space, snacks and first class dishes. Look for Vinicius or Roberto, but they all serve with the same promptness and attention. Ask for tips, everyone has great ideas! Very good for happy hour or a lazy lunch on Saturday or Sunday. Enjoy your food!

title: Nice food!
author: Sgrolli
reviewBody: Good food, good price, satisfactory service, waiting time within expectation, I liked the place ...

address.streetAddress: Avenida Presidente Vargas 132 Bairro Da Campina

title: Good food
author: ronikatz
reviewBody: Restaurant located in a small shopping center next to FGV. Tasty food; good service and a fair price

title: Feijoada BALL SHOW !!!
author: Gustavo_Barros_Rec
reviewBody: We went on Saturday with a group of friends to have lunch there. At the time it was Feijoada day. It was really good. The price I found quite honest for the quality. For what sells pizza having a Feijoada like this is very worth going !!!

title: Birthday
author: Ana J
reviewBody: I visited and found one of the best pizzerias I have ever visited wonderful and I loved Joel's service, very polite and helpful!

title: The best of fish
author: Joaquim S
reviewBody: This is one of the best restaurants in Cuiabá. Wonderful fish. Be sure to order a Matrinchã. The fish are fresh and made to order, so it takes time. Go with time.

title: Sensational
author: larissabfontes
reviewBody: Wonderful restaurant !! Delicious, plentiful food at a fair price. Super charming atmosphere, the waiting area outside is already beautiful.

address.streetAddress: Rua Jeronimo da Veiga, 30 Itaim Bibi

title: Lunch with friends
author: Anely62
reviewBody: Restaurant with pleasant atmosphere, well located and delicious food. Although all the dishes are delicious, I think the restaurant was not prepared to receive many people at the same time. After serving the first dish, it took too long to vote to serve more. The attendant himself informed me that the delay was because there were too many people to be served. I hope to have a normal day to enjoy the dishes that were delicious. Especially the fish at Rondon.

title: Delicious
author: Tássia T
reviewBody: as always, the subway is a great option to kill hunger, but for a change the lines are immense. The service takes a long time, but the sandwiches are delicious.

title: Show schedule
author: Joao_de_Brito
reviewBody: Great to take that original cold, also enjoying a broth of seafood or beans. Sit on the wall of the urca, admire the landscape and relax. Relaxed, informal and very cool. Get a little cluttered to buy things and the pressure to go to the bathroom. But in general, it is very good! I will return every time I go to Rio.

title: The best meat in the city.
author: Filipebac
reviewBody: The 300 gram meal type sun meat serves two people and has excellent side dishes: two baião with cheese, cooked cassava and differentiated vinaigrette as it is made with lots of tomatoes. The sun meat is very tender and tasty.

address.streetAddress: Av. Nossa Senhora de Fatima, 2575 O número correto é este, não o que estava divulgado.

title: No mistake
author: Jansileia
reviewBody: This is the restaurant that everyone celebrates their successes and achievements. It has a complete menu. There are meats, chickens, fish, pizzas, ice cream ... Everything! The food is good, but the price is a little steep.

title: Best option in Teodoro!
author: hugog946
reviewBody: Whenever I go to Teodoro I always go to Quero Quilo, because after having tried several this one was the best, due to the service and quality of the food!

address.streetAddress: Rua Teodoro Sampaio Cj Jose Pires De Godoy

title: Excellent!!!
author: carolcelles
reviewBody: In Rio de Janeiro I don't know a place with the best cost / benefit. Tasty food and very well served. I love the dry tomato risotto with filet mignon in the Paris mushroom sauce. Everything very well done and excellent service.

address.streetAddress: Av. Lauro Muller, 116 Shopping Rio Sul

title: Great option
author: Amarildo S
reviewBody: I was invited to lunch with friends and did not know the restaurant. Great surprise, pleasant atmosphere and very good service. Great quality food.

title: Confused
author: amomnascimento
reviewBody: Starting with the good part, the meat served has an excellent seasoning and tenderness, I don't remember it very well but I think it was a chorizo. In addition to a super frozen beer. But what was marked, unfortunately, was the bad part. The restaurant is a little confusing in terms of "theme". By its name it is an "American" bar, but inside, with pictures of classic films and dark colors (all black), we are a little lost. Here comes the menu on an A4 sheet. Nothing against that part, but because we really couldn't understand what the look of the restaurant wanted to tell us. It may be boring, but the environment gave me that idea. In addition, very (very) expensive food for the portion that arrives at the table.

title: Scenario and Flavor!
author: Silvane_Romero
reviewBody: One of the most graceful environments in our capital of Rio Grande do Sul, it is undoubtedly one of the right addresses that I make a point of taking friends who come from other countries to visit me. Attending the house for several years, I always had a certain dissatisfaction with the service and registered with the management. however on my last visit I was surprised by the service, the house has a new team, which in addition to being helpful is efficient and extremely kind. we tried several snacks, a cold draft beer at the right point and desserts such as casserole with cassis and a breathtaking oven baked coconut. Now in this spring time our happy hours have the right address. Oh ... and the price is very good ... and there is a double draft beer from 6pm to 8pm ... I recommend it!

title: Yummy self service!
author: Lagartoleta
reviewBody: The price is not cheap, between 50 and 60 kilo. But it has a lot of variety, regional dishes, national dishes, salads and the desserts are excellent,

title: Pleasant lunch
author: anacarolvieira
reviewBody: Willian's nice location and excellent service. The dishes were served quickly and at an appropriate temperature. Helpful service. I recommend!

address.streetAddress: Rua Francisco Deslandes 900 Shopping Anchieta Garden Shopping Anchieta Garden

title: Spectacular experience!
author: MarcellaSchutzer
reviewBody: Beautiful restaurant, splendid food and even better service! The atmosphere is super nice and the decor is beautiful! My favorite dish is Capellini with lemon scent and mushrooms with truffled oil, it is delicate and very tasty! The chocolate cake with milk ice cream nest is also a must!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Brigadeiro Faria Lima 2232 Shopping Iguatemi Sao Paulo - Piso Superior

title: worth knowing
author: Vinicius M
reviewBody: Nice place to hang out with friends. The less lively have several tables available, for the more lively 2 environments for bands. Admission is paid but there are several shows at night.

title: Excellent
author: tulior275
reviewBody: One of the best temakis I have ever eaten. Very tasty, very good fish, seaweed and seasoning !! I recommend Ishiban, with salmon and shimeji. Detail: they are giants hehe

title: Best of Goiânia
author: PPiona
reviewBody: Wonderful pizza, I like Fialho very much, the dough is very good, harmonious with everything else! Very pleasant atmosphere, accurate and helpful service! I recommend.
userLocation: São João da Boa Vista, SP

title: Incredible buffet and attentively show
author: evandroa2015
reviewBody: I already knew this restaurant but now that I am going to evaluate it, I felt motivated to make the evaluation due to the changes I noticed, organized, clean, beautiful and tasty buffet, incredible service, I liked the idea of a waiter offering grilled meat on the tables, it was kind steakhouse ... On Saturdays it serves feijoada and the price is right ...

title: Lunch
author: gabrielazuardi
reviewBody: Thomas has a very good buffet at a good price for lunch too! It has a variety of hot dishes, and I found the food very good!

address.streetAddress: Rua Padre Chagas, 330 Moinhos de Vento

title: Sound too loud
author: maribrandaoz
reviewBody: The burger is great but the volume in the lounge is too loud. Worse is asking to go down and hear that you can't because it is “the norm of the house” ... I prefer not to go back and eat at TT Burguer

address.streetAddress: Avenida das Americas 8585 Vogue Square Mall - loja 105

title: Good place to see and be seen
author: mariagabriellak
reviewBody: Modern, relaxed and full of charm (mainly due to the waiters / models). Valet is not charged (a rarity in São Paulo), but the food was nothing too surprising. Penne with melon and raw ham is the most requested dish. It is always crowded, so the ideal is to arrive early or have patience.

title: prefect service and food. the excellent environment!
author: Jose Antonio S
reviewBody: Whenever I'm in Natal, I don't miss going to eat a shrimp salad and a good house wine.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Very good restaurant!
author: Ricardolfgv
reviewBody: We were in Cameroon in Natal and we were very well attended. In addition the food is excellent. It is impossible to visit Natal is not to go to Cameroon.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Great food
author: 0daniloc
reviewBody: It is not carvery but the food is excellent. Bon service at a fair price. Valet service included .... Very good atmosphere. Excellent option

title: Excellent for those who want to try typical local food
author: Danielle M
reviewBody: A point to note would be the preference for the old restaurant. There are two restaurants, one on the beach, on Av Litorãnea and one at the tip of the lighthouse. I prefer the old one at the tip of the lighthouse in every way. Mainly the service.

title: Dinner with friends
author: susyegert
reviewBody: Delicious dishes, Suggestion for you who love to try new flavors: choose the Ceviches Tasting. If you want a meal the ceviche is what I recommend the most and the portion is satisfying. Black rice is fantastic too. Sushi I prefer from other places, but it is good. The value of the executive lunch is also super affordable and satisfying. Lunch is super affordable. Dinner is average.

title: Very good, beautiful restaurant and pleasant service.
author: osvaldoalves
reviewBody: Very good foods, especially the pizzas. Very nice and beautiful place, Excellent option to chat with the family. Very cold beers and draft beer. Close to the beach, you can walk from the hotel I stayed at. very gastronomically attractive surroundings. I advise everyone both this place and the neighborhood as a whole.

address.streetAddress: Av. Dr. Antônio G. de Barros, 188 Jatiúca

title: Lack of preparation to meet when full
author: estelamizu
reviewBody: Today at lunch we were in four people and the dishes took 1 hour and 20 minutes to be ready. The excuse of the manager, owner or whoever came to talk to us, was that there were a lot of orders at that time (funny that everyone wants to have lunch at lunchtime right?!?!). In addition, we ordered grated cheese and informed that it had not. The food was ok, nothing wonderful. An excellent alternative, with perfect service, reasonable time for preparation and very delicious food (and much better, in my opinion) is less than a block away, Bacareto. There is not that most refined style of the environment, but certainly the service and food are 10 x 0 in this "osteria".

title: Great option
author: Cindy S
reviewBody: An excellent option, the hamburgers are very delicious, the handmade mayonnaise is spectacular, the potatoes are very crunchy, the service is always good. The store is not big, but very cozy, it has a North American restaurant style. Next to the subway Vila Prudente.

title: Refined and excellent service
author: Sam D
reviewBody: First rate staff, and the cheese ice cream is unique .. It really is worth the visit when the destination is Cuiabá.

title: Sun dried meat
author: JuniorO223
reviewBody: best sun meat from the reef with good service. good location. there are other variations of dishes. if you don't know, you need to know.

title: Pleasant atmosphere, several options of dishes.
author: AndyGnt
reviewBody: Very good restaurant, several options of dishes. Pleasant atmosphere, especially on the balcony facing the street. We savored a Tutu from Minas Gerais and a Surubim with Vegetables.

title: Sensational Food and Drink!
author: Prsm21
reviewBody: This evaluation is about the sidewalk bar, as the Urca bar is divided into a restaurant (upstairs) and the sidewalk bar which is a typical Rio tavern with a but, does not have tables and chairs to sit, so customers use the sidewalk wall to support food and drink. The beer comes very cold and the delicious snacks stand out for the pastries and the fried sardines ... delights ... the difference is to drink the beer enjoying the beautiful view that the Urca neighborhood offers, with the botafogo cove and the hill at the bottom of the corcovado.

title: Nice walk
author: Robertasbarroso
reviewBody: Tour by the Guaíba River, well organized with guides, by islands and with a beautiful view of the city of Porto Alegre.

title: Great pizza.
author: marcelgsilva
reviewBody: I went to the restaurant to eat pizza and it was worth it, very tasty, thin dough. It was really worth it.

title: Eating well is a matter of choice
author: LolitaDrummond
reviewBody: Diverse and good menu, well located. Good service and well frequented location. Being a great place for dinner

title: Weak service at the beginning of activities
author: edisontjunior
reviewBody: I know the people in charge of the restaurant, they have a lot of money and I always bought with them, so I felt the obligation to talk and expose the mistakes that occurred when I was at the place, the restaurant has a very nice atmosphere, well located but it has sinned by the service, many Sometimes our table and others waited a long time to have food on the table, they were disorganized and in need of guidance and it was the customers themselves who helped with the orders. I hope to visit soon and post a new review. The food is worth it, the prices are good and the beer is very cold

title: Good Steakhouse
author: carlostarraf
reviewBody: Very good meat, varied salad buffet, very good service. In Cuiabá one of the best, it's worth checking out !!!

title: I expected more
author: lucianad765
reviewBody: I have been to other chain restaurants and expected more. Despite the very good service the food left something to be desired. Sangria in a very small jar. The whole rsfeicao was not worth the amount we paid.

title: A find in Poa
author: alexbR3763HJ
reviewBody: I recommend going mainly as the temperature allows you to access the tables in the garden. Without a doubt, in addition to good food, this restaurant's differential.

address.streetAddress: Rua Fernando Gomes, 44 Moinhos de Vento

title: Good fish!
author: BrunoS4527
reviewBody: The fish is good and cheap, I don't recommend it for people who like a quiet place, it's a little noisy but a lot of fun.

title: Relaxed and very good
author: 296danid
reviewBody: I loved lunch with a friend! Relaxed atmosphere, full of young executives and modern women, young waiters are very attentive. The food is excellent, a little pricey for lunch, but Vsle is worth it! The tuna sealed with olive oil and lemon sauce is divine! The pasta with melon and parma ham was my friend's choice, unusual is very tasty!

title: Italian cuisine
author: Marcos M
reviewBody: great italian food ,,,,, for those who love European gastronomy, this is an excellent option

address.streetAddress: Avenida Presidente Cafe Filho 11 Pr Do Meio

title: Good food and good cost-benefit restaurant
author: 847fabino
reviewBody: Good Minas food, fish salads, great atmosphere, but sometimes very crowded, it is worth it for those who are close. And very cheap compared to Rio and SP !!! Good desserts paid for separately. But few boxes to pay delay !!!!!

title: Passionate!
author: valmirlins
reviewBody: In my humble opinion, this is the best restaurant in town. Expensive, but the service is impeccable, the atmosphere is passionate and the food is exceptional. Order Ganberi with Formaggio Fuso. And for dessert the Sopresa Caravaggio. Worth every penny!

address.streetAddress: Rua Professor Dias da Rocha, 199 Varjota

title: Very good
author: flaviadeti
reviewBody: It was a very nice and nice ride. The night was not very favorable due to the weather, but in the outback everything is always very good! The standard is excellent and there was no queue.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Diario de Noticias, 300, Cristal Barra Shopping Sul, Piso Guaíba

title: Very good!
author: gabihmayer
reviewBody: Great request. One of the best pasta in SP. I recommend booking at night, as it is very busy. If possible, ask for a table on the street and enjoy a pleasant evening.

address.streetAddress: Rua Jeronimo da Veiga, 30 Itaim Bibi

title: ONE OF THE BEST PRICES IN CHRISTMAS SLIDE
author: otavioblz11
reviewBody: We had lunch, my wife and a cousin, had a natural juice and water, I paid R $ 84.00 and my 4 year old son still got a "ride" with us. Free buffet for R $ 23.00. The best price I found on the waterfront. Very hygienic environment, good service and good variety of flavors. I highlight the feijoada (white beans) and the shrimp. I highly recommend it.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Erivan Franca 152 Aquaria Natal Hotel

title: Great!!!
author: antoniop254
reviewBody: My mother's birthday. Great food, amazing Reginaldo service! The atmosphere is pleasant and informal.

address.streetAddress: Rua Francisco Deslandes 900 Shopping Anchieta Garden Shopping Anchieta Garden

title: Excellent
author: Joao M
reviewBody: exceptional service, unrivaled rib. Be sure to try the rib sausage. Excellent option in the city

title: Northern region food
author: ECNepomuceno1975
reviewBody: Nice atmosphere, good service and good food. I recommend the visit. The cost benefit is not scary. Amazonian dishes.

title: Pizza slice- good value for money
author: 873carinac
reviewBody: The place is nice and runs away from those "street stalls". The presentation is good. It's very tight and "Bomb". Despite this, we were well attended by waiter Wilson. It has several dishes, snacks, hamburger, pizza, sweets and ice cream. Prices are quite steep. A Brahma chop, 500ml, costs around R $ 16. We ate a slice of pizza (very generous, almost 3 pieces), which comes with a super edge of catupiry. Only that edge is almost an oven pastel. The cost is R $ 14.00 and you are satisfied with just that. I thought the pizza was good. Hot, for the proposal. And it can also be added to the condiments on the table: ketchup, mustard and Heinz mayonnaise, olive oil and a sensational home barbecue sauce. For these condiments, you earn a lot of points, for me! I saw that the dishes are well served and may serve two people. For two people, with pizza (2 slices) and chop (2 of 500ml), the bill came to R $ 67.

address.streetAddress: Avenida  Nossa Senhora de Copacabana Copacabana

title: Milkshake Ovomaltine
author: Fabrício B
reviewBody: The best thing about this snack bar is the ovomaltine milkshake! Its very tasty! It is not for nothing that is so successful!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Giovanni Gronchi 5819 Shopping Jardim Sul - Piso 2

title: Finger-licking!
author: CijameJr
reviewBody: I went by a friend's recommendation and I didn't regret it. The atmosphere is cozy, air conditioned and well decorated. The service is courteous and, in a way, fast! As it is very busy, you always get a good queue when you arrive. In my case, regardless of time, I always took the queue. But the space to wait is ample and they always serve a snack to appease hunger. The food is unique, one of the best shrimp dishes I've ever eaten, well prepared, with an incredible look and the portion is generous. Cameroon is a reference and a mandatory stop whenever I go to Natal.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Best pastel and ambience
author: Bernardo T
reviewBody: Wide variety of pastries and all that I managed to try were very good, dry and well filled. Great location and first class service! I recommend it to everyone

title: Sensational!
author: Fernanda F
reviewBody: I just LOVE Nono! I've already celebrated birthdays, farewell to Europe, starting a job, promotion, anything. Only in November / 17 I was 5x. Pizzas ma-ra-vi-lho-sas, excellent service from the parking, concierge, waiters and management !! Everyone is to be congratulated !! Super recommended !!

title: Brazilian food
author: tais a
reviewBody: I only had good references about the restaurant. Cozy atmosphere. Wonderful service, great starters (corn bread). Maria Isabel menu: main dish had fish of the day with baru nut crust, mashed plantain and lime orange vinaigrette, and mutton sirloin with paçoca, Maria Isabel rice and pickled gherkin ... perfect. If you still have it, order the Caju Refrescante drink (Cashew juice, cajuína, cashew sweet syrup, lemon juice and mint), he missed Fortaleza.

title: Excellent
author: Naiara0000
reviewBody: VERY good food, nice place and great service. Portions look expensive, but they serve three people well and so it comes out well. Best restaurant in Fortaleza

title: McDonald's and McDonald's
author: Andresa F
reviewBody: I've been going there for years, after the renovation it got better, because before it had even been banned for hygiene reasons, it's always full of people and in the summer the ice cream line goes far, but there are plenty of tables to sit on the first and second floors .

title: Love!
author: danyp619
reviewBody: Excellent food, first class service, prices are getting a bit steep, but the quality of service pays off! I will always!

title: The pasta is unforgettable !!!
author: GENI J
reviewBody: Delights the macaroni made inside the cheese. Unmissable. I had already tried to go other times but it was always crowded. At lunch it was quiet.

title: Fantastic
author: Neto N
reviewBody: Juicy and tasty hamburger. Just right! I ate the famous Queijoca and I loved it! Rustic potatoes were also super crispy! Congratulations!

title: Food quality
author: pessoamesquita
reviewBody: The meal at Restaurante Mangai is of excellent quality, featuring a variety of cold and hot dishes that, by means of an excellent quality, appeals to the most demanding palates. The physical environment is very spacious, clean and with an exuberant architecture, making it possible to enjoy meals with all the tranquility and pleasure

address.streetAddress: Setor comercial Norte Quadra 06 Shopping ID

title: Good
author: BlogPapoBom
reviewBody: The location itself is charming, the decor is beautiful and the service is reasonable, although I think they were very upset, they are polite and kind, which in Rio de Janeiro alone is more than enough for us to think that the service is good. But it takes too long to get orders. The food is wonderful, we ordered a quinoa salad with shrimp which was delicious. The Apperol Spritz obviously loaded in sparkling water, it was good, but not the best I've ever had here in Rio, without comparisons with what I drank abroad. In summary, I think the restaurant is expensive but for those who want to have a drink and eat a little bullshit, it's good.

title: Cozy place
author: carlosdG6802PX
reviewBody: Z Café do Iguatemi is the ideal place to take a woman you are just getting to know, as it offers a cozy and peaceful environment. The place offers great a la carte dishes. I recommend the fillets with parmigiana or mustard sauce. It also has a divine flatbread sandwich. As a dessert, pie Z is a great choice. It is a chocolate mousse pie. Of course the coffees are great. If you're lucky, you can sit by tables with upholstered armchairs. They're great for dating. The service is excellent.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Joao Wallig 1800 LJ 2253, Area Externa Shopping Iguatemi

title: Good to go when you are very hungry!
author: Rogerio_px
reviewBody: It is a very simple place, but it pays off with the products it serves. The esfihas are huge and delicious, at a very comrade price. Tasty seasoning in the meat, quality tuna, tasty alici and very good cheeses. As if that were not enough, large and delicious Syrian sweets.

title: Bagaceira bar
author: Márcia C
reviewBody: It is a bar that is growing little by little, most of the people who frequent it are the people who come from the interior to live here. The price is affordable, but needs to improve Mt infrastructure yet. The good thing about the food here is the two basses of pepperoni are perfect.

itemReviewed.name: Bar e Restaurante Aconchego Do Matuto

title: Nice place.
author: tayaraw
reviewBody: The Italian air adds a special touch to the place. The food is good and the value for money too. The delay in service needs to be reviewed by the owners.

title: Disappointment
author: KarynedaCunha
reviewBody: We arrived, ordered a water and a beer, and the glass for the water came dirty with orange juice. We got up and left.

address.streetAddress: Quadra Qs 3 Lot 3/9 Store 21, Ed Patio Capital - Taguatinga

title: Excellent quality sushi
author: anamickelinac
reviewBody: Excellent sushi in Natal, is at the end of Afonso Pena, in the Tirol neighborhood. The pieces Jamb Flambado and special jow are delicious, the best on the menu! But all the pieces are fresh and made to order, and very tasty. There is a delivery service and the prices are very attractive.

title: Regional food anywhere
author: 897marioa
reviewBody: The Mangai of João Pessoa is cozy and everything is delicious. Prices are similar to Brasilia's and so is quality. It's worth trying the desserts too. ...

title: beer and beans
author: Duaguiar
reviewBody: has the best cinnamon beans. is close to the Campo Grande square. Cold beer to make the base before the block.

title: Great pastel
author: Lorrayne F
reviewBody: The service is very good, people are receptive. Clean and very cozy environment. Good location, central.

title: Steak Tartare
author: kaahren
reviewBody: Certainly the main highlight was the steak tartare, great choice of starter. We do not eat fondue because as many people have said there are other better places, but all the dishes were very good. The wine list is very extensive and has great options as the prices are not abusive. Sitting by the fireplace on cold days is a good choice. It is worth the fall for that special celebration!

title: Simply complete!
author: 7Raquel
reviewBody: A real complex located in Praia do Futuro, with massage, different types of food, live music all day and night attractions, with crabs and a humor show every Thursday! Love!!!

address.streetAddress: Av. Zeze Diogo 3125 Praia Do Futuro

title: Too good
author: romeuacjuniorc
reviewBody: I love the beautiful pasta there. This is my life saver at airports, because as I travel cheaply, I want to eat well for little, I love the pasta, the quality of the services, the friendly staff, the fresh vegetables, but only the line to buy is that sometimes I get discouraged a little.

address.streetAddress: Av. Cristiano Machado, 4000 Lj 325 Nível 2 União

title: Very good location, incredible view.
author: C_Campanaro
reviewBody: Skye, together with "Terraço Itália", has one of the best views of São Paulo. There is no doubt about the quality of the dishes, they are not great, but I think they are above average. A special caveat for Cocktails, very well prepared. Prices are high, it is true, but many places have very high prices and do not deliver what they promise! I'll be back.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Brigadeiro Luis Antonio, 4700 Jardim Paulista

title: Best shrimp dumpling with catupiry cheese
author: Rbotelli
reviewBody: The place is simple and always gets crowded at the weekend. The appetizers are very tasty and at a fair price. I find the shrimp dumpling phenomenal !!! super recommended!

title: The most precious jewel of the Maletta!
author: Bigmanbhz
reviewBody: Since the 1990s I have frequented Cantina do Lucas. A place with a “retro feel”, when time seemed to pass more slowly. The walls lined with dark woods, the ceiling decorated with old bottles of Italian wines, witnesses to countless customer confidences, almost always at parties. I have always had the pleasure of enjoying hearty and delicious dishes! How many times did I take home, even if only a little, what my eyes desired but my hunger didn't take care ... There are 3 different areas to receive people: on the outside, promoting interaction with the fauna that frequents mine dear Arcângelo Maletta Building. For those who enter, on the left we have the typical bar, suitable for the most lively conversation with the taste of beers, wines and other works blessed by Bacchus. Next to it, more lit, the favorite place for meals and lovers' courtship. I have only compliments to Lucas. It is not an affordable place. In fact, far from it. In the meantime, the customer will receive that true sensory investment back. Be it the flavors, smells, the happy hubbub of the tables next to you and so on ...

address.streetAddress: Av. Augusto de Lima, 233 - loja 18 Centro

title: Excellent!
author: Leonardo B
reviewBody: I went on Father's Day, where the movement was in great flux. We ordered a rump steak which was just fantastic! The service from the waiter was also excellent, which is very difficult here in São Luís.

address.streetAddress: Rua Independência Nº 10, Qdr 5, Ponta do Farol

title: Great restaurant in Rio de Janeiro
author: Ricardo C
reviewBody: Prime beef (the house's parrilla), excellent side dishes, great wine (the Alentejo Mariana that is on sale), excellent service and beautiful location. Rustic environment referring to a warehouse, very pleasant. It's not cheap, like any good steakhouse, but it was good value for money. A program to be repeated.

address.streetAddress: Av. Almirante Silvio de Noronha, 365 Shopping Bossa Nova

title: Excellent!
author: QuelFlorian_opolis
reviewBody: It's just praise, for the quality, the service, the abundance (serves 3 to 4 people) and the price (average of R $ 66.00). It is a must. The dishes are delicious, it is difficult to choose.

address.streetAddress: Av. Engenheiro Roberto Freire, 2610 Ponta Negra

title: Happy hour excelente
author: irenecpessoa
reviewBody: I love coconut bamboo happy hour, drinks are half the price, in addition to discounts on tickets. The waiter Marcílio is great. Highly recommend

address.streetAddress: Rua República da Armênia 1154 Água Fria

title: Family lunch
author: CarolinaC3194
reviewBody: As always, very nice place, delicious food, and excellent service from the MAIA waiter. Very attentive! I always recommend it to my friends.

address.streetAddress: Rua República da Armênia 1154 Água Fria

title: " Common "
author: Alessandra_1122
reviewBody: - Despite being highly recommended by friends and being trendy it didn't live up to expectations. We ordered a paella that looked like rice with a lot of coloring, the taste was not good. I hope to return and have a good experience!
